K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:53b-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i m'u la tantra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:53b-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:53b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:53b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:53b-7: bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs so so tha dad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:53b-9: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:53b-10: so sor rab tu gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:53b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:53b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:53b-16: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:53b-17: ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54a-0: rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang @54a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54a-1: chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54a-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54a-6: yid la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i sngags kyi gzhi dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54a-7: de shin tu legs par nyon la zungs shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54a-8: de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la lags so zhes gsol te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54a-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54a-10: sa chen po thob par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54a-11: rdo rje'i gdan gnon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54a-13: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54a-15: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54a-17: mi rnams su skye bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54a-20: nad rnams zhi bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54a-21: longs spyod kyis phyug pa 'dren par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54a-23: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi spyod pas phongs par mi byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54a-24: re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung 'bras bu med par byed pa ma yin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis @54b byams pa'i thugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54b-3: sems can thams cad thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54b-7: gnas gtsang ma'i gnas la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas dag pa'i yul la 'od rnam par spros te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54b-8: yul rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54b-9: bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu mdzod spu nas me tog kun tu skyes pa zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54b-10: byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od phyung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54b-11: 'od bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54b-12: byang shar gyi phyogs su brgya stong gi gang g'a'i klung gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54b-13: me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rjes su zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:54b-14: gang na me tog kun tu skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55a-0: der yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa dang @55a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55a-1: ldan pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55a-2: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'od zer gyi snang ba de mthong nas bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55a-4: 'od 'di ni nga la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yin gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55a-5: khyed cag g-yeng ba med par gyis shig ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55a-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mig mi 'dzums shing kha bye bas 'od gang na ba de logs su mngon du bltas nas 'dug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55a-7: de nas bskul ba'i 'od des me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55a-8: me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor nub par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55a-10: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55a-11: bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55a-12: spyi bos phyag btsal nas pus mo gams pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55b-0: bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po la 'di @55b skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55b-1: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la dgongs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55b-3: bdag ni bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la blta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55b-6: sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55b-16: dbang bskur ba bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55b-17: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas mchi bar 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55b-18: de skad ces bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55b-19: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs pa na phyogs bzhi mtha' yas mu med pa steng dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:55b-21: thad ka thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyogs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag par gang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56a-0: 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par la snyoms par zhugs pa @56a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56a-2: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi nus /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56a-3: byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56a-4: sa bcu la gnas pa dag gis kyang snyoms par zhugs par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par bgros te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56a-6: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba don thams cad sgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa ni yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56a-7: sems can thams cad kyi las thams cad byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56a-8: sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par can bzang po yang dag par sgrub par byed pa'o; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa yud tsam zhig cang mi gsung bar gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56a-9: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang dag par dgongs nas byams pa'i thugs kyis sngags gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56a-11: na ma:sarba bud dh'a n'am aam mam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56a-12: 'di ni 'jam dpal gyi snying po mchog yin te las thams cad byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56b-0: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge @56b 'dzin de las langs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56b-2: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56b-4: se gol gtogs pa tsam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56b-5: mig 'byed 'dzums tsam la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi shugs blo ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56b-6: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su chas te sngar 'khod nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56b-7: steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na nor bu rin po che rab tu gnas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams gnas su 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56b-8: gnas gtsang ma'i gnas de thams cad 'od chen po'i snang bas gsal bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56b-9: 'od kyi rin po ches rab tu brgyan cing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56b-10: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56b-12: dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du ma rgya che ba'i lha'i gos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56b-13: dar mang po'i tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56b-15: de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:56b-16: 'on kyang nga'i bkas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la gnod pa nyung ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57a-2: bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhu bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57a-6: gang g'a'i klung brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi sngags kyi spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57a-15: brtul zhugs bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57a-16: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57a-17: 'od rin po che'i tshogs kyis rab 'byams /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57a-21: rgyal po'i dbang phyug lung ston par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57a-23: yul gyi mthar 'gro bar byed pa mi snang bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57a-25: dam tshig rab 'byams kyi tshogs thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57a-26: 'jig rten pa ma lus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57a-27: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57b-0: rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'byung ba'i spyod pa mthar thug @57b pa gsungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57b-3: de ltar rjes su yi rang ba nyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57b-5: de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig; sh'akya thub pa'i spyan sngar mngon sum du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur te khyod kyang ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57b-7: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga ta n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57b-8: aa tsin tya aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57b-9: aom sma ra sma ra aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa na ku m'a ra r'u pa ha ri na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57b-10: aom h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57b-11: 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags so; ;de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57b-14: khyod kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas dbye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57b-15: rnam par dbye ba rgya cher ston par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bas kyang las thams cad byed pa 'di rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57b-17: 'dir snying po mchog tu gyur pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57b-18: aom b'a kye dam na ma:'dir nye ba'i snying po ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:57b-20: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas gnang nas bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58a-1: snying po thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58a-2: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub ba la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog rnam par bkod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58a-6: rin po che'i dril bu'i dra bas 'brel ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58a-8: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58a-12: phye ma'i char dbab par mngon par sprul to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58a-13: de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas ba spu ldang zhing gnas g-yo ba mthong nas snying 'dar zhing dngangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58a-14: ci bdag cag gi 'byor pa nyams par ma gyur tam zhes phan tshun du rings par 'gro zhing skad mthon pos smra ba rtsom par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58a-19: yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur @58b gyur pa 'di ni me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan snga nas nga la blta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-3: don chen po'i spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-5: rgya che zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi tshig ston pa'i phyir 'ongs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-6: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-7: mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing zhabs gnyis la btud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-8: tshig 'bru 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-9: skyes bu bskyed pa khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-10: skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-11: skyes bu gtso bo khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-12: spyod pa thams cad don sgrub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-13: skyes bu seng ge khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-14: phung khrol thams cad zlog byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-15: dpa' po chen po khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-17: skyes bu pad dkar khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-18: kun nas bsod nams dri ldan ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-20: srid gsum 'dam ni rnam dag byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-21: rnam grol khyed la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-22: sdug bsngal ma lus rnam grol byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-25: thams cad ldan pa legs 'dul byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-26: thams cad grub pa khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-27: sngags kyi spyod pa'i don sgrub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:58b-28: bkra shis khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:59a-0: @59a *// bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:59a-1: sangs rgyas kun la khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:59a-2: chos kun rnam bar rtog mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:59a-3: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid spros pa med pa'i ngo bo la yang dag par rjes su zhugs shing ston par byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:59a-5: shes bya'i dngos po thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:59a-8: theg pa gsum gyi lam dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:59a-9: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jog par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:59a-10: gnas par byed pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig 'bru 'di dag brjod pa'i bstod pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:59a-12: 'di nas gang+g'a'i klung brgya phrag stong gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na me tog yang dag par skyes pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:59a-13: de na me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang du bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa dbang po'i rgyal po /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:74b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong du ma'i rdu phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par rab tu g-yos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:74b-10: snang ba chen pos gsal bar yang byas nas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs skyed pa ston te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:74b-11: rang gi sngags kyi tshig kyang ston pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:74b-12: na ma: sa manta bud dh'a n'am/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:74b-14: na ma: phra tye ka bud dh'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:74b-16: na mo bo dhi sa tv'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:74b-17: da sha bh'u mi pra tishtha te shva r'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:74b-21: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:74b-22: dushta sa tva da ma ka aa si mu sa la bar shu p'a sha ha sta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:74b-29: sarba bhu ta bha yam ka ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75a-0: aatta tta h'a sa ni n'a di @75a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75a-1: ne; bya ghra tsarma ni p'a sa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75a-13: pra be sha ya pra be sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75a-15: pee ba satva dzi bi t'anta ka ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75a-16: ku ru ku ru ma ma sarba k'aryan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75a-19: m'a bi lamba m'a bi lamba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75a-20: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75a-22: spho ta ya spho ta ya /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75a-24: he bha ga b'an kanyts [?] i r'a ya si ma ma sarb'a rtham s'a dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75a-27: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i khro bo chen po gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75a-28: gshin rje'i rgyal po yang 'joms pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75a-30: khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gzungs sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sems can thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75a-37: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ma gtogs par skyabs gzhan med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75a-39: dpung gnyen gzhan med par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75a-40: de nas gang su dag sa la gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75b-0: nam @75b mkha' la gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75b-2: mi brtan par gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75b-4: sgo nga las skyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75b-5: drod gsher las skyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75b-6: rdzus te skyes pa'i sems can gyi grangs su gtogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag na rnam par gnas pa steng dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75b-10: phyogs mtshams dag tu skad cig de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75b-11: yud tsam de la gab cing gnas pa dag skad cig de nyid la khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'di nyid du bkug par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75b-12: khro bo rgyal po'i sngags 'di ni 'dod chags dang ma bral ba rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75b-16: dam tshig la dmigs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75b-17: sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75b-19: yang na las gzhan gyi ched du brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75b-21: de dag tu ni brjod par mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75b-25: bdag nyid 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:75b-26: thugs rje mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:76a-1: dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kho na'i spyod pa rjes su bsgrub cing bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:76a-2: sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:76a-3: chos kyi tshul yang dag par gnas par bya ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:76a-6: lam gsum la yang dag par sbyor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:76a-7: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi bcad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:76a-8: sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:76a-13: gzhan gyi stobs rnam par gzhig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:76a-16: mi snang bar bya ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:76b-2: rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems kyis smras so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:76b-24: kampo tse'i mi chen po dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:76b-46: gzugs can ma chen mo dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:77a-14: yud tsam las byung ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:77b-45: khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos bkug pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:78a-17: mgo mtha' yas pa yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:78a-18: gang yang sha za chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:78a-19: sha za'i 'khor bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa de dag kyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:78a-26: bsam pa ma yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:78a-27: gdung ba bzang po dang; za byed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:78a-30: mi bzad pa'i gzugs can yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:78a-31: gang yang klu'i rgyal po chen po klu bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:78b-28: drang srong chen po de dag la /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:78b-52: shing pi pa la gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:78b-53: shing pi pa la za ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:80a-5: gzhal med khang na gnas pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:80a-26: bar snang la spyod pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:80a-33: pa bsangs dang; spen pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:81a-2: chu smad dang; gro bzhin dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:81a-25: khyim sum cu rtsa drug la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:81b-2: dmyal ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:82a-12: shin tu mi bzad ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:82a-16: gsang ba dam pa ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:82a-17: shing la mu la gnas ma dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:82b-1: phyag dar khrod kyi sha za mo dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:82b-26: ma mo chen mo dag 'jig rten gyi rjes su rnam par spyod cing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing gtor ma dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:83a-7: ma mo chen mo de dag kyang ma mo'i 'khor bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i tshig 'don cing 'khod par gyur to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:83a-11: sems can ma yin pa nas dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du thams cad kyang skabs 'dir nam mkha'i dkyil du snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:83a-12: sems can gyi ris na srog chags su la yang phan tshun mi mthun pa med par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:83a-13: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:83a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul gyi rgyan gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:83a-15: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sems can thams cad kyi spyi bo'i gtsug na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:83a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:83b-0: sngags kyi spyod pa'i don @83b rnam par gtan la dbab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:83b-1: ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u rab 'byams byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gang 'di bshad pa'i dus la bab par sems na shod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:83b-2: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas rjes su gnang bar mdzad pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:83b-3: nam mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje mthug cing sra ba'i rgyud bkod pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:83b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang de dpag ched brgya stong du ma rgya che ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin du lhag par gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:83b-11: sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gzhal med khang de dag rdo rje nor bu rin po che lta bur gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:83b-12: der rab tu zhugs nas 'khod par gyur kyang phan tshun rnam par 'tshe bar byed pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:83b-13: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de 'dus par gyur par shes nas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84a-0: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rjes su nges par 'byung bar byed pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa @84a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84a-1: 'di'i sems can thams cad srungs shig srungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84a-3: ma rungs pa gdul bar gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84a-4: sems can zhi ba dag sad par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84a-5: sems can thams cad dad par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84a-6: ji srid du nga'i rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod rgya che ba dag las sngags spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'chad par byed pa de srid kyi bar du 'di dag gi phyi rol tu sang la srung ba gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84a-8: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84a-9: khro bo'i rgyal pos bka' mnyan nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84a-10: khro bo chen po'i gzugs kyis sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84a-11: rjes su bstan pa'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed khro bo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma phyogs bzhi kun dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84a-14: thad ka dag tu shin tu mi bzad pa'i sgra rab tu 'don cing gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84a-15: de nas sems can de dag zhi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84a-17: sems bzang po dang ldan par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84a-18: bka' las mi 'da' bar byed par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84a-19: 'di lta bu'i sgra yang thos par gyur te gang dam tshig 'di las 'da' par byed pa de dag ni aardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur to /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84b-0: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyang de yin @84b no; ;de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa'i don du chos kyi tshig smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84b-1: chos gcig la yang dag par bsams na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84b-4: chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i rnam par rjes su mthong ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis la rab tu gnas na sngags 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84b-7: byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84b-8: sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84b-9: chos gsum dang ldan na sngags kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84b-11: sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84b-13: rang gi sngags yongs su mi gtong ba nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84b-14: chos bzhi dang yang dag par ldan na dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84b-16: rang gi sngags yongs su mi gtong pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84b-17: gzhan gyi sngags rjes su gcod pa med pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84b-18: sems can thams cad la byams pas gnas pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:84b-19: snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i sems pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85a-0: chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na dang po sems bskyed @85a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85a-1: pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85a-2: chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug cing sngags kyi spyod pa sgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85a-4: rnam par dben pa'i phyogs yang dag par bsten pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85a-5: bas mtha' dgon pa sten par byed pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85a-6: sems can gzhan la zhe sdang med pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85a-7: 'jig rten pa'i sngags la mi lta ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85a-10: spyod pa la gnas par byed pa nyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85a-11: chos lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na sngags spyod pa'i don 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85a-12: chos drug dang ldan na sngags kyi spyod pa 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85a-14: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rjes su mi gcod pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85a-15: byang chub sems dpa' la dang ba rjes su mi gcod pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85a-16: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags la kun tu dga' ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85a-17: chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa la lta ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85a-18: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab mo'i tshig gi don mi spong zhing skyo ba med pa'i sems nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85a-19: sngags kyi spyod pa yongs su btsal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85a-20: dge ba'i phyogs yongs su mi gtong ba nyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85b-0: chos drug po 'di dag dang ldan na @85b rig pa'i spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85b-1: sngags 'grub cing yang dag par sgrub pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85b-2: chos bdun dang ldan na rig pa sgrub pa'i dus kyi thabs thob par 'gyur zhing sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85b-4: theg pa zab mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid sgom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mos pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85b-16: dka' thub la gzhol ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85b-21: bstan pa la bsnyen pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85b-24: zab pa'i chos kyi tshul la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85b-25: rang dga'i sngags dgug pa'i bya ba la mkhas pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85b-29: dga' ba chen po nyid yongs su bsgom pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85b-30: spros pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su 'tshol ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:85b-31: sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-0: theg pa dman pa la dga' ba med @86a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-2: chos bdun po de dag gis ni rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-3: sngags 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-4: chos brgyad dang ldan na rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-5: sngags kyi spyod pa'i don 'grub cing lam du 'gro bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-8: ma mthong pa'i 'bras bu dag la blta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-11: rnam par 'phrul pa nyid la the tshom med cing dang pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-12: phyin ci ma ldog pa'i sngags gzung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-13: bla ma la gus pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-15: byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-17: spyod pa bstan pa mi slu ba bzung zhing bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-19: gnas ma yin pa rmi lam na mthong ba rab tu ston pa la mkhas pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-22: rmugs pa mtha' dag dang bral bar byed cing rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-24: byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid 'bul bar byed pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-25: mdor bsdu na dge ba'i rtsa bas cho ga mi shes shing go cha chen po bgos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-26: bgegs thams cad rab tu sel bar 'dod pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86a-27: byang chub kyi snying po gnon ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86b-1: dbang che bar grags par bdag nyid 'dod pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86b-2: dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag la bsnyen pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86b-3: dge ba'i bshes dang mi 'bral bar bya ba dang; byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la nye bar gnas pa nyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86b-4: chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na sngags spyod pa'i don 'grub pa'i yang dag pa'i lam du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86b-6: byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86b-7: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86b-8: mchog tu sdug bsngal zhing tshul khrims nyams pa la yang mi skyo ba'i yid kyis rtag tu mngon par brtson pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86b-9: nga'i sngags kyi le'u rab 'byams mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i yid las byung ba 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86b-10: de las gzhan du shes par bya ba ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86b-11: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid du byas nas nyam sad pa'i phyir yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86b-12: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:86b-15: 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dag gis 'di skad du tshig brjod par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87a-0: sngags kyi spyod pa'i don rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya ba chos kyi @87a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87a-1: tshul la rjes su 'jug pa dang mthun zhing chos bstan pa legs par bstan pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87a-2: des na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa dang rjes su mthun zhing sngags kyi spyod pa dang rjes su mthun pa legs par bstan pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87a-4: gang la la zhig 'dus pa'i le'u 'di klog par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87a-7: g-yul gyi thog mar glang po che'i steng du bzhag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87a-12: byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par byed na de la bdag cag byin gyis rlob par byed cing phyir rgol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87a-13: dgra bo dag kyang dbang du 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87a-14: gzhan gyi dmag gi dpung yang gzhig par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87a-15: glegs bam la bris pa byas te rang gi khyim du bzhag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87a-24: dge bsnyen ma dag la srung ba chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87a-25: longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87a-28: longs spyod rtag tu mngon par 'phel ba nyid kyang bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87b-0: de @87b skad ces smras nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87b-1: theg pa chen po sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i cho ga zhi ba mo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87b-2: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u rab 'byams rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87b-4: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la bltas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87b-5: sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su 'jug cing kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87b-6: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs nas 'od zer bye ba brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa'i 'od zer phyung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87b-7: sems can gyi khams thams cad kun tu snang bar byas nas slar log ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87b-8: gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang snang bar byas nas 'khod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87b-10: sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u rab 'byams kyi spyod pa sgrub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:87b-11: sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88a-0: khyod kyi sngags kyi tshogs gang du sems can yang dag @88a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88a-2: 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags 'grub pa yang dag par thob par 'gyur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88a-3: sems dpa' chen po; khyod smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88a-5: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88a-6: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88a-7: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88a-8: rig pa thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88a-9: lag pa g-yas pa bteg nas sor mo'i rtse mos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la ston par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88a-10: sor mo'i rtse mo de las rig pa'i rgyal po bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88a-11: gyur nas kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad snang ba chen pos gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88a-12: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi snying po las thams cad byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88a-22: chu la mi nub par 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88b-2: mar me dag kyang rang gi rgyud kyi sngags kyis sbyin par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88b-4: ji lta ji ltar sbyar bde lta de ltar sgrub par byed pa ni yi ge gsum zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88b-5: stobs chen po don thams cad sgrub par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88b-6: khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88b-9: 'di ni khro bo chen po de'i snying po ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88b-12: sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis smras te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88b-13: bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88b-14: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lag pa g-yas pa bteg ste khro bo'i spyi bor bzhag pa byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88b-16: sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88b-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88b-18: gang su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par gnas shing mtha' yas mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dam tshig la lhag par gnas par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88b-19: de skad smras nas khro bo'i rgyal po la lag pa bskor nas btang par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:88b-20: khro bo'i rgyal po chen po btang ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:89a-0: skad cig tsam gyis gang dag sdang ba'i @89a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:89a-1: bsam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rdzu 'phrul che ba dag tshar bcad cing der bkug par gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:89a-2: chos kyi dkyil 'khor chen po gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang der yang dag par bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:89a-3: gnas ji lta ba bzhin gnas par byas nas sems can ma rungs pa dag la yang kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i tshogs su byas shing spyi bo la yang dag par gnas par byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:89a-4: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de la yang bltas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:89a-5: sems can khyed cag thams cad nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:89a-6: gang yang dam tshig 'di las 'das par gyur na de la khro bo'i rgyal po 'dis chad pa gcod par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:89a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:89a-9: sngags kyi don gyi tshig gsang ba byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis mdor bstan pa brjod par bya yi /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:93a-9: phung khrol thams cad zlog par byed pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:93a-13: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzlas pa byas na grub pa'i dus su khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:93a-20: bi sardzdza ya sa ba bi b'a ram sv'a bh'a ba n'am tsa pra be sha ya sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sarb'a rth'a shtsa ma sid dhyantu mantra p'a da ma no ra thanytsa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:93a-21: me pa ri p'u ra yantu sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:93a-22: 'di ni gshegs su gsol pa'i sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:93a-23: las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:93b-0: phyag rgya ni bzang po'i gdan zhes bya ba yin @93b ta; 'dis gdan la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:93b-1: yid kyis bzlas pa bdun byas te gshegs su gsol lo //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-10: gdengs ka can gyi dug rnams 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-11: phyag rgya che dang sbyar byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-12: phung khrol shin tu mi bzad 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-13: gnas dang 'gro ba'i dug dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-14: gso bar byed par the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-15: sems can gdul ba'i thabs su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-17: nam mkha' lding gzugs la spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-19: ji srid nam mkha' lding rgyud du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-20: cho ga rgya cher bstan de dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-21: sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-22: thams cad nga yis bstan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-23: byang sems dpa' nam mkha' lding //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-24: gdul ba'i don du 'di bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-25: gdengs can dug ni gzhom bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-26: 'dab chags tshul gyis rnam par rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-27: 'jig rten sngags ni ji srid pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-28: cho ga 'di ni bstan pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-29: sems can gdul bya'i don du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-30: de lta de ltar rnam par rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97a-31: gang yang de bzhin gshegs sngags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-0: rdo rje padma'i rigs @97b dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-1: nga yis cho ga rab 'byams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-2: mdo dag kyang ni bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-3: ji ltar ma mo mang po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-4: 'bad pas byis pa rnam srung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-5: de bzhin byis pa blo can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-6: sngags kyi tshul gyi nga yis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-7: sngon ni stobs bcu ldan pas bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-8: da ni nga yis bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-9: sngags rgyud don ni ma lus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-10: 'od chen gzhon nus bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-11: rgyal ba mchog gis gang gsungs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-12: stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras gsungs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-13: rmad byung bsam mi khyab tshul gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-14: 'jam dbyangs kyis gsungs de dag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-15: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-16: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas dam tshig yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-17: gang du ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sems can mtha' dag gi sgrub pa'i spyod pa sems la rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:97b-18: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che sna tshogs pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98a-0: bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rang sangs rgyas thams @98a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98a-4: sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa dag gis kyang dkyil 'khor de bri ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98a-5: 'dri 'jug par mi nus na so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i sems can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98a-6: 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang po de grub pa'i gnas skabs la gnas pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzigs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98a-8: rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98a-9: 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98a-11: rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98a-12: spyod pa la zhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98a-13: zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98a-14: zag pa med pa thams cad 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98a-16: ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyi thugs las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs par bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98a-17: sems can so so'i skye bo'i yid kyis kyang de dmigs par mi nus na bri ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98a-18: 'dir 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98b-0: de nas @98b 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dkyil 'khor chen po bzang po de la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can de dag la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98b-1: grogs po dag nyon cig 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98b-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98b-4: 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98b-5: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98b-7: mi las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa yid las byung ba ni bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98b-8: mi rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das na'ang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98b-10: sems can rnams gang du yang dag par zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98b-12: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98b-13: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98b-15: gang de dus la bab par shes na gsungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98b-19: sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98b-20: sa steng khyod kyi dkyil 'khor byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:98b-21: mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig rten na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99a-2: dam tshig bdag por ma gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99a-3: bdag nyid chen po tshangs pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99a-5: sngags la dad pa med pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99a-6: 'bad pa du ma byas gyur kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99a-8: ma rungs dam tshig mi bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99a-9: dam tshig sbyor ba nyams pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99a-10: rab 'byams brgya byin yin na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99a-12: mi rnams smos kyang ci zhig dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99a-13: dam tshig bstan bcos de nyid shes; ;las kyi spyod pa sgrub pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99a-16: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ni; ;las kun byed la rab zhugs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99a-17: bstan pa la ni gzhon nu bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99a-19: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sems dpa' chen po de la gsol ba btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99a-21: sems can gyi don gyi phyir mdor bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs shig ces so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99a-22: gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99a-23: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sems can gyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor gyi chog smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99b-0: re zhig dang po cho 'phrul @99b gyi zla phyed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99b-6: rgyu skar bzang po dang ldan pa yar ngo'i tshes gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99b-8: dus gzhan la dbyar gyi dus spangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99b-9: snga dro sa byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99b-10: gang du grong khyer chen po la brten pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99b-11: dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon rang nyid 'dug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99b-12: rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa'i gnas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99b-13: rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang nye ba'i grong khyer chen po'i byang shar gyi phyogs su ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi nye bar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99b-14: lo ma'i spyil bu byas pa la zhag bdun nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99b-15: zla ba phyed kyi bar du gcig pu rab tu gnas par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99b-16: gang gnas de dag tu yang gtsang ma'i sa phyogs rdo ba med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99b-23: shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa'i sa phyogs su srog chags med pa'i chu la ba'i rnam lnga 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99b-26: gur gum gyi chus bsres pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99b-27: khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:99b-28: gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas sa phyogs der phyogs bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100a-0: phyogs mtshams thams cad du bsang @100a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100a-2: de nas phyogs der kun nas gru bzhir khru bcu drug gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100a-5: de la chen po khru bcu drug pa'o; ;'bring ni khru bcu gnyis pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100a-6: chung ngu ni khru brgyad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100a-8: thams cad gzigs pas gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100a-9: rgyal po 'dod pas chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100a-11: chung ngus dam tshig yang dag srung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100a-12: las rnams kun byed zhi ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100a-13: de dag las yid la gang 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba ni de la sa phyogs der khru do tsam brkos la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100a-19: srog chags kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs gal te mthong na sa'i phyogs gzhan du brko ba byas na gnod pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100a-24: chu bo chen po'i ngogs su bye ma'i phung po chen po rnams 'bad pas shin tu so sor brtags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100a-26: srog chags med par byas la bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100a-27: sa phyogs de yang srog chags med pa'i chu la ba'i rnam pa lnga bsres te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100a-28: chu bo'i klung gi sa gtsang ma 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100b-0: grog mkhar gyi sa gang du @100b srog chags med pa'i sa des dgang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100b-1: bkang nas kyang legs par brdungs te kun nas mnyam par byas la dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum gang 'dod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100b-2: seng ldeng gi phur pa bzhi la khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags lan bdun bzla zhing phyogs bzhir gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100b-3: tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la khro bo'i snying po lan bdun bzlas pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100b-4: dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi kun nas bskor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100b-5: de bzhin du dbus kyi gnas su nang du yang zur bzhir bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100b-6: dbus na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis rang gi rig pa rtsa ba'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100b-7: gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis grogs po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100b-8: bdag nyid bsrung bar byas la; sngags zlo bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100b-9: dkyil 'khor de la g-yas su bskor ba byas nas kha shar phyogs su bltas te ku sha'i stan la 'dug par bya'o; ;sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100b-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid la byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100b-11: dkyil 'khor de'i gru bzhi kun tu ku shas bskor zhing dgram par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:100b-12: de nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang pa rnams zhag gcig gnas pas bsnyal zhing dbyung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101a-0: de la dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngon du bya ba rnams byas nas rang gi rgyud kyi sngags la mkha' @101a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101a-2: sems can gyi don gyi thabs kyi phyir theg pa chen po la mos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101a-3: zhag gcig smyung bar byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101a-4: grogs bzang po dang ldan pa dang; bstan bcos sna tshogs kyi las mthong bas tshon sna lnga'i phye ma zhib mo shin tu gsal zhing legs par sbyar ba byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101a-5: yi ge drug pa'i snying po mngon par bzlas pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101a-6: phyi rol tu yang rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101a-9: chu shing 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis g-yur za ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101a-14: bkra shis pa'i sgra sgrogs pa dag bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101a-15: zur bzhi nas chos mnyan pa dag la bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101a-16: phyogs bzhir theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bklag par bya ba la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101a-18: bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lho phyogs su bklag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101a-19: 'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin nub phyogs su bklag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101a-20: 'phags pa sdong po brgyan pa byang phyogs su bklag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101a-21: 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde shar phyogs su bklag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-0: glegs bam dag med na mdo sde bzhi po shes pa'i gang zag chos 'chad pa po la chos mnyan pa'i phyir bskul @101b bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-1: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon langs nas tsandan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-3: gur gum bsres pa'i me tog dri zhim pa dkar po [?] rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-4: dkyil 'khor de thams cad du chal par dgram par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-5: mngon par bkram pa byas nas phyi rol tu byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-6: zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i kha zas bsten pa'i ri mo mkhan gnyis sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-7: gsum byang chub tu sems bskyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-8: gso sbyong nye bar bsten pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-10: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gtsug phud bcing ba byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-14: rin po che rnams pa sna tshogs las tshon sna lnga shin tu mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba'i phye ma zhib mo rab tu blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-15: longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-16: chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dag 'drir gzhug pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-17: dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis nges par byang chub 'thob pa yin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-18: sngags sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-20: sems can bsod nams chung ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-24: skye bo phongs par gzigs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-25: nyung zhing dkyil bsdus dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:101b-26: mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:102a-1: phye ma shin tu zhib pa'i tshon sna lnga bzang po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:102a-6: ljang gu dag gis bsgyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:102a-7: sngar bzhag pa'i tshon gyi phye ma slob dpon rang gis blangs nas gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:102a-8: rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas phye ma de la phyag rgya bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:102a-9: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs su cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis thab khung bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:102a-10: rgyar khru do la zabs su khru gang pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:102a-11: kun nas 'khor bar padma'i ze ba 'dra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:102a-12: phyi rol yang padma'i ze ba 'dra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:102a-13: shing pa la sha'i yam shing gis me sbar bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:102a-14: shing bil ba'i yam shing mtho gang tsam rlon pa la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:102a-16: mar la btags pa la rtsa ba'i sngags 'bru drug pa'am /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:106b-14: de'i yang g-yon phyogs su chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba dang ldan pa bri'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107a-4: sgo dag ni rgyab kyis lta ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107a-6: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thams du 'gyur ba yang kha dog lnga'i tshon shin tu gsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107a-7: sna tshogs blta na sdug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107a-9: rta babs bzhi'i rnam pa phyogs bzhir khru gnyis tsam; nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su tshangs pa chen po bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107a-11: gos dkar po bgos pa la stod g-yogs gos dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107a-12: tshangs skud dkar po thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107a-17: de'i g-yas phyogs su 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107a-19: bsam gtan khyad par can gyi gzugs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107a-21: dar la'i stod g-yogs byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107a-24: mchod phyir thogs dkar po can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107a-26: lag pa g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-0: de'i g-yas phyogs @107b su 'og min gyi lha'i bu bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-1: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-3: bsam gtan gyi rnam pa'i cha byad can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-5: dar la'i gos kyi stod g-yogs byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-7: lag pa g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-8: mchod phyir thogs dkar pos byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-9: de'i rim gyis dga' ldan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-10: 'phrul dga' dang; gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-12: brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-13: go rims ji lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-15: dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-16: brgya byin gyi 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris la rtag tu myos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-20: sa bla'i lha'i bu dag go rims ji lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-21: cha byad ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-22: de bzhin du lho phyogs su mi che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-27: bsod nams skyes la sogs pa'i lha'i pu cha byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-28: dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-30: byang phyogs su yang de bzhin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-31: de dag ni rim pa 'og ma gnyis la brten te bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:107b-32: dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi phyi rol tu dkyil 'khor gsum par 'gyur ba la mthar gyis phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108a-1: 'jug pa'i g-yas ngos su gter nye bar gnas pa la gnod spyin rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108a-4: de'i g-yas su nor bu bzang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108a-5: gang ba bzang po gnod spyin gyi bdag po gnyis bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108a-6: de bzhin du mthar gyis gnod spyin mo chen mo 'phrog ma yang bri'o; ;de bzhin du mthar gyis nub phyogs su chu lha lag na zhags pa thogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108a-10: nor rgyas la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po chen po brgyad po bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108a-11: de bzhin du rim pa gnyis la gnas pa'i mthar gyis gnod sbyin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108a-15: drang srong dang; grub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108a-20: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108a-22: nor bu rin po che'i bye brag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108a-26: mthar gyis gtso bo thams cad bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108a-27: lho phyogs su ni gshin rje ma mo bdun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108a-28: shar lho mtshams su me kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108a-31: phreng ba lag na thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-0: dar @108b la'i stod g-yogs byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-1: mchod phyir thogs dkar po thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-3: thal ba'i thig le gsum byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-7: kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa rim pa gnyis pa la brten te bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-8: thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo'i phyi rol tu dka' zlog gi bdag po khyu mchog la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-9: lag na mdung rtse gsum thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-10: lha mo dka' zlog ma kha dog sna tshogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-11: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-12: smin drug gi bu rma bya'i stan la 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-18: gos ser bo'i stod g-yogs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-19: lag pa g-yon pa na dril bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-20: ba dan dmar po thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-21: mthar gyis bhring gi ri ti shin tu ring pa 'dri ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-22: tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-25: ma mo bdun po rgyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-28: dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-31: khyab 'jug lag pa bzhi na 'khor lo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-35: gdan nam mkha' lding rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:108b-37: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109a-1: gza' brgyad sa steng gi dkyil 'khor na rab tu rgyu ba yang bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109a-2: mthar gyis tshes grangs bco lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109a-9: sring mo bzhi gru la zhon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109a-10: ming po lnga gru la zhon cing tshul gnas pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109a-11: mdor na phyag rgyar gzhag par bya ba yang yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109a-12: lha mo de dag mthar gyis rim pa gnyis pa la brten te bya ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109a-13: slob dpon bdag nyid phyi rol tu byung nas dkyil 'khor de la g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109a-14: mdor na dkyil 'khor gsum yang dkyil 'khor gsum la brten cing bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109a-15: dkyil 'khor gsum char yang gru bzhir rnam par gnas par bya ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109a-17: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi mgon po ni nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109a-18: padma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109a-19: rdo rje'i rigs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'ang nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109a-20: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtso bo 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'ang nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109a-21: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109b-0: lhag ma rnams ni ji ltar rnam par gzhag @109b pa bzhin phyag rgya bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109b-2: dkyil 'khor bar ma la yang shar phyogs su ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109b-3: de bzhin du 'od gsal ba ni lho phyogs su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109b-4: 'og min gyi gzugs can rnams lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109b-5: 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar ni brjod par mi bya'o; ;byang phyogs su brgya byin lha'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109b-10: 'od chung la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams nges par lha'i rgyal po re re bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109b-11: lhag ma rnams ni phyag rgyar gnas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109b-12: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gsum par yang byang phyogs su 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan dka' thub zlog ma dang bcas pa nges par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109b-13: 'jam dpal gyi sgo gnyis pa'i sgo'i drung du ni smin drug gi bu rma bya'i stan yod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109b-15: lus kyi kha dog dmar pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109b-16: gos ser pos stod g-yogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109b-18: lag pa g-yas pa na dril bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109b-20: gzhon nu'i gzugs can 'khor la lta ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109b-21: shar phyogs su ni nam mkha' lding 'dab chags kyi gzugs can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:109b-22: drang srong gi nang nas mar kanda nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-0: lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa @110a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-1: bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-2: shar lhor ni gzhon nu ma bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-3: ming po gzhon nu dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-4: gru'i bzhon pa la gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-5: rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par rgyu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-6: me lha'i rgyal po yang nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-7: de bzhin du lho phyogs su ni srin po'i bdag po las ni grong khyer lang ka'i bdag po bi bhi sha na shing pi tsu mrda la gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-8: dzambha la chu dbang zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-9: de bzhin du mthar gyis gshin rje'i rgyal po yi dvags rdzu 'phrul chen po nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-10: de bzhin du sha za'i rgyal po rnam par g-yengs byed ces bya ba nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-11: lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri rar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-12: de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams su ni klu'i gtso bo dga' bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-13: nye dga' bo nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-14: gza'i gtso bo nyi ma bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-15: nub phyogs su ni drang srong thub pa'i mchog gcar bu pa mu stegs kyi mchog gcer bu'i gzugs bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-16: lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-17: nub byang mtshams su ni gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po mchog sbyin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-18: dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110a-19: mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110b-0: @110b lhag ma ni gnas ji lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110b-1: dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110b-2: dkyil 'khor bzhi pa byi rol tu ri mo lngar bkod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110b-3: phyag rgya'i phreng bas nye bar mdzes par byas pa; zur bzhi nas rta babs bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110b-4: rgyal po chen po bzhis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110b-7: phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sgor 'jug pa la autpa la sngon po bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110b-8: g-yas dang; g-yon gyi phyogs su ni padma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110b-28: 'di dag rnam pa 'di dag 'dra ba'i mtshon cha'i mchog gi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs su kun nas khyab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110b-29: de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir rgya mtsho chen po gzhag par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110b-30: byang phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110b-31: sna tshogs rdo rje rtse gsum yod pa kun nas 'bar ba bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110b-32: shar phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs can byas te bzhag la kun nas 'bar ba'i padma'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110b-33: lho phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor zur gsum pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:110b-34: kun nas 'bar ba'i lhung bzed kyis mtshan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-1: kun nas zlum por byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-2: autpa la sngon po sdong bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-3: 'dab ma dang bcas pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-4: phyogs mtshams bzhir yang phyag rgya bri bar bya ba yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-5: nub byang gi phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor zlum po bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-6: zhags pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-7: lho nub kyi mtshams su ni dkyil 'khor gzhu 'dra ba bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-8: dbyug pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-9: shar lho'i mtshams su ni dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-10: dgra sta 'od zer kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o; ;byang shar gyi mtshams su ni ral gri 'od kun nas 'bar ba gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-11: de ltar thams cad bris nas steng dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-13: thang kar phyag rgya gsum dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol sgo dang nye bar phye ma dang bri bar bya la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-17: lha mo 'od zer kun nas 'bar ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-18: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo can gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-19: sems can rnams la phan bzhed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-20: dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-21: 'dir ni mdor bsdus bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-22: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dang po nyid du slob ma gzung bar bya ba la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-23: dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111a-24: yan lag thams cad mdzes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-0: rje'u rigs dang @111b dmangs rigs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-1: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-2: theg pa chen por zhugs pa'i rang bzhin can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-3: theg pa dman pa'i 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-5: dad pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-7: rgyal po chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-8: longs spyod chung ba la smod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-9: longs spyod chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-12: dul ba dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-13: tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-16: dge bsnyen ma rnams yang dag par sdom pa la nges par gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-17: gso sbyong la nye bar gnas shing sdom pa la gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-18: byang chub sems dpa' chen po la zhe mi sdang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-21: rang bzhin nyid kyis chos spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-22: zhag gcig smyung ba byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-23: gos gtsang ma bgos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-25: dus gsum du khrus byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-26: de'i nyin zhag la ga pur dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-28: li shi'i dri zhim pos dri zhim par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-29: rtag tu nye reg dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-30: ku sha'i khres la 'dug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-31: srung ba'i cho ga byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-33: bden pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:111b-34: dus mtshams las rgyal ba dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol de nyid du ha cang yang mi nye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112a-1: mi ring bar gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112a-3: shin tu gtsang sbra dang ldan pa gcig nas brgyad kyi bar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112a-4: de las gzhan ma yin pa de dag kyang phan tshun gnyen du 'brel ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112a-5: rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po dag gi bu gzhon nu ma'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112a-6: gzhon nu grong gi chos mi shes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112a-8: bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal ni byis pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112a-9: gzhon nu'i rol pa la dgyes pa des na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112a-10: dang po nyid du gzhon nu nang du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112a-11: rgyal po chen po mngon par 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112a-15: skal ba chen po mngon par 'phel ba yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112a-16: khyad par du byis pa rnams la nges par sngags grub pas grub pa gnas pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112a-17: de dag sngar gzhag pa byas nas grogs po bag yod pa bzang po dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis ga pur gyi bdug pas bdugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112a-18: rgyab kyis phyogs pa ma yin pas phyi rol tu byung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112a-20: ji ltar mthun pa'i chu legs par gtsang sbra byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112a-21: srog chags med pa la rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112b-0: gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen pos @112b phyag rgyar byas pa'i chus khrus byas la nye reg byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos pa'i gtsang bas me thab kyi drung du song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112b-1: ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas byang shar gyi phyogs su mngon par bltas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112b-2: mar gyi sbyin sreg ga pur dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112b-4: tsandan bsres pas stong rtsa brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112b-5: sngar bshad pa'i chogs spyan drang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112b-6: gshegs su gsol ba bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112b-8: nges par yang bum pa gang ba brgyad ras gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112b-9: shing aa mra'i lo ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112b-15: 'bru nang du bcug pa gcig bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112b-16: gnyis pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112b-17: gsum pa ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112b-19: bzhi pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112b-20: lnga pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112b-21: drug pa ni lha thams cad la'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112b-23: brgyad pa ni dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo khang la gzhag par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112b-24: gcig ni 'byung po thams cad la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:112b-25: gcig ni sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur bar bsngos nas gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113a-0: de bas na sngar bshad pa'i cho @113a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113a-2: de bzhin du me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113a-6: lha bshos kyang sngar bstan pa nyid kyi las kyis dbul bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113a-7: thams cad kyi thams cad du go rims bzhin du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113a-8: mar me 'dzin pas mar gyi mar me gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113a-10: 'phags pa ma yin pa thams cad la lha bshos zhes smos pa ni 'bras s'a lu'i chan zho dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113a-11: sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa'i 'o thug khyad par can gyis nye bar sbyar ba'i mar la btsos pa'i snum khur gyis 'breng bu la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113a-12: khanda la sogs pa'i bza' ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113a-13: mar gyis gang ba dang; tsandan gyi thang chu sbrang rtsi'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113a-14: 'o mar btsos pa'i bza' ba ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113a-16: byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113a-17: 'phags pa'i lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113a-18: de bzhin du garbhod au lo pi ka ri ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113a-19: khyad par du snum khur gyi yo byad 'byung po thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113a-20: sems can thams cad la sngags dang ldan pa'i chogs sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113a-21: de bzhin du me tog dri zhim pa sna ma'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-0: me tog bun @113b sdug [?] la sogs pa sngar bstan pa sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-1: rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-3: byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-5: 'phags pa ma yin pa'i lha rnams la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-6: khyad par du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni sna ma'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-7: padma'i rigs la ni me tog padma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-8: de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs la ni me tog autpa la dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-9: lha gzhan dag la ni gzhan gang yang rung bas dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-10: ga bur gyi bdug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-12: de bzhin du gu gul ni gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-13: lha gzhan thams cad ni bdug pa tha ma la bas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-14: mar gyi mar me 'phags pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-15: thams cad la ni dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-16: 'phags min lha ni thams cad la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-17: dri zhim 'bru mar dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-18: cho ga ji bzhin rim pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-19: bdug pa mthong ba'i rgyu yis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-20: de ltar gsungs pa de bzhin dri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-21: sngags rnams kun la rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-22: spyan ras gzigs la gang gsungs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-23: gang gsungs phyag na rdo rje la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-24: rang rang gi ni sngags dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-25: sngags spyod don du sgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-26: cho ga gcig bu blta bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:113b-27: rtag tu rjes su mthun par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114a-0: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngar mthong ba'i cho @114a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114a-3: bdug pa la sogs pa byas nas gtsor mthun pa'i bya ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114a-4: de'i 'og tu sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis mkhas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114a-5: myur bas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sha med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114a-6: kun nas rnga pa ta ha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114a-7: dung gi sgra dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs pa la sogs pa des bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114a-10: phreng bas brgyan pa'i phyogs bzhi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114a-14: thad ka thams cad du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu bskor ba bya zhing 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma rgya cher gtong bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114a-15: de nas khrus byas te yang zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114a-17: mar gyis bsgos pa'i s'a lu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114a-18: 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge drug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114a-19: snying pos stong rtsa brgyad bya'o //
