K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114a-20: sbyin sreg byas nas dkyil 'khor la rjes su bcug cing sngar bzhag pa'i sems dpa' chen po la srung ba byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi slob ma nyid du khas blangs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114a-21: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114a-24: byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid kyi lus phul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114a-25: dngos grub kyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi nye bar longs spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114a-26: yongs su longs spyod pa thun mong du gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114b-0: dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i byang @114b chub kyi snying po gnon par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114b-1: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thob par bya ba la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114b-2: bstan ba tsam nyid kyis sdig pa'i rnyog pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114b-3: mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'i skye bo yang de ma thag tu grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114b-4: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis ras ma nyams pa thag mas btags ma thags pa skra med pa la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lan gsum bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114b-6: gur gum gyis bsgos pa'i ras kyi gdong g-yogs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114b-7: dang por byis pa lo gsum nas lo bcu drug pa'i bar zur phud lngas nye bar mdzes pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114b-8: gtsug phud gcig gis nye bar mdzes pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114b-9: gtsug phud kyis nye bar mdzes ba skra dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114b-10: rgyal po'i bu spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114b-12: gzhan bdag nyid chen po rgyal po chen po 'dod pa dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114b-13: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la phyin pa na gdong g-yogs par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114b-14: autpa la'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags lan gcig brjod du gzhug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114b-15: me tog dri zhim po tsandan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114b-16: gur gum dang bsres pa shin tu gtsang ba byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:114b-17: lag pa gnyis su byin la me tog 'dor du bzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115a-0: gang du de'i me tog babs pa der de'i sngags sbyin par bya @115a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115a-1: ste; sngags 'di ni de'i yin par bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115a-2: skye ba brgyud pa nas de dang rjes su 'brel ba yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115a-3: de nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub kyi snying po la gnon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115a-4: byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i don du mngon par sgrub par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115a-8: gang zag rtse gcig par mngon par sgrub pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115a-9: tshe 'di nyid la'ang chos thams cad la the tshom med par bsgrub par bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115a-10: de bzhin du mthar gyis dngos grub 'dod pas brgya snyed kyi bar du bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115a-11: gzhan la ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115a-12: gzhan dag la ji ltar sdig pa spang ba'i phyir dam tshig tsam sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115a-13: dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dbang bskur na dang por re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol ha cang yang mi nye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115a-14: ha cang yang mi ring bar byang shar gyis phyogs su rtsa ba'i sngags kyis dag par byas pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115a-15: rgyal po dbang bskur ba bzhin du bdag nyid sems pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115a-18: dge 'dun la dad cing dang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115a-19: spro ba chen po dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115a-20: byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-0: theg pa chen po la zhugs pa @115b dang; dkon mchog gsum la phan par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-1: dbang po mtshang ba med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-3: tshe 'di nyid la sngags 'grub par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-5: sngags kyi spyod pa la spro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-6: blta bar 'dod pa'i rang bzhin can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-7: sad par 'dod pa'i phyir yang sngags kyi don pa rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-8: der gtod pa'i yid dang; gcig la sogs pa nas lnga'i bar du dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-9: lhag ma ni spang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-11: spyod pa la rmongs pa med pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa la dbang bskur bar bya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-12: gzhan dag ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-13: de nas rgyal po thams cad bskur ba bzhin du yo byad thams cad bsogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-14: slob dpon mkhan po mnyes na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-15: de nas bla re chen po bres te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-17: ba dan mthon po bsgreng zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-18: gdugs dkar po dbu la 'dzin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-19: rnga yab dkar pos g-yob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-20: bkur sti chen pos dung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-21: rnga bo che'i dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs shing rgyal ba'i sgra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-22: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-24: rab tu bsngags pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rgyal bas gsungs pas mngon par bstod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-25: dkyil 'khor de la bskor ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:115b-27: byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116a-1: dang; byang chub sems dpa'i sngags kyi spyod pa sgrub pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116a-2: 'jig rten thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i gsang pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116a-3: chos kyi rgyal srid thams cad kyi sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116a-5: sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116a-6: de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116a-7: shar gyi phyogs su phyogs te dkyil 'khor la blta zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116a-8: dang por re zhig rig pa'i dbang bskur ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116a-9: phyag rgya chen po gtsug phud lnga 'ching du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116a-10: de nas rang 'dod pa'i sngags gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116a-11: gang la dga' ba gro ga'i 'dab ma la gi wang gis bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116a-13: gur gum gyi chus lag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116a-14: kham por kha sbyar bkrus la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116a-15: de nas gro ga'i 'dab ma de kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du gzhag par byas pa dkyil 'khor gyi nang du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi zhabs drung du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116a-16: de nas ku sha de la gnas nas rig pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad snga ma nyid du bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116a-17: de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug pa la dbang bskur bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116b-0: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la gang sems can thams cad @116b dang thun mong du gyur pa'i bum pa gang ba sgo dang nye bar sngar bzhag pa blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116b-1: slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i sngags brjod pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116b-2: gzhan dag la ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i chus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116b-3: de nas kham por kha sbyar de de la sbyin par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116b-4: mar me la klog tu gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116b-5: gal te de nyid yin na ni rim gyis 'bad pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116b-6: yang na ji ste gzhan na ni sngags bzlas pa kho nas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116b-7: yang na yi ge'i yan lag nyams ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116b-8: lhag pa byin na ni dang po sgrub pa kho na la 'grub par the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116b-9: de ltar slob dpon gyis sngar bris pa'i sgrub pa gsum gyis nges par 'grub par the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116b-10: de bzhin du dang pos ni rig pa'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116b-11: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la dbang bskur ba ni gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor du lha thams cad la bstabs pa'i sngar gyi bum pa des dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116b-12: spyi po la sngar gyi cho ga ji lta ba de nyid kyis byas na sdig pa'i rnyog pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gnang zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116b-14: sangs rgyas dang; byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'jig rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:116b-15: 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117a-1: cad sgrub pa la byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur zhing slob dpon du dbang bskur ba sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117a-2: dkyil 'khor gsum pa la ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117a-3: nyan thos thams cad la phul ba'i bum pa gang ba de nyid kyi cho gas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117a-5: byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117a-6: 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags rgyud dag 'don pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117a-11: rang nyid spyod cing ston par khyod la rjes su gnang zhing brjod par bya ba yang tshe 'di nyid la yin la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117a-12: phyi nas skye ba brgyud pa dag la ni sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117a-13: de bzhin du rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117a-14: rnam par rgyal ba'i dbang bskur ba yang sngar bstan pa'i chogs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sngar phul ba'i bum pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117a-15: byang chub sems dpa' la phul ba'i bum pa gang bas kyang de bzhin du dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117a-17: byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117a-18: nyan thos rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya zhing khyod la rjes su gnang ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117b-0: 'byung po thams cad kyis rab tu thub par dka' zhing @117b lus can thams cad kyis mi pham pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117b-1: sngags pa thams cad las khyod rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117b-2: ji ltar 'dod pa sgrubs shig pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117b-3: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis re re la yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dbang bskur ba lnga sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117b-4: sems can rnams la yang lnga po nyid kyis bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117b-5: de dag mthar gyis dkyil 'khor la bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117b-7: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid phul nas dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas te slar gtang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117b-8: de las gzhan pa'i nyin zhag la mthar gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la bslab par bya zhing sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117b-9: skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sngar phul ba'i bum pa gang ba blangs nas dkyil 'khor du zhugs ba de dag la chu khyor ba gsum shar du mngon par blta bar bya ba la blud par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117b-10: 'di skad du brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117b-12: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig las 'das par gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117b-13: bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar ma byed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117b-14: sngags thams cad kyang 'dor bar ma byed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117b-16: byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang slu bar ma byed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:117b-17: bla ma mnyes par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118a-1: du dam tshig las 'das par gyur na sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur zhing bsod nams ma yin pa mang po 'gyur ro zhes de ltar smras la gtang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118a-2: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis kyang zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118a-4: mar gyis btags pa'i s'a lu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118a-5: 'bras thugs po che'i sreg blugs gyis yi ge brgyad pa'i snying po dang; sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118a-6: de nas langs nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118a-7: sngar bstan pa'i me tog gis sder bstan pa'i chogs lha thams cad yid la bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118a-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118a-12: 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118a-22: rnal 'byor pa dang; grub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118a-24: sems can thams cad yang dag par bdug nas me tog gtor te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118a-26: gur gum gyis bsangs la sngar bstan pa'i chogs slar gshegs su gsol bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118a-27: sems kyis thams cad gtang ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118a-28: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bsho sa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-1: sa tshon thams cad chu bor dor bar bya ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-2: srog chags sdug bsngal ba rnams la sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-3: sa phyogs de legs par byugs shing 'jam par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-4: legs par phyag pa byas nas ba lang gi lci bas byug tu gzhug pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-6: shin tu gtsang ba'i sas byug pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-7: bye mas gtor bar byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-8: de nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-9: dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa des bdag nyid 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-11: lha la dbul ba'i kha zas bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po'i dbang po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-13: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i le'u rab 'byams las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-14: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bstan pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-18: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa la gzigs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-20: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag btsal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-21: yi ge gcig pa mchog tu gsang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-22: dug thams cad 'joms par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-25: dkyil 'khor chung ngu sgrub pa'i thabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:118b-26: las phran tshegs thams cad la nye bar sbyar bar bya ba smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119a-1: na ma: sa manta bud dh'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119a-5: 'di ni 'byung po thams cad nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119a-6: sngags 'di nyid ni yi ge gcig gi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i cho ga thams cad du dgos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119a-8: khru bzhi sa'i phyogs yang dag par byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119a-9: tshon sna lnga'i phye mas rang nyid kyis bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119a-10: gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119a-12: de dag tu'ang 'dir ni nges pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119a-13: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mnyam pos nye bar mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119a-14: gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang por re zhig bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119a-15: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i autpa la'i phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119a-19: phyag rgya 'di dag dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar gyi char bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119a-22: autpa la dang phyag mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119a-35: skyes bu gzhon nu'i gzugs can phyi rol gyi sgo'i rtsa bar bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119a-36: mthar gyis rim pa la brten nas bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119a-37: dkyil 'khor gsum la brten nas de ltar bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-0: de nas yi ge gcig pa'i sngags nyid kyis shar lho'i @119b phyogs kyi char me'i las bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-1: shing aa pa mrga'i yam shing zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-3: mar la btags pas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-4: de nas me tog gi mchod yon dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-5: yi ge gcig pa'i sngags nyid kyis ji ltar 'dod par gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-10: gshegs su gsol ba rnams bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-11: de nas rgyal srid 'dod pas ni grong khyer gyi dbus su bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-12: longs spyod 'dod pas ni shing aa mra'i drung du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-13: bu 'dod pas ni bo de rtse'i shing gi drung du'o; ;chung ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-15: rta 'dod pas ni glang po che'i bres skyu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-17: chu 'dod pas ni mtsho chen po'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-19: nyin bzhi pa'i rims sam; rtag pa'i rims sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-20: rims thams cad la rtags gcig pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-22: srin pos zin pa la ni dur khrod dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-24: yang srin pos zin pa la ni ba ru ra'i shing gi drung ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-25: ae randa'i shing gi drung du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-26: ma mo thams cad kyis zin pa la ni bzhi mdo 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-28: bu btsas pa'i khyim du nye bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-29: tshangs pa'i srin pos zin pa la ta la'i shing du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:119b-30: sbyar ba'i dug 'byin pa la ni yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyis chu la lan gsum sngags pa bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-1: nyid du blud pa byas na grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-2: de bzhin du bud med dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-3: skyes pa grags pa 'dod pa la ni bzhi mdo 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-4: bram ze gnas par bri bar bya'o; ;bu shi ba la ni shing 'bras bu can nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-5: 'o ma can gyis shing drung du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-6: 'bras s'a lu smin pa'i sa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-7: zhing gi dbus su ni bu med pa la bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-8: nad rnam pa gsum bdag gir byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-9: gzhan gyis nyams pa la ni 'jug dogs la sogs pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-10: nad chen pos btab pa la ni dkyil 'khor chu bo'i ngogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-12: nad thams cad kyis thams cad du btab pa la ni ri'i rtse mor bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-13: mkha' 'gro mas byas pa la yang bram ze'i ldum ra 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-15: gnas dben pa gzhol pa'i sa phyogs su bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-16: de bzhin du las thams cad la nam phyed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-17: dus thams cad du mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-18: yi ge gcig ba de nyid kyi sngags kyis me tog gi mchod yon phul te gshegs su gsol la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-19: dkyil 'khor la chus gtor ba byas na nad thams cad bsrung ba chen pos byas par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-20: nad thams cad las grol bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-21: bu med pas ni bu rnyed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-22: skal med rnams kyang skal ldan 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120a-23: dbul po rnams kyis nor thob pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120b-0: dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam @120b gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120b-1: skyes pa'am yang na bud med kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120b-2: thos nas the tshom med byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120b-3: ci 'dod rnam pa sna tshogs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120b-4: thob 'gyur rtag tu phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi cho ga rab 'byams las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120b-6: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i rtsa ba las kyi dkyil 'khor gsum pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120b-7: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma la gzigs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120b-9: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus pa la yang gzigs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120b-10: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i zhabs gnyis la bcud nas zhal 'dzum pa dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120b-12: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir sngags kyi spyod pa'i cho ga sgrub pa'i rgyu mthun pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120b-13: chos kyi char ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'i cho ga rab 'byams las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120b-14: ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga bsod nams bla na med pa bskyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120b-15: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon mngon par sgrub par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120b-17: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120b-18: sngags thams cad kyi 'bras bu la rab tu sbyor zhing 'bras bu dang bcas par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:120b-19: don med pa ma yin pa grub cing sgrub par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121a-1: thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121a-2: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i go cha bgos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121a-3: bdud thams cad kyi stobs zil gyis mnan cing rgyab kyis phyogs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121a-5: sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i phyir de legs par bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121a-6: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121a-9: khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121a-10: 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121a-12: de shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121a-13: khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byams sngags thams cad sgrub par byed pa la rab tu 'jug pa mthar gyis ngas bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121a-14: sngon yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan te da ltar yang ngas bshad par bya'o; ;dang por re zhig sa'i phyogs gtsang ba rdul med pa las ras bal yang dag par blangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-0: dam tshig la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyis ras bal de yang @121b dag par dag par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-1: yang sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor gyis brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-2: na ma:sa manta bud dh'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-3: bo dhi satva aa pra ti ha ta ga ti ma ti pra ts'a ri n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-4: na ma:sam sho dha na du:kha pra sha ma nendra r'a dz'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-6: aarha te samya ssam bud dh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-8: aom sho dha ya sam sho dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-9: sarba bighnam gha ta ka ma h'a k'a ru ni ka ku m'a ra r'u pa dha ri ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-11: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra tishtha tishtha h'um h'um phad phad sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-12: de nas grong gi chos mi shes pa'i gzhon nu ma bram ze'i rigs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-13: rgyal rigs su skyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-14: rje'u'i rigs su skyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-15: rigs ngan pa'i skye gnas yongs su spangs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-16: dbang po mtshang ba med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-17: yan lag thams cad mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-21: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-24: kha dog gzhan rnam par spangs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-26: bud med kyi mtshan nyid rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-27: shin tu nyin zhag shis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-31: khug rna med cing sprin dang bral ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:121b-32: rlung med cing gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su sngar bstan pa'i gzhon nu ma khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122a-0: gos kyi legs par bkab pa byas pa la sngags 'di phyag @122a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122a-1: rgya chen po dang ldan pas bsrung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122a-3: gur gum srog chags med pa'i chu dang sbyar bas ras bal de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122a-4: bu mo de sngags de nyid kyis yang dag par sbyangs te gtor la tsandan dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122a-5: gur gum gyi chus steng dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122a-7: phyogs bzhir yang gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122a-10: ga bur gcig tu byas pa'i bdug pas bdugs par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122a-12: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi slob dpon gyis sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122a-14: sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122a-15: ras kyi dog pa 'di la lhag par gnas par mdzod cig ces lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122a-16: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122a-17: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dgongs su gsol zhes byas nas bdug pas bdug pa de'i dus su rma bya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122a-21: ngur pa rnam pa sna tshogs bya dge ba thang la gnas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122a-22: chu la spyod pa rnams nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122b-0: dge ba'i skad 'don na las 'di ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no zhes sgrub pa @122b pos shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122b-2: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bdag gi ras skud 'di la byin gyis brlabs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122b-3: bdag gi skye ba dam pa ni legs par 'tsho ba yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122b-4: bdag gi sngags sgrub pa 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122b-12: rdza rnga chen po'i sgra thos pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122b-17: bcos ma ma yin pa de'i dus su glo bur du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122b-29: de dag la sogs pa'i sgra gzhan rab tu dge ba 'don pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122b-32: des na rig pa 'dzin pas shes par bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122b-34: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122b-35: don yod pa'i grub pa ni 'di yin zhing gzhan du ma yin no zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:122b-36: ji ste de'i dus su ma rungs pa'i tshig 'don pa khyer cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-0: med pa zhes bya ba la sogs @123a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-8: dud 'gro smad ba rkang gnyis sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-9: rkang bzhi pa'i sgra 'don par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-10: des ni sgrub pa pos bdag gi dngos grub ni med pa yin no zhes shes par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-11: skabs der brtul par bya zhing yang snga ma bzhin du yang brtsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-12: de bzhin du lan bdun gyi bar du byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-13: bdun pa'i las kyi bya ba la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-14: de nas sgrub pa pos gzhon nu ma de bsrung ba byas la ku sha'i khres la gzhag par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-16: byang phyogs su phyogs par bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-18: lha la dbul ba'i kha zas zas su sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-19: sngar sbyang ba byas pa'i ku sha'i khres de nyid kyi cho gas ras bal la yang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-22: sngar bslabs pa'i bu mos yang dag par blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-26: brgyad la sogs pa nas bcu drug gi bar ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-27: kar sha'i grangs legs par bgrangs pa dang ldan pas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-28: de las rab ni bcu drug bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-29: de bzhin brgyad ni bar ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-30: phran tshegs las la sgrub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123a-31: gcig dang lnga ni tha ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-0: las rnams kun la sngags @123b rig pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-1: ji ltar nus pa bzhin du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-2: de nas brtsams te gang cung zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-3: sdig pa sngar ni byas pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-4: dog par sems kyis dmigs pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-6: dog pa 'di dag yang dag blangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-7: gtsang ma'i snod du gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-8: de nas bzhag pa byas nas de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-9: ga bur gyi ni bdug pas bdug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-10: srog chags yan lag min byung ba'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-11: gur gum tsandan la sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-12: me tog ma le tsam pa ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-13: dri zhim sogs pas yongs su bsgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-14: bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-15: gtsang ma'i phyogs su yang dag bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-16: sngags rig las kun shes pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-17: shin tu mnyam gzhag bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-18: de nas tha ga par song nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-19: ci 'dod pa yi rin spyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-20: rang dbang yan lag ma nyams dang; ;dkar po'i chos la rtag tu dad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-21: rgan min nad kyis gdungs pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-22: lud pa dbugs mi bde ba spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-23: ma ning smad pa ma yin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-24: 'phye bo ma yin skra dkar spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-25: kun gyis bkur ba'i mtshan nyid ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-26: rab sngags blta na sdug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-27: blo dang yang dag spyod pa dge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-28: 'jig rten pa yi tshul la brten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-29: dngos grub 'dod pas de la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-30: ras bzang btags pa'i ched du bskul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-31: grogs po rigs bzang rab bsngags shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-32: blo ldan bzo ni mkhas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:123b-33: shin tu khyad par mchog gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-2: rab ni rab tu bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-4: tha ma phran tshegs las la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-5: dman pa nyid na thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-6: bzo bo ji ltar smra ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-7: rin ni da ltar sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-8: dang po'i tshig ni yang dag byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-9: bzo bo la ni sngags rigs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-10: de nas myur du rin byin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-11: dpa' bo'i tshong zhes de la brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-12: don du gnyer med de la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-13: rin du smra byed sgrub pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-15: ras ni bzang po bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-16: las kun byed cing mchod pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-17: lha dang mi yi bde ba sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-19: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-20: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas thag pa la rgyu skar bzang po 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-21: cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-23: gza' dge ba bltas te gso sbyong sbyin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-24: yang na dus kyi mchog dpyid kyi dus kyi zla ba yar gyi ngo la shing aa mra'i me tog skyes shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-25: shing gi mchog rnams kyi yal ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-26: me tog rgyas pa de'i dus mtshams su snga dro nyi ma 'char ba la sngar bstan pa'i tha ga pa lha la dbul bar 'os ba'i kha zas bstan cing gos gtsang ma bgos la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124a-27: mgo la cod pan bcings nas khrus legs par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124b-0: gur gum gang yang rung bas lus byugs @124b nas ga pur gyi dris kha la bsgos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124b-3: skom pa med par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124b-4: thags kyi lag cha tha ga pa la sogs pa'i yo byad thams cad kyang sar pa las dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124b-5: ba lang gi lci bas bkrus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124b-6: yang ba'i rnam lngas bkru bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124b-7: de nas srog chags med pa'i chus kyang bkru bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124b-9: gur gum gyi chus kyang gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124b-10: gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su ca co med cing skye bo dang bral ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124b-11: dben ba'i gnas su bkab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124b-12: gsang bar me tog gis mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124b-13: de nas sgrub pos yang dag par byed pa'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags pa'i yungs kar gyis phyogs bzhi steng 'og phyogs mtshams su gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124b-14: de nas tha ga pa la yungs kar gyis gtor bar bya zhing phyag rgya chen po gtsug phud lnga bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124b-15: gtsug phud bcing ba byas na srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124b-16: gal te ras ris rab yin na ni zur bzhir zheng du khru bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124b-17: chur khru brgyad de tha ga pas de tsam la yongs su goms par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124b-18: 'bring ni zheng du khru do chur khru lnga pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:124b-19: tha ma ni zheng du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang chur ni khru brgyad kyi phyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-0: de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtho gang la ni yul dbus kyi skyes bu tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gcig @125a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-1: ste; 'di la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho zhes bsgrags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-2: tshad 'dis tshad du bstan pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-3: ras ni rab kyis dngos grub mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-4: 'jig rten gang zag mchog gis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-6: rgyal srid 'dod la bar ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-7: longs spyod chen 'dod skyes bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-8: lha mi lha min gdengs can ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-9: tha ma la ni grub par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-11: las rnams phran tshegs dag la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-12: ras ni tha mas rtag tu 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-13: rdzas rnams kun la rtag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-15: ras gsum gyis kyang bstan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-17: brgya byin bde sogs bdag po la'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-19: cho ga yang dag ldan na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-20: mi yi skye ba tha ma la'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-21: las rnams thams cad 'bad med par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-22: myur ba nyid du 'grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-23: rgyal ba rgya mtsho sras dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-24: lam 'di dag ni yang dag bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-25: phongs pa mgon med sdug bsngal ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-26: sems can kun la legs sbyin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-27: byang chub lam ni ma lus kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-28: de nyid gzigs pas bstan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-29: byang chub rgyu yi chos 'di ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125a-30: sngags kyi lam gyis bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-2: dkyil 'khor gang dag bstan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-4: gang zhig byang chub rgyu 'dod pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-5: de la rtag tu dngos grub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-6: 'gro la phan sems rtag med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-8: bdag nyid chen po 'jam dpal ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-9: gzhon nur gyur pas khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-10: byang chub 'jug pa'i khyad sems la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-11: ras ris 'grub par gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-12: bya ba myur du 'grub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-13: thams cad 'dir ni thob pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-14: de nas mthar gyis bzo bos ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-15: ras ni 'bad pas btags par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-16: nyin zhag lnga dang brgyad dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-17: bcu drug gnyis dang bzhi dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-18: nyin zhag gcig gis myur du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-19: myur bar ras kyi tha ga bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-20: grub pa mchog ni 'dod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-21: nyin zhag gcig pa dge ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-22: gtsang sbra'i spyod pa phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-23: bzo bo rtag tu byin rlabs ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-24: gnas nas thag ring song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-25: bshang dang gci ba yongs su dor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-26: de nas gos bcas khrus byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-27: gos gzhan dag kyang bgo bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-28: gos dkar phreng ba ldan par 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-29: yang dang yang du nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-30: lus ni tsandan dkar pos byugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-31: bzo bos lag pa gnyis kyang byugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-32: legs 'jam rtag tu dri med par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:125b-33: 'bad pas kyang ni tha ga bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-2: gzhan ni rgyal bas gsungs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-3: rnam dpyad rang bzhin 'bad pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-4: ras ni ma lus tha ga bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-5: ras kyi tha ga zin pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-6: sngar gsungs las kyi legs byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-7: tshad ldan nyams pa med pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-8: nyin zhag bzang la bltab te bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-9: yar ngo'i shin tu bzang po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-10: de la sngags ni gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-11: ras ni yongs su gsal byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-12: kha tshar mthar ni mdud mdzes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-13: 'od ma'i shing la btags nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-14: de nas ras ni blangs te 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-15: bzo bo bde legs byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-16: nor mang pos ni bgo bsha' bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-17: brtul zhugs bzang po legs spyod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-18: sngags pa ji ltar 'dod song nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-19: me tog dri zhim gyis mchod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-20: gtsang ba'i phyogs su gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-21: 'di nyid kyi ni sngags kyis su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-22: srung ba'i cho ga rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-23: sngon ni ras bal gang de yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-24: lan mang du ni yongs sbyangs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-25: bdag nyid dang ni ras dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-26: de nyid kyis ni bsrung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-27: dpa' bo chen po 'jam dpal gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-28: sngags kyi bzlas pa gsungs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-29: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas mang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-30: ngas kyang da ltar gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-31: de nyid sngags ni thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-32: sngags kyi ngo bos rnam par spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-33: brtson 'grus che zhing gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126a-34: sngags kyi don kun sgrub byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-0: cha byad @126b rnam pa sna tshogs byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-1: skyob pa rnam pa sna tshogs rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-2: 'dzam gling gnas pa'i sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-3: rmongs pa spyod cing sems pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-4: ma dad phyin ci log par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-5: longs spyod shin tu brkam chags kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-6: rdzas rnams ma lus pa dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-7: sngags rnams kyis kyang 'grub mi byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-8: 'khor ba'i chun pa'i btson rar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-10: gang yang rtag tu yid dag cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-11: dad ldan bkra shis dag la dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-12: sngags rnams kun la spro ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-14: bdag nyid chen po dngos grub 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-15: spro ba che zhing gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-16: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-18: dad pa med pa'i skye bo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-19: dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-20: sa bon tshva sgor btab pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-21: myu gu skye ba med pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-22: dad pa'i rtsa ba rtag tu chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-23: chos don gzigs pas gsungs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-24: chos don spyod pa de dag la; ;sngags rnams rtag tu 'grub par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-25: de nas sgrub pa pos bzo bo lags par bslabs pa'i ri mo mkhan nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-26: bdag nyid 'dri ba la mkhas pas tshon ma 'dres shing kha dog gsal ba dang ldan pa'i tshon rtsi rnams blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:126b-27: sngar tha ga pa la byas pa'i cho ga ji lta ba de nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas ri mo mkhan la snga ma bzhin sbyang bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127a-0: @127a *// sngar ji ltar tha ga pa la byas pa de nyid kyis ras la ri mo 'drir gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127a-1: yang na bdag nyid kyis bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127a-4: gur gum la sogs pa'i dris tshon rtsi la bsgo bar bya zhing bdug spos bsregs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127a-5: de nyid kyi sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa la yang bzla ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127a-6: me tog n'a ga ge sar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127a-12: m'a la ti'i me tog la sogs pas ras de gcal bkram pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127a-13: shar du mngon par phyogs pas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127a-14: blo legs par gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127a-16: byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs pa'i sems kyis bir phra mo lag par blangs nas 'khrug pa med pa'i sems kyis ras de la bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127a-17: dang por re zhig bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127a-18: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127a-19: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mtshan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127a-20: sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127a-21: rin po che'i padma la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127a-23: sku 'od 'dom gang gis nye bar mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127a-26: zhing rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-0: dbus na gnas pa'i @127b padma bee d'urya'i sdong bu can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-1: 'og na ni klu'i rgyal po gnyis kyis gdan chen po'i padma'i sdong bu la 'dzin cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-3: lag pa g-yas pas phyag 'tshal ba; mdog dkar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-4: rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-9: kun nas padma'i mtsho padma'i 'dab ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-10: me tog cung zad kha bye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-11: rnam par kha bye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-12: chu las skyes pa'i srog chags rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-14: nya la sogs pas khyab pa yangs shing mdzes par skyes pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-15: gang bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i padma'i sdong bu de las 'phros pa'i yal ga las padma'i me tog du ma mthar gyis mtho ba bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-16: g-yon gyi phyogs su padma'i me tog brgyad byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-17: padma de dag la byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi gzugs bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-18: dang po la re zhig 'phags pa 'jam dpal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-19: cung zad kha dog padma'i ge sar bzhin du ser skya 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-25: skra zur phud lnga dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-26: gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-27: lag pa g-yon pa na autpa la sngon po bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:127b-28: lag pa g-yas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-0: zhi ba'i cha byad kyis de bzhin gshegs @128a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-3: 'od 'bar ba dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-4: padma gnyis pa la 'phags pa zla ba'i 'od shin tu gzhon sha can de bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-5: gsum pa la ni nor bzang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-6: bzhi pa la ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-7: lnga pa la ni nam mkha' mdzod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-8: drug pa la ni sa'i snying po'o; ;bdun pa la ni sdig med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-9: brgyad pa la ni spyan bzang yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-10: de dag thams cad kyang gzhon nu khye'u'i cha byad can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-11: gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad byams pa ma gtogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-13: 'phags pa byams pa ni bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-14: tshangs par spyod pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-15: mgo ral pa'i cod pan bcings pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-17: ga sha dmar po gyon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-18: dar la dmar po'i stod g-yogs byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-19: thal ba'i thig le gsum gyis mtshan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-20: gzugs mdzes pa dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-23: krishna sa ra'i pags pa thal gong g-yon par bgos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128a-24: lag pa g-yon pas phreng ba 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-0: der gtod pa'i lta ba sems kyi spyod pa bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam @128b pa can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-1: padma gnyis pa la 'phags pa kun tu bzang po mdog me tog pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-2: lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-3: lag pa g-yon pa na nor bu rin po che thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-4: lag pa g-yas pa na bil ba thogs shing mchog sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-5: gzugs mdzes pa dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-6: de bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-7: gsum pa la ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'dam bu'i mdog 'dra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-8: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-10: mchod phyir thogs dkar pos byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-11: 'phags pa 'od dpag med gzugs mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-13: ral ba'i mthar skyil mo krung gis bzhugs shing cod pan du byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-14: lag pa g-yon na padma bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-15: lag pa g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-16: sems kyi spyod pa bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-17: lus kun nas 'od kyis gsal bar byas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-18: bzhi pa la ni 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje lag pa g-yon na rdo rje 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-19: lag pa g-yas na bel ba thogs pas mchog sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-21: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-23: zhi ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-25: dra ba phyed pas lus nye bar dkris pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-26: mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir zhogs byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:128b-27: cod pan rin po che 'bar bas rnam par 'phro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-0: gos g-yo ba dang ldan pa @129a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-2: dar la dkar po'i stong g-yogs byas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-4: kun tu bzang po'i na bza' stod g-yogs kyang 'di bzhin du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-5: cha byad ni ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-6: de bzhin du padma lnga pa la ni 'phags pa blo gros chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-7: drug pa la ni blo gros zhi ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-8: bdun pa la ni rnam par snang mdzad snying po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-9: brgyad pa la ni ngan song spong ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-10: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-12: glegs bam lag na thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-13: rgyan thams cad kyis shin tu mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-14: dar las stod g-yogs byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-15: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-16: g-yo ba dang ldan pa'i gos bgos pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-17: de dag gi steng du'ang rang sangs rgyas brgyad bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-18: dge slong gi cha byad 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-19: lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-20: chos gos dmar po gyon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-21: skyil mo krung gis nye bar gnas pa; rin po che'i autpa la la 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-22: cha byad zhi ba'i bdag nyid kun nas 'od 'phro ba'i phreng bas khyab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-23: me tog dri zhim pos gcal bkram pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129a-29: n'a ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog gis ras ris kun nas gcal bkram par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129b-0: bcom @129b ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i g-yon phyogs su 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng du rin po che du mas nye bar spras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129b-1: shin tu yangs pa'i gzhal med khang gi dkyil 'khor brag gi tshogs kyis shin tu nye bar mdzes par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129b-2: rin po che'i autpa las shin tu bkab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129b-3: ri'i rnam pa lta bu bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129b-4: gnas der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129b-6: rin chen gtsug tor can rin po che beed'urya'i 'od rnam par 'phro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129b-8: rin po che padma r'a ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129b-10: ma rgad la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129b-12: aasma gar bha la sogs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i bye brag kun nas 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lhung bzad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129b-17: skyil krung gis bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129b-18: na bza' ser po mnabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129b-19: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis sku la khyab pa; dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku nye bar mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129b-20: zhi ba'i gzigs pa dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129b-21: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:129b-22: gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang po kha dog gser 'dra ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130a-0: gsum pa padma'i gtsug tor padma'i ge sar dang 'dra @130a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130a-1: ba'i chos 'chad pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130a-2: bzhi pa spyan bzang po yang bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130a-3: lnga pa bsnyen par dka' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130a-4: drug pa rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130a-5: bdun pa sman gyi bla bee d'ur+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130a-6: brgyad pa de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i spyan gyi rgyal po bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130a-7: 'di dag thams cad kyang gser gyi mdog can de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs su bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi steng gi phyogs su g-yas g-yon nas sprin gyi gseb nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis lus mi snang bar me tog gi char 'bebs pa bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130a-9: bar snang la gnas nas sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130a-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130a-12: 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130a-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po brgyad byang chub sems dpa'i mgo la 'dug pa spangs te bri bar bya ba la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130a-15: gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130a-16: moong gal gyi bu chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-0: dkar po'i tog @130b dang; mu khyud dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-2: 'di dag thams cad kyang shin tu mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-3: zhi ba'i cha byad kyi bdag nyid can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-4: shin tu dul ba'i cha byad can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-5: nyan thos chen po dag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la lta ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-6: steng du gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gzhan gnyis nye bar kun nas gos kyi bla re chu zheng yangs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-7: shin tu mdzes pa 'dzin cing sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-10: 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi steng du lha'i gos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-11: phreng ba 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o; ;bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i steng dbu'i steng du mu tig gi phreng ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-12: tha gu dmar po padma r'a ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-13: aindra n'i la la sogs pa'i mdud pa byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-14: rin po che'i tha gu'i tshogs bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-15: de la yang gos kyi bla re shin tu legs par kun nas bkod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-16: mu tig gi phreng ba 'phyang bas mdzes pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu ni padma'i mtsho las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhabs drung dang nye ba na klu'i rgyal po nye dga'i phyogs su rin po che chen po'i ri bo padma'i mtsho las mngon par thon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-18: rin po che'i myu gu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-22: rin po che'i shing gis yongs su bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:130b-23: drang srong chen po'i gnas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-0: grub pa dag gis de la @131a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-2: ri'i rtse mo'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed shin tu mi bzad pa'i gzugs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-3: lag pa g-yas pa na zhags pa thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-4: lag pa g-yon pa na gzhu thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-5: bzhin khro gnyer dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-6: bka' nyan cing 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyogs te lta ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-14: mgul ba'i phyogs sbrul gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-15: stag gi pags pa mnabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-16: bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-17: rab tu mi bzad pa chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-18: khro bo'i rgyal po chen po kun nas 'bar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-19: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-20: ri de'i 'og tu rdo'i steng na 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-21: lus sa la btud de spos kyi snod lag na thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-23: dbyibs de lta pa bzhin rtags 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-24: ji ltar rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-25: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rjes su lta ba'i sgrub pa po bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-26: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye bar bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i 'o ga de'i g-yas ngos su padma'i mtsho las mngon par byung ba'i rin po che'i ri'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131a-27: ji ltar sngar ri'i rgyal por bstan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-0: @131b khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-1: lha'i me tog gis khyab pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-2: ri de yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-3: ri de yang shin tu mtho ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-4: rin po che padma r'a ga'i them skas 'dra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-6: rtse mo myu gu 'dra ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-7: de la brten pa'i lha mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje'i ngo bo 'phags ma sgrol ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-8: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-9: dar la dmar pos stod g-yogs byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-10: kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gos can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-11: bud med kyi rgyan thams cad kyis lus brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-12: lag pa g-yon pa na autpa la thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-18: sems bsam gtan la zhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-20: lag pa g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-21: cung zad gdong dang lus 'dud pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-23: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la cung zad lta zhing 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-24: kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi phreng bas yongs su bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-25: der yang beed'urya rin po che'i rtse mo la shing bun n'a ga'i yal gas kun nas bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-26: yal ga dag la yang me tog 'phel zhing kha bye bas legs par rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma mngon par bkab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-27: yal ga mngon par 'dud pa de nyid kyang shin tu kha dog sna tshogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:131b-28: byu ru'i myu gu 'brel ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ngo bo'i tshon 'bar ba na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-1: mngon du phyogs shing lta ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-2: lha mo bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-3: 'jigs pa sel bar byed pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-4: sgrub pa po ni srung don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-5: des ni dam pa sbyin zhing dge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-6: stobs bcu ldan sras thugs rje ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-7: bud med gzugs 'chang lha mo yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-8: 'byung po kun gyi dpal don dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-9: mchog sbyin byed pa bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-11: gzhon nu'ang lha mo 'di la dgyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-12: bgegs rnams thams cad bsal ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-13: sgrub pa pos kyang yang dag bkur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-14: mi yi bdag po srung don dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-15: dpal sgrub phyir yang ri mo bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-16: khro bo'i rgyal po gang yin de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-17: ri yi rtse mor gzhag bris pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-18: bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-19: rgyal ba mchog dang sras kyis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-20: mi bzad chen po 'khyil ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-21: gtum chen 'od chen ldan pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-22: ma rungs sems can tshar gcad phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-23: sgrub pa la ni rab tu brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-24: sgrub pa po ni srung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-25: bgegs rnams thams cad sel bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-26: mi bzad khro bo'i ngang tshul can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-27: sngags kyi lha dag 'gugs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-28: shin tu mi bzad drag po'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-29: brtse ba med pa thams cad 'dul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132a-30: sdig dang drag por spyod pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-0: mkha' spyod sa la spyod @132b pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-1: sa 'og spyod pa thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-2: thub pa'i bstan la 'gal byed gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-3: ma rungs thams cad 'dul bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-4: ras ni kun nas gru bzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-5: zur bzhi dag tu bri ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-6: ras kyi 'og tu tha mar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-7: chu bo rgya che'i gnas bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-8: klu yi gdengs ka yan lag can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-9: gcig ni kun tu bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-10: yan lag bzang po dkar po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-11: lus bye mi yi rnam par skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-12: byang du mgo ni gzhag bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-13: rtag tu thal mo sbyar byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-14: stobs chen gdengs ka bdun dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-15: mtha' yas zhes ni bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-16: de bzhin gshegs la nges par lta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-17: nor bu rin chen gyis mdzes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-18: legs par mdzes dang gzugs mdzes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-19: rin chen rgyan gyis yongs brgyan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-20: 'bar ba'i phreng can bri ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-21: klu rgyal chen por rnam par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-22: 'jig rten kun la phan par brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-23: sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-24: bgegs rnams thams cad rnam gzhig phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-25: chu po la brten bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-26: ras kyi cho ga dam pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-27: rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-28: de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-29: rgyas bstan ngas ni mdor bsdus yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-30: mkhas pa gang zhig 'dri byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-31: de yi bsod nams mtha' yas 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-32: bskal pa bye bar byas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:132b-33: sdig pa shin tu mi bzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-2: de yi mod la 'byang bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-3: mtshams med lnga bo byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-4: tshul khrims nyams dang smad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-5: sdig pa kun la 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-6: 'khor ba'i mun par spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-7: 'gro ba'i skye gnas ngan pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-8: der ni ras ris gzhag mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-9: ras ris mthong ba'ang don ldan zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-10: thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-11: mthong ba tsam gyis dag 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-12: de bas skad cig de tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-13: yid dag lus ni dag 'jug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-14: rjes su bzlas pa byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-15: sngags rten nyid la rtag brtson pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-16: mi rnams grub 'dod smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-17: bskal pa bye bar sangs rgyas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-18: mchod pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-19: sa steng ras ris 'dri ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-21: gang g'a yi ni bye ma dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-22: tshad du bstan pa gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-23: de dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-24: rang rgyal dang ni byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-25: bse ru nyan thos 'jig rten na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-26: lan mang dag tu mchod ston byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-27: ras ris mthong btsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-28: mi yis de bzhin bsod nams 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-29: cho ga klog pa tsam dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-30: mchod dang rjes su yi rang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-31: cho ga thams cad rab brtags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-32: de la sngags kyis dngos grub des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-33: 'jig rten sngags rnams ji snyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133a-34: gang dag rgyal ba skyes mchog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-0: de'i slob @133b bas ru byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-1: bdag nyid chen pos gang gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-2: ri mo 'di ni mdun bzhag na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i sngags snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-5: ras ris chen mo dang po'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas thams cad dang ldan 'khor la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-8: khyod kyi 'brang gi ras kyi cho ga de ngas bshad par bya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-9: legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-10: dang por re zhig sngar bstan pa'i dog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-11: sngar bstan pa'i cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-12: sngar bstan pa'i bzo bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-13: sngar gyi tshad bar ma dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-14: ras shin tu bzang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-16: shin tu bkrus pa kha tshar dang bcas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-18: skra la sogs pa med par byas la tshad ma gtogs pa dang po ji lta ba de bzhin du byas pa'i ras de la phyi nas bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-19: dang por re zhig gnas gtsang ma kun nas mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-20: rin po che shel gyi rang bzhin lta bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-21: mu tig dkar pos brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-22: de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:133b-23: rin po che'i seng ge'i khri la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134a-4: g-yon pa'i dpung pa'i phyogs su autpa la bsnams shing thal mo sbyar bas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la blta ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134a-7: zur phud lngas mgo mdzes par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134a-8: byis pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134a-9: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134a-11: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i g-yon logs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog ltar dkar ba snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134a-12: 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g-yob par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134a-13: de'i phyogs su 'phags pa byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134a-19: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134a-20: 'di dag kyang snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134a-21: dang po ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134a-22: 'di dag gi steng du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134a-24: lag pa g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134a-25: sku lan bza' ser pos stod g-yogs byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134a-26: lag pa g-yon pas chos gos kyi dkyil nas 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134a-27: chos gos kyi kha dog cung zad dmar ba mnabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134b-1: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas phyogs su 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mdun du 'khor chen po'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134b-13: nyan thos chen po brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134b-14: rang sangs rgyas brgyad snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du bri ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134b-15: 'on kyang 'phags pa mood gal gyi bu chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134b-17: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la rnga yab kyis g-yob pa 'greng bag tu bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134b-18: de bzhin du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134b-19: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134b-28: tshangs pa mi mdzed kyi bdag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134b-30: de la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs na spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134b-31: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag mthar gyis bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134b-32: 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang nye bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor legs par dgod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:134b-34: cha byad du bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:135a-1: ldan 'das kyi seng+ge'i khri'i 'og tu ni rgya mtsho chen po las mngon par byung ba'i kun nas rin po che'i ri bo ras ris kyi mtha' mar bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:135a-2: ras ris kyi phyogs gcig gi mtha' la sgrub pa po cha byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:135a-3: dbyibs ji lta bu'i rnam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:135a-6: spos snod lag na thogs pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:135a-7: rin po che'i ri bo de'i steng 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed ji ltar bstan pa de ltar bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:135a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon phyogs seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung dang nye ba der rin po che'i ri bo'i steng du lha mo sgrol ma sngar ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:135a-9: ras ris de'i khor khor yug tu me tog gtor bar bri bar byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:135a-10: gcal bkram par bya ba la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:135a-11: me tog tsam pa ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:135a-17: dh'a nushk'a ri ka dang; pun n'a ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:135a-18: n'a ga gsar la sogs pa'i me tog gis ras ris de la kho ra khor yug tu gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:135a-19: ras ris kyi steng gi mtha'i zur gnyis su me tog gi tshogs 'thor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:135a-22: char 'byin pa'i sprin gyi nang nas mgo tsam thon ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:135a-24: kha dog dkar po bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:135b-1: dpal don gnyer la yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:135b-2: sa yi steng gi mi rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:135b-5: sdig pa cung zad gang byas pa; ;'dir ni ras ris mthong tsam gyis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136a-0: @136a *// ras ris mthong ba'i skye bo yi //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136a-3: brjod par yang ni mi nus so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136a-5: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhi ba mo le'u lnga pa'i cho ga rab 'byams las /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136a-9: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136a-12: khyod kyi ras ris gsum ba'i cho ga rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136a-13: gang sems can rnams la 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur ba sngar stan pa'i bzo bo dang; cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136a-14: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang tsam thad kar de bzhin du kun nas zur bzhi snga ma bzhin du ras la ri mo bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136a-15: sngar bstan pa'i tshon gyis dang por re zhig 'phags pa 'jam dpal seng+ge'i khril bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136a-16: snga ma bzhin du byis pa khye'u'i gzugs mdzes pa'i gzugs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136a-18: chos 'chad pa bri bar bya'o; ;g-yon gyi phyogs su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po rin po che'i ri la gnas pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136a-20: lag pa g-yon pa na nor bu rin po che thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136b-0: me tog pri yang @136b ku ltar sngo bsangs sngam bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136b-1: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi g-yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snga ma bzhin rin po che'i ri la gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136b-2: rnga yab lag na thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136b-3: lag pa g-yon pa na padma 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136b-4: lus kun nas 'od dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136b-5: seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu rin po che'i ras ris kyi mtha'i bar du bri bar bya'o; ;ras kyi mtha' ma dang nye ba'i zur du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi seng ge'i khri'i 'og g-yas phyogs su khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136b-6: de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136b-7: spos snod lag na thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136b-8: thams cad kyang snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136b-9: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136b-10: rin po che'i ri'i phug sor bcu drug gi tshad tsam gyi nang na bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136b-11: r'i stod kyi cha khang pa brtsegs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136b-13: ras ris kyi khor yug tu ri'i rnam pas yongs su 'khor ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:136b-14: steng gi ras kyi mtha' gnyis la gnas pa'i ri'i stod kyi cha la lding ba bzhin du me tog gi tshogs 'thor ba'i gnas gtsang mi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-0: rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba gnyis snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya zhing ras la me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi @137a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-1: gcal bkram pa yang bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-2: rnam gsum ras ris mtshan nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-3: thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-4: 'di ni tha ma zhes bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-5: phran tshegs las rnams dag la shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-6: bskal pa bye bar mi bzad las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-7: ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-8: ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-9: skad cig de la grol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-10: sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-11: mthong ba tsam gyis grol 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-12: ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-13: de yi mod la grol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-14: sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-15: blo dang ldan pas bsnyen bkur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-16: ras ris tha ma mthong ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-17: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-18: sangs rgyas skyob pa kun la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-19: mchod byas bsod nams gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-20: khas pas bsod nams gang thob de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-21: ras ris tha ma mthong ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-22: dge ba dag gi las rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-23: longs spyod phyir yang 'dir spyad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-24: sngags rnams gang dag ci yod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-25: tshangs dbang drang srong gis bshad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-26: nam mkha' lding gis gang bshad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-27: chu lha nyi ma lus ngan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-28: nor sbyin sogs dang srin po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-29: lha min dbang po lto 'byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-30: zla ba rlung dang gshin rje sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-31: khyab 'jug lha chen sogs bshad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-32: sngags rnams 'dir ni bkug pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137a-33: ras ris mdun du dngos grub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-0: 'dir ni @137b zhi ba bya ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-1: de bzhin du ni rgyas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-2: 'dir ni mngon spyod spang bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-3: thub pa mchog gis smad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-5: 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo le'u drug pa'i cho ga rab 'byams las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-6: ras ris chung ngu gsum pa'i cho ga rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-7: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-9: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-10: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skang ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa ni legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-13: rig pa thams cad kyi brtul zhugs spyad pa'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-16: 'jig rten la snying brdze ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-17: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa ston pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-18: phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-19: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyud nges par byang chub sgrub par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-20: sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:137b-21: bdag gi gsang sngags 'di skye bo thams cad la rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-0: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi bla ma 'das @138a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i rigs nub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad spangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-7: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mun par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-8: snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par 'jig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-13: nor bu rin po che med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-14: skye bo dam pa rnams kyis 'jig rten na yongs su ma zin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-15: sems can gyi khams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te /
