K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-20: mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-21: g-yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-22: slu ba spyod pa de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas skrag par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-23: le lo la mngon par 'dod cing dad par mi 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-24: 'dod pa tshol zhing yid ches bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-25: log pa'i ltab skye zhing bsod nams ma yin pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-26: mtshams med par gzhol zhing shin tu mi bzad pa'i yang shin tu mi bzang pa 'thob pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-27: sdug bsngal ba de dag gi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-28: dbang med pa la dbang du bya ba'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138a-29: dbang du gyur pa la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-0: thabs mkhas pas bsdu @138b bar [?] sbyor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-1: sngags kyi ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga gang de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'dri bar sems pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-7: khyod kyi mchog tu gsang ba rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod pa'i le'u ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byams yod do /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-8: snying po mchog rnams kyi don mchog tu gsang ba dam pa don chen po sngags thams cad kyi cho gar gyur ba drug po 'di dag yi ge drug gi snying po'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-9: the tshom med pa de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-10: sems can de dag gdul ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-11: thabs la mkhas pa la yang dag bar rab tu zhugs pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-12: nges par yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa drug gis sngar gsungs shing da ltar yang ngas bshad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-13: ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshegs la phan pa'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas sngags gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-17: aom b'a kye nyacva dza ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-18: aom b'a kye shes sha sv'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-19: aom b'a kye bam dza ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-20: aom b'a kye ni shthe ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-21: aom b'a kye ya na ma:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:138b-22: aom b'a kye dam na ma:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139a-1: dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod kyi sngags drug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139a-2: yi ge drug pa mthu chen po dang stobs mnyam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139a-3: snying po dam pa mchog tu grub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139a-5: sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rab tu gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139a-7: dam tshig g-yos pa rnams kyi las thams cad byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139a-8: byang chub kyi lam rjes su ston pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sngags kyi mchog tu gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139a-12: tha ma gsum la rab tu sbyor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139a-13: legs par sbyangs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139a-14: bstan pa nub pa'i dus su yang dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139a-15: las kyi tshul dang bcas pa la yang dag par gzhol ba la skad cig don sgrub par 'gyur ba de dag myur du shin tu myur bar de'i tshe dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139a-17: nyams sad pa'i phyir yang snying po dam pa 'di dag bsgrub par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139a-19: ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar gyur par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139a-20: de nas ras ris kyi cho ga 'di bya ba yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139a-21: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jigs pa chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139a-22: snyigs ma la sems can bsod nams chung ba 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139b-0: longs spyod chung @139b bas shin tu rgya che ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga'i sgrub pa la sogs pa rtsom par mi nus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139b-1: de dag gi phyir shin tu mdor bstan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139b-2: dang por re zhig dpa' bo'i tshong gis dog pa srang gcig gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139b-5: zheng du khru phyed tsam gyi ras kha tshar dang bcas pa tha ga pa 'thag tu gzhug go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139b-6: yang na skra med pa'i ras kyi dum bu sar pa gzhan steng dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139b-7: 'og tu ji ltar 'dod pa khru gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139b-12: ji ltar 'dod pa'i ri mo mkhan gyis bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139b-18: gur gum gcig tu byas pa srog chags med pa'i chu rdul med pa dang bsres te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139b-19: snod sar pa'i nang du bkrus la zhag gsum gyi bar du legs par bkab ste bzhag nas gtsang ba'i phyogs su srung ba byas shing bdag nyid kyang gtsang bar byas te zla ba yar ngo'i tshes bco lnga la ras snod kyi mdun du shar du mngon par phyogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139b-20: ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas sngags kyi tshig lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya ba la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139b-22: aom he he bha ga b'a na ba hu r'u pa dha ra di bya tsakshu she /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139b-25: m'am sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ku m'a ra r'u pa dh'a ri ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139b-26: mah'a bo dhi satva ki nytsi r'a ya si h'um spha te spha te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:139b-27: sngags 'dis bzlas pa byas la de nyid du nyal bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140a-3: de nas langs nas rmi lam du grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong na ring por mi thogs par ras ris bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140a-4: gal te grub pa'i mtshan ma rmi lam du ma mthong na ras de snod de las phyung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140a-5: nyi ma la bskams nas yang snod sar pa gzhan du bcug la shin tu dben par legs par bsrung ba byas la bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140a-6: de nas yang snying po'i mchog de dag las gang yang rung ba'i sngags blangs la gang 'dod pa'i yi ge drug pa yang yi ge 'bum bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140a-7: de nas ras mi dge ba yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140a-8: dang por re zhig ras de blangs la cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140a-9: yar ngo'i nyin zhag la rgyu skar bzang po dang ldan pa'i tshes grangs bzang po la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140a-10: 'phags pa 'jam dpal byis pa khye'u'i gzugs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140a-11: mgo zur phud lnga dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140a-12: byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140a-14: na bza' sngon po g-yo bzhin pa mnabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140a-15: na bza' dar la sngon pos stod g-yogs byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140a-17: seng ge'i khri la skyil mo krung phyed pas bzhugs pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140a-18: zhabs g-yas pas rin po che'i zhabs rten la bzhag pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140a-19: g-yon pa seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-0: rgyan thams @140b cad dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-1: bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa dang bcas pa sgrub pa po la lta ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-2: g-yas phyogs su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po rnga ma dkar po g-yob pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-3: pri yang ku'i mdog ltar sngo bsangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-4: lag pa g-yon pa na rin po che thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-5: yan lag thams cad mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-6: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-7: na bza' sngon po g-yo ba mnabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-8: mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-9: padma dkar po'i gdan la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-10: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi g-yon phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-11: ston ka'i zla rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-12: na bza' sngon po g-yo ba mnabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-13: yan lag thams cad mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-14: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-15: mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-16: lag pa g-yon pa na padma dkar po 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-17: lag pa g-yas pa rna rnga yab gser gyi yu ba can dkar po thogs pa; zhi ba'i cha byad can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-19: de bzhin du 'phags pa kun tu bzang po padma dkar po la gnas pa gnyi ga yang de ltar bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-20: de nas sdong bu gcig las skyes pa'i padma gsum la dbus kyi rtsa ba'i padma'i ge sar la ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi seng ge'i khri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:140b-21: rin po che'i zhabs rten no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-0: @141a *// gnyis pa'i padma la ni 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-1: gsum pa'i padma la ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-2: padma'i sdong bu mdzes pa rin po che mrgad 'dra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-3: padma'i me tog du ma kha ma bye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-5: kha bye ba dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-6: mtsho chen po ma dros pa las skyes pa klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-7: nye dga' gnyis padma'i sdong bu la 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-8: klu'i rgyal po de dag gi kha dog dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-9: gdengs ka bdun gyis nye bar brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-10: lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-11: lus kyi stod mi la sbrul gyi gdangs kas mtshan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-13: lus phyed chu'i nang du nub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-14: nor bu rin po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-15: gos kyis nye bar mdzes pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-16: mtsho chen po kun gyi 'og tu sgrub pa po ras ris kyi g-yas phyogs kyi mtha'i zur du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor la lta ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-17: sbos snod lag na thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-21: kha dog snga ma ji lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-22: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng ras kyi zur gnyis su lha'i bu me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-24: sbrin gyi nang nas byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-25: me tog gi tshogs chen po 'thor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141a-26: shin tu mdzes pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-0: ras ris kyi khor yug tu me @141b tog n'a ga ge sar la sogs pas rab tu gtor bar bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-1: ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs de bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-3: 'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs lag na rnga yab g-yob pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-5: yang na sgrub pa po ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du ras ris kyi gzugs nges par bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-6: ji ltar 'dod pa'i cha byad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-8: sgrub pa po ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-10: g-yas g-yon du 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-11: kun tu bzang po ji ltar 'dod par nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-12: yang na ji snyed pa'i ras kyi dum bu mtho gang ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-13: khru gang la bdag nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-15: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-16: gso sbyong ma byas pa dad pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-21: tshul khrims 'chal pa'i ri mo mkhan gyis kyang bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-23: sgrub pa pos nges par sngon du bsnyen par byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-25: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni nges par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-26: de ltar byas na sngags 'grub par 'gyur gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-27: gzhan du sdig pa'i las can gyis ni mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:141b-29: de ltar gyur pas bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-1: dag 'dar dad pa dang ldan par 'grub par 'gyur gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-2: gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-3: gang phyir dad pa theg pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-4: gang gis rnam par 'dren pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-5: dad pa med pa'i mi la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-6: dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-7: sa bon tshig par gyur pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-8: myu gu sngon po ji bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-9: dad dang ldan pa'i mi dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-11: sngags rnams thams cad khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-12: dad pa med la mi 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-13: gang yang 'jig rten lha dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-16: sdig pa dag dang bral phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-17: byang chub der song yid kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-18: de dag myar du nges 'grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-20: bstan pa 'di la rnam par bzlog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-21: ras ni chung dang chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-22: 'bring du nye bar bsgrags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-23: las rnams kun la sgrub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-24: da ni rab tu bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-25: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-26: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bdun pa'i le'u rab 'byams las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-27: ras ris kyi cho ga bzhi pa'i le'u rab 'byams rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142a-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142b-0: gang khyod @142b kyis bstan pa'i sems can de dag gi phyir le'u'i cho ga rab 'byams 'di thabs sla bas 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas kyang bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142b-1: de dag gi don gyi phyir yon tan rgya che ba'i bye brag gi dbye ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142b-2: las rnam par 'byed pa sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir yang dag par bshad par bya yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142b-3: de legs par shin tu rab tu nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142b-4: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142b-5: bdag gi tshig gi nus pa gsal bar mdzad cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142b-6: sngags kyi spyod pa'i yon tan grub par mdzad pa ni legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142b-9: de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du de bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs te 'dzam pa mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer sngon po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142b-14: shel gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142b-15: 'od zer de byang ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud thams cad zil gyis mnan nas rgyu skar gyi 'od dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142b-16: ri bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi 'od dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:142b-18: nyi ma rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba de dag gi 'od kyang zil gyis mnan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-1: gsal zhing 'od med par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-2: rnam par mdzes par mi 'gyur zhing gsal bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-5: sman dang rin po che'i 'od thams cad 'od med par byas nas slar log ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-6: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgor nub par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'khod par gyur pa de stan las langs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-8: rings pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-9: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-10: bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu ma mchis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-11: rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-13: 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-15: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-20: ji skad smras pa de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-21: bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-22: rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-25: gang zhig mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga rig pa'i spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-26: las sgrub pa'i thabs la yang dag par gzhol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143a-27: chos kyi sbrin la rten pa la yang dag par 'jug cing rjes su bzang bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143b-3: glegs bam la 'dri ba byas nas mchod par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143b-10: ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143b-11: tshig gi bye brag gis sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143b-12: sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143b-14: tha na rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgyud la thob pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143b-15: ba sbu ldang bar byed pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143b-16: rig pa'i mthu thos nas dga' ba skyes pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143b-17: rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143b-18: spyod pa thob par 'gyur bde dag ni ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur bar lung bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143b-19: des na rgyal ba de ltar 'dzum pa mdzad kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143b-20: 'dir dang por re zhig cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la dam tshig mthong ba sngon du bya ba rnams byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143b-21: dbang bskur ba thob pa rtsa ba'i sngags sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143b-24: sngags gang yang rung ba bzung nas yi ge gcig pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143b-25: gang 'dod pa dgon pa chen por song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143b-30: lo ma'i bza' ba byas na sngon du bya ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:143b-31: de nas ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs nas ras ris chen po'i tshad nub phyogs su mngon du lta ba bzhag pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-0: bdag nyid shar du bltas te ku sha'i @144a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-2: padma dkar po la tsandan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-4: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-8: nyan thos dag la 'bum phrag gcig ri mo'i ras ris kyi 'og tu dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-9: ga bur gyi bdug pa yang ci 'byor pas bdug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-11: klu rnams la yang ci snyed pa'i me tog gis mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-12: de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus su cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed kyi zla ba nya ba la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-13: ras ris kyi mdun du padma'i rnam pa lta bu'i me thab byas pa la tsandan dkar po'i shing gis me sbar nas gur gum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-14: ga pur bsres pas sreg blugs ci 'byor pas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa las 'od zer byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-17: ras kyi ri mo'i khor yug nas gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-18: sgrub pa pos gur gum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-19: tsandan gyis btags pa'i tsandan dkar po'i me tog gis mchod yon dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-20: de nas sgrub pa pos rings pa'i tshul gyis ras ris la lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-22: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-23: rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144a-24: 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la phyag byas nas sgrub pa pos bris pa'i ras ris kyi mtha' ma'i phyogs 'jigs pa med pas ras ris gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-0: @144b de nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'phur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-1: se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du phyin par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-2: me tog can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rab tu gnas par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-3: gang du bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang mngon du mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-6: byang chub sems dpa' du ma dag kyang mthong zhing de dag la bsnyen bkur yang byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-7: bskal ba chen po stong du rga ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-8: 'chi ba med cing gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-9: ras ris kyang de na gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-11: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-12: de dag gi byin gyis brlabs par yang yang dag par shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong yang 'da' bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-14: lus stong yang ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-15: rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu du ma yang 'byin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-16: 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-17: nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po rgya che ba'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:144b-19: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo rab 'byams sgrub pa'i thabs mchog gi las kyi le'u brgyad pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145a-1: thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor sngags sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145a-5: sgrub pa po bsrung ba'i phyir mchog tu gsang ba dam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145a-8: rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bzlas pa gang gis sngags thams cad bzlas par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145a-10: 'di ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145a-11: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang rig pa'i rgyal po 'dis 'gugs shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145a-12: dbang du byed la 'byor pa med par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145a-13: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145a-14: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145a-15: bgegs thams cad kyang 'jig par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145a-19: sngags thams cad kyi mchog gcig tu bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145a-20: yi ge gcig pa rnams kyi nang na gcig par bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145a-21: yi ge gcig gis don thams cad sgrub par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145a-22: bya ba thams cad byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145a-23: sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-0: ma rungs pa'i las rnams kyi sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa @145b sngags thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-3: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags rnams kyi gong nas gong du 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-6: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-9: 'di nyid mchog tu gsang ba dam pa las thams cad byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-10: yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-11: sems can thams cad kyis thub par dka' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-12: 'byung po thams cad kyi bkra shis pa; sangs rgyas thams cad sgrub par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-13: sngags thams cad kyi mnga' bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-14: 'jig rten thams cad kyi dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-15: rnam par sdang ba rnams la byams pa'i bdag nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-16: skye bo thams cad la snying brtse bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-17: bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-19: ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-20: bsgrubs pa med kyang las 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-21: sngags 'di bzlas la reg pas de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-22: gos la sngags nas gyon na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-23: so shing la sngags na so nad nye bar zhi par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:145b-24: ka ra b'i ra dkar po'i so shing la lan bdun sngags te zos na don du ma gnyer bar yang kha zas 'byung par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146a-0: mig gi nad la rgya ma tshva btags te lan @146a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146a-1: bdun mngon par sngags la mig bkang na mig gi nad sel to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146a-2: rna ba'i nad la 'brug sgrogs pa las skyes pa'i rtsva tshva tri ka zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146a-3: glang po che'i rgyab tu reg par byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146a-4: rang gi lo ma'i nang du btums nas me chung ba la bsregs te shin tu 'jam par byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146a-5: rgyam tshva'i phye ma chu dro 'jam tsam dang sbrus te lan bdun sngags pas rna ba bkad pa dang skad cig de nyid la rna ba na ba nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146a-6: bud med bu 'byung ba'i dus su mngal nas ma thon te na zhing nyam thag pa la ni shing a'a d'a ru sha ka'i rtsa ba srog chags med pa'i chu la btags te lte ba'i phyogs su bskus na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146a-7: mtshon nang du lus pa'i skyes bu la ni mar rnying pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags te btung ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146a-8: byugs na phyogs de nas de'i skad cig la zug rdu med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146a-11: 'khru ba'i nad la ni lan tshva nag po 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146a-13: tshva gzhan gang yang rung ba la lan bdun sngags te zos na nad de las grol bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146a-14: de nyid kyi nyin par bde legs su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146a-15: ldan pa'i nad kyis tshad pas 'khru ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146a-16: 'khru ba la ni ma du lung ga'i rtsa ba btags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146a-18: gnyis bzlas pa byas nas srog chags med pa'i chu dang 'thungs na gnod pa med par de las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146b-0: @146b bud med mo sham bu mi skye ba skye bar 'dod na aa shva gan dha'i rtsa ba mar bzang po dang lhan cig bskol la ba'i 'o ma dang lhan cig bskol te ba'i 'o ma dang bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa lngar bzlas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146b-1: zla mtshan gyi dus su blud la khrus byas pa'i 'og tu khyim bdag gzhan gyi chud ma spangs shing 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spangs pas rang gi chung ma la mngon par song na rang gi khyo dang 'dra ba'i bu skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146b-3: lo lnga'i bar du btsa' ba'i dus su khrag 'byung ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146b-4: lo du ma'i bar du bum chags pa' am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146b-7: gzhan gyi phyag rgyas bcing pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146b-8: gzhan gyis ma rungs par byas pa' am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146b-9: bu zla ba ma tshang bar 'byung ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146b-10: nad las yang dag par byung ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146b-11: gzhan gyi sbyor bas yang dag par byung ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146b-12: gzhan gang yang rung ba cung zad gzhan gyis byas pa'i nad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146b-16: bcos ma ma yin pa'i dbyig dug la sogs pa byin pa' am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146b-21: mi mdza' bas sbyor ba byas pa la lan nyi shu rtsa bdun sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:146b-22: mar rnying pa la rma bya'i sgro zla ba 'dra ba dang bsres te btags la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147a-0: de nas shin tu zhib par byas la sha kha ra dang lhan cig sbyar te aa ru ra tsam bza' bar @147a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147a-2: zhag bdun gyi bar du kha ra dang ldan pa'i bskol ba btung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147a-4: yang du sngags kyang bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147a-5: mgo bo'i nad la ni khva'i gshog pa la lan bdun sngags te byabs na bde legs su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147a-6: bud med la spyad drags pa la sogs pa'i nad ni shing aa lam bu sa'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma dang lhan cig btags nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147a-7: sman ni li ka'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa la brgya rtsa brgyad sngags te 'o ma de dang bsres la btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147a-8: de bzhin du rims nyin gcig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147a-14: rims mi bzad pa la sogs pa la'o thug mar dang ldan pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags te blud pa byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147a-15: de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis zin pa dag la ni bdag nyid kyi gdong la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags te nad pa la bltas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147a-16: de bzhin du ma mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-0: gzhon nu'i gdon la sogs pa mi ma yin pa'i mi bzad pa'i gdon thams cad kyis zin pa la ni bdag nyid kyi lag pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon @147b par sngags pa byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-1: gdon gyis zin pa'i mgo la reg par byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-2: lan gcig bzlas pas bdag nyid bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-3: lan gnyis bzlas pas grogs po bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-4: lan gsum bzlas pas ni khyim bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-5: lan bzhi bzlas pas ni grong bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-6: lan lnga bzlas pas ni grong gi spyod yul gyi 'gro ba bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-7: de bzhin du lan stong gi bar du bzlas na dmag gi tshogs bsrung ba byas par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-9: gzhan yang ma bsgrubs par las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-10: ci ste bsgrub par 'dod na ni las phran tshegs rnams bya ba ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-11: gcig tu dben pa'i gnas su song nas rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo 'byung ba'i gnas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-13: chu bo gang g'a'i ngogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-14: gzhan gang yang rung ba'i chu bo chen po'i ngogs la brten nas gtsang ma'i gnas su lo ma'i sbyil po byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-15: khrus lan gsum bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-16: thub par gnas shing slong mo'i kha zas bza' ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-20: 'bras bu za zhing bzlas pa sum 'bum byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-21: grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong na de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-22: phyogs de nyid du ras ris chen po bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:147b-23: ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148a-3: sa'i rang bzhin la shing du ru ska'i 'bru mar gyis bkad pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148a-4: dri zhim po'i 'grub [?] mar gyis bkang ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148a-5: ba'i mar gyis yongs su bkang ba'i mar me ras kyi dum bu gsar ba'i snying po byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148a-6: ras ris kyi mdun du 'bum phrag gcig gi mar me dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148a-7: kho ra khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba phul ma thag tu ras ris las 'od 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148a-8: 'od byung ma thag tu ras ris kyi kho ra khor yug tu 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun nas khyab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148a-9: steng gi nam mkha' bar snang las rnga bo che'i sgra sgrogs shing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra yang thos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148a-10: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings pa'i tshul gyis sgrub pa pos ras ris kyi mtha' la sngar bris pa'i ras ris kyi mtha' nas mchod yon gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148a-11: lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148a-12: sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148a-13: de nas de bzung ba tsam gyis mar me thams cad 'dzin pa'i sems can rnams gcig gis lhag pa'i gzhal med khang 'bum dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148a-14: lha'i sil snyan dang yang dag par ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148a-15: glu snyan pa'i sgra la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148b-0: gar dang ldan pas rig pa 'dzin ma khor yug @148b tu khyab pa dag gis mar me thogs pa dang lhan cig sgrub pa po rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por dbang bskur bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148b-2: 'chi ba med pas rol par 'gyur zhing bskal ba chen por gnas shing nyi ma dang 'dra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148b-3: lha'i yan lag lta bur mdzes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148b-4: gos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148b-5: 'khor de dag dang yang 'di lhan cig tu spyod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148b-6: rig pa thams cad kyang 'di'i bran bzhin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148b-7: rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro; ;ring du 'tsho ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148b-8: grub pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148b-9: rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi bu mo rnams mchog tu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148b-10: rdzas thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148b-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la bzhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148b-13: skad cig gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro zhing brgya byin la yang bgrang ba med na rig pa 'dzin pa gzhan lta ci smos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148b-14: 'di ni mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur zhing 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148b-16: las kyi sgrub pa po yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:148b-17: de nas shin tu brtson pas gcig tu dben pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149a-0: skye bo med la 'dres pa med cing 'dres pa dang bral bas dgon pa chen por @149a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149a-2: gnas gang du padma chen po yod pa'i mtsho dang ldan pa'i ri'i rtse mo gcig tu brten nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149a-3: ri'i rtse mo de'i steng du 'dzegs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149a-4: rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig pa 'jam dpal gyi cho ga las bshad pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149a-6: gzhan byang chub sems dpas bshad pa' am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149a-7: gang yang rung ba'i sngags gang 'dod pa de dag bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149a-9: 'o ma'i kha zas kyis 'cho zhing rig pa 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug bzlas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149a-10: bzlas pa'i mthar cho ga de nyid kyis sngar bstan pa'i ras ris kyi ri mo chen po rab tu bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149a-11: me tog padma la tsandan dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149a-12: gur gum gyis btags la seng ldeng gi shing gi me spar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149a-13: sngar yongs su btags pa'i me tog gis stong phrag drug cu rtsa drug gi sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149a-14: de nas sbyin sreg gi mthar bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i ras ris las 'od zer 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149a-15: de nas sgrub pa po snang bar byas te sbyi bor zhugs par 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149a-16: des reg ma thag tu sgrub pa pos mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149a-18: lha'i lus kyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149a-19: bskal pa sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum cu rtsa drug gnon @149b par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149b-1: de dag gi mthu yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149b-2: sangs rgyas sum cu rtsa drug gi gsung rab 'dzin par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149b-3: de la mchod cing bsnyen bskur ba la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149b-4: mthar yang byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149b-5: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis byang chub kyi mthar thug pa mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen du yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga dgu pa'i le'u rab 'byams las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149b-7: gnyis pa sgrub pa'i thabs dam pa'i las kyi le'u rab 'byams rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas bsgrub pa'i las dam pa gzhan yang gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149b-9: cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzung nas gang g'a'i klung chen por zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149b-10: dkyil du gru'i bzhon pa la 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149b-11: 'o ma dang sbyar ba'i 'bras chan za zhing ji ltar 'dod pa'i nyi ma la bzlas pa sum 'bum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149b-12: de nas bzlas pa'i tha ma la klu thams cad mthong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149b-13: de nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149b-14: gru'i steng de nyid kyi nang du me thab padma'i rnam pa 'dra ba byas chas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149b-15: me tog n'a ga ge sar dag gis ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:149b-16: ras ris chen po nub tu bstan pas bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-1: nyid shar du bltas nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-2: me tog n'a ga ge sar re re la yang lan bdun bdun /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-3: sngags pa byas nas shing seng ldeng gi me spar ba la sbyin sreg bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-5: gur gum dang bsres pa'i me tog n'a ga ge sar gyis lan stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-6: gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-7: klu rnams mthong ba yang don yod pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-8: grub pa'i rdzas la rab tu chags pas blang bar mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-9: grub pa'i rdzas rnams chags pas len par mi byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-10: des na sbyin sreg rdzogs pa dang glu'i bzhon pa dang bcas par 'phur bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-11: rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-12: klu'i rgyal po'i dbang po thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang zhing bran bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-13: bar gyi bskal pa sum cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-14: 'di rang dbang du'ang spyod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-15: 'gro ba la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-16: 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-17: sbyi po la phyag gis reg par mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-18: reg pa tsam gyis mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-19: nges par sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150a-20: las kyi mchog gzhan yang bstan pa ni bil ba'i shing gcig gi rang bzhin las gru'i bzhon pa shin tu brtan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150b-0: de @150b la zhon nas gang g'a'i klung chen por zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150b-1: bil ba'i shing las rlung yor byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150b-2: de nyid kyis gru de rlung yor 'dzin pa mkhas pa gsal ba des phyags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150b-3: gang g'a'i klung chen po mi dor bar yongs su thad ka 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150b-5: de nas gzhan gang yang rung ba'i sngags rtsa ba'i sngags sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150b-11: 'khor gyi sngags bzung nas dang por ras ris chen po de nyid nub tu bltas pas bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150b-12: sgrub pa po shar du blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150b-13: de nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150b-18: 'bras bu'i kha zas kyis 'tsho la mi smra ba'i dka' thub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150b-19: dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes nas dge ba'i las bzang po yang dag par spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150b-20: blo dge ba bzang po dang ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150b-21: dang por re zhig ras ris kyi mdun du sngar ji ltar bstan pa'i sngar bshad pa'i cho gas rig pa 'bum phrag drug cu bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150b-22: bzlas pa zin pa na gru de rgya mtsho chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150b-23: sgrub pa po'i yo byad yang dag par blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150b-24: sngar gyi gnas su gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150b-25: de nas gru'i bzhon pa rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba na 'jigs par mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:150b-27: sgrub pa po ma gtogs pas zlog par nus pa yang ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151a-1: dpag tshad stong du gnas pa'i rgya mtsho chen por yang yud tsam gyis 'jug par 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151a-2: lam thung du lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151a-3: rgya mtsho chen po der phyin pa na sgrub pa pos bsgrub pa'i las brtsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151a-4: de nas seng ldeng gi shing gis me spar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151a-5: sngar byas pa'i me thab bam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151a-6: rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i sa'i snod la me tog n'a ga ge sar /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151a-8: ga bur gyis bsres pa'i sreg blugs kyis shin tu nyung ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151a-9: rab tu mang ba yang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151a-10: 'bum phrag drug cu sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151a-11: sbyin sreg byed pa na yang lang ka'i grong khyer na gnas pa'i srin po gzugs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151a-12: cha byad mang po 'dzin pa ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151a-13: klu'i grong khyer gdengs ka dang ldan pa na gnas pa'i rgyal po rnams langs par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151a-14: cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151a-16: rab tu zhi ba'i klu de rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151a-21: bdag cag gi bdag po mdzad du gsol zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151a-22: de bzhin du lha ma yin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151a-27: mi ma yin pa thams cad kyang rab tu chags par byed na ldang bar mi bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-0: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngags zlo zhing lag pa g-yon pa'i mdzub mos sdigs mdzub byas na de nas phan @151b tshun du 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-3: de nas sbyin sreg zin pa na gru de sgrub pa po des blangs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-4: skad cig gis 'og min du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du yang 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang mthu mnyam par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-8: mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-10: mthu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-11: 'dis 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang rtag tu mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-15: 'phags pa nyan thos ma gtogs pa klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-19: lha ma yin thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-20: sems can thams cad kyang 'di'i bka' bzhin byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-21: 'di'i sngags grub pa de dag la yang byams pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur zhing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-22: sems can thams cad kyang 'di'i bka' bzhin 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-23: gzhan yang las sgrub pa'i thabs dam pa yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-24: shing bil ba chen po las gru'i bzhon pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-25: yang na shing gcig gi shing gi tshogs las gnas chen po byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-26: gang g'a'i dbus kyi klung der gru'i bzhon pa'i gnas byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:151b-27: der yang gru'i bzhon pa la zhon pa'i skyes bu brgya nyi shu rnams mar me lag na thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-0: @152a *// cho ga snga mas yang dag par bzhag pa'i ras ris mdun du gzhag par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-1: de nas ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-2: n'a ga ge sar gyi phye ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-5: ga bur gyis bsres pa'i sreg blugs kyis seng ldeng gi me la stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-6: de nas sbyin sreg zin pa na skad cig gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-8: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin rnam par rgyu bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-9: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-10: mthong ba tsam gyis sa thob par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-11: mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-12: yun ring du 'tsho zhing bskal pa chen por gnas par yang 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-13: rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-14: mar me 'dzin pa de dag kyang rig pa 'dzin pa 'di'i grogs por 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-15: de dag dang lhan cig ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rgyu zhing rang dbang du 'gro bar yang 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-17: bsnyen bkur byed par mngon par dga' bar 'gyur zhing 'phral yang sangs rgyas nyid du nges par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-18: gzhan yang sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las dam pa yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-19: chu klung rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152a-20: de bzhin ri po kha ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-0: ri yi rgyal po @152b 'bigs byed la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-1: las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-2: ma la ya ri sa ha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-3: spos kyi ngad ldang aar bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-4: ri yi rgyal po sum brtse gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-5: las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-6: de bzhin rgya mtsho chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-7: ri ni shing ldan me tog yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-8: 'di dag gi ni phyogs dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-9: sngags grub par ni rgyal bas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-10: gtsang zhing bas mtha' dben phyogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-11: grong gi chos ni rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-12: de bzhin ri yi tshang ching du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-13: sngags kyi rgyal po thams cad 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-14: bas mtha'i gnas mal nyams dga' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-15: rgyal bas de bzhin bsngags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-16: ma rungs sems can thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-17: sngags kyi rgyal pa thams cad 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-18: chos ldan rgyal po yod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-19: gtsang sbra spyod pa'i skye bo yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-20: pha dang ma la gus pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-21: bram ze'i rigs ni yod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-23: gzhan du 'grub pa ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-24: chu bo gang g'a'i 'gram dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-25: de bzhin legs mdzes ya mu na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-26: sindu nar ma d'a nang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-27: zla ba'i cha ni gtsang dogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-28: de bzhin k'a ba'i sa ra svad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-29: chu bo chen po s'i ta rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-30: 'di dag grub pa'i zhing du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-31: stobs bcu ldan sras rnams kyis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-32: stobs bcu ldan pas bshad pa'i zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-33: byang phyogs yod pa'i ri dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-34: kha che dang ni rgya yul dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-35: bal po de bzhin mang yul dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-36: rgya yul che dang li yul dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-37: de dag ma lus grub pa'i zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:152b-38: byang phyogs la ni gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-2: ri dang chu bo dag la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-3: bsod nams yul du bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-4: sems can snying rje ldan gang gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-6: dpal gyi ri bo'i ri chen ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-7: lho phyogs na ni yang dag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-8: dpal ldan 'bras phung mchod rten ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-9: rgyal ba'i ring bsrel gnas pa'i sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-10: thams cad don gyi gnas dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-11: der ni sngags rnams myur du 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-12: mchod rten chen po rdo rje gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-13: chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-14: thub mchog zhi bar rab gshegs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-15: der yang grub par rab tu snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-16: lha las babs pa'i mchod rten dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-17: nee ka sha dang cho 'phrul bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-18: grong mchog ser skya zhes bya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-19: nags tshal lum bi nir 'khrungs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-21: rgyal bas rab bsngags brjod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-22: bya rgod phung po'i ri dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-23: de bzhin sa steng bsil ba'i tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-24: grong mchog me tog ces bya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-25: rtag tu de bzhin ga sha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-26: bcom brlag kan n+ya ku ba dza dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-27: sa steng grong ni 'phags rgyal dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-28: de bzhin yangs pa can mchod rten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-29: mi thi la yi grong khyer sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-30: grong dang grong khyer mchog dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-31: gang gzhan skye bo yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-32: rab bsngags bsod nams yul dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-33: de dag du ni bsgrub pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-34: de dang gzhan yang yul dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153a-35: grong dang ljongs dang ri bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-0: @153b gnas dang grong mchog gtso bo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-1: bsod nams gnas la rab brten nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-2: der ni slong mos rjes 'tsho zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-3: bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-4: gnas khang bla gab med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-5: rtag tu khyim ni stong pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-6: sngags rnams las ni thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-7: thog ma nyid du bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-8: sngags pas rtag tu yul dbus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-9: sngags bzlas mngon par 'dod pas bya; ;bzlas la rab zhugs rtag tu brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-10: sngags rig gtong ba dag la goms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-11: tshul khrims spyod cing shin tu dben //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-12: 'byung po kun la phan par dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-13: sngags spyod pa la dga' ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-14: sdom brtson gyis ni sngags bzlas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-15: gtsang zhing gtsang sgra yod phyogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-16: kla klo rkun ma rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-17: sems can sdig sbrul la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-18: spangs pa'i sa phyogs 'dod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-19: 'bras bu me tog yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-20: dri med rab bsngags chu yod par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-21: sngags rig sngags ni brten byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-22: sbyor ba thams cad rab tu 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-23: gzhan yang dur khrod chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-24: der ni bzlas pa rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-25: dri med chu dang 'bab chu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-26: srog chags dag kyang rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-27: der ni de nyid bzla bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-28: mnyam par gzhag pas sngags bzla bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-29: 'jig rten spyod pa'i bsod nams min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-30: der ni cung zad mi mthong ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-31: 'on kyang sngags ni bstan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-32: cung zad dus ni bsten pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:153b-33: dam tshig tshogs pa'i rgyu ldan na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-2: der ni dam tshig thob bsten pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-3: cung zad gus te gzhan du min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-4: de nas gzhan du'ang myur du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-5: sngags rig pas ni ci nus 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-6: bde gshegs mchod rten bzhugs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-7: sa steng dag la rtag tu brten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-8: 'jig rten mu stegs thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-9: lta ba log par ltung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-10: gzhan yang stegs su gyur pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-11: sngags rig pas ni rtag tu spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-12: rgyu ngan 'gro ba ngan yod par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-13: sngags rig pas ni der mi bsten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-14: gang du rgyal ba mchog bzhugs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-15: sa steng bsi ru rang rgyal dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-16: byang chub sems dpa' skal ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-17: nyan thos rgyal ba'i sras dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-18: de dag gnas pa'i phyogs dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-19: zlos pa sngags rig ldan pas bsten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-20: 'bad pas snga ma nyid du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-21: gnas de la ni rtag tu spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-22: sngags shes cho ga mthong ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-23: yang dang yang du sngags bzlas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-24: lus can sdig pa ma lus dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-25: bzlas dang sbyin sreg dag gis sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-26: de bas 'bad pa kun gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-27: mnyam gzhag sngags ni bzla bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-28: las thams cad la gnas 'di dag gsungs pa las sgrub pa mchog gi las kyi thabs sgrub pa la gnas 'di dag ma rnyed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-29: gang yang rung ba'i gnas de dag tu gtsang sbra byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154a-30: sngon du bsnyen pa byas la dad cing mos pas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi lam dam pa brtsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154b-0: dang po re @154b zhig ras ris chen po nub tu bltas pas bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154b-1: bdag nyid shar du bltas la grog mkhar gyi sa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154b-2: gang g'a'i klung gi ngogs na yod pa'i sa blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154b-6: ga pur la sogs pa bsre ba bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154b-7: rma bya'i gzugs byas la ras ris de'i mdun du bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154b-8: ku sha'i rtse mo ma nyams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154b-9: sa phyogs gtsang mar skyes pa 'khor lo'i gzugs su byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154b-10: ras ris kyi mdun du lag pa g-yas pas bzung zhing lag pa g-yon pas rma bya bzung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154b-11: yar ngo'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mor ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154b-13: tsandan gyi dud pa bsregs la nam langs kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154b-14: de nas nyi ma shar ba'i dus su lha'i rang bzhin gyi rma bya ni rma bya chen po'i rgyal mor 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154b-15: 'khor lo ni kun tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing bdag nyid kyang lha'i lus su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154b-16: de nas lha'i phreng pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154b-19: nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra ba'i 'dod pa'i gzugs mdzes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154b-21: byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas ras ris la g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:154b-22: ras ris blangs te rma bya'i stan de la 'dug na yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gnon par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155a-0: rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi 'khor du ma dang ldan pa'i rig pa @155a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155a-2: bar gyi bskal pa drug cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155a-3: ji ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing spyod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155a-4: 'gro ba la thogs pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155a-5: lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155a-6: 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang mngon sum du 'gyur zhing de nyid 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155a-7: mthar sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155a-8: de bzhin du dbyig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155a-17: mtshon rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par sa'i rang bzhin nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155a-21: bzhon pa'i bye brag seng ge dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155a-24: grog mkhar gyi sa'i rang bzhin dri zhim po'i dris bsres pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155a-30: rgyan gyi bye brag thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155a-31: rin po che'i bye brag thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155a-32: rab tu byung ba'i yo byad kyi bye brag phreng ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155a-39: gri la sogs pa lcags khyad par can gyi rang bzhin nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155b-0: gang cung zad sems can gyi yo byad snod la @155b sogs pa lcags bzang po'i rang bzhin nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155b-2: chu bo'i dogs kyi sa las byas pa de dag thams cad ba'i rnam lngas bkrus pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155b-3: chus gtor ba tsam byas la; snga ma bzhin du yongs su dag par byed pa'i sngags sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155b-4: yi ge gcig pa'i sngags sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155b-5: gzhan gang yang rung ba'i sngags cho ga'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabs kyi sngags ma gtogs pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155b-6: ji ltar 'dod par bdag nyid bsrung ba byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155b-7: grogs po yang yongs su bskyab pa byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155b-8: shin tu gsang ba'i sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155b-10: sngar bstan pa'i gnas dag tu ras ris nub tu bltas pas gzhag la bdag nyid snga ma bzhin du byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155b-11: ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas ras ris chen po la ga bur gyi bdug pas bdugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155b-14: sems can gyi khyad par sngar bstan pa'i bcos mar byas pa la yar ngo'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo gong ma'i rdzas gang mang rung ba de dag blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155b-15: mtshan mo nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi bar bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155b-16: bar 'dir 'od chen po'i phreng ba ras ris la yang dag par mthong la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155b-17: gal te bzhon pa'i khyad par sgrub pa pos gzung bar 'gyur na ni de la zhon nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:155b-18: gal te rgyan gyi khyad par ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-1: gyi khyad par de blangs pas de bcangs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-2: rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-3: ji ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-4: nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-5: 'od kyi phreng ba chen po dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-6: lus shin tu gsal bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-7: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-8: ring du 'tsho zhing bskal pa chen por gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-9: rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi 'khor du ma dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-10: lha'i nor bu rin po che'i gzhal med khang la spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-11: bzhon pa gang sngar yongs su brtags pa sa'i rang bzhin grub na de nyid 'dir mthu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-12: bzhon pa de nyid 'di'i grogs por 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-13: gzhan gyi sngags 'gugs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-14: grub pa rnams kyi bsten pa'i gnas su gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-15: bdag gi sngags kyi grub pa la yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-17: phan par 'dod pas rab tu 'brel pa gang 'di nyid kyi mtshon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-19: rin po che'i khyad par dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-22: sems can la sogs pa nyid 'di la srung ba chen po nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-24: sbed pa la rtag tu 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156a-27: lus chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156b-0: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa @156b mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad la spyi bo la reg par mdzad cing byang chub kyi snying po thob kyi bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen du sgrub par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156b-1: stobs bcu nyid kyang nges par thob par mdzad cing sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon cing mchod par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156b-2: 'byung po thams cad kyis mi chugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156b-3: yang dag pa'i rgyud kyi mtha' gcod pa med par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i sa nges par thob par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156b-8: las dam pa thams cad gnas dam pa dag tu gnas nas ras ris dam pa dag gi mdun du mchod pa dam pa la mngon par dga' bas las dam pa gzhan dag kho na bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156b-9: rig pa 'dzin pa nyid du nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su zhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156b-11: mngon par shes par lnga nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156b-14: lus 'di nyid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu 'gro ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156b-15: stobs bcu'i rgyu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156b-16: 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong ba nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156b-17: 'bras bu yod bar mthong ba'i chos ston pa mnyan pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:156b-18: sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-0: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthar gyis rjes @157a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-1: su thob pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-2: chos kyi sprin las byung ba'i sngags bzang po la 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-3: nyon mongs pa bskam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-4: bdud rtsi'i char gyis nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-5: 'jig rten rjes su gzung ba la rab tu 'jug par rjes su sgrub pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-6: de bzhin du chos kyi tshul gzung ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung don yod par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-8: sngags kyi thabs kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga rab tu gsang ba nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-12: 'phags pa nyan thos kyi bdag nyid chen po 'byung ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-13: cho ga'i rgyal po rab 'byams sngags kyi mthu dang rab tu rnam par ldan pa 'di ras ris chen po'i mdun du nye bar gnas la bsgrub par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-15: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-16: sngags rgyud thams cad kyi cho ga'i lam gyi ste; mdor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-17: 'dir cho ga gzhan du gsungs pa'i las kyis kyang cho ga'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-18: myur du de dag gi sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-19: gang ngas bstan pa de dag nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157b-0: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bcu pa @157b ras ris chen po'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas; 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157b-3: khyod kyi ras ris bar ma'i cho ga gzhan sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157b-4: mdor bsdus nas bshad kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157b-5: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157b-7: 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157b-8: ston pa sems can thams cad la phan par dgyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157b-9: bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157b-10: ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la gzigs nas de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na de bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157b-11: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157b-12: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157b-14: dang por re zhig tshul khrims dang; brtul zhugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157b-20: cho ga gang du legs par rab tu gnas pa la sngags thams cad spyod pa sgrub pa'i las 'bras bu dang bcas shing don yod par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157b-21: sngags thams cad kyi sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:157b-22: nges bshad pa de gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-0: @158a *// dang por re zhig rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-2: tshul khrims kyi yi dam dang po nyid du blang bar byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-3: dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i dam tshig khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal por bstan cing sngar bshad pa la rjes su 'jug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-5: yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-6: slob dpon du dbang bskur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-7: khyod kyis bstan pa'i cho ga shes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-9: gsal ba'i chos dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-11: spro ba chen po dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-13: yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-18: bkur sti la chags pa med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-19: tshangs par spyod pa snying rje dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-21: longs spyod kyi rgyu tsam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-22: rjes su chags pa'i rgyur yang rdzun mi smra na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-25: rmongs pa tsam gyis rnam par lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-26: dam bcas pa brtan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-27: sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang; snying rje dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-28: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-29: sngon du spyad pa byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-30: khyod kyi gsang ba'i sngags rjes su zlos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-31: snga ma nyid du rig pa goms par byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-32: khyod kyi dkyil 'khor la mthar gyis yang dag par zhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158a-35: yang dag bar rjes su 'dzin par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158b-0: 'bras @158b bu dang ldan zhing mkhas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158b-1: legs pa la rab tu zhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158b-8: nad gang gis las mi nus pa'i ngang tshul can gyi nad med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158b-10: yon tan de dag dang ldan na ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur la sgrub pa po yang de dang mnyam pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158b-12: ma tshang ba cung zad kyang med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158b-13: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la mchod pa byas shing don du gnyer bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158b-14: slob dpon dang lhan cig byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i dam tshig la rjes su 'jug par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158b-15: slob dpon gyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du phan pa'i thugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158b-16: brtse ba'i thugs kyis de bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158b-17: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des sngar bstan pa'i cho gas slob ma la snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du brtags nas rab tu gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158b-18: sngar ji ltar dbang bskur ba bzhin du phyis kyang sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158b-19: go rim ji lta ba bzhin du dam tshig bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158b-23: las kyang dus ring po nyid nas nges par brtags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:158b-24: bsam pa shes nas brtan par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159a-0: sngags la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang thams cad du gzhan du ma yin no zhes cho ga 'di ltar @159a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159a-2: de nas slob mas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la ci nus pas gang gis slob dpon dgyes pa bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159a-3: longs spyod rab tu dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159a-4: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des bu'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159a-5: bu bzhin du bsgrub par bya zhing ma bzhin du yang longs spyod kyis nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159a-6: de nas sgrub pa po des sngags gang yang rung ba bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159a-7: gcig pu dben par song nas sngar bstan pa gong ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159a-8: de dag nyid kyis sngags dag gis ni spyan drang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159a-14: lha bshos dkyil 'khor la gsungs pa nyid kyi tshogs rgya cher byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159a-16: mchod yon phul la dus mtshams gsum du khrus lan gsum bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159a-17: gos gsum brje zhing nyin re bzhin du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159a-18: de la dus gsum zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo'i mtha' nas brtsams pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159a-19: zung tsam nas nyi ma 'char ba'i bar 'dir dang po'i dus su brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-0: nyi ma'i gung na nyi ma gnyi ga'i gung tsam gyi tshad du nam mkha' la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor @159b la nyi ma gung gi dus zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-1: nyi ma nub pa'i dus su lhag ma zung tsam lus pa'i dus gsum pa zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-2: tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-3: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-4: mthon po'i rigs su skyes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-5: rnam pa kun tu brtson 'grus brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-6: sngags rgyud dag la mngon brtson dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-7: bya ba kun la blo gros dge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-8: zhib cing mkhas la chog shes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-9: chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-10: spro ba che zhing gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-11: 'jig rten chos la ltos pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-12: thub mchog chos la dad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-13: 'jig rten na ni yongs su bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-14: dben pa shes shing bzlas pa byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-15: sngon du bsnyen pas rjes bsnyen byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-16: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sngags shes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-17: mthong bas nges 'dzin de mchog byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-18: sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-19: 'jig rten pa yi sbyor ba shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-20: srung byed mthu ni brtan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-21: rtag tu gtsang sbra'i spyod la dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-22: sangs rgyas bstan pa'i lam la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-23: thams cad du ni 'jug par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-24: rab bsngags rgyal bas bstod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-25: sngags zlos pa la brtson par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-26: las 'bras dag la rtag yid che sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-27: 'jig rten pha rol de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-28: sdig pa kun la 'jigs byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-29: shin tu phra ba'ang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-30: gtsang zhing grims dang le lo med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-31: yid gzhungs blta na sdug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:159b-32: stobs bcu ldan pas sngags bshad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-2: gang dag 'jig rten sngags dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-3: rdo rje padma'i rigs dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-4: de la rtag tu brtson byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-5: gzhung dang bstan bcos don klog pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-6: nad med pa dang stobs ldan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-7: rgas dang gzhon pa rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-8: sngags grub de bzhin shes nyes can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-9: kun nas myur du byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-10: las mtha' mi ring nga rgyal chung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-11: zur tsam gyis go khyad par can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-12: tshangs par spyod cing shes rab che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-13: gcig pu 'dre bar mi byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-14: 'jam dpal gyis gsungs rgyud dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-15: dbang bskur thob cing dpa' ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-16: bzlas pa'i mthar byas ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-17: de bzhin rig pa goms byas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-18: sems dpa' che zhing 'jig rten shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-19: 'gro ba'i de nyid rjes sems dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-20: legs pa'i lam nyid rab sbyar byad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-21: sbyin byed 'byung po phan la dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-22: khyad par can de'i slob dpon la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-23: rtag tu don du gnyer bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-24: dkyil 'khor de ni bris pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-25: sngags rnams grub pa ster par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-26: de nyid kyi ni dbang bskur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-28: grub pa 'dod pa'i slob mas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-29: thub mchog de ni rtag tu mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-30: de yi bka' ni ma 'gom par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-31: slob mas 'bad nas bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-32: ji ltar 'byor ba yod pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-33: longs spyod de la sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-34: nyung ba'ang yang na mang ba'ang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160a-35: gang gis dga' ba thob 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-0: lus dang srog @160b gi don phyir ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-1: nor ni ji ltar sbyin pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-2: slob mchos rig de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-3: slob dpon phyir ni nor sbyin na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-4: tshe dang nad med de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-5: grags pa thob par 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-6: slob mas bla ma de mchod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-8: lam ni sna tshogs nyar bstan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-10: de la bsten dang bsnyen bkur byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-11: ri mo byas dang mchod pas ni; ;sangs rgyas rnams dang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-12: rgyal ba'i sras rnams mnyes par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-13: bla ma rtag tu bsnyen bkur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-14: lha rnams thams cad dga' bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-15: bla ma sngags rnams mthong ba yis; ;de ltar thams cad bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-16: sgrub pa pos ni dang por yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-17: dam tshig la ni 'jug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-18: dma' ba'ang de dang mnyam pa'ang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-19: gal te khyad par gyur na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-20: rmongs pa'am lhag pa yin yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-21: rtag tu bla ma brnyas mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-22: ji ltar de nyid rjes mthong la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-23: sngags 'grub pa la bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-24: sngar bstan pa yi slob ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-25: de la phrag dog bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-26: lus can brtse ba 'phel byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-27: mig ni gang la yod gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-28: de ni slob ma nyid bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-29: slob dpon rgyur yang bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-30: gang du phan tshun rgyud la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-31: brtse ba'i phreng ba yod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-32: brtse ba'i rgyud ni 'dzin pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-33: de la sngags ni sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-34: slob dpon la ni slob ma 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-35: bla mas slob ma mthong ba'ang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-36: rtag tu spro bar 'gyur ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:160b-37: gnyi ga la ni grub pa gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-2: sngags spyod lam ni bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-3: gnyi gas pha dang bur shes la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-4: sngags ni 'bras bcas gnas pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-5: slob ma bla mas rtag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-6: brtan dang dga' ba de bzhin thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-7: bu ni chos dang rjes mthun la //
