K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-8: 'bad pas rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-9: de dag la ni sangs rgyas chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-10: rtag tu rgyun mi chad par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-11: gal te de med mgon bral la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-12: sngags rnams ji skad gsungs pa sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-13: sems can dbul po rnams la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-14: khyad par du yang sngags byin na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-15: sems can kun la'ang sbyin pa bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-16: sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par 'phags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-17: mchog dang bar ma tha ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-18: dus rnams kun tu bya ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-19: rtag tu sems can kun la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-20: rjes su gzung ba'i phyir bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-21: 'gro ba'ang skye gnas rnams brtags nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-22: 'dod pa dag la sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-23: de ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-24: slob mas de la blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-25: de nyid kyis bstan lam yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-26: gzhan du de lta ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-27: 'jig rten pha rol pa la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-28: grub pa de las bslang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-29: pha bzhin mgo bos phyag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-31: de nas gcig bu 'gro byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-32: mnyam par gzhag ste bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-33: slong mo slong bas rjes 'tsho zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-34: thub pa dus gsum zlos par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-35: sngar ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-36: lam du rab tu 'jug par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161a-37: de la rjes 'jug bsten pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-0: 'dug pa dang ni gnas pa @161b 'o; ;dben pa chen po ri rtse dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-1: de bzhin chu bo'i ngogs gtsang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-2: ba lang gnas dang mtsho chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-3: dben pa skye bo rnams spangs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-4: lha khang stongs dang shing dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-5: mtshan gcig ri ni mthon po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-6: rgya mtsho che ngogs dga' ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-7: gling rnams chen po dag dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-8: rnam pa sna tshogs sngar bstan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-9: yul ni yid du 'ong ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-10: 'di dag las ni phyogs gzhan du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-11: mnyam gzhag sngags ni bzla bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-12: grogs po mtshan nyid ldan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-13: sngags don lugs dang tshad mar ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-14: zur gyi rnam pa de nyid shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-16: dpa' zhing g-yul las rnam rgyal dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-17: snying stobs che zhing bzod dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-18: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i bstan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-19: sngags kyi spyod pa la dad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-20: sngags pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-21: bzod dang ldan pa'i grogs po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-22: de la 'bad pa med par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-24: tho rangs mal nas langs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-25: mtsho chen las byung chu bo las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-26: byung chu srog chags skyon med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-27: bzang pos khrus ni rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-28: sa dang lci ba phye ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-29: sngags shes pas ni lus dril bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-30: sngags kyis de bzhin dag byas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-31: dri med gtsang sgrar byas pa'i chus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-32: sngags ldan bdag nyid khrus bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-33: ha cang ring bar 'dug mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-34: de nas langs nas chu dogs 'dug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-35: sa dag gis kyang lag gnyis bkru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-36: bdun dang bdun dang yang bdun ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:161b-37: nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-0: @162a *// de bzhin du yang nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-1: so shing dag kyang yang dag byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-2: so shing rnam par bor nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-3: de nas skyob la phyag kyang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-5: mchod pa yid du 'ong bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-6: rnam pa sna tshogs mchod bstod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-7: yang dag bstod pa yang yang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-8: dri zhim me tog de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-9: ston la 'dod pas mchod yon dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-10: sangs rgyas rnams dang de'i slob la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-11: spyi bos rab btud phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-12: 'jig rten mgon po de dag gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-13: mdun du sdig pa bshags par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-14: ras ris bar ma'i mdun du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-15: bdag nyid dag kyang dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-16: ku sha'i khres ni byas pa der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-17: legs par mnyam gzhag 'dug nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-18: des ni phreng ba thogs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-19: 'bad pas bzlas pa bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-20: ji ltar rnyed pa'i sngags kyis bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-21: de tshe sngags gzhan bzlas mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-22: ha cang ngan pa spang bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-23: ha cang bzang po'ang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-24: bar ma bar ma'i las dag la; ;sdom chen sngags ni rtag tu bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-25: ha cang skad mthon 'bad pas spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-26: tshig ni dma' ba'ang ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-27: bar ma dbus kyi yul dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-28: rjes mthun rgyal bas bsngags pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-29: ha cang skad mtho dma' ba'ang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-30: bar mas rtag tu bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-31: sangs rgyas snga ma kun gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-32: tshig ni legs ldan yin zhes gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162a-33: rtag tu gzhan gyi rna lam dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-0: @162b gzhan gyi drung du mi bzla 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-1: dben pa'i phyogs su'ang bdag rig pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-2: sngags kyang bar ma bzla bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-3: de ltar sngags bzlas rab sbyar na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-4: sngags ni gang yang myur du 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-6: yang dang yang du bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-7: de bas bzlas pa rnam bral dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-8: sngags kyi de nyid don legs thos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-9: dben zhing gdung ba med par ni; ;zlos pas sngags ni bzla bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-10: mtshan mo yi ni bzhi cha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-11: de phyed de bzhin phyed nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-12: skya reng dmar po zung tsam la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-14: dang po bar ma nyid du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-15: thub pa mchog gis gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-16: zung tsam khru ni bzhi pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-17: bar mar yongs su bsgrags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-18: de nas nyi ma phyed shar na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-19: sngags bzlas de tshe spang bar bya; ;sngags bzlas de tshe btang ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-20: sngom brtson mchod yon slar gshegs gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-21: de tshe btang ba'i lhag dus la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-22: thub pa'i bstan la dge ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-23: dam chos bklag la sogs pa ni; ;shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-24: glegs bam sa bcu zhes bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-25: mchod dang bklag pa rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-26: de nas dus la bab gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-27: rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-28: thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-30: dus dang spyod dang de bzhin ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-31: dus su zas spyod dbang bo thul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:162b-32: chos can sgrub la brtson pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-1: rgyas bstan la rab tu dad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-2: mi smra grong gi nang du 'dug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-3: rtag tu gtsang sbra spyod la dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-4: chos ldan sems can khyim du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-5: slong dus rtag zlos byed cing 'dug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-6: srog chags med chos grub pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-7: zas ni gtsang bar grags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-8: yang dag lta ba'i khyim dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-10: sangs rgyas bstan la dang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-11: de 'dra'i khyim la rtag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-12: slong ba'i don du slong mo blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-13: ji ltar dpa' bos go bgos te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-14: nyam nga'i g-yul du 'jug pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-15: rtag tu dgra ni 'joms byed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-16: dgra yis 'joms kyang mi nus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-17: de bzhin sngags pa rtag grong du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-19: gzugs sgra la sogs bzang po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-20: de ltar mthong bas chags gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-21: 'dod chags zhi ba'i don gyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-22: dge ba mi gtsang bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-23: lang tsho'i rnam pas brgyan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-24: bud med gzugs ni mthong ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-25: mi gtsang dri ngan bsgom bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-26: shin tu smad pa rnag dang gcin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-27: srin bus zos dang dur khrod gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-28: lus ni mi rtag sdug bsngal yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-29: byis pa sngags la rmongs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-31: las kyi skud pas bcings nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-32: yun ring dus su mya ngan byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-33: mi shes sgrib pas rmongs pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-34: dmus long sdug bsngal rgyu yang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163a-35: gang du blo ni phyin ci log /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-0: skye bo chags @163b pas phongs par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-1: rnam pa sna tshogs las gar gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-2: rnam pa du mar chags byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-3: yun ring res kyis gnas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-5: gar byed bzhin du spyod pa yis; ;bran bzhin du ni gtong bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-6: mi gtsang dga' ba'i sems can gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-7: yun ring lam du phongs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-9: zo chun gyi ni rnam pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-10: 'gro ba de dag mi bzad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-11: sdug bsngal chu yis khyab pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-12: sangs rgyas kyis ni bud med dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-13: ma 'dres sdug bsngal rtsa bar gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-14: nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-15: rang rgyal thub pas de bzhin gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-17: rgya mtsho 'di ni skam par dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-18: bud med sems kyis bslus pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-19: gang du sems can bying gyur nas; ;dmyal ba dud 'gro'i 'jig rten dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-20: yi dvags 'jig rten lha ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-21: de bzhin mi yi 'jig rten dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-23: bud med chags pas bslus pas na; ;kun nas yongs su 'khor 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-25: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho btson ra yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-26: bud med chags pa'i blun po'i mi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-27: rul pa'i ro la wa bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-28: gang du mi ni chags byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-29: shin tu mi bzad sdug bsngal bzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-30: dkar po'i chos ni nges nyams byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:163b-31: sangs rgyas bstan la zhugs pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-2: thams cad yongs su zlog byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-3: sngags zlos dga' zhing brtson pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-4: grags pa che zhing chags dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-5: gzi brjid ldan zhing kun dang mdza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-6: de dag la ni sdug bsngal med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-7: yang dag sdom dang tshangs bden shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-8: bla ma lha la mchod byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-9: ma dang pha la gus pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-10: de dag la ni sdug bsngal med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-11: dam pa'i don la brten na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-12: mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-13: de bzhin dbyig dug zug rdu bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-14: zlos pa bud med lus bsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-15: blo ngan phung ba'i lcags kyus zin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-17: rtag tu bud med chags gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-18: de la grub pa yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-19: zlos pa 'di la tshul khrims nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-20: de la grub pa mchog med cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-21: grub pa 'bring yang yong med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-22: grub pa tha ma'ang yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-23: tshul khrims 'chal la thub dbang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-24: sngags grub par ni ma gsungs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-25: mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yi; ;yul dang phyogs kyang ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-26: byis pa ngan pa 'di la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-27: sngags grub pa ni ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-29: de la bde 'gro ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-30: mtho ris su yang mi 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-31: bde ba mchog tu'ang mi 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164a-32: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-0: ta la'i shing gi mgo @164b pa ni; ;gang tshe bcad par gyur pa na'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-1: sngon po nyid kyi skal med na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-3: de bzhin sngags grub rmongs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-4: tshul khrims nyams shing sdig las byed; ;rtag tu bud med chags pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-5: 'dir ni rab tu bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-6: mi dge'i bshes gnyen bsten pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-7: sngags kyi rgyal po ga la 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-8: de bas dul dang rtag bzlas byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-9: bud med skyon ni rnam spyod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-10: de la chags pa rnam spang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-11: de la grub par brjod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-12: byis pa bud med la brgyal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-13: gzhan la grub pa bstan pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-14: blo ldan g-yeng ba med la dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-15: gtsang zhing ma chags shes nyen can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-16: rigs mtho brtan dang dpa' ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-17: brtser ldan mthong na dga' ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-18: chos dang chos min rnam dpyod shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-19: de la grub pa rnyed mi dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-20: de ltar sngags shes zhugs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-21: grong du slong phyir rab tu 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-22: sngar ni brtags pa'i gnas dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-23: ji ltar 'dod bzhin song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-24: blo ldan dag pas bslang ba'i snod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-25: gtsang ba'i phyogs su yang dag gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-26: phyi rol song nas rkang gnyis bkru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-27: de nas yang ni yan lag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-28: de tshe srog chags me dpa'i chus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-29: lag pa g-yas pas byin pa g-yas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-30: lag pa g-yon pas byin pa g-yon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-31: yang na gnyis ka dus gcig bkru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-32: sa ni lag g-yon yang bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-33: sngar ni yang dag bzhag pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-34: bdug pa gtsang ma'i sa dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:164b-35: lag pa gnyis ni rab tu bkru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-2: dri med gtsang sbra dag snod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-3: ba ni ser skyas bor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-4: lci ba sar pa blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-5: srog chags med pa'i chur sbyar bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-6: ston pa la ni dkyil 'khor bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-7: dang po thub pa mchog la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-8: khor yug khru gang tsam du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-9: gnyis pa rang sngags mgon po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-10: gsum pa rang rigs lha la 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-11: sngags pa bzlas pa gang byed pa; ;rtag tu'ang de nyid bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-12: yang ni sems can thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-13: longs spyod phyir ni bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-14: g-yas su 'jig rten mgon po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-16: dkon mchog gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-17: gru bzhi dag tu bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-18: gnyis pa rang sangs rgyas rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-19: gsum pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-21: kun nas gru bzhir bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-22: khru gang ngam ni khru phyed du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-23: nyin re zhing ni bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-24: sdig pa 'jig byed bzlas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-25: dben pa'i phyogs su nyin re bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-26: sngags pa de nas langs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-27: 'bad pas lag gnyis rab tu bkru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-28: gtsang ba'i chu yis nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-29: dag cing srog chags spangs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-30: dri med gtsang sbras 'bad nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-31: gtsang ba'i snod ni de tshe blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-33: chu mig chu bo la gnas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-34: gtsang ba'i phyogs nas byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165a-35: sems can dag pa lag blangs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-0: gnyis sam gsum du @165b rtag tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-1: sngags pas nye reg bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-2: de nas chus reg gdong dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-3: de bzhin du ni rna khung dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-4: mig dang sna dang lag gnyis dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-5: spyi bo lte ba'i phyogs reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-6: dge ba spyod pas lan lnga 'am bdun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-7: cho ga ji bzhin thams cad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-8: gtsang sbra'i spyod pa legs ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-9: zlos pa gtsang bar gyur pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-10: slong snod yang dag blangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-11: chu yi gzhir ni 'gro bar bya; ;gang du chu yi rgyun 'bab gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-12: de bzhin du ni chu mig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-13: chu bo rab tu 'bab pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-14: rtag tu zas ni bkru bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-15: gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-16: de nas langs nas 'gro bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-17: gang du sngon ni brten pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-18: gang du gnas pa der 'gro bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-19: de nas zlos pas lhung bzed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-20: song nas phyogs ni der gzhag bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-21: de nas nye reg myur byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-22: de bzhin yang ni lhung bzed blangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-24: dngul dang gser gyi snod dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-25: zangs ma shing shun dag kyang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-26: ston pa la ni dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-27: sten pa la ni bshos phul nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-28: rang sngags sngags kyi rgyal po'ang brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-30: ci nus par ni sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-31: rnam pa kun tu kha zas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-32: ha cang mang ba sbyin mi bya; ;sngags rig lus gdung mi bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-33: rnam pa kun tu ci rigs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-34: lto ba'i tshad tsam gzhag bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-35: lhag ma'i zas ni rtag tu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:165b-36: bkres dang skom pas nyen gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-1: kyi don la rten mi nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-2: kha zas mang dang nyung zos na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-3: sngags rnams mnyes par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-4: de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-5: sems can zas kyis gnas pa'o zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-6: lus can rnams la gsungs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-7: gang gis mi rnams 'tsho ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-8: lha dang lha min dri za dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-9: klu dang gnod sbyin mi'am ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-10: srin po yi dvags sha za dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-11: 'byung po skar ma gza' rnams dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-12: gang zhig kha zas mi za ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-13: de ni gang yang yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-14: rags pa'i zas ni gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-15: kham gyi zas su rnam par bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-16: sems can phra ba'i zas can yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-18: bsam gtan zas can rnams la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-19: gzugs kyi khams na spyod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-20: gzugs med khams kyi lha dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-22: srid pa bar ma'i sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-23: dri yi zas su rab tu bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-24: de bzhin 'dod khams sems can dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-25: sna tshogs zas la spyod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-26: de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-27: las kyi rgyu yis gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-28: sems can zas kyis gnas pa zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-29: thams cad la ni rab tu bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-30: zlos la rtag tu brtson pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-31: zas kyi tshod rig bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-32: gang phyir sngags brten nus pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-33: kha zas la ni rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166a-34: spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-0: dge zhing tshangs par @166b spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-1: kha zas tshod ni rig pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-2: de la grub pa rnyed mi dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-3: ji ltar shing rta'i shing rta babs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-4: mig ni yongs su bskus pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-5: yun ring dus su brtan phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-6: khal ni 'dogs bar bya phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-7: de bzhin sngags pa sngags shes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-8: kha zas gnas phyir 'dzin byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-9: lus kyang tshim par bya ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-10: zlos pas rtag tu gso bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-11: sngags rnams bsgrub pa'i phyir dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-12: byang chub tshogs ni bya ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-13: de bzhin du ni sngags bzla ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-15: de nyid phyir na thub mchog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-16: 'od srung zhes bya sngon byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-17: de tshe de dus sa steng 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-18: 'od chen ldan pa des gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-19: 'byung po rnams la legs don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-20: sngags 'di rab tu gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-21: 'jig rten ma lus sdug bsngal dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-22: dman dang dbul dang skyo ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-23: 'bad rtsol dag la nyon mongs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-24: de dag don phyir gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-25: 'byung po rnams la legs don dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-26: de bzhin gnas par 'dod pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-27: 'byung po rnams la zas don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-28: sngags mchog 'di ni gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-29: nyan thos dag ni thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-30: byang chub la gnas thams cad nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-31: bdag gis sngags 'di rab brjod kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-32: nad rnams 'jig byed zungs shig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-33: gang yang bkres nad kyis nyen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-34: gang yang sems can skom pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:166b-35: kun gyi sdug bsngal nyer zhi'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-2: thub pa mchog gis de skad gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-3: nyan thos rnams ni yid dga' nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-4: khyab bdag la ni gsol ba 'debs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-5: chos mkhyen sngags ni bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-6: chos kyi rgyal po thub pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-7: sems can brtse ba'i mchog gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-8: dus ni rab tu nye bar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-9: de skad gsol nas thub mchog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-10: ka la ping ka'i sgra skad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-11: rnga bo che yi sgra skad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-12: tshangs dbyangs stobs ni chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-13: tshangs shes rgyal ba sngon 'dren pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-14: 'byung po'i tshogs ni gang su dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-15: 'dir lhags gyur pa kun nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-16: rkang med dang ni rkang mangs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-17: rkang gnyis dang ni rkang bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-18: mdor na sems can kun gyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-19: bde 'byung sngags ni bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-21: sems can gang dag 'dir lhags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-23: mdor na bdag gis rab bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-25: aa pra ti ha ti sh'a sa n'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-27: aom ga ga ne ga ga na ganydze a'a na ya sarba la hu la hu sa ma ya ma nu sma ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-29: m'a bi lam ba m'a bi lam ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-30: ya the bi stam me sam pa d'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167a-31: bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de skad gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167b-0: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bar der rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig rgya cher gsungs @167b pa na nam mkha' de thams cad chen po la 'os pa'i zas kyi sprin gyis yongs su khengs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167b-1: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu zas kyi sprin gyis khyab par snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167b-2: sems can gyi bsam pa ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167b-3: ji ltar 'dod pa'i zas de dag la char bzhin du bab par gyur to; ;ji ltar 'dod pa'i zas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167b-4: bza' ba'i bya ba ni bkres pa'i sdug bsngal zhi ba'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167b-5: skom pa rnams kyis btung bar bya ba ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun yid la 'dod pa bzhin du der bab par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167b-6: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi skad cig de nyid la bkres pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167b-7: skom pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167b-8: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang ngo mtshar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167b-9: rab tu dga' ba thob par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:167b-10: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas su rnam par bzhugs so; ;bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa ngas kyang de'i tshe de ltar bshad cing rjes su yi rang bar byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-0: sngags kyi rgyal po'i mchog 'di la sems can thams cad kyi don du ba kres pa @168a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-2: skom pa sel ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-3: sngags thams cad zlos pa dag la yang khyad par du sel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-4: dang po re zhig zlos pas sngags 'di bsgrub par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-5: gal te bsod snyoms la 'gro bar spro bar med na ri'i rtse mo la 'dzegs te 'bum phrag bdun bzla bar bya zhing zas dkar gsum mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-6: 'o ma'i zas bza' zhing ri'i rtse mo de nyid du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi ras ris bar ma gong ma bzhin bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-7: mchod pa chen po byas nas shin tu rgya che ba'i gtor ma phul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'di nyid kyis gsungs pa'i sngags kyis seng ldeng gi yam shing gi me rab tu spar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-9: shing au dum b'a ra'i yam shing la mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-10: sbrang rtsis btags pa'i shing rlon mtho gang tsam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-11: bil ba'i 'bras bu'i yam shing stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-12: de nas nam phyed kyi dus mtshams su sprin nag po chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-13: rlung gi dkyil 'khor byung na 'jigs par mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-14: langs te gzhan du 'gro bar mi bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-15: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi yi ge brgyad kyi snying pos bdag nyid bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-17: grogs bsrung ba yang byas na; snga ma lta bu'i sprin nag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-18: rlung nag po de yang mi snang bar gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168a-19: bud med yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-0: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis phyogs thams cad @168b snang bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-1: sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dug nas smra ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-4: khyod ni grub pa yin no zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-5: de nas sgrub pa pos sna ma'i me tog gis bsres pa'i dri zhim po'i chus mchod yon sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-6: de nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-7: gang de'i nyin mo nas bdag nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-8: grogs po nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-9: yang ci 'dod pa'i grogs po dag la ci 'dod pa'i kha zas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-10: ji ltar 'dod pa'i yo byad rnams yang dag par ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-11: de nas sgrub pa pos ras ris la gshegs su gsol ba'i mchod yon dbul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-12: lan gsum bskor ba byas nas ras ris blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-14: byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-15: sngar bstan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs ji lta bu'i gnas dgon pa chen po 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-17: mi med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-18: der lo ma'i spyil po byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-20: grogs po gnyi gar bcas te rab tu gnas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-22: gnas de la nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i las byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-23: de nas sgrub pa pos snga ma bzhin du ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas ras ris bar ma snga ma bzhin du bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-24: seng ldeng gi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:168b-25: dus gsum du me tog padma dkar po zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169a-0: mar gyis btags pa stong rtsa brgyad nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar @169a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169a-2: de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus su sbyin sreg gi mthar 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169a-3: 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169a-11: longs spyod chen po nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169a-12: rgyal po dga' ba nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169a-13: 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang lhan cig rjes su spyod par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169a-15: gang 'dod pa de thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169a-16: gang don du gnyer ba de yang rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169a-17: grub pa'i rdzas thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169a-18: sems can chen po rnams kyang 'gugs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169a-20: ji lta ji ltar brjod pa de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169a-21: sngon gyi las kyi nyes pa yang yang dag par spyod par byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169a-23: las kyi thabs par ma sgrub pa yang yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169a-24: dang po re zhig de ltar khyad par du gyur pa'i gnas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169a-27: chu gling gi ngogs su snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169b-0: ras ris nub cu bstan te bzhag la bdag kyang shar du mngon du phyogs par @169b byas nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169b-1: snga ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar byas nas dus gsum du yi ge drug pa bzlas par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169b-3: dong ka'i me tog la tsandan dkar po 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169b-4: gur gum gyis bsgos pas snga ma bzhin du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169b-5: de bzhin du me sbar nas sbyin sreg gi mjug tu ras ris rab tu 'gul ba na ni blon po nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169b-6: ras ris las 'od kyi snang ba byung na ni 'od las rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169b-7: ras ris 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun khyab na ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169b-8: ras ris las me stag byung na ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug brgya byin nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169b-9: ras ris las chos 'chad pa'i sgra byung na ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169b-10: ras ris kyi phyag gis mgo la phyug par mdzad na ni mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169b-11: sa bdun pa thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169b-12: stobs bcu la gnas pa mthar gyis thob pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169b-13: de nas sgrub pa po la bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis gsungs pa'i sngags bsgrubs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169b-15: skom pa rab tu bsal ba'i don rjes su thob pa de nyid kyi 'tshog chas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169b-16: sngags spyod pa'i don sgrub thabs kyi chos la yang dag par rjes su bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:169b-17: gzhan du ni 'di 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-1: gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su 'jug cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-3: nges par 'bad pa la ni rdzas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-5: yo byad kyi khyad par dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-6: nor bu rin po che sngar ji skad bshad pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-7: sngags rig sngags ni zlos pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-8: sems ni cho ga la mkhas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-9: sngags pa de tshe de yul du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-10: de tshe gtsang ba'i kha zas bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-11: zos nas yid ni dga' ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-12: rtag tu dbang po rgyas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-13: lhung bzed lhag ma blangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-14: chu bo gtsang ba dag tu 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-15: dben par yongs su bor nas ni; ;sdom can gyis sbyin dud 'gro la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-16: dud 'gro la ni byin nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-17: 'bad pas snod ni bkru bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-18: de nas 'bad pa byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-19: sa yi snod kyang bsreg par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-20: lhag ma lhung bzed bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-21: snum med zas ni med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-22: dri nyid yongs su spang bya zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-23: lhag ma lhung bzed thub pas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-24: gang du slong ba'i lhung bzed la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-25: der ni kha zas mi spyad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-26: shing thog dngos rnams thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-27: bca' ba rnams kyang der mi spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-28: padma'i lo mar bza' mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-29: autpa snod la bza' ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-30: me tog dri mchog la min te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-31: sngags pas de la bza' mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-32: gang yang lo ma ku mu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-33: pla psha au dum b'a ra las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-34: pa ta shing gi lo ma'ang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170a-35: tsher ma'i shing dang ri khrod byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-0: @170b aa mra'i lo ma dag la'ang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-1: de bzhin pa ta la las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-2: sa la shri sha'i lo ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-3: byang chub shing las yang dag byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-4: gang du bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-6: shing de 'bad pas spang bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-7: so shing du yang bca' mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-8: klu shing gi ni ge sar dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-9: lo ma dag kyang mi btung zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-10: gang du'ang nam yang bza' mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-11: mkhas pas de kun rnam par spongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-12: thub pa'i lo ma'i spyil po las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-13: rmongs pas nam yang 'god mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-14: sngags pa dam tshig nyams 'gyur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-15: lo ma de dag la mi bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-16: lo ma gzhan la bza' bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-17: sngags pas der ni bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-18: sa dang zangs mar bstan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-19: de bzhin dngul dang gser las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-20: shel dang rdo yi rang bzhin las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-21: rtag tu bza' ba blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-22: lo ma'i rgyab tu mi bza' ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-23: lag pa'i mthil du'ang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-24: stobs bcu ldan dang de yi sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-25: gang yang rang rgyal bse ru dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-26: nyan thos gang zag dag la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-27: phul ba'i lo ma gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-28: de dag zlos pas spang bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-29: rkang pas kyang ni mi 'gom mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-30: zas snod rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-31: de bzhin btung dang bza' ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-32: thams cad de ltar phul bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-33: sngags pas 'bad pas blang mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-34: rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchog rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:170b-35: de bzhin nyan thos gang zag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-1: mchog gsum la phul ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-2: zlos pas de dag rtag tu spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-3: cung zad tsam yang lus can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-4: sngags rnams de la mi 'grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-5: bkra shis thams cad 'dod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-6: legs pa bzang po smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-7: rgyas pa dang ni zhi ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-8: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-9: bshos ni za bar byed de la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-11: gtsang zhing shes rab tshul khrims ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-12: snying rjes snying rje'i las can dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-13: gtsang sgra'i spyod la dga' ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-14: sngags rnams kun tu 'grub par 'gyur; ;sems can gzhan la sbyin pa'i zas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-15: zlos pas de ni bza' mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-16: gzhan gyis rab tu ma bstabs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-17: zas gzhan bza' bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-18: cung zad tsam gyi kha zas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-19: rang la byin pa blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-20: sngags shes de ltar 'jug gang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-21: de las grub pa dpag na gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-22: zlos pa 'di yi cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-23: sdom can bza' ba blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-24: thub pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-25: sngags rnams ma lus bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-26: mdor na cho ga mthong bas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-27: bza' ba kun bya las rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-28: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-29: sngags kyis ma lus dbang du byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-30: de nas zlos pas nye reg byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-31: de tshe sngags ni bzlas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171a-32: sngags pas de tshe lan bdun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-0: lus @171b sbyangs phyir ni bzlas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-1: 'byung po'i tshogs dang lha rnams dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-2: de don rgya cher rab nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-3: lus kun nye reg byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-4: thub pa'i sngags 'di brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-6: aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-8: aom sarba kilbi sha n'a sha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-9: n'a sha ya n'a sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-11: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra h'um dza:sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-12: sngags 'dis bslangs pa'i zas ji ltar yongs su spyod pa'i kha zas la lan gsum sngags te yongs su spyad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-13: zos nas kyang snga ma bzhin du nye reg bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-14: spyi bo la sogs pa lus thams cad du nye reg byas nas de nas ngal gso bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-15: ngal sos nas yud tsam gyi phyed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-18: sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas; dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-19: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-20: 'phags pa zla ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-23: 'phags pa rma bya chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-24: 'phags pa rin po che tog gi gzungs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-25: 'di dag las gang yang rung ba bklag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-26: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zung tsam gyi tshad kyi dus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:171b-27: de nas yongs su grub pa ni ji ltar nus pa de bzhin du bklag par byas nas glegs bam brtul ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-2: dam pa'i chos la phyag byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-3: de nas khrus kyi don du chu'i ngogs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-4: mtsho chen por song ste 'jug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-5: phyin nas srog chags med pa'i sa blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-6: lan bdun bzlas te de chu la gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-9: aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-11: aom sarba dushta na stambha ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-12: na di ba r'a b'a ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-13: ku m'a ra kr'i da r'u pa ni ban dha ban dha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-14: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-15: 'dis bsrung ba byas nas phyogs rnams bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-20: rab tu ma rungs pa thams cad 'gugs par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-21: skud pa dkar po la lan bdun bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-22: rked pa'i phyogs su bcings na thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-23: bzlas pa'i dus thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-24: khrus kyi dus thams cad du yang bgegs ma rungs pa rnam par 'jig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-25: rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na des ni las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-26: gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-27: las thams cad la thams cad du byed par 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172a-28: de nas sgrub pa po sa sa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-0: lci ba'i phye ma la sogs pa blangs te ci bde bar khrus byas @172b te; srog chags med pa'i chus kyang bkrus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-1: las thams cad la yang srag chags med pa'i chus bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-4: gzhan yang dri zhim bo dang ldan pa'i yo byad kyi khyad par gyis byugs te de'i 'og tu khrus bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-5: chu'i nang du bshang gci yang dor bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-6: chu gtor zhing dor bar yang mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-7: chu la rtse bar yang mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-9: sems can thams cad la so sor brtag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-13: tshor bas mngon par gnod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-14: sdug bsngal thob pa bzhin du 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-15: 'ong ba'i sbyor bas sdug bsngal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-16: de bzhin du sems can sgrub pa dang bral ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-17: sngags rig pas 'di lta bur 'jig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-19: rnam par 'jig pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshogs kyis nye bar khyab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-20: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho brgal dka' ba la gnas pa'i bdag nyid du mthong zhing gnas med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-23: shin tu dman pa'i yid can du bdag nyid brtags la sgom pa pos mi gang tsam gyi chu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-24: lte ba tsam gyi chu la gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-25: chu de nyid kyi dbus su sems rtse gcig tu nye bar gnas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:172b-26: dang po re zhig padma chen po'i rtse lag la me tog padma chen po dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-1: chen po'i 'dab mas nye bar mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-3: sdong bu rin po che bee d'urya'i rang bzhin las byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-4: padma'i ge sar rin po che mrgad las grub pa 'dab ma stong shel las byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-5: shin tu rnam par kha phye ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-6: de'i rjes su skyes pa'i shel dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-7: padma r'a ga'i me tog gis mdzes par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-8: de'i steng du seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa rin po che du mas nye bar mjes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-9: ras bcos bu zung gis rab tu bkab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-10: de'i steng du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsgom par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-12: gser gyi mdog ltar snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-13: kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-15: 'od 'dom gang gi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-16: sku'i tshad chen po nam mkha' la thug pa dang 'dra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-17: skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-18: g-yas su yang 'phags pa 'jam dpal rgyan thams cad kyis nye bar mjes par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-21: bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i zur na gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-22: sku'i kha dog dmar skya 'am; gur gum bdar ba lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173a-23: g-yon du'ang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kha dog ston ka'i zla rgyu 'dra ba rnga yab thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173b-0: de bzhin du byang chub sems @173b dpa' brgyad la 'phags pa byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173b-4: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173b-6: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173b-8: byang chub sems dpa' bcu po de dag gi g-yas logs su rang sangs rgyas brgyad bsgom par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173b-17: de nyid du nyan thos chen po brgyad gnas pa la; 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173b-18: 'phags pa mood gal gyi bu chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173b-21: bha ra dva dza bsod snyoms len dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173b-26: nyan thos chen po de dag dang nye bar dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173b-27: rang sangs rgyas dang nye ba na rang sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173b-28: byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi gnas su yang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:173b-29: de bzhin du nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan pa bsgom par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174a-0: bdag kyang lte ba tsam gyi chu la @174a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174a-2: mi'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa la me tog man d'a ra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174a-3: man d'a ra ba chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174a-9: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs la tshad chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174a-10: tshan chen por gyur pa'i ri rab tsam gyi me tog gi snyim pas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174a-12: rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174a-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174a-18: mar me rab tu mang po bya ba khri phrag brgya stong yid du 'ong bas yang dag par mchod par byed la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174a-22: bshos la sogs pa bsnyen bkur thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174a-23: yo byad rnams nye bar dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174a-24: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i mdzod spu nas kyang 'od zer byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174a-26: phyogs thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par sgom mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174a-27: zlos pa po bsam gtan la zhugs ma thag tu tshangs pa'i bsod nams dang mnyam pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174a-28: nges par byang chub la yang gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174a-29: de la sogs pa'i bsam gtan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-0: 'jig rten gang zag @174b mchog gis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-1: 'byung po kun la legs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-2: sngags pa rnams la phan pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-3: bsam gtan de tshe dang po'i gtsos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-4: sngags pa rnams la phan don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-5: gsungs pa sems can rnams la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-6: de nas thub mchog bdun pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-7: dkyil 'khor rnam pa de nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-8: gang yin dang po thub pas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-9: gnyis pa yi ni dkyil 'khor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-10: gsum par yang ni de las gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-11: dang po mchog gi grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-12: gnyis pa de bzhin de las gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-13: tha ma grub pa phra mo zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-14: thub pa mchog gis nges par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-15: mchog dang bar dang tha ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-16: de bzhin ras ris bar ma bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-17: mdor na rnam gsum sgom pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-18: sdig pa'i rnyog pa ma lus 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-19: mkhas pas sgom pa'i rnam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-20: de las gzhan du mi bsten te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-22: bsam gtan de la rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-23: ci 'dod cho ga bstan nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-24: zlos pas bsam gtan byas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-25: sngags kyi lha ni gshegs gsol te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-26: mchod yon gsol nas ci bde bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-27: chu bzhi de las byung nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-28: ci bde bar na 'gro bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-29: gnas kyang sngar ni bstan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-30: cho ga legs dben mthong ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-31: sngags pas sngags ni de tshe bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-32: ji bzhin las ni sngar bstan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-33: rang gi lha ni spyan drangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:174b-34: der ni sngags kyis gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-0: de nas rang nyid bsrung bya @175a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-2: de bzhin grogs po dag kyang bsrung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-3: dge ba'i las kyi de nyid shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-4: cho ga'i las la dga' zhing 'dog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-5: bstod pa'i rnam pa mang pos mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-6: gang zag mchog la bstod nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-7: rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-8: nyan thos rang rgyal bse ru dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-10: 'jig rten gsum la rjes gzung mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-11: sngags zlos pas ni gnas de nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-12: de nas kyang ni langs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-13: gnas ni thag ring song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-14: phyi rol rlung ni rnam spangs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-15: snabs dang mchil ma rnam par dor; ;bshang dang gci ba'ang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-16: nyin par byang du kha bltas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-17: mtshan mo lhor ni blta bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-18: der ni don rnams mi bsam ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-19: sngags zlos nam yang bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-20: der ni sngags kyang mi bzla zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-21: las bcas rigs kyang bshad ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-22: rab sngags 'gros dang mtshan sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-23: de tshe sa la 'dug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-24: gtsang phyir gos mtha' chur gzhug bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-25: chu gtsang gis ni nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-26: 'bad pas rkang gnyis bkru bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-27: sa ni khyor ba bdun blangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-28: lan bdun sa de nyid kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-29: bshang ba la ni sum cus bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-30: mchil ma dor dang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-31: snabs dor ba la re re'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-32: de nas nye reg bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-33: sgra med de bzhin song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175a-34: lam la sogs pa spangs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-0: de nas gzhan yang ci @175b 'dod par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-1: lho phyogs mtha' ni phyi rol tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-2: g-yangs zhing dang tshva sgo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-3: de bzhin bye mas khyab pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-4: chu bo spangs shing ngogs kyang spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-5: mi gtsang ba yang spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-6: rab tu bkab dang dben yid ches //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-7: bas mtha' skye bo rnam spangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-8: sngags pas de 'dra'i sa dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-9: mi gtsang ba ni dor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-10: sngags zlos dus ni shes pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-11: ji ltar 'dod pa'i shugs dag min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-12: de nas gtsang mtha'i phyogs song nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-13: bshang gci'i bya ba byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-14: de nas gnas su ci bder gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-15: gsal ba'am dben ba'am g-yogs pa 'am; ;skye bo med pa'i sa phyogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-16: mi smra lus reg spangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-17: rtag tu bshang gci bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-18: bshang dang gci ba med byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-19: sdom can gtsang sbra rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-21: srog chags rnam par spangs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-22: sa gsum yongs su blangs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-23: gcig gis bshang ba'i phyogs su bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-24: sa yi cha gnyis dag gis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-25: lag pa gnyis ni bkru bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-26: sngags pas sa dag rtag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-27: sngar bstan pa dag blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-28: 'bad pas rkang g-yon bkru bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-29: de nas g-yas pa bkru bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-30: phan tshun nyid du bshibs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-31: zlos pas rkang pa bkru bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-32: sngags zlos pas ni gtsang sbra dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-33: sngar ni rgya chen bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-34: dri nga med pa'i gtsang sbra yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:175b-35: thub pas sngar ni bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-0: @176a *// sngags zlos pa yi gtsang sbra ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-1: 'dir ni mdor bsdus bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-2: dri ma bral ba'i gtsang sbra yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-3: gtsang sbra nyid ni rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-4: rgyud rnams kun la snang ba zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-5: thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-6: de nas 'dod pas nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-7: sdom can gyis grub las kyang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-8: sngar bstan pa yi cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-9: yid ni nang gi dag pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-10: rgyud rnams kun la bsngags pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-11: gtsang sbra lnga yi cho ga gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-12: lus kyi dag dang ngag dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-13: yid kyi dag pa yin par bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-14: bzhi ba bden pa'i dag pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-15: chu yi dag pa lnga par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-16: bden pa'i chos can khro ba thul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-17: de nyid shes shing bstan bcos mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-18: phra ba'i de nyid don la mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-19: sngags shes las la grags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-20: phyi dang nang la mkhas pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-21: de la dngos grub rnyed mi dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-22: bden pa'i chos ni rnam spangs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-23: rdzun gyi tshig ni smra mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-24: de nyid thams cad rnam spangs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-25: ma rungs rab tu ma rungs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-26: rnam par sdang dang 'khrug bcas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-27: rtsub dang gnad rnams smra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-28: bden ba'i chos ni rnam nyams pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-29: sems can gzhan la gnod byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-30: phra ma nyon mongs can sems dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-31: chos kun rnam par spangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-32: rtag tu 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-33: khrims 'chal chos min spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176a-34: zlos pa'i sngags pas rtag tu spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-0: @176b grong gi chos dang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-1: khro ba log par 'byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-3: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-4: blo ldan rnams kyis yongs su smad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-5: rtag tu rang rgyal bse ru dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-6: nyan thos kyis kyang rtag tu smad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-7: brdzun pa de bzhin 'jig rten na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-8: sa steng grub pa 'dod rnams la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-9: brdzun pa nye bar smra ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-10: shin tu mi bzad dmyal bar 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-11: de bzhin dud 'gro yi dvags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-13: rdzun ni nye bar smra ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-14: der ni rtag tu gnas pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-15: blo ngan mi bzad ltung ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-16: thig nag rab tu tsha ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-17: yang sos ral gri'i lo ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-18: de bzhin shal ma li nags su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-19: rdzun smra ba yi gang zag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-20: bskal pa mang por der gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-21: log par smra bar gyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-22: rmongs pas log par brjod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-23: 'byung po rnams las slu byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-24: de la sngags grub ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-25: des na rmongs pa'i las de yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-26: sngags ni grub par ma mthong nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-27: 'di skad du ni tshig smra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-28: sngags la grub pa med do zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-29: de skad kyi ni tshig smra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-30: gang gis sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-31: sa steng 'dir ni spangs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-32: bskal ba bye ba mang por yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-33: de la grub pa ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-34: des na mi bzad dmyal bar 'tshed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-35: mnar med 'jigs pa chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-36: yang sos dang ni thig nag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-37: rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:176b-38: dam pa'i chos la brnyas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-2: gang yang dmyal ba mi bzad par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-3: byis pa'i skye bo 'tshed byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-4: dam pa'i chos la brnyas byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-5: zhe sdang mun pas bsgribs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-6: mi shes byis pa'i ngo bo'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-7: rmongs pa log pa'i nga rgyal gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-8: rig pa'i rgyal po brnyas byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-9: mi bzad dmyal bar 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-10: de bas sdig pa mi bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-11: log bar smra ba'ang smad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-12: dam pa'i chos kyang mi brnyas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-13: lta ba log pa'ang smad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-14: de bas rtag tu dad gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-15: sngags kyi cho ga rtag tu bsten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-16: chos shes bden par smra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-17: sems can rnams la phan par dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-18: sngags dang sngags shes bsten gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-19: nges par de la grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-20: mchog dang bar ma tha ma las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-21: rnam pa sna tshogs las byed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-22: las ni bya bas byed pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-23: bya ba mi byed rtag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-24: bya ba las ni ldan pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-25: rtag tu de las grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-26: bya phyir las rnams thams cad phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-27: las phyir rtag tu bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-28: bya ba'i don du bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-29: bya ba las la sbyar ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-30: don bcas nyid kyi bya ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-31: bya ba nyid kyis rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-32: bya ba las dang 'bras bu nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177a-33: bya ba las 'bras rtag tu bya; ;'bras med pa las 'bras 'byung zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-0: yang dag @177b ldan pas sngags grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-1: yang dag ldan pas sngags grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-2: ldan pas rnam par bral ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-3: mi ldan ldan pa grub pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-4: bsgrub bya sgrub pa med pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-5: de la grub pa mi 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-6: grub pa'i rdzas ni thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-7: grub pa'i rgyu dang 'gal ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-8: sngags pa ma grub sgrub byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-9: sngags ni sgrub par byed pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-10: byed pa rab 'dod las yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-12: las min las ni thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-13: las kyi rgyur ni mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-14: sngags dang rgyud kyi don ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-15: 'bras bcas las ni brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-16: brtsam pa'i las ni brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-17: las med nyid la brtsam mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-18: ma brtsams bya ba'i sngags rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-20: sems can kun la thugs brtse bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-21: thub pa mchog gis sngon gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-22: sngags ni rgyu yi sgo dag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-23: rgyal ba'i sras la dam tshig bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-24: sgrub pa sngags ni kun shes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-25: sngags kyi rgyal po mchog 'di ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-26: sngags kyi tshul du bstan pa yin; ;yang dag rdzogs lam rgyud yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-27: gang du rigs pa rtags yod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-29: dus ni ring po mi thogs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-30: mkhas pa'i grub pa thob pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-31: 'byung po rnams la zhi don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-32: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab tu bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:177b-33: lam yang sngags kyi tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-0: @178a *// de bzhin rtag tu byang chub lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-1: las don thams cad rdzogs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-2: de yi mthar thug dpung gnyen ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-3: dang po'i gnas ni sangs rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-4: de bzhin 'bad med grub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-6: sna tshogs las dang las shes yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-7: sngags bzlas dag ni byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-8: tshul khrims bsam gtan rnam thar rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-9: mdor bsdus 'di yis thob pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-10: don kun sgrub byed grub pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-11: rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-12: nor rnams rgyas par thob 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-13: dam pa'i 'gro bar gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-14: de bzhin rtag tu gnod sbyin spyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-15: lha mi'i rgyal srid byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-16: mi lha lha min 'jig rten gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-17: de bzhin bdag po thob gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-18: bdag po ma lus de dag gi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-19: sngags pas thams cad thob pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-21: gtsang sbra'i spyod dang ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-22: tshul khrims bsam gtan rtag tu dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-23: rgyud rnams kun las gsungs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-24: sngags pas rtag tu bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-26: las rnams sna tshogs bya ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-27: de bzhin mchog dang bar ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-28: tha ma nyid kyang bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-29: tha mas longs spyod 'phel ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-30: 'bring gis gong ma'i lus thob cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178a-31: mchog gis rab tu 'gro ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178b-0: zlos pas @178b rtag tu thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178b-1: sngags pas zlos mthar ngal bso zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178b-2: ji srid dus su bsdad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178b-3: zlos pas dus la bab pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178b-4: der ni bsgrub par bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178b-5: de lta mod kyi de la sngags pas las rnams sgrub pa na der rtag tu bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178b-6: skyes bu rnams kyi sdig pa zad par byed cing las rnam pa sna tshogs skye ba rgyud pa dag tu gang du gang byas pa de dag la grub pa gnas par nam zhig 'gyur zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178b-7: skyes bus ji srid tshogs pa rnyed pa na sngags pa'i ngo bos sngags bzlas pa na sdig pa zad pa'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178b-8: las bsrabs pas sngags 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178b-13: bzlas pas sdig pa mtha' dag zad par byed cing lus can thams cad kyi skye ba brgyud pa dag tu gang byas pa'i sdig pa de dag thams cad 'jig par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags bzlas na lus rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yid dga' zhing yon tan thams cad kyis grags par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178b-15: gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyi rgyal po nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178b-16: rtag tu don thams cad thob pa dang ldan pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178b-18: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga rab 'byams las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:178b-19: sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las kyi gnas bzhi pa las bzlas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179a-3: las thams cad kyi cho ga sgrub pa'i le'u rab 'byams bcu gcig pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179a-6: khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags rjes su spyod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179a-7: sems can thams cad kyi don la rjes su brtson pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179a-8: sems can rnams gang zlos par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179a-9: gang gis zlos par byad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179a-10: de'i phreng ba'i cho ga de thams cad rgyud thams cad kyi spyi sngags thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179a-11: de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179a-12: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179a-16: bdag la thugs brtse ba'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179a-17: sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179a-18: dam tshig la zhugs pa rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi slad du de bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179a-19: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179a-22: rnam par dbye ba rgya cher bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-0: sngags thams cad kyi @179b spyod pa la mngon bar brtson pa na sems can thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-1: dang por re zhig sngags su 'gyur ba de gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-3: aa tsin tyad bhu ta r'u p'i n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-6: sarb'a rnr'a na s'a dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-7: sarba dushta'm bi mo ha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-8: ga ga n'a bi lambe bi sho dha ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-9: sngags 'dis phreng ba thams cad la las bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-13: rgyu ba la sogs pa'i las bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-14: dang po phreng ba'i shing la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-15: sngags kyis lan grangs nyi shu bdun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-16: mngon par sngags pa byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-17: sdom brtson rtag tu bsrung ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-18: mtshan gcig der ni nyal byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-19: rmi lam nang du des mthong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-20: mi ma yin gzugs grub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-21: mi sdug mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-22: sngags pa la ni des smras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-23: nor ni ci 'dod khyer cig ces //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-24: sgrub byed nang par langs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-25: shing de las ni 'gro bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-26: sngags pas shing de bor nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-27: gzhan dag tu ni 'gro byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-28: mi sdug gzugs ni 'jigs byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-29: rmi lam du yang mthong mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-30: dang po ru dr'a ksha yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-31: ain dr'aksha ni gnyis pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-32: tha ma bo de tse yin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-34: shing la legs par 'dzeg mkhas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-35: grogs dang lhan cig 'dzeg par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-36: grogs po med par gyur na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-37: rang nyid de la 'dzeg par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-38: steng gi yal ga'i 'bras gnas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:179b-39: sdoms brtson brtul bzhugs can 'dzegs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-0: rtag tu de la bag yod @180a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-1: pas; ;steng gi yal ga la byung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-2: yal ga'i steng gi 'bras blangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-3: steng gi las la sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-4: steng gi grub pa mchog tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-5: gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-6: bar ma bar ma'i grub pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-7: grub pa tha ma'ang tha ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-8: rtag tu srog chags ma zos pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-9: 'bras bu yang dag blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-10: nub kyi yal ga las thob pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-11: rdzas kyi rgyur ni grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-12: byang gi gnod sbyin la sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-13: lha rnams rtag tu 'gugs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-14: skad cig 'gugs par byed bsten pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-15: 'byung po thams cad zhi phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-16: lha dang lha min dri za dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-17: mi 'am ci dang srin po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-18: dbang du bya ba'i las byed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-19: 'byung po kun yang rgyas par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-20: don yod las ni byed pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-21: las rnams sna tshogs ma lus byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-22: shar phyogs yal ga la skyes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-24: de tshe 'bad de byas gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-25: tshe ni ring ba'i rgyu yang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-26: rtag tu sngags grub 'bras bu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-27: rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-28: gang zhig lhor ni 'gro ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-29: yal ga lo mar rab ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-30: sngags pas de ni 'bad de spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-31: sems can rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-32: lhor bstan pa yi yal ga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-33: 'bras bu gang dag skyes pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-34: blangs na gdung byed dgra rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-35: srog ni 'jig par byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180a-36: zlos pas 'bad de spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-0: @180b bsod nams ma yin mang po'i rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-2: 'bras bu gang zhig rab bsgrags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-3: lha min bu mo gnas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-5: de yi 'bras bu'i phreng ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-7: sa yi 'og tu gnas par ni //
