K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-8: des na de ni 'gro bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-9: der zhugs lha yi bde ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-10: zlos pas thob bar 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-11: lha min bu mo chags bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-12: bskal par de ni gnas par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-13: me tog phreng ba kun blangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-14: de nas zlos pa slar log bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-15: grogs dang lhan cig bsrung byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-16: de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-17: gnas nas thag ring song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-18: de bzhin gtsang phyogs cho ga bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-19: de nas sngags pas rtag tu 'dug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-20: phreng ba yongs su sbyang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-21: brtson pas phreng ba'i 'bras blangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-22: kun nas yongs su dag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-23: sngags pa bzang pos phreng ba dbug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-24: gsum bdun brgyad dang gcig gam ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-25: nyi shu dang ni rtsa gcig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-26: sngags kyi de nyid shes pas bkru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-27: snga ma'i sngags kyis rtag tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-28: bdun nam brgyad du bzlas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-29: de nas dag par yang dag 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-30: padma'i rtsa lag dag las ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-31: bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-32: gsum dang lnga lnga ba byas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-33: sdom can gyis ni phreng skud bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-34: sngags kyi de nyid shes pas brgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:180b-35: 'bru ni phra zhing shin tu zlum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-2: legs 'jam smad ba'ang med pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-3: mdzes dang kha dog mdzes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-4: de bzhin gas med bu ga med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-5: ru dr'a ksha dang bo de ce //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-6: ain dr'a ksha yi 'bras bu nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-7: rtag tu lung tang mdzes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-9: 'bad pa yis ni phreng ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-10: sngags pas brtson byas de tshe brgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-11: gser ram yang na dngul dag gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-12: nor bu shel las byas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-13: dung dang mu sar dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-14: mu tig las kyang bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-15: byu ru rnam pa sna tshogs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-16: phreng ba dag kyang bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-17: gzhan yang rin chen bzang po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-18: phreng ba legs par rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-19: sa ni rab bzlums ril bu dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-20: mnyam par gzhag nas skud pas brgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-21: gzhan yang ril bu cung zad gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-23: ku sha'i rtse mo'i mdud pas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-24: sngags pas 'bad de bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-25: brgya rtse brgyad dam nyi shu 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-26: lnga bcu nyid ni bar ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-27: sngags pa mnyam par bzhag nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-28: tshad 'dis phreng ba brgyu ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-29: rtsa brgyad stong du bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-30: phreng ba'i mchog tu bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-31: phreng ba'i rnam pa 'di bzhi yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-32: sngags pas rtag tu brgyu ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-33: de ltar brgyu ba byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-34: rim pa gsum mam gnyis su bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-35: lcags bzang rang bzhin gdu bur bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181a-36: de bzhin gser dngul dag dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-0: de bzhin @181b zangs ma'i gdu bu yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-1: phreng ba kun yang bcing bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-2: de nas yang mig kun mthar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-3: kun la'ang de bzhin gdags par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-4: 'bad pas dam du bcing bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-5: ji ltar dam por 'gyur bar ro; ;yongs su gsal bar byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-6: dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-7: de ltar sbrul gyi gdengs ka ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-8: yongs su 'khor bas brgyan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-9: mu tig phreng ba 'dra ba yis; ;mgul pa brgyan pa lta bur bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-10: chu bo dag ni dri med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-11: chu gtsang dag gis khrus bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-12: ji ltar go rims khrus byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-13: chu bzhi las ni ldang nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-14: 'bad pas de bzhin nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-15: phreng ba rje su blangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-16: ba yi rnam lngas rab tu bkru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-17: de bzhin sa yi phye ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-18: chu gtsang dag gis rab bkrus te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-19: dri zhim dag gis rjes byugs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-20: rab tu sngags pa'i kha dog kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-21: tsandan dkar dang gur gum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-22: de nas de bzhin gnyi ga 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-23: 'bad pa yis ni rab tu bkru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-24: de bzhin khrus byas song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-25: gang na ras ris bar ma de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-26: rgyal ba gtso bo thub mchog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-27: sh'akya seng ge mi yi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-28: de bzhin rtag tu ston pa'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-29: sa steng rgyal ba'i ring bsrel can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-30: de yi mdun du phreng ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-31: de dang nye bar gzhag par bya; ;de dang nye bar bzhag nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-32: de yi mdun du nyer gnas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-33: stong phrag gcig dang brgyad dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-34: brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:181b-35: nyin zhag gcig ni smyung byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-2: lnga pa de bzhin blas byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-3: tshad kyang de dang mnyam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-4: de nas phreng ba la bzlas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-5: de yi mtshan mo nyal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-6: ku sha bting ba'i sa la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-7: sngags shes der ni nyal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-8: gal te des ni rmi lam na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-9: dge ba'i rmi lam mthong na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-10: 'bras bcas rmi lam ston pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-11: de la grub par bstan pa yin; ;sangs rgyas nyan thos bse ru ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-12: gal te 'di yis rmi lam mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-13: sngags pa de yi bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-15: gzhon nu'i gzugs can byis pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-16: rnam pa sna tshogs mdzes mthong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-17: gal te rmi lam des mthong dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-18: phreng ba stsol ba'ang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-20: sngags kyi don rnams sgrub byed pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-21: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-22: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-23: ras ris bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byams las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-24: phreng ba'i cho ga rab 'byams bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182a-27: thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-1: khyod kyi sngags mtha' dag rnam par dgod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-2: sbyin sreg gi las la rab tu sbyor ba'i rig pa sgrub pa yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-3: me la nye bar spyod pa'i khyod par gyi cho ga'i phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-4: gang gis rig pa thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can rab tu 'jug cing gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-6: gsang ba'i rig sngags kyi gzhi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-8: aom auttishtha ha ri ping+ga la lo hi t'aksha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-9: de hi da d'a pa ya h'um sphat sphat sarba bi ghnam bi n'a sha ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-13: 'dod pa thams cad ster bar byed pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-14: dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos me'i snying po 'di la lan gcig bzlas pas sreg blugs gsum gyis me la sbyin sreg byas na me spyan drang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-15: de ltar rab tu sbyar na zhi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-17: drag po'i las dag la yam shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-18: mya ngan med shing zhi don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-19: rlon pa nyid ni rab tu bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-20: mtho gang ngam ni khru gang tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-21: sor gsum srid du bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-22: snum pa'i rnam pa rab tu bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-23: cho ga 'di ni bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-24: bu ga med cing nang stong min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-25: de bzhin ne tso'i 'dab ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-26: ljang dang dkar ba'i kha dog gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-27: kha dog nag po spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-28: srin bu rnams kyis zos pa'ang spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:182b-29: bu ga yod pa'ang rnam par bzlog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-0: @183a *// gzhan yang kha dog rab bsngags min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-1: tha ma nyid kyang rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-2: ha cang skam min rlon pa'ang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-3: tshig min las ni brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-4: rul pa dang ni yo ba'ang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-5: shin tu ring ba'ang spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-6: de nas me thab bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-7: kun nas gru bzhir bya ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-8: 'og nyid du yang brko ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-9: 'bad pas khru ni bzhi yi tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-10: bru gsum dang ni khru gnyis dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-11: de bzhin khru gcig tshad du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-12: rtag tu srog chags spangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-13: bye mas legs par spyar ba gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-14: de nas pad 'dra'i lan kan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-16: yang na 'bad pas zur bzhi yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-17: de bzhin lan kan dbyibs su bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-18: rdo rje'i rnam pa 'dra ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-19: rtse mo gnyis su'ang rtse gsum bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-20: me thab kyi ni thad ka la; ;khru gnyis thad kar bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-21: gtsang dang de bzhin gsal ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-22: chu klung de bzhin chu dbus dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-23: shing gcig gi ni phyogs dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-24: dur khrod dang ni kha stong du; ;sbyin sreg legs par yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-25: de bzhin ri bo'i rtse dag tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-26: rtag tu lha khang stong pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-27: dgon pa chen po'ang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-28: gang yang sgrub pa'i phyogs dag tu; ;gang zag mchog gis rab gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-29: sbyin sreg gnas ni thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-30: gnas de dag ni thams cad gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183a-31: ku sha'i khres ni khru gang tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-0: de la 'dug par @183b byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-1: sngags shes der ni sbyin sreg las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-2: khyad par du yang bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-3: gnas de dag la 'dug na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-4: myur du 'grub par the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-5: shar dang byang du bltas pas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-6: zhi ba dang ni rgyas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-7: lhor bltas nas ni drag po'i las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-8: sngags pas de ni spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-9: shar du bltas pas zhi ba 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-10: byang du bltas pas rgyas pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-11: 'di yis sngags pa dus rtag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-12: sngags kyi ngo bo yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-13: bil ba blag sha n+ya gro dhas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-14: rgyas pa'i las ni yongs su bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-15: mngon spyod shing las bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-16: dkar dang tshva dang skyur dang rno //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-17: de dag thams cad spang bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-18: thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu bkag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-19: zhi dang rgyas pa'i las la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-20: shing rlon dag ni rab tu bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-21: drag po'i las la shing skam ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-22: thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-23: yam shing de dag med na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-24: tha mal shing dag kun tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-25: gnyi ga'i rtse mor bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-26: ku shas kun tu yang dag dkri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-27: sngo dang snum pa 'dra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-28: rma bya'i mgrin pa 'dra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-29: de 'dra'i ku shas rtag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-30: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-31: ma rgad rnam pa 'dra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-32: rtsa skam gyis ni rtag tu yan /g /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-33: sdig pa'i las rnams bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-34: 'dir ba'i thub pa mchog gis bkag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-35: dri med chu ni yongs dag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-36: srog chags dag gis rtag spangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-37: des ni kun nas gtor byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:183b-38: g-yas phyogs su ni bskor byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-2: cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-3: gtsang ba'i rtsva yi rtsa bas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-4: me sgron tshad dang ldan byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-5: de nas chad par bcangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-6: 'bad pas me ni spar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-7: kha yi rlung gis mi bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-8: rtag tu gos kyi mthas kyang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-9: sham thabs bla gos rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-10: gos gzhan dag ni bkag ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-11: shin tu drag pas de mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-12: gnod par dga' bas ma yin na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-13: rlung yab gtsang dang de bzhin gos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-14: lo mas kyang ni rlung yab bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-15: rlung gis khyad du mi gsod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-16: me ni rab tu sad byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-17: sngags shes pas ni me spar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-18: sbyin sreg don du legs mnyam gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-19: lag pa de ni g-yon pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-20: lan gsum bar du chus gtor nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-21: der ni ba yi mar gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-22: sreg blugs gsum ni des sbyin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-23: de nas kyang ni phyag bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-24: sangs rgyas kun dang skyob pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-25: rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-27: de tshe me yi snying po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-28: sngags kyis lan bdun rtag bzlas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-29: dri zhim me tog dag gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-30: sdom brtson me ni spyan drang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-31: sngags shes rtag tu spyan drangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-32: mkhas pas gnas ni sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-33: gdan dang gnas ni sbyin byed na'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-34: de nyid sngags yin gzhan pas min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-35: zho dang mar gyis spags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184a-36: sbrang rtsis spags pa'i yam shing gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-0: rgyas pa'i @184b las ni bya ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-1: sngags kyis kun tu sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-2: mar dang sbrang rtsir ldan pa 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-3: yang na zho dang ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-4: yam shing rdzas dang ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-5: gnyi ga la gnas de tshe bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-6: stong ngam yang na 'bum mam ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-7: yang na brgya rtsa brgyad du brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-8: de tshe sngags pas sngags bzung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-9: lan re bzlas shing me la dor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-11: de bzhin me lce gcig gyur la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-12: zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-13: dud pa med la rgyas pa'ang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-14: dud bcas drag po'i las la bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-15: de ni rgyal bas smad cing spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-16: gal te me ni mdog ldan na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-17: sbyin sreg las ni rab tu sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-18: zhi la kha dog dkar po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-19: rgyal ba mchog gis rtag tu bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-20: gal te me dkar sbyin sreg byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-22: de bzhin rtag tu mdog dmar la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-24: gnag dang du ba'i kha dog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-25: ser skya la ni sdig ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-26: kha dog rnam gsum bstan pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-27: rnam gsum grub pa 'di dag yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-28: mdog gzhan sprin gyi kha dog gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-29: rnam pa sna tshogs mdog ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-30: sa steng 'di la sngags rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-31: grub pa yod pa ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-32: de 'dra'i kha dog 'dra ba 'am; [?] ;rnam pa sna tshogs mdog ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-33: me ni 'bar ba de mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-34: las kyi sbyor ba'ang brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-35: gal te sngags ni grub 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:184b-36: phyi rol me ni spar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-2: phyir yang sbyin sreg rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-3: me yi sngags ni zlos pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-4: gshegs gsol spyan drang nyid kyang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-6: sngar ni rab tu brtags pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-7: de nyid kyis ni sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-8: gshegs gsol spyan drang la sogs pa'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-9: de nyid kyi ni las dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-10: las rnams thams cad nyid kyang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-11: me yi las dang de bzhin gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-12: ras ris mdun du brtsam byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-14: sngon gyi bde gshegs rnams kyis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-15: rgyal bas bsngags pa'i las rnams dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-16: der ni rnam pa kun tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-17: sdig pa dag ni khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-18: gang yang rgyal bas smad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-20: gzhan gyis smad pa'ang bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-21: 'khor los bsgyur bzang nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-22: byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'thob dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-23: de bzhin mngon shes lnga 'thob dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-24: de nas lha nyid thob pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-25: ras ris la rtag brtson zhing shes; ;spyin sreg las la 'jigs med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-27: yang na bar snang spyod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-28: sa bdag lha dang gnod spyin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-29: rtag tu gnod sbyin mo 'gugs byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-30: rgyal srid bdag po nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-31: yul nyid dang ni grong dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-32: rig pa 'dzin dang lha min nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-33: sems can thams cad dbang du byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185a-34: bdag nyid che dang sems can che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-2: sa bcu la ni yang dag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-3: sbyin sreg las kyis 'gugs byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-4: sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-5: sde dpon bdag dang de bzhin du; ;khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-7: de bzhin mi yi dbang po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-8: sems can kun la dbang don dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-9: yang na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-10: de bzhin rtag tu las kun la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-11: sbyin sreg gis ni kun tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-12: thams cad kun la brtson bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-13: las kun las ni bsten byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-15: las dge'i don ni dam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-17: tha ma'i las kyang de bzhin po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-18: rdzas rnams dag ni de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-19: grub dang ldan pa'ang rnam pa gsum /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-20: 'bras dang bcas par grub snang ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-21: sbyin sreg las la rab tu bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-22: phyag rgya gtsug phud lnga bcings nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-23: sngags kyang skra can mas byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-24: las rnams kun ni bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-25: sngags pas bdag nyid bsrung ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-26: sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-27: de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-28: bdun nam brgyad du bzlas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-29: las 'di la ni rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-30: na ma: sarba bud dha bo dhi sa tv'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-31: aa pra ti ha ta ga tim ga t'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-33: aom dzv'a la ti shtha h'um ru ru bi shva sam bha ba sam bha be sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-34: spags kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:185b-35: yang dang yang du shing la bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-1: sam bdun du bzlas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-2: sngags rig des ni sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-3: me tog bdug pa dri yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-4: ma lus thams cad dag dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-5: chu la sngags rnams bzlas pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-6: 'di nyid kyis ni sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-7: las rnams kun gyi rgyu yi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-8: de nas cho ga brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-9: las rnams dag ni thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-10: snga ma'i sbyor ba nyid kyis bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-11: snga ma'i gtsug phud lnga bcings te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-12: phyag rgya chen po grags ldan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-13: snga ma'i gtsug phud lnga bcing bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-14: skra can ma nyid rab bzlas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-15: des na srung ba byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-16: grub pa'i rgyu la 'jigs med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-17: las rnams thams cad brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-18: gal te la nye bzang po 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-19: rtag tu dge ba'i sgra thos na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-20: de la sngags ni don yod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-22: dang po'i las la rab sbyor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-23: sngags kyi rgyu la rab 'jug na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-24: thams cad 'bras bu bcas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-25: de la grub bar brjod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-26: rgyal sgra rnga ni pa ta ha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-27: rnga bo che yi sgra dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-28: brtson byas grub pa ma lus 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-29: sbyin sreg las la yang dag bsten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-30: gzhan yang la nye bzang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-31: 'dab chags dge ba'i sgra dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-32: rnam pa sna tshogs nges pa'i sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-33: rgyal ba rnams kyis bsngags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-34: bkra shis bzang po rab bzangs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186a-35: rnam pa sna tshogs yid 'ong sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-0: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan @186b ba dan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-1: bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-2: de bzhin mchod yon bum pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-3: mthong na 'grub pa'i rgyu rnams yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-4: rnam pa du ma'i kha dog gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-5: 'jig rten gyis mchod rab bsngags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-6: de dag mthong na grub 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-7: sngags rnams du ma'i spyod yul yin ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-9: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bcu gsum pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-10: sbyin sreg gi cho ga rab 'byams rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-13: gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-14: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-16: khyod kyi gsang ba'i rig pa yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-17: sngags thams cad kyi sgrub pa po'i thabs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yang dag par rjes su gnang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-19: chos kyi mdzod las byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-20: chos kyi sprin gyi rjes su zhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-21: nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid 'jig rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-22: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad kyi mnga' bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-23: shin tu gtso bor gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-25: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-26: shin tu gtso bor gyur cing dam pa yin la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:186b-28: mi rnams kyis kyes bu khyu mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-0: de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po @187a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-1: 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bstan cing shin tu gtso bo yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa gang g'a'i glung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa dag gis sngon gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-4: kun nas bkra shis par 'dod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-5: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-7: sems can thams cad yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-8: sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-9: 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-10: re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de yang gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-11: bar 'dir bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas smin mtshams kyi mdzod spun sa sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-12: gang 'di phyogs bcu steng 'og thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bas khyab par mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-13: sems can thams cad kyi yid tshim par mdzad nas slar log ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-14: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya shub pa'i dbu'i gtsug tor du nub par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tror nas kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i lus can blta bar mi nus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-17: sems can thams cad kyis mi thub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187a-18: 'od chen pos yang dag par 'phags pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187b-0: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis @187b lus brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187b-1: rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187b-2: 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i gzugs can rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187b-3: byung nas nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad snang bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187b-4: rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187b-5: rig ba du ma bye ba khri phrag brgya stong 'byin par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187b-6: yi ge gcig pa'i sgra 'don cing 'od zer chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'byin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187b-7: steng gi phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la mngon du blta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187b-8: thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po yang snang bar byas nas bar snang la gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas yi ge gcig pa'i rig pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog gis yang dag par thob pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187b-13: s'a la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187b-16: spyan bzang dang tog bzang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:187b-20: gser thub la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188a-0: @188a *// 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba de yang gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog sngags thams cad kyi rig pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba dag byed chen po 'di yang dag par bsgrubs na sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188a-7: gang yang khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po'i mchog la sngags thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188a-8: mchog tu gsang ba'i mchog yang dag par rjes su gnang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188a-9: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par sbyong bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188a-10: dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos nges par 'bum phrag gsum bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188a-11: de nas las rnams sngags dang bcas pa 'dir gzhon nu khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po la 'jig rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188a-14: 'dis bsrung ba byas na 'byung po thams cad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188a-16: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bgegs thams cad kyis zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188b-0: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas de gsungs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa @188b drug tu g-yos par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang snang bas khyab cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188b-3: gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang du 'khod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188b-4: sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188b-5: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188b-7: rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188b-8: rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188b-9: rig pa'i rgyal po rnams 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul nas lhags par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188b-10: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na rnam par gnas pa'i sems can mang po dbang du gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188b-13: yi dvags kyi ngan 'gro la gnas pa rnams 'od zer chen po'i snang bas reg cing snang bar byas pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i rgyun la gnas pa yid shin tu bde bas tshim zhing skyo ba med par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188b-14: nges par theg pa gsum la gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas 'khor de la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:188b-17: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di rdzu 'phrul che ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189a-0: rig pa thams cad kyi rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur @189a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189a-1: ba; sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189a-2: cho ga zhi ba mo thams cad yongs su rgyas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189a-5: cho ga rab 'byams la yang dag par zhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189a-6: sngags thams cad sgrub par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189a-10: sems can sgrub pa po'i khyad par gyi thabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189a-12: byang chub kyi lam thams cad yongs su sbyong bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189a-13: mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'jug par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189a-14: bdud zil gyis gnon par byed pa; byang chub kyi snying po la gnas par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189a-15: dge ba'i tshogs yang dag par 'byung bar byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189a-17: cho ga zhib mo rgyas pa ras ris kyi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs sngon gyi sngags kyi spyad pa rjes su spyod pa gang la rab tu gnas na sems can gyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba chen po sgrub par 'gyur te; rmad du byung ba chen po sngags thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189a-18: 'od byed pa thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189a-20: 'gro ba thams cad la phan par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189a-21: sangs rgyas bzhin du mngon sum du nye bar bzhugs pa rang byung du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189a-24: tha ma'i las thams cad byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-0: shin tu bde ba @189b dam pa; shis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-2: sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-3: lha rnams kyi yang lha nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-4: thub ba rnams kyi thub ba mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-5: sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen gyur pa; ;dag pa 'jig rten rnam par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-6: chos kun rang gi ngo bo mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-7: yang dag mthar gyur rnyog pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-8: de yi cho ga mchog bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-9: 'byor pa 'dod pas mnyan par gyis; ;re zhig dang por ras bzang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-10: skyon rnams dang ni ma 'dres pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-11: sar ba phra ba'i khyad par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-12: kha tshar dang bcas nyid la bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-13: chur ni khru do'i tshad yin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-14: zheng du khru gang tshad du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-15: de 'dra'i bzang po kho na la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-16: dri med blta na sdug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-17: bcos bu dkar po de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-18: phra dang legs bkrus ras bal spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-19: phyag dar dri ma med pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-20: du gu la yi ras nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-21: rgyu ni shing kun nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-22: dag la rgyud ni rnam spangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-23: chu ngan las ni bkrus min dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-24: skye bos zhal mthong phul ba'ang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-25: ma gos pa dang de bzhin du; ;gzhan yang cung zad dam pas bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-26: de 'dra'i ras ni bzang po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-27: gzhal med khang ni bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-29: ston pa'i gzugs ni yang dag bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-30: de bzhin gser gyi mdog can ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-31: 'od zer phreng ldan bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-32: gcig bu phug ni bzhugs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-33: ri bo la gnas grags pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:189b-34: dar la'i bla re bre ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-1: ba 'o; ;steng du lha ni gnyi ga yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-2: 'dzin pa dag ni yang dag bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-3: ri rnams kyi ni steng dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-4: rin chen phreng ba rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-5: bla re khor yug mu tig gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-6: dra ba dra phyed dag gis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-7: ri rgyal steng du 'bad pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-8: 'di dag thams cad bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-9: ri bo dag gi rtsa ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-10: rgya mtsho chen bor nub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-11: ras ris mthar yang me tog ni; ;kun nas 'khor bar yang dag bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-12: n'a ga ge sa ra pun n'a ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-13: ba ku la dang zhu ti ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-14: snam me tog pri yang ku /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-15: de bzhin ku ra ba ka dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-16: autpa la dang dri mchog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-17: de las gzhan yang padma dkar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-18: me tog rigs ni sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-19: de bzhin gzhan yang drir ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-20: me tog dag ni 'di dag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-21: gang yang rung ba rtag blangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-22: ston pa la ni mchod don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-23: yid du 'ong ba'i mchod yon dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-24: sngar bstan cho gas ras ris ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-25: mchog dang de bzhin gzhan dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-26: dog pa tha ga pa dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-27: ri mo mkhan yang de bzhin 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-28: cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-29: nyi ma dge ba dag la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-30: dus ni de ltar gyur pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-31: bzlas pa nyid kyang bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-32: 'di la sems can thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-33: sngar bstan bzhin du yang dag spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-34: tshon gsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-35: ston pa'i gzugs ni bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190a-36: rnam pa du mar ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-0: dong @190b ga'i me tog mdog 'dra dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-1: tsab pa ka yi mdog 'dra dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-2: gser gyi mdog dang 'dra bar bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-3: de lta'i rnam pa ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-4: rin chen rigs skyes thub pa bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-5: chags pa chen po rin chen tog ;gtso bo thub mchog dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-6: chos rnams thams cad yongs thob pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-7: sangs rgyas dkon mchog de bri bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-8: rin chen ri bor gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-9: rin chen phug gis nyer mdzes sheng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-10: skyil krung gis ni bzhugs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-11: chos ni rjes su 'chad cing stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-12: cung zad 'dzum zhing brtan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-13: thugs ni bsam gtan la dmigs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-14: phyi rol phug ni yang dag bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-16: ras mtha'i zur du sgrub pa bos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-17: pus mo'i lha nga yang dag btsugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-18: bdug spos lag na thogs bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-19: lus ni cung zad 'dud pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-20: bla gos gcig tu byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-21: cha byad ji lta bzhin du yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas phyogs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-23: 'og gi rgya mtsho che steng du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-24: sngags pas dge ba'i don gyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-25: sngom brtson rtag tu pri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-26: las kyi cho ga 'di dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-27: 'jig rten gyi sngags bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-28: dkyil 'khor de yi lha dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-29: da ni rab tu brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-30: de tshe sngags pas rig pa'i sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-31: de tshe sngags ni rig pa des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-32: sngags la rtag tu bsnyen byas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:190b-33: bzlas pa phun sum tshogs mngon shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-0: de tshe sngags pa dbang bskur @191a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-1: ba; ;dkyil 'khor rnam pa la mkhas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-2: rtag tu gtsang sbra byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-3: sngags rnams kun la dbang bskur dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-4: dkyil 'khor 'di la 'jigs pa med; ;rig pa'i sngags dang sngags bcas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-5: bdag nyid bsrung dang phan 'dogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-6: grogs kyang de bzhin bsrung shes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-7: yongs su legs brtags 'od chen ldan; ;slob dpon legs par yang dag rtsom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-8: rtsom zhing sbyangs yon bsten pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-9: shes rab che zhing legs 'jam dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-10: dpal ldan snying rjer rtag tu ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-11: grogs po dag ni thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-12: mtshan nyid de bzhin kun tu bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-13: gcig gnyis gsum dang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-14: gzhan yang de bzhin brgyad kyi bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-15: slob ma legs par sbyang ba bya; ;mang po dag ni spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-16: sngar bstan cho ga ji lta bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-18: stobs bcu ldan pas dang por ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-19: dkyil 'khor gang dag rab bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-20: 'jam pa'i dbyangs las gzhan min dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-21: rgyu gzhan dag gis bri mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-23: tshad ni rab tu bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-24: khru bzhi'am khru ni gnyis pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-25: de bzhin gzhan yang khru brgyad par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-26: gtsang ba'i phyogs sam chu klung ngam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-27: khyad par du ni ri bo'i rtser //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-28: tshon sna lnga yi phye ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191a-29: sngar bstan pa yi las kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-0: gru bzhi sgo @191b ni bzhi pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-1: rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-2: zur bzhi mnyam zhing bzang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-3: lha yi rnam pa 'dra ba'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-4: tshon rtsi gsal ba sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-5: mdzes pa'i kha dog legs mdzes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-6: dri zhim bzang dang gzugs bzang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-7: grogs bzang dag gis yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-8: thub pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-9: yan lag brgyad pa'i brtul zhugs bsten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-10: nyon mongs med sems zas tshod rig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-11: chos ldan rtag tu zlos pa byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-12: sdig med las dang yongs srung byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-13: de bzhin zhi dang rgyas pa shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-14: de nas dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-15: bstan bcos las gsungs bzhin du bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-16: rin chen lha tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-17: ri mo dang por bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-18: der zhugs gzhi brjid chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-20: skyil krung gis ni legs bzhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-21: chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bskor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-22: ras ris la ni ji lta bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-23: bstan bcos la sngags thams cad bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-24: ri mo'i phreng ni gsum dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-25: phyag rgyas rab tu brgyan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-26: gser mdog rim pas 'khor yug tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-27: yongs su bri bar bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-28: gsal dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-29: drang po de yi rnam pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-30: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bdag po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-31: de yi dbus su bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:191b-33: gur gum rnam pa 'dra mdog can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-2: 'bad par gnas pas kun tu bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-3: rgyal po chen po mnyam 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-4: gzhal med khang bcas rgyan gyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-5: sems dpa' chen po'i cod pan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-6: rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-7: dar la mdzes pa'i smad g-yogs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-8: sna tshogs dar las stod g-yogs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-9: phreng ldan zhi ba'i kha dog 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-10: gos dang phreng bas brgyan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-11: me tog phreng ba ba ku la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-12: lag pas g-yas pas snyoms par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-13: bzhin ni cung zad 'dzum pa'i lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-15: gzugs bzang gzugs ni mdzes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-16: byis pa rgan po rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-17: lag pa g-yon na 'khor lo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-19: de ni yongs su bskor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-20: skyil krung phyed kyis gnas pa bri; ;gzugs bzang gzugs la bsten nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-21: lha yi gzugs 'dra bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-22: ri bo 'od chen ldan pa'i steng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-23: rin chen du ma'i steng du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-24: sngags rnams kun la che ba dang; ;rtag tu mchog sbyin la 'jug byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-27: rlung gis sbar ba'i me bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-29: de bzhin sngags kyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-30: khyab bdag me yis 'bar bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-31: stobs chen de dang 'dra ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-32: sngags kun rab tu sgrub byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192a-33: gang gis bdag nyid chen po mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-0: sdig pa kun las @192b yongs su grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-1: mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-2: tshul 'chal blo ni chung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-3: sdig pa kun la 'dzud byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-4: khyab bdag mthong ba tsam gyis grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-5: lha yi lha ni 'khor lo'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-6: dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-7: gzhan yang sdig tu yongs bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-8: de yi mod la grol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-9: sngags pas rtag tu khyab bdag gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-10: de nas shar sgo yang dag sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-11: rta babs kun nas yongs bsgreng ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-12: ba dan dag gis nyer mdzes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-13: mtha' dag gzugs ni mdzes pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-14: dkyil 'khor yongs su gsal byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-15: bshos dang bdug pa dri dang ni; ;rtag tu phreng ba bzang po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-16: cho ga snga ma kho na ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-17: de dag thams cad gus par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-18: dbus kyi bum pa gang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-19: 'khor lo can gyi mdun du dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-20: de bum rnam par rgyal zhes bya; ;sngags shes pas ni de mi bteg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-21: cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-22: me thab snga ma bzhin du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-23: sbyin sreg cho ga yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-24: cho ga sngags ni gzhan pas min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-25: sbyin sreg kyang ni brgya rtsa brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-26: seng ldeng bud shing me la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-27: pa la sha dang bil ba'i shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-28: bil ba au dum aarka dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-29: 'bad pas las rnams kun la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-30: aa pa mar gas sbyin sreg bya; ;til la mar gyis btags pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-31: zho la sbrang rtsi bsres pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-32: las rnams kun la sbyin sreg ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-33: stong rtsa brgyad ni rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:192b-34: dus gsum dus ni kun bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-1: dang gos ni brje ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-2: dkar gsum rgyu skar bzang po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-3: mkhas pa rnams kyis bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-4: las rnams sngar ni bstan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-5: bzlas dang sbyin sreg de bzhin gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-6: sngags dang yang dag ldan pas sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-7: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs kyis bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-8: las rnams dag ni kun la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-9: yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyis bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-10: de ni mthu chen don ldan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-11: dpa' bo gcig pu rtag pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-12: de la rtag tu zlos byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-13: sngags rnams kun gyi cho ga spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-14: 'jig rten pa yi 'jig rten 'dod; ;cho ga thams cad 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-16: rig pa'i rgyal po dka' thub che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-18: cho ga 'di las gzhan pas min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-19: thub pa rnams kyis sngags gsungs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-20: de bzhin stobs bcu ldan sras dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-21: 'jig rten skyong ba brgya byin sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-22: khyab 'jug dbang ldan tshangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-23: zla ba nyi ma de bzhin gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-24: gnod sbyin dbang po srin po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-26: de bzhin sa steng drang srong mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-27: nam mkha' lding dang rlung lha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-28: sems can ming ldan 'jig rten gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193a-29: gang gis bshad pa'i sngags rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-0: sngags rnams kun la 'gugs @193b byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-1: las rnams kun la ston byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-2: 'byung bo kun gyi sngags rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-3: rgyas dang bcas pa dbang du byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-4: yi ge gcig pa'i sngags 'di ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-5: sngags pa kun gyi rab byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-6: bzlas pa tsam gyis don ldan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-7: lha rnams kun ni 'gugs byed la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-8: cho ga rnams ni dbang du byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-9: yi ge gcig chen bdag po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-10: dam pa rnams kyis rab bsngags pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-11: rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-13: yang dag sbyar na sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-14: ma lus mthong na mdzes pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-15: ras ris gsal ba byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-16: gtsang ba'i phyogs dang 'bab chu'i ngogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-17: ri bo'i rtser yang gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-18: snga ma'i las kyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-19: nub kyi phyogs su rtag tu bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-20: cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-21: sgrub pa po ni shar du blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-22: dur ba'i khres la 'dug nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-24: sgra ni drag min dal bas min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-25: gzhan la ngan sems med gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-26: sangs rgyas ma lus kun gyi yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-28: rtag tu 'jig rten byams sems dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-29: sdug bsngal can la snying brtser ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-30: mgon med sems ni dman pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-31: phongs pas nyams thag stobs chung dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:193b-32: mi bzad 'khor bar ltung ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-1: dag tu; ;mchod pa chen po rtag tu bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-2: dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-3: bzang po sems las byung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-4: rgyal dbang gzugs kyi ri mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-5: bsam pa'am yang na bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-6: de nyid kyi ni cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-7: de nyid du ni me thab bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-8: me ni shin tu 'bar ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-9: sgrub pas sreg blugs sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-10: tsandan dkar dang ga bur dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-11: gur gum gyis bsres mang po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-12: brgya ni rtsa brgyad sreg blugs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-13: sngags rig me 'bar sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-14: seng ldeng blag sha n+ya gro dha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-15: pa la sha ni gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-16: de dag las byung shing dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-17: me chen rab tu sbar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-18: shing de dag ni med gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-19: shing gzhan yongs su gzung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-20: pi tsu mrda tshva dang skyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-21: po son cha las byung ba'i shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-22: tsher ma can sogs spang bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-23: sdig pa'i las la rab tu bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-24: yi ge gcig pa'i sngags nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-25: zhi dang rgyas pa byas gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-27: sdig pa'i las ni spyad mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-28: sngags mchog kun kyang 'di la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-29: las rnams cho ga rgya chen kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-30: rnam rtog med pas rab sbyar na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-33: mchog sbyin nyid du'ang 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-34: yam shing blag sha au dum bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-35: yang na blag sha n+ya gro dha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-36: mar gyis btags dang sbrang rtsir ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194a-37: zho dang ldan pas mnyam bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-0: @194b sa steng rgyal thabs 'dod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-1: sngags pas dus kun sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-2: lha yi rgyal po 'dod pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-3: gur gum tsandan sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-4: rig pa 'jin pa'i lha dag gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-5: bdag po nyid ni 'dod gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-7: sum cu rtsa drug ge sar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-8: sbyin sreg mthar ni mchod yon yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-9: bstan bcos las byung bzhin du dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-10: rgyal bas bsngags pas ras ris mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-11: der ni kun nas yongs su 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-12: de la reg pa tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-13: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dag dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-14: 'og min gyi ni bar dag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-16: bar skabs 'dir ni grub rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-17: der ni rgyal por rtag tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-18: stobs chen brtan zhing pha rol gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-21: las rnams yongs su sbyong bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-23: bskal pa tsam du'ang gnas pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-24: gang tshe lus ni shi 'phos nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-25: nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-26: gzhan yang las ni 'di dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-27: mdo dang rgyas pa bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-28: padma dkar po yongs blangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-29: tsandan dkar dang ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-30: sbyin sreg 'bum phrag brgya byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-31: des ni rin chen tog mthong 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-32: rgyal ba dam pa de mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-33: de tshe mngon shes lnga thob 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-34: bskal pa chen por ring 'tsho zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:194b-36: mtha' yas phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-2: de dag la ni rtag mchod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-3: de dag nyid dang lhan cig gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-4: rin chen ldan zhes 'jig rten khams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-5: gcig na bcom ldan de bzhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-6: thub gtso mchog ni dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-8: de la de ni rtag gnas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-9: sngags kyis dag par the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-10: gzhan yang las ni 'dod pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-11: gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-12: n'a ga ge sar ga pur dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-13: tsandan gur gum cha mnyam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-14: sngags pas de tshe gcig byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-15: sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bdun cu brgyad; ;de tshe lha ni sbyin sreg mthar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-17: rtag tu dgyes nas mchog stsol te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-18: sgrub byed spyi bor byug par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-19: de tshe reg pa tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-20: sngags pa sa bdun bdag por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-21: rgyal sras thugs las skyes pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-22: byang chub sems dpar der brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-23: nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-24: de ni lung bstan 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-25: de nas brtsams nas cung zad gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-26: shes dang shes bya rgyal ba'i sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-27: shes 'gyur sngags rnams ma lus ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-28: rtogs pa'i bdag nyid cher rgyas yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-29: de la reg pa tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-30: mngon shes lnga ldan sngags rgyal 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-31: rtag tu bdag dang gzhan bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-32: rnam pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195a-33: rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-0: mchod pa'i las la rtag @195b tu dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-1: skad cig de nyid kho na la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-2: byang chub las la brtson par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-3: de tshe skad cig tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-5: 'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-7: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-8: de tshe spyod bcas mthong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-9: de las chos ni thos pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-10: mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-11: rgyal pa 'khor los bsgyur gsungs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-12: 'dir ni las rnams gzhan yod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-13: mar me yon du dbul ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-14: mar bcas snying po gtsang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-15: gser dang dngul gyi snod dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-16: zangs ma sa dag nyid yin na'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-17: der ni mar me rab spar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-18: skyes bu grangs ni 'bum dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-19: grangs kyi tshad tsam nges bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-20: brgya phrag stong las lhag pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-21: bud med spangs pa'i skyes pa yis; ;kho ra 'khor yug mar me 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-22: mchod pa'i las kyi don du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-23: ston pa'i ras ris sku la dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-24: sngags rnams re re 'ang 'don bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-25: thams cad mnyam par rab zhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-26: ston pa la ni 'bul byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-27: de yi mod la grub par ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-28: kun nas sgra ni sgrogs byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-29: rnga bo che yi sgra yang sgrogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-30: gang phyir lha tshogs du ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-31: legs so zhes pa'i sgra rab 'don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-32: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-33: de tshe nam mkha' la bzhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-34: shes rab can khyod legs so legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-35: legs byas las ni yongs su byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:195b-36: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-0: @196a *// sdug bsngal yang ni mthong mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-1: bde dang zhi ba mya ngan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-2: 'jigs med sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-3: lam ni dge dang dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-4: yan lag brgyad la legs par spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-5: yi ge gcig pa mnyes byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-6: sngags kyi ngo bo'i mgon po mnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-7: gzhan yang las ni 'di nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-8: dam pa'i 'gro ba la gnas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-9: mthu chen por ni rnam shes pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-10: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-11: nim pa'i rang bzhin shing blangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-12: rtse gsum rdo rje gnyis mthar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-13: dbus kyi phyogs su bya ba ni; ;rdo rje rigs te mi bskyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-14: de nas sngags kyis dag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-15: de ni ras ris mngon du bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-16: de nas sngags pas lag reg nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-17: sngags ni mnyam par gzhag nas bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-18: rtsa brgyad 'bum phrag bcu drug ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-19: yongs su rdzogs nas grub par 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-20: de nas rdo rje gcig 'bar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-21: kun nas de ni rab tu 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-22: de nas rdo rje de blangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-24: de nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-27: grub pa kun gyi sngon du 'dren //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-28: grub pa'i rig 'dzin la sogs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-29: bdag po nyid kyang byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-30: lha yi 'dus pa mang po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196a-32: bdag nyid kyi ni spyod pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-0: rnam pa sna tshogs byed @196b par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-1: bar gyi bskal pa bcu yi bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-2: yun ring gnas te bar chad med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-3: bde ba la brten rtag tu mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-4: rtag tu skyes bu dam par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-5: byang chub sems kyis yang dag spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-6: skye ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-7: grub pa'i dbang phyug 'gyur ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-8: sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-9: de la shi 'phos mir skye zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-10: bde ba mang la rab tu gzhol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-11: 'gro ba ma lus skyob byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-12: byang chub yang dag gzhol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-13: rnam pa sna tshogs las mtha' yas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-14: mang po 'jig rten don mchod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-15: sngags kyi rgyal po 'dir brjod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-16: cho ga rgya chen cho gar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-17: sa bdag brgya byin nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-18: 'khor los bsgyur nyid yang dang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-19: rig 'dzin rnams dang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-20: lha nyid dang ni bdag po'ang byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-21: rnam pa du ma'i ngo bo 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-22: las ni gang dag 'di gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-23: thams cad grub pa thob 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-24: sngags pa legs par sbyor byed na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-25: mtshan mo skyil mo krung bcas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-26: sdom can don yod bzlas byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-27: tho rangs grub pa thob 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-28: zlos pa mngon shes lnga thob 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-29: dur khrod ro la 'dug nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-30: sdom can 'gul med zlos pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-31: yi ge gcig po don chen te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-32: tho rangs grub par 'dod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-33: rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-34: gal te dur khrod gnas nas bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-35: zla ba drug gis grub thob ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:196b-37: gang yang rung ba'i gnas dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-1: byed na; ;der gnas grub pa thob 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-2: sngags pa legs par sbyor byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-3: gdugs dkar de bzhin ral gri dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-4: nor bu'i lha ma dang gdub gong dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-5: mu tig phreng ba dpung rgyan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-6: gdu bu dang ni sor gdub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-7: 'og pag dang ni de bzhin gos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-8: so shing dang ni spyi blugs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-9: mchod phyir thogs dang zhva dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-10: khrab dang go cha nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-11: g-yang gzhi dang ni ril ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-12: phreng ba dang ni mchil lham dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-14: rgyan gyi gtso bo thams cad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-15: lha dang mi dang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-17: de dag thams cad thob 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-18: ras ris mdun du zlos byed la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-19: rdzas rnams kun dang 'byung khung dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-20: rgyan dang nor bu rnams dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-21: mtshon cha thams cad du ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-22: ras res mdun du bzhag nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-23: dag byas gcig car bzla bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-24: 'bum phrag brgyad kyis g-yo ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-25: thams cad bcas te 'bar ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-26: zlos pa reg pas gyen du 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-27: rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-28: sems can rang bzhin yin yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-29: rgyan dang mtshon cha yin yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-30: ngo bo nyid dam sa rang bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-31: rang tshul spyod dam bcos ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-32: 'dab chags sna tshogs tshogs kyang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-33: gang dag 'byung po kun la grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197a-34: bcos ma'am bcos ma min pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-0: sngags pa mchod @197b pas grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-1: rnam pa sna tshogs rdzas bzhag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-2: rnam pa sna tshogs khams las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-3: rang byas byed du bcug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-4: 'gro ba'i skye gnas dag na bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-5: sngar bstan cho ga bzhin du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-6: ras ris mdun du rnam par gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-7: lan ni drug gam bdun dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-8: sngags pas reg nas bzla bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-9: bzlas mthar de dag rab 'bar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-10: grub pa rgyas pa thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-11: de ni de la reg tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-13: 'dir ni lha yul thob nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-15: rdzu 'phrul chen po rig rgyal la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-16: ji lta ji ltar rab sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-17: de lta de ltar dga' 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-18: rtag tu mchog kyang ster bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-19: gzhan yang las la rab sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-20: las rnams dus ni yun ring ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-21: rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-23: gtsang zhing sems ni gtsang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-24: gtsang ba'i las la rtag tu dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-25: gtsang ba'i phyogs dang sngags shes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-26: gtsang ba'i grub pa thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-27: las gang byed pa de 'bras thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-28: mchog gi mchog tu 'gyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-30: tha mas kyang ni tha mar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-31: ma bsgrubs las kyis grub pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-33: bu mo'am nor ni mang po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-34: yang dag spyod pas byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:197b-35: rtag tu bzlas pa tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-2: rgyal po dga' zhing blon po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-3: rtag tu bzlas pas byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-4: sngags kyi rgyal po lan gcig bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-5: de yi sdig pa rab tu 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-6: gnyis su bzlas sam bdun bzlas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-7: bdag nyid srung ba chen por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-8: lan brgyad de ni bzlas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-9: grogs po thams cad srung bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-10: gos la lan gnyis mngon sngags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-11: sngags pa dag ni rtag tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-12: nad rnams kun las shin tu grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-13: gos ni gnyis ka la sngags nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-14: gos dag la ni reg byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-15: lus can nad ni med par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-16: gdong dang mig gnyis dag la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-17: 'bad pas mngon par rab sngags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-18: khros pa rnams kyi khro ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-19: sngags pas bltas pa tsam gyis 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-20: gang yang 'byung tshogs ma rungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-21: 'tshe byed sdig pa'i las can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-22: sngags rgyal sum cu rab bzlas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-23: de dag gdong la blta ba'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-24: rang lag nyid la yang dang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-25: mngon par sngags pa byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-26: de dag thal mo brdabs na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-27: lus can kun ni grol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-28: byis pa la ni rtag bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-29: khrus dang bza' dang btung ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-30: sngags mchog drug cu bzlas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-31: lha yi dam pa mchod byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-32: sha za ma mo dag gi gdon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198a-33: ma rungs kun las grol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-0: rtag tu byis pa gtong @198b bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-1: de ltar rnam pa du ma'i las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-2: sa steng myur du rtag 'jig na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-3: mi rnams la ni de bzhin byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-4: gang dag 'byung po sdig sbrul ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-5: rnam pa sna tshogs gnas 'gro ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-6: dug bcas dug ni med pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-7: sngags kyi mthu yis 'jig par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-8: gang dag sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-9: gang dag tshor ba thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-10: sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-11: myur du zhi bar rab tu 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-12: rnam pa sna tshogs gnod sdug bsngal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-14: sngags kyi rgyal po drug brgya bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-15: myur ba nyid du sel bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-16: sbyin sreg las ni bya ba la; ;zho dang mar gyis thams cad bsre //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-17: aud pal sngon po'i dri bzang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-18: rtsa brgyad stong gis bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-19: zhi zhing 'byung po rnams song nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-20: 'gro ba rnams ni bde gnas thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-21: de ltar rnam pa du ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-22: mang po'i las ni yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-23: sngags pa legs par rab sbyor na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-24: myur du thams cad byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-25: bzlas pa tsam gyis byed pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-26: dgra rnams kyi ni khro ba sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-27: sngags 'di don dang ldan gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-28: cho ga mang po rgya che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-29: de dag cho ga mthong ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-30: de dag 'dir ni grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-31: 'dir ni sngags rnams zlo byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-32: phran tshegs las kyang don yod 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-33: thams cad la yang bzlas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:198b-34: myur du don rnams rtag tu byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-0: @199a *// dus gsum du ni bzlas pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-1: rtag tu sna ma'i me tog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-2: sbyin bsreg las kyang bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-3: tsandan dkar dang ga pur dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-4: gur gum gyis kyang bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-5: bzlas nas sngags pa mchog sbyin zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-7: rtag tu zlos pas sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-8: yid la 'dod pa'i don sgrub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-9: ga pur la sogs ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-10: rtag tu sbyin sreg rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-11: ji ltar 'dod par yongs brtags pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-12: rnam pa sna tshogs cho ga bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-13: tha ma las ni tha ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-14: chen po las ni chen po 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-15: bar ma bar ma'i las dag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-16: rtag tu grub par bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-17: de bas las rnams kun la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-18: khyad par du ni sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che thegs chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-20: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las /
