K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-21: le'u bcu bzhi pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs rab 'byams rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199a-22: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'khor gyi nang der 'dug shing 'khod par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-0: 'dug pa de stan las langs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas @199b te; bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-4: legs par rab tu bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-5: mchog tu legs par gsungs pa'i rig pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi sbyor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-6: chos chen po'i sprin las nges par byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-8: rig pa chen po'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-10: cho ga chen po rgya che ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-11: don thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-12: 'bras bu dang bcas pa sgrub par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-13: byang chub kyi lam bla na med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-14: bya ba'i bye brag yang dag par sdom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-18: spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-19: 'bras bu bstan pa'i las kyi rkyen skyed pa'i rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-21: rmad du byung ba'i stobs bcu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-22: nod par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-23: byang chub kyi snying po nod par byed cing nges par pha rol du 'gro bar byed pa de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-26: sngags sgrub par byed pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i rmi lam na mthong bar byed pa'i mtshan ma de ston pas bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:199b-27: gang gis rig pa thams cad sgrub pa'i rjes su spyod pa'i sems can grub pa'i mtshan ma'i las rtsom par byed par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200a-0: 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rig pa thams cad kyi @200a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200a-2: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200a-3: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200a-5: khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200a-6: skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200a-7: 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200a-8: skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200a-11: rig pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200a-13: de legs par rab tu nyon la zungs shig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200a-15: dang po re zhig las thams cad kyi sngar 'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas su song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200a-19: gtsang ba'i phyogs su lo ma'i spyil po byas la de nyid kyi cho ga snga ma bzhin du ras ris bzhag cing mchod pa chen po byas la las thams cad la yang yar ngo'i zla ba phyed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200a-20: cho 'phrul chen po'i zla ba phyed la nges par nyin zhag bzang po'i mtshan mo'i thun dang po la tsandan dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200a-22: ga pur gcig tu byas la tsandan gyi shing gis me rab tu spar zhing ras ris kyi mdun du khru bzhi'i tshad tsam gyi me thab la du ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200a-23: sol ba med pa'i me la sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-0: de nas @200b yang sbyin sreg gi mthar padma'i me tog tsandan dkar po'i chus bsang gtor byas pa'i stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-1: sbyin sreg gi mthar yang bzang po'i gdan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-2: gdong bkab la rang gi lha la rang gi sngags kyis spyan drang bar bya zhing sngags 'dis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-3: na ma: sarba bud dh'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-4: aa pra ta hi ta sha sa n'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-6: aom ku m'a ra r'u pi ne darsha ya darsha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-7: a'atma no bhu mi mud bh'a ba svapnam me ni be da ya w'a bhu tam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-9: sngags 'dis srung ba byas shing sbyin sreg gi las thams cad la las bya'o; ;de nas ku sha'i rtse mo gnyis ka phyi rol du bstan te bting la ku sha'i khres kyi sngags byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-10: mgo shar phyogs su bstan la ras ris kyi mdun nas ha cang yang mi ring; ha cang yang mi nye bar nyal bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-11: thun dang po la mi nyal ba'i sbyor bas rjes su brtson par byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag byas nas sdig pa rnams so sor bshags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-14: sangs rgyas thams cad la bdag nyid phul la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-15: de nas ji ltar bde bar gnyid kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-16: dang po'i thun gyi rmi lam gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-17: bad ka na las byung shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-18: gnyis par gang byung mkhris pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-19: 'jig rten la yod smad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:200b-20: gsum pa rlung byung shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-2: bad kan rmi lam dang po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-4: nor bu shel gyi khang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-5: kun nas mu tig phreng ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-6: aa mra'i shing tshogs rab mang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-7: bdag nyid chu nang 'bying bar mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-8: kun nas 'bab chus khyab pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-9: rgya mtsho chen pos khyab pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-10: gang du bdag gi lus gnas pa; ;de nyid du ni mthong bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-11: gang du phyogs der rdzing dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-12: kun nas yongs su khyab pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-13: gru dang chu ni 'thung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-14: btung ba'i khang pa khang pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-15: kun nas yongs su 'khor ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-16: chu chen gyis ni khyer bar mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-17: kha ba can ni byis pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-18: chu bo chen por shel gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-19: shing dang ri yi rgyal po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-20: shel gyis yongs su bcings pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-21: mu tig dra bas legs g-yogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-22: mu tig phung po mthong ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-23: char chen 'bab pa chu yi tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-24: mthong na bad kan las gyur yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-25: gdugs ni dkar po dag dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-26: rgyan rnams kun kyang dkar ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-27: ban glang dag ni dkar po'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-28: bad kan rmi lam dag tu brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-29: rnga ma dkar ram skyes bu 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-30: yang na gos dag mthong ba 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-31: lan tshva la sogs reg pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-32: kun tu gsal te mthong ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201a-33: ras bal btso ma'i gos dag gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-0: ra gan @201b dngul dang aa ga ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-1: reg dang za bar byed pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-2: bad kan rmi lam dag tu 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-3: mon sran gre'u za ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-4: til btags bu ram 'bras chan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-5: mon sran rnam mang za ba ni; ;bad kan rmi lam dag tu 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-6: sva sti ga dang au lo pi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-8: de dag za byed rmi lam ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-9: bad kan rmi lam bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-10: 'breng bu sa bcud bza' ba sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-11: rnam pa sna tshogs snum khur ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-12: reg dang za bar byed pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-13: bad kan 'phel ba'i rmi lam yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-14: snum khur rnam pa du ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-15: bza' dang spyad par rjes 'dod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-16: zos dang reg par byed de dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-17: bad kan rmi lam shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-18: gnas dang gnas mal theg pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-19: bzhon pa sems can las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-20: reg dang 'dzeg par byed pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-21: dang po'i thun la mthong pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-22: gal te rmi lam snang gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-23: thams cad bad kan can du brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-24: rnam pa de lta'i rmi lam dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-25: chu la 'byung dang spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-26: rnam pa sna tshogs bza' la spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-27: mthong na bad kan can du brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-28: de dag rmi lam dag tu mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-29: bad kan can gyi spyod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-30: rmi lam ma lus du ma ni; ;'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-31: gnyis pa'i thun la lus can gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-32: rmi lam mkhris pa can gyi yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:201b-33: 'bar ba'i me yi gzugs mthong dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-0: @202a *// sna tshogs rin chen mthong ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-1: mes tshig skar mda' ltung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-2: ri dang phyogs ni rab 'bar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-3: skye bo gang gis rab mthong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-4: de ni mkhris par gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-5: rin chen padma r'a ga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-6: gzhan yang rin chen gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-7: gang du rmi lam mthong na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-8: lus can mkhris pa las gyur yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-9: me dang tshab sten pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-10: reg dang za bar byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-11: rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog ser //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-12: rmi lam mkhris pas brgyal ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-13: rtag tu tsha ba'i nyi ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-14: nyi ma rtag tu bde bar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-15: gang gis rmi lam mthong gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-16: lus can mkhris pa las gyur yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-17: nam mkha' gser gyi mdog gyur dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-18: sa yi steng ni kha dog ser //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-19: rmi lam na ni gang gis mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-20: mkhris pa las gyur na ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-21: me ni kun nas 'bar ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-22: nam mkha'i ngos ni rab gsal bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-23: rmi lam dus su mthong ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-24: mkhris pas gnod pa'i lus can yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-25: sa dang de bzhin ri bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-26: brag ni mthon po 'ang gser gyi mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-27: shing chen de bzhin theg pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-28: rtag tu thams cad gser rang bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-29: rtag tu rmi lam gnas mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-30: mkhris pa las gyur rmi lam yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-31: theg pa rgyan dang bzhon pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202a-32: snod rnams gser gyi rang bzhin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-0: @202b stan rnams dang ni gnas mal rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-1: sa le sbram gyi rang bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-2: reg dang 'gro bar byed pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-3: rmi lam mthong na mkhris gyur yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-4: phreng ba ser po thogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-5: ser po'i gos kyis nyer mdzes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-6: ser po'i 'od dang dri yis byugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-7: ser po'i mchod phyir thogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-8: bdag nyid ser po'i rnam pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-9: gang gis rmi lam la mthong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-10: gnyis pa'i thun du mthong na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-11: mkhris pa las gyur shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-12: de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-13: gang gzhan rmi lam dag tu brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-14: rnam pa sna tshogs ser por snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-15: rmi lam mkhris las yang dag byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-16: mkhris pas lus can rab gnon pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-17: gnyis pa'i thun la bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-18: rnam pa du ma'i gzugs can ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-19: ser por snang ba yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-20: 'jig rten gtso bos gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-21: rmi lam mkhris las yang dag byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-22: gang yang rlung byung rmi lam ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-23: gsum pa'i thun du bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-25: phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-26: nam mkha' la ni 'gro ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-27: nam mkha'i dkyil du thad drang 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-28: bar snang nam mkha'i dkyil du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-30: rlung byung rmi lam zhes bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-31: 'di lta bu la bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:202b-32: rgal dang mchong dang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-2: bstan bcos ma lus 'don pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-3: khyad par du ni sngags rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-4: bshad dang rjod par byed pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-5: phal cher yang ni rlung las gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-6: shing rnams tsher ma can 'dzeg dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-7: kha ba dag kyang za ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-8: bza' ba ma lus tsha dang skyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-9: zos ba rlung las gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-10: gtsor yang rlung ni yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-11: shing thog rlung ni rab bskyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-12: de dag za bar rmi lam mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-13: rlung las byung ba yang dag bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-14: dngos rnams rlung ni skyed pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-15: bza' dang bca' ba khyad par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-16: de bzhin skye bo sems 'khrugs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-17: reg par byed dang smra bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-18: 'byung po rnams ni gar byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-19: bdag nyid dang ni gar byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-20: gang gis rmi lam mthong na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-21: de 'dra rlung nad can du shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-22: rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-23: rnam pa sna tshogs 'khyud dang smra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-24: rnam pa sna tshogs mi bzad gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-25: rmi lam rlung nad can gyis mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-26: de la sogs pa'i rmi lam ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-27: 'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-28: rnam gsum sbyor ba rab ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-29: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-30: chags can bad kan can zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-31: zhe sdang las byung mkhris pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203a-32: rmongs pa rlung las gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-0: grong @203b chos ni mthong ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-1: rmi lam chags pas sa bon byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-2: der ni bud med la chags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-3: bad kan las byung rmi lam yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-4: rtsod bcas ngang tshul zhe sdang can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-5: mkhris pa las byung rmi lam yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-6: ma rig las byung rmongs pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-7: dran pa nyams par mthong ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-9: rmi lam na ni rtag tu mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-10: de bas rnam pa thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-11: rmi lam zhes bya yod pa spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-12: bya ba dus kyi rim pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-13: de nyid gzigs pas bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-14: sems can bad kan can gsungs pa; ;mdog ldan snyan par smra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-15: tshe ring yid ni gzhungs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-16: kha dog snum zhing 'jigs pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-17: bong tshad ring zhing dkar ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-18: bud med la phrad rtag tu dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-19: chos ldan rtag tu dpa' ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-20: btung ba mngal rtag tu dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-21: rgyal rigs su ni bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-22: ser sna ldan zhing mtshon pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-23: de bzhin sa yi bdag po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-24: dmag dpon don du gnas pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-25: longs spyod chen po skye 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-26: rang gi las kyi nye bar 'tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-27: rang gi las 'bras bstan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-28: las kyi sngags ni spang ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-29: las min sngags ni gtso bo zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-30: rnam par 'dren pas gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-31: de bas sems can bad kan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-32: sa steng grub pa byed pa mi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:203b-33: sa bdag 'dod pa byed pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-0: @204a *// de la grub pa thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-1: zlos pas bad kan can gyi zas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-2: ma lus bsten par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-3: gang phyir shin tu bsten gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-6: grub pa'i don du ma brjod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-7: sngags pas de tshe de mi bsten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-8: mkhas pa rig pa ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-9: de yi dus su gnyid log min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-10: mkhris pa can gyis sems can gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-11: rtag tu spyod pa brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-12: zhe sdang gis ni rnam 'khrugs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-13: kha dog nag dang stobs chung dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-14: drag po drag pa'i las dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-15: rtag tu yon por byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-16: dpa' dang bab chol rtag tu byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-17: stobs dang blo dang ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-18: mang du smra zhing grogs po mang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-19: bstan bcos ting 'dzin mang po rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-20: chos ldan las kyi mtha' brtan cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-21: zhe sdang slong brjod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-22: yid ldan dgra ni mang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-23: zhe sdang mtshon pa skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-24: nor mang dpa' bo la sdang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-25: 'jig rten shes shing mthong na dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-26: des grol chags pa med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-27: brtan cing sdug bsngal rtag tu bzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-28: nga rgyal phrag dog ma rungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-29: bud med rnams la dga' bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-30: spro chen brtan dang blon po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-31: longs spyod chen por skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-32: shes bzhin las kyis nyer spyod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204a-33: sems can zil gyis mnan nas spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-0: sngags @204b ni srog la gnod byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-2: mi bzad thub pas spangs pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-3: myur du sgrub par byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-4: sems can gnod phyir byed pa'i las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-5: lus can de la grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-6: cho ga sbyar ba'i chos rnams gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-7: sngags pas thams cad rab sbyar na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-9: gzhan las sems can de las min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-10: sngags pa zhes sdang can dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-11: sems can gzhan la gnod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-12: de bzhin gzhan gyi sngags gcod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-13: sems can khro ba la grub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-14: gzhan gyi rdzas ni 'phrog don dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-15: gzhan gyi srog ni gcod pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-16: khro ba'i sngags kyis grub 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-17: sngags gzhan dag la sbyar mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-18: zhe sdang rigs kyis sems can 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-19: bdag po nyid kyang byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-20: mdog nag pa'am sngo ba sangs sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-21: dkar ba'am yang na 'dres pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-22: mi ni khro ldan gser gyi mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-23: rnam par spangs pa skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-24: mi ni rtsu ba mdog du ba'i mdog //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-25: ser skya'i mdog tu'ang skye ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-26: dpa' dang de bzhin drag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-27: chags ldan sdig pa'i khyim las skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-28: gza' ni mig dmar zhing bdag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-29: pad kan can la phur bu'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-30: skye 'gyur nyung du za ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-31: tsha dang skyur ba'i ro bsten cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-32: de yi tshe ni ring 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:204b-33: dran dang ldan pa skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-2: rlung nad can gyi bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-3: mdog mi sdug dang rtsub mdog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-4: bong tshod med cing shin tu rjud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-5: blo nyams shes rab med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-6: mi brtan gnas pa med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-8: skyug cing bshang gci mang du 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-9: mang du za zhing rtag par za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-10: de dag gang phyir nad mang 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-11: 'jig rten rigs dang mi mthun zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-12: dgra ni mang po skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-13: de ni sa steng 'di dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-15: mi snang ba yi sngags dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-16: de la 'grub par bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-17: gang zhig rlung nad 'khrug byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-18: zas la de ni dga' bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-19: zlos pa las ni grub 'dod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-20: de ni yongs su bsten mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-21: sems can rlung nad 'khrug pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-22: gti mug nye bar zhi ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-23: rmongs pa'i rigs can la gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-24: rmongs pa'i sngags ni rab sgrub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-25: rtag tu de dag rmongs pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-27: rgyu skar khyim ni chu skyes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-28: gza' ni bdag po spen par blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-29: rlung nad skyes pa'i sems can ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-30: dge ba'i las la mi spyod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-32: de bzhin rmongs dang rengs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205a-33: rlung nad can gyi sems can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-0: gti mug can de sdig @205b pa byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-1: rmi lam bden par mthong ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-2: mtshan nyid 'di dag gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-3: sems can rnams kyi don sgrub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-4: thub pa rnams kyis sngon gsungs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-5: lug glang dang ni sbyor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-6: sbal pa seng ge nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-7: srang dang bu mo sdig pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-8: de bzhin gzhu dang chu srin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-9: bum pa nya dang glang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-10: lha dang spre 'u lha ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-11: grub dang dri za gnod sbyin sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-12: mi rnams gang gis rab bsgrags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-13: sems can rnams kyi khyim mang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-14: gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-15: rnam pa mang po sna tshogs don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-16: rnam pa sna tshogs las bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-17: de dag las ni thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-18: yon tan rgya cher smin par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-19: las las gol ba med par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-20: lus can yon tan mi smin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-21: yon tan kho na las ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-22: skye bar yang ni byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-23: yon tan chos don ldan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-25: zlos pa sems can yon tan shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-26: yon tan yon tan min las 'ching //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-27: yon tan med la bya min gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-28: de yi las ni bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-29: gang phyir bya ba las byed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-30: bya ba yon tan med pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-31: bya ba las dang yon tan nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-32: yang dag ldan pa sgrub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:205b-34: stobs bcu ldan pas sngon bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-2: bya ba las dang yon tan yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-3: rnam pa sna tshogs rmi lam tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-4: las las 'byung bar snang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-5: de bas rmi lam mtshan ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-6: rgya che las la rab sbyar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-7: rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-8: yid 'ong blta na sdug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-9: bgegs kyi gzugs dang gzugs med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-10: rmi lam rgyur ni snang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-11: mthu che sbro ba che ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-12: mi ni grub pa 'dod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-13: mchog dang tha ma 'bring dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-14: de dag la ni grub par brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-15: drag cing las rnams ma rungs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-16: rmi lam rtag tu 'phral du min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-17: bzang po bstan pa'i las dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-18: yun ring dus su grub phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-20: yon tan skye par yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-21: rmi lam rnam pa sna tshogs snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-23: mi 'grub don du sngags rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-24: gnyid dang snyom pa rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-25: bgegs 'joms byed pa'i sngags rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-26: de yi dus su rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-27: de tshe sngags ni rigs tshul gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-28: zlos pas de tshe rab tu sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-29: khro bo chen po phyag drug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-30: zhal drug nyid du brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-31: sngags chen yi ge bzhi ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-32: gzhon nu'i gzugs la gnas pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-33: drag po'i gzugs ni gzugs chen bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206a-34: phag gi rnam par yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-0: bgegs @206b kun rnam par gzhig bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-1: dus mtshan de ni lha yi rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-2: stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-3: sprul gyi gdengs ka rnam par 'phyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-4: lag na ral gri sems dpa' che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-5: gzi brjid chen po gshin rje'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-6: bgegs rnams kun la gtse bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-8: 'byung po kun ni rab nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-9: mi bzad sngags ni bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-10: cho 'phrul chen po bgegs rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-11: ma rungs sems can 'jigs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-12: sngags rnams kun ni sgrub byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-13: lha yi tshogs rnams nga la nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-14: na ma: sa manta bud dh'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-15: aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-17: he he mah'a kro dha sha na mu khashta tsa ra na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-18: sarba bighna bighna gh'a ta ka h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-19: kinytsi ra ya si bi n'a y'a ka dz'i bi tanta ka ra du: sva bna ma n'a sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-20: la hu la hu sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phat phat sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-21: khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'di gsungs ma thag tu bgegs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-22: log 'dren thams cad 'jigs shing nyam thag nas snying gas te yid shin tu skrag nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-23: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:206b-24: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed cing dam tshig la gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas thams cad dang ldan ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen @207a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-1: po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-2: kye kye lha'i tshogs chen po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-3: khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni 'jig rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-4: 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags rnams 'don par byed pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-5: gang zhig ma rungs pa'i sems can gyi gzugs can gyis rnam par 'tshe bar byed pa de la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-6: khro bo'i rgyal po 'dis ni rigs rgyud thams cad 'dul bar byed cing srog kyang 'dzin par mi byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-7: yongs su gdung bar byed cing yongs su skem par byed pa'i rnam par gzhag par bya ba la 'jog par byed cing zlos pa dag la yang srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-9: sbed pa la gnas par 'jog par byed cing rjes su 'phel bar byad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-10: gang zhig dam tshig 'di las 'da' bar byed ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-11: khro bo'i rgyal pos sgrub pa po bsrung bar byas pa la rnam par tho 'tsham par byed na mgo bo aardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du rnam pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-12: thub pa mchog gis legs gsungs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-13: 'jam pa'i dbyangs la de tshe gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-14: gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-15: ma lus don ni rgya chen ngon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-16: sngags rgyud don dang ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-17: sgrub pa rnams la khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-18: bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207a-19: rgyud la khro rgyal bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-0: @207b de bzhin du ni yang dag sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-1: ma lus bgegs rnams 'jig bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-2: dgra rnams kyi ni khro ba sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-3: zlos pas rtag tu 'di dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-4: mtshan mo rtag tu gdon byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-5: sems can rnams ni srung don dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-6: rmi lam ngan pa sel bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-7: sngags rnams ma lus sgrub pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-8: 'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-9: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-10: skyes bu'i mtshan nyid bzang po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-12: mchog dang tha ma bar ma 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-13: gzi brjid ldan dang shes ldan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-14: gser mdog gsus pa che ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-15: dkyus ring mig dang snum pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-16: chags chung khro ba rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-17: mig rtsa dmar zhing snyan par smra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-18: de la grub pa mchog 'gyur la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-19: lpags pa sra ba cing sngo bsangs mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-20: ha cang ring min yan lag phra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-21: spro ba che zhing gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-22: chog shes kun nas dge ba byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-23: skye gnas bzang po dag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-24: 'dod pa chung zhing cung zad dge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-25: las rnams kun la snang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-26: de la nges par grub pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-27: yan lag thams cad mtshang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-28: dur bsngo bsangs gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-29: nyon mongs med sems shes pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-30: rtag tu gtsang zhing changs par spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-31: phra ba'i gsol rtag tu dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:207b-32: chos kyi ngang tshul 'jig rten shas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-2: zas tshod rig dag rtag gtsang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-3: shes nyen tshul khrims spyod ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-4: gtsang ba'i spyod la rtag tu dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-5: bden par smra zhing snying rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-6: de la grub pa mchog tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-7: yon tan rgya che yan lag tshang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-8: rigs ldan rtag tu chos dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-9: pha dang ma la gus pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-10: bram ze la ni mchod pa byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-11: shin tu snying rje ldan zhing brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-12: de la'ang grub pa mchog tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-13: sngo bsangs dkar dang snum pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-14: rtag tu gtsang zhing nyung du smra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-15: bsod pa'i kha zas la dga' zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-16: gtsang ba'i spyod bas mngon par 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-18: de la'ang grub pa mchog tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-19: ha cang ring min thung ba'ang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-20: sku ni mig sman bzhin du gnag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-21: mig dang mig 'bras rab tu snum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-22: gtsang zhing rtag tu khrus la dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-23: dkon mchog gsum la shin tu dad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-24: de yi grub pa mchog tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-25: mchog gi las ni rab ston cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-26: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-27: bzod ldan snyan par smra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-28: rgyal pa'i sras la rab tu dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-31: sems dpa' che zhing brtson 'grus che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208a-32: gzi brjid che zhing brtul zhugs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-0: longs spyod che @208b zhing sngags rnams shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-1: sngags rnams kun la de nyid rig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-2: rigs kyi mchog ni rgyal rigs sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-3: bram ze shes dang ldan ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-4: bud med la brten de la chags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-5: de bzhin gser gyi mdog dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-6: bong tshod che zhing dkar ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-7: sna ni mtho zhing lag ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-8: dpa' zhing lag pa ring ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-9: rgyal po che la mngon par 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-10: rgyal pa'i sras la dad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-11: bud med ming ldan lha la mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-12: dkon mchog gsum la gus pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-13: byang chub sems kyis brgyan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-14: lhag par snying rje brtan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-15: cung zad khro zhing cung zad rmongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-16: longs spyod che zhing gtong ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-17: gzi brjid che zhing thul bar dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-18: bud med rnams ni dga' dang dpa'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-19: de yi grub pa'ang mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-20: shin tu btung dang dga' dang dpa'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-21: rtag tu bud med la chags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-22: gser gyi mdog dang byin pa phra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-23: rked pa che zhing gtsang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-24: brtse dang snying rje ldan mkhas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-26: rtag tu sngags rnams zlos la gus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-27: rgyal ba la ni srog kyang gtong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-28: de bzhin nyan thos sras rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-29: bse ru la yang rtag tu gtong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-30: stobs ldan 'jig rten gtso bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-31: rigs ni gnyis pa bzang po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-32: yan lag thams cad ma tshang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:208b-33: ma rungs rtag tu bab col byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-0: gtong ldan tshul ldan dgra las @209a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-1: rgyal; ;chos dang chos min rnam dpyod byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-2: ha cang sbom min rjud pa'ang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-3: ha cang ring min thung ba'ang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-4: bar ma'i mi ni mchog yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-5: de yi grub pa mchog tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-6: sen mo zangs mdog legs snum dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-7: lag mthil dmar dang gtsang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-8: rkang ba'i mthil dmar snum pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-9: 'khor lo sva sti kas brgyan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-10: rgyal mtshan rta babs nya dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-12: mi gang rkang ba lag pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-13: mtshan ni 'di dag yod gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-14: de 'dra'i skyes bu dam pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-15: grub pa mchog tu brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-16: mche ba dkar zhing bzang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-17: mtho ba'i ri bo dang 'dra dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-18: sna bzang mtho zhing mig dkyus ring //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-19: smin ma stug cing kos ko bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-20: ba yi rdzi ma 'jig rten mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-21: nag pa'i lta ba'i mig 'bras mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-22: dpral ba'i dbyes gang rgya che zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-23: mgo bo gdugs 'dra'i rnam pa bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-24: mgo bo gtsug tor 'dra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-25: rna ba bzang ba dam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-27: ma mchu bim pa smin 'dra'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-28: gang gi lce ni rab snang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-29: padma 'dab ma dmar 'dra'i mdog mgrin pa bum pa 'dra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-30: thal gong rgyas shing yang dag 'phags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-31: mchan khung thong ka bzang ba mchog //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209a-32: de bzhin brla ni rgya che dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-0: lte ba'i phyogs kyang chung ba @209b dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-1: rked pa rgya che bzang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-2: lte ba zab cing g-yas su 'khyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-3: kun nas dkar med ba spu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-4: lag ring lag ni ne ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-5: rked pa seng ge 'dra ba'i mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-6: gang gi brla ni zlum pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-7: gru mo nyams med zlum pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-8: byin pa ae na ya lta bur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-9: zlum po'i nang na zlum por grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-10: rkang ba sha dang ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-11: sor mo rnams ni ring ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-12: dmar zhing sen dmar snum pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-13: sha rgyas pas ni snum pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-14: nang stong ma yin mthil mnyam gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-15: dge zhing mthong na dga' ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-16: 'jam zhing kha dog dag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-17: rab bsngags 'jig rten bkra shis dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-18: de dag gi ni steng dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-19: rtsa yi dra ba mngon pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-20: bshang ba 'byung ba'i lam dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-21: ri mo zab cing g-yas su 'khyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-22: mchig pa rab bsngags shin tu chung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-23: rtag tu zlum zhing dge ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-25: gcig min nyid du bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-26: gang tshe skyes dbang gtsang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-27: rtse mo dmar la yang ngag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-28: skye bo nyal khar kha zas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-29: ro ni btsa' bar byed pa za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-30: bshang ba kha dog sngo ba'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-31: gal te dmar po rab snang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-32: mang po ma yin snum pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-33: dge pa'i mtshan gyis rab mtshan ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-34: de lta'i sems can gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:209b-35: grub pa mchog tu 'dod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-2: gtsang sbra'i spyod dka' yongs su gtsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-3: gang zhig thun ni tha mar nyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-4: tho rangs ldang ba'i skye bo rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-5: de yi grub pa rtag tu mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-6: las kun byed par snang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-7: 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-8: phun tshogs rnam pa mang po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-9: mi rnams rjes su 'dod pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-10: mtshan nyid kyis ni mngon mtshan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-11: rgyu skar dag la'ang skyes pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-12: rgyal dang nam gru gre dbo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-13: mchu dang lha mtshams dag dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-14: nag pa snar ma smin drug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-15: nus pa'i gza' rnams kyis mtshan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-16: de dag la ni skyes mthong dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-18: tho rangs dus su gang skyes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-19: gang tshe de yi dus su skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-20: de la grub par rab tu snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-21: nyin phyed dang ni tho rangs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-22: nyi ma'i mthar yang gza' bzang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-23: dkar ba zla ba ba sangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-24: ser ba gza' lhag phur bu yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-25: skye bo rnams kyis mthong na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-27: mi ni gang zhig dge las kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-28: 'di la skyes par gyur pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-29: sngags don ma lus sgrub pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-31: nyi ma phyed ni 'das pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-32: rtag tu nyi ma nub pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-33: lus can rnams kyis rtag de la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210a-34: ma rungs gza' mthong gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-0: ma rungs nyi ma mig @210b dmar dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-1: mjug ring sgra gcan spen pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-2: gang yang gza' ni gtso bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-3: las ni ngan 'joms skar mda' can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-4: skar ma shin tu mi bzad nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-5: de bzhin nag po 'chi ltas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-6: dus min 'chi ba sa la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-7: mi bzad de tshe snang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-8: nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-9: gza' lhag gis ni sa rnams mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-10: gnya' shing gang tsam nyi mas phyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-11: phur bus sa de mthong par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-12: de nas pha rol gnya' shing tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-13: pa sangs nor spyan gyis de mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-14: nyi ma phyed ni yongs rdzogs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-15: zla bas lus can ma lus mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-16: gza' lhag dus su rgyal thabs thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-17: phur bus nor dang longs spyod byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-18: pa sangs nor ni nges sgrub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-19: rgyal srid tshe dang longs spyod ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-20: zla ba de bzhin tshe ring zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-21: dbang phyug dang ni 'bras bu bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-22: de bzhin nyin phyed nyi ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-23: nyi ma phyed du mnyam par mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-24: rtag tu nyin phyed rnam 'das na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-25: nyi mas phyogs ni mthong bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-26: thung gyur nyi ma gnya' shing tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-27: byed pa nyid du bstan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-28: sgra gtan spen pa nyid dag yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-29: mun pa dus dang dus mthar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-30: de nas phar ni thung pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-32: li khri tshogs kyis mdog bsgyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-33: nyi ma nub gar zangs ma'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-34: gza' yi gtso bo gang yin de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:210b-35: byis pa gzhon nu'i tshul 'dzin cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-0: @211a *// lag na mdung thogs ma rungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-1: mig dmar nyid kyis mthong ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-2: de nas nyi ma gnya' shing 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-3: dge ba'i gza' ni 'byung ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-4: nyi mas mthong ba las skyes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-5: ma rungs bab col byed bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-6: spen pa mig dmar las skyes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-7: khro ldan brkam zhing nga rgyal can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-8: mjug rings 'chi ltas dus rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-9: skyes ba nad ni yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-10: dbul zhing nad btab glen pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-11: de bzhin du ni rtag tu rmongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-12: dus dang mun pa 'gul byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-13: skar mda' can dang gza' ngan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-14: 'gul byed sgra drag dmar ba'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-15: gnam lcags nyid kyang rab rdung byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-16: de bzhin rdo rje 'chi ltas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-17: gzhan yang khyim sogs rab tu mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-18: skye bo kun gyi sgra gcan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-19: mi bzad rab tu mthong gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-20: dbul zhing mgon med tshul khrims 'chal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-21: mi ni rtag tu sdig pa spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-22: mi ni sdug bsngal skye 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-23: nad kyi gzhi ni skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-24: mdze can nad ni mang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-25: long ba 'theng po shu bar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-26: za ma ma ning mo sham dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-27: bud med mtshan ni ngan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-28: skyes pa bud med de bzhin gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-29: gza' ni ngan pa mthong ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-30: de ltar skyes gyur skyes pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211a-31: 'jig rten mang po skye ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-0: dkar dang ser ba'i gza' mchog @211b ni; ;de dag las skyes dge ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-1: mdog ni dkar dang ser ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-2: rgyal bas rab tu bsngags par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-3: gza' ni gtso bo bzhir bshad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-4: pa sangs zla ba bla ma lhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-5: zlos pa las rnams kun la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-6: de dag mthong na 'grub pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-7: sems can byis ba rnams la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-8: rtag tu de dag skye ba bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-9: lo ni kun la'ang 'dod pa zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-10: 'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-11: skad cig tsam yang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-13: 'di ni mdor bsdus skye ba zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-14: 'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-15: 'di tsam gyi ni tshad dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-16: gza' kun 'jig rten dgongs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-17: de dag de bzhin rtag tu 'char //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-18: 'di dag dus kyi de nyid yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-19: 'di dag dge dang sdig pa'i gza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-21: 'jig rten dge dang mi dge byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-22: de nyid 'jig rten gnas pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-23: des na de dag gang cung zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-24: sdig pa'i blo yang skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-25: sems can dge dang mi dge 'bras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-26: mang po yang ni skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-27: gza' rnams las la spyod pa zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-28: des na 'di ni mthong zhes gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-30: myur bar 'ong bas myur ldan yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-31: mig gis mthong dang ma mthong ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:211b-32: se gol gtogs pa'i myur 'gros yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-1: tsam gyi ni tshad dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-2: blo mchog rnams kyis bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-3: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-4: nges par zlos pas rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-5: yud tsam dag ni bcu gnyis dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-6: dus dang dus min 'gro ba'i rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-7: grub pa'i rgyu 'am ma yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-8: 'gro ba min pa'ang bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-9: 'jig rten la nye bzang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-10: char dang char min yang dang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-12: lo legs nyi ma gsal mthong dge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-13: dus dang de bzhin dbang po'i gzhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-14: skye bo rnams la rtag zhi byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-15: mjug rings sa 'gul nam gru dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-16: skar mda' dang ni lho bur dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-17: rgyu skar gza' dang skar rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-18: spyod pa dge dang mi dge ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-19: 'byung po rnams kyi spyod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-20: dge dang mi dge'i spyod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-21: sha za dang ni ma mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-22: drag po ma rungs nyer 'joms byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-23: sha za rnams kyi spyod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-24: de bzhin ma rungs sems can brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-25: gang du lha la rab dad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-26: rin chen chos dang blo mchog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-27: dge ba'i las dang rtag tu ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-28: byams sems brtse bar ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-29: legs par spyod pa'i don ldan blo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-30: gzhan gyi sdug bsngal dag la sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-31: sngags dang rig pa rnams kyis drangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-32: sman gyi don du bzas spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-33: gang du mtshan nyid la brten pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212a-34: spyod pa rgya cher bstan ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-0: @212b gzhan gyi lus la gnas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-1: mi lus brten nas gnas pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-2: lha ni mchod ba zhes bshad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-3: lha min nga rgyal can gyi rgyus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-4: gnas der gnas pa'ang rnam pa gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-5: rim bzhin lha dang lha ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-6: de yang der ni rnam gnyis te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-7: grags pa dang ni thun mong yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-8: de yang der ni rnam gnyis 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-9: dge dang mi dge 'gro ba lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-10: der gnas rnam gsum 'gro ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-11: nyi shu sum cu grangs med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-12: lha dbang dang ni 'og min par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-13: go rims ji bzhin sa med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-14: 'jig rten khams ni mtha' med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-15: dge dang mi dge'i 'jig rten yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-16: 'khor spyod sems can ji snyed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-17: 'phags pa nyan thos ji snyed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-18: sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-19: de yi thugs las skyes sras dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-21: sa bcu la ni rab gnas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-22: rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-23: sems can skye gnas yang dag brten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-24: byis pa'i skye bo thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-25: 'gro ba'i skye gnas rten pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-26: rtag tu 'phags rnams thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-27: mtshan nyid dang ni spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-28: tshig dang brda dang de nyid kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-29: rgya cher rab tu bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-30: sngags dang rgyud ni rigs bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-31: 'byung bo kun ni dgug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-32: dbab dang dgug pa'i sngags shes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:212b-33: gzhan gyi lus la yang dag brten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-2: bag yod rigs ni bza' ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-3: mi blun spyod pa'i sems can dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-4: tshar gcad rjes gzung spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-6: mi ni sngags zlos byed pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-7: de dag grub pa'i mtshan ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-8: de nyid thams cad bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-9: mi rnams kyi ni mdor bsdu na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-10: de dag gi ni lus bzung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-11: rtag tu shin tu chos don dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-12: thar pa'i don du rnam par brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-13: ma rungs rnams ni tshar gcad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-14: rnam dag rnams ni mchod pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-15: tshar gcad rjes gzung nyid la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-16: sngags dang rgyud ni rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-17: rlung dang bad kan mkhris can ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-18: rnam gsum dag la spyod pa'ang gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-19: de dag zhi bar rab brtags la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-20: rnam gsum nyid du rim par 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-21: mi rnams kyi ni gso ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-22: sngags dang rgyud kyis rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-23: 'byung ba chen por rnam brtags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-26: lhag par 'byung ba de la brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-27: skye bo gang tshe lhag 'byung zin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-28: de tshe bde ba med par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-30: rnam pa gnyis su rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-31: rtag tu sems can 'byung ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-32: sems can ma yin rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213a-33: mkhris pa bad kan de bzhin rlung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-0: gang gzhan @213b rnam pa sna tshogs byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-1: 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-2: lnga pa dag ni nam mkhar brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-3: chu dang me dang ldan ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-4: sa dang rlung du yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-5: blo dang ldan pas rtag tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-6: sems can min pa'i grangs su bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-7: 'jig rten mchog gi bdag po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-8: 'od chen ldan pas gsungs ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-9: sems can ma yin grangs su bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-10: sems can grangs 'gro mi ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-11: blo mchog smra ba dam pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-12: mi rnams sems can nyid du gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-13: mi ma yin dang mi dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-14: rtag tu sems can grangs nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-15: sems can rnams la dge don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-16: thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung yang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-17: 'das dang ma byon sangs rgyas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-18: de bzhin da ltar byung rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-19: dge ba'i las kyi las 'byung phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-20: las 'di dag ni yongs su gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-21: sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung dag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-22: las ni don med mi byed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-23: de yi rgyu mtshan rigs dang spyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-24: grub pa nyid du bar snang ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-25: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-26: bde zhing zhi la rtag tu gtsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-27: mthar thug dag dang bdag med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-28: don dam thar par 'dod pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-29: de nyid chos ni btsal bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-30: rgyud 'di yongs su bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-31: rgyud dang sngags dang sman bzang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:213b-32: bka' ni yang dag gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-0: bstan bcos thams cad legs bsngags @214a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-2: 'jig rten mchog dang chos bdag med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-3: rtag tu zhi dang shes pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-4: 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-5: de yi go 'phang mchog gnas pa; ;thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-6: ma 'dres rab tu brtags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-7: sangs rgyas rnams kyi mthu dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-8: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-9: sngags rnams kun gyi cho ga la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-10: grub pa kun tu bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-11: des na 'di nyid thub dbang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-12: cho ga'i rgyal por gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-13: lus can rnams ni sngags tshul gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-15: zhi ba nad med phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-17: mya ngan med dang rdul med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-18: rtag tu byang chub gzhol zhing shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-19: gang 'di bstan pa dag la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-20: sngags kun 'don par byed pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-21: kun mkhyen shes dang shes bya yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-22: las kyi rgyud ni 'brel pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-23: sngags zlos pa yi ched du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-24: rgyud rnams mtha' dag sa steng gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-25: sngags rgyud ma lus don dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-26: byang chub rnam gsum gzhol ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-27: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-28: cho ga 'dir ni rab tu bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-29: sems can rnams la'ang phan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-30: 'jig rten kun la rab tu bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-31: gzhan la cho ga rab snang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214a-32: cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la'ang yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-0: thub mchog @214b thub pa'i sras dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-1: gzhan du cho ga gang bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-2: sngags rnams thams cad 'di la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-3: des na cho ga rgya chen yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-4: de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-5: lus can kun la gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-6: gang du cho ga'i rgyal po 'dis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-7: dbang 'gyur min dang bkug min pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-9: rig pa'i sngags rgyal de yod min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-10: thub pa'i zla ba rab nub cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-11: sa yi dkyil 'khor stongs pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-13: bstan pa'i don ni byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-14: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rtag tu dge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-15: 'byung ba kun la gzhon nu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-16: de tshe sangs rgyas mdzad pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-18: cho ga'i rgyal po mthu la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-19: yun ring dus su 'dod pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-20: lan cig thos kyang grol 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-22: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-23: rtag tu dge ba don yod 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-24: sngags rnams kun la sngags pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-25: bzlas dang sbyin sreg rtag 'dod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-26: dus gsum dag tu shes bya la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-27: mkhyen pa gang du rab 'jug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-29: cho ga'i rgyal po dam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-30: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-31: sngags su rab gnas de 'dir gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-32: sngags de rnam par mi rtog par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-33: cho ga de 'dir gsungs ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:214b-34: don dang don min sems can gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-2: de tshe 'gro ba blo bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-3: 'jig rten kun gyi dge mi dge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-4: de nyid cho ga 'dir spros pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa spros pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-8: las rnams kun la shin tu lhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-10: chos rnams rnams pa sna tshogs byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-11: 'jig rten kun gyis rab tu bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-12: sngags rgyal las la brtson par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-13: de bzhin sems can tshogs la phan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-14: gzhon nu 'jam pa'i dbyangs de ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-15: sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-16: de don yon tan nges grub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-17: 'jig rten khams kyi dge mi dge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-18: bag med ma bskul ma yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-19: bskul nas ngas ni chos bshad do; ;sems can ma lus phan nyid phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-20: sangs rgyas kyis ni bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-21: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-22: bshad cing ngas kyang bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-23: sangs rgyas gdung ni mi gcod phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-24: bdag gis kyang ni bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-25: sngags pa'i las rnams kun la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-26: kun mkhyen ye shes 'byung don du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-27: kun mkhyen ye shes rab 'jug la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-28: las rnams gcig tu bsngags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-29: 'jig rten sngon las bdag yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-30: de ni de ltar yongs su spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215a-31: de bas las rnams rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-0: tshe 'dir @215b dka' ba legs spyad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-1: las ldan tshe ni 'di la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-3: las ni 'di la'ang snang gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-5: de bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-6: las ni gcig pu rab tu bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-7: las de cho gar ldan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-9: sems can byis pa cho ga nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-11: de bas rnam pa kun gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-12: las ni gcig pu rab bsngags yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-13: cho ga las ni yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-14: sgrub pa pos ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-15: de bzhin cho ga nyams pa'i las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-16: shin tu yun ring dag gis 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-17: bsam gtan med par thar pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-18: thar pa med par bsam gtan med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-19: de bas bsam gtan thar pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-20: yang dag ldan pa byang chub brjod ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-21: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-22: las thams cad kyi bya ba'i don gyi le'u rab 'byams bco lnga pha rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-25: gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:215b-26: blo dang ldan pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rjes nga la dris nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-0: @216a *// cad bya ba'i las kyi le'u rab 'byams 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher sngar bstan pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-1: sngags kun don dang ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-2: rmi lam dge dang mi dge yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-3: des na zhar la 'di kun ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-4: sngags kyi bzlas pa bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-5: gnod sbyin bdag po yid dga' nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-6: thal sbyar spyi bor byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-7: ston la mgo bos phyag btsal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-8: de tshe tshig ni 'di skad zhus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-9: 'jig rten rjes su gzung don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-10: blo mchog rnams kyis gsungs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-11: bdag la'ang rjes su thugs brtse dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-12: sems can rnams ni bde don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-13: zlos pa'i sngags ni thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-14: rmi lam dge dang mi dge dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-15: sems can mchog dang tha ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-16: spyod pa'i yon tan rgya cher bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-17: bzang po'i 'gro ba'i skye gnas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-18: rgyu dang shes pa'i rnam pa spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-20: dge dang mi dge da ltar gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-21: thams cad kun 'gro'i shes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-22: kun mkhyen ye shes spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-23: snang med dmigs pa med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-24: spros med rab tu spros pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-25: rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-26: shis pa zhi ba bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-27: sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-28: blo mchog gis ni bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-29: khyad par du ni zlos pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216a-30: sngags rnams don dang ldan par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-0: las @216b dang las 'bras sems can gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-1: bya ba dus dang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-2: de bzhin snod dang gnas dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-3: cha byad rmi lam zhar la gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-4: gnod sbyin bdag pos thung mchog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa bdun pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-6: gang zhig skal bzang sangs rgyas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-7: sh'akya'i skye mchog bdun ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-8: sh'akya'i seng ge dgra las rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-9: 'di ni bdun par rab tu brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-10: kun gyi tha mar rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-12: brtson 'grus che zhing shes rab che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-13: thub pa mthu ni chen po thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-14: lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-15: byang chub sems dpa' phyag byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-16: rang gi gnas su 'dug gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-17: blo ldan de nas cang mi smra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-18: de nas 'jam dpal shes rab che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-19: de tshe thub pas dris pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-20: rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskul ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-21: thub mchog dam pa tha mal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-22: legs so bcom ldan rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-23: las dang shes pa rgya cher bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-24: btsas pa'i gza' ni gtso bo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-25: dge dang mi dge legs tshul bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-26: las dang shes pa rgyur bcas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-27: sems can mang po'i spyod pa gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-28: mchog dang tha ma'i spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-29: dge ba'i don dang ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-30: zlos pa grub pa'i mtshan ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-31: bsgrub bya sgrub min rnam par brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:216b-34: rgyal po khyad par can 'dod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-1: thams cad kun 'gro'i ye shes kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-2: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-3: rgyal ba'i sras kyis gsol btab nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-4: thub pa mchog gis gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-5: blo ldan ka la ping ka'i skad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-6: lha yi rnga sgra'i skad dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-7: brtson 'grus chen po tshangs pa'i sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-8: 'brug sgra yi ni sgra skad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-9: thub pa bdun pas tshigs bcad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-10: sangs rgyas gsung ni dag pas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-11: gzhon nu 'di ni dngos don khyab gyur cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-12: ma byung 'jig rten pham pa sgrub byed la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-13: 'gro ba kun la phan pa bde phyir ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-14: thar pa shes shing dag pa'i gnas su 'dug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-15: bden dang brtse dang bzod pa phan sems dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-16: gang zhig rtag tu byams dang sbyin la dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-17: de dag rtag tu grub pa thob par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-18: kye ma gzhan la'ang grub pa yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-19: rtag tu sngags mchog la ni dga' dad dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-20: bstan dang 'khor lo 'dzin dang 'jam mchog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-21: de ni bdud 'dul chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-22: 'khor lo 'dzin par 'dir ni rigs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-23: gang gi gsung ni bzang po yid 'ong zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-24: rtag tu byis pa'i skye bo rnam spangs yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-25: yid 'ong bzang po rnar ni snyan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-26: dga' skyed snyan pa dang ni rjes su mthun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217a-27: sems ni tshim byed bde ba rab tu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-0: 'jam zhes bya bar sangs rgyas @217b yang dag gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-1: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-2: gang gi mthu ni mkhyen par mi spyod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-3: de dag gi sras de bzhin sar zhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-4: 'jig rten 'das pa de bzhin bcu yi grangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-5: khyod kyang lha'i dbang phyug 'jig rten khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-6: thub bzang shes par nus pa ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-7: gzugs dang gzugs med de bzhin sa gnas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-8: 'dod ldan lha dang mi ni yid las skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-9: rnal 'byor grub pa thob dang 'jig rten na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-10: khyad par can kun de bzhin mi yi gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-11: de yi che ba gang gis shes gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-12: sems can gang de yod pa ma yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-13: khyod kyi che ba 'di ni yongs shes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-14: 'jam zhes bya bar rab shes sangs rgyas yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-15: 'jam dpal zhes byar yongs su brtags pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-16: khyod kyi ming ni sngon gyi rgyal bas mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-17: khyod kyi ming du 'di ltar brtags byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-18: 'das dang ma byon da ltar sangs rgyas kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-19: gzhan du ma yengs rtse gcig yid dag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-20: khyod kyi ming ni 'khor gyi nang du thos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-21: des ni 'di la shis dang zhi ba 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-22: srid mthar byang chub mchog ni khyad par thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-23: sngags rnams ma lus grub par 'gyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-24: 'gro ba'i skye gnas mchog ni rab thob cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-25: rtag tu chos mchog la ni yang dag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:217b-26: bgegs rnams rnam par spangs shing grub pa thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-2: byang chub shing dbang drung du myur du 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-3: song nas byang chub mchog ni thob par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-4: song nas sems can phan phyir der 'dug ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-5: sangs rgyas byang chub 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-6: de ltar rgyal ba'i gtso bos yon tan gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-7: 'jam dpal zhes ni khyod kyi ming dran pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-8: yon tan bsam mi khyab ces rgyal bas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-9: rgyal ba'i gtso bo sngar gshegs thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-10: rtag tu khyod kyi mthu ni bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-11: gzhon nu dag pa khyod kyis sngags rtogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-12: bskal pa grangs med rtag tu'ang ston mi nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-13: 'jam dpal khyod kyi sngags kyi spyod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-14: sangs rgyas ma lus dag gis rab tu bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-15: gzhon nu 'di ni thams cad kun tu 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-16: nga yi bstan la khyod ni mi mchog bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-17: dag pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i skye bo rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-18: 'dir ni ma lus mtha' dag zhi bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-19: khyod kyi sngags ni nam yang 'da' ma gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-20: khyod kyi sngags ni nam yang nyams ma gyur ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-21: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218a-22: tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u rab 'byams bcu drug pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams @218b cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218b-1: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer sngon po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218b-5: shel gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang snang bar byas shing 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag kyang snang bar mdzad nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218b-8: rgyu skar thams cad kyang yud tsam gyis zil gyis mnan te bkug par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:218b-9: bkug nas kyang rang rang gi gnas la yang dag par sbyar nas /
