K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-7: sems can kun la rnam par spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-8: sngags rnams bdag po dpal dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-9: gtsug tor las byung bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-10: snying rje'i dbang la brten nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-11: 'di ni yi ge gcig tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-12: chos kyi dbyings la brten nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-13: 'di ni sna tshogs gzugs la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-14: ji ltar sangs rgyas sku rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-15: skye bo rnams la sku gdung gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-16: 'jig rten gyis mchod zang zing bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-17: zang zing med pa'ang khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-18: dam chos sku gdung dag tu bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-19: 'jig rten zang zing med pa'i rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-20: sku ni zang zing bcas par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-21: thub pa'i zla ba zag pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-22: zang zing bcas dang zang zing med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-23: 'jig rten rgyur ni gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-24: chos kyi dbyings la brten nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-25: thugs rje'i dbang gis sems can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-27: sngags kyi tshul gyis bzhugs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-28: sna tshogs gzugs can thams cad mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-29: sa steng 'di la snang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-30: sems can rnams kyis sngags grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:238b-31: sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239a-2: rang gi cho gas 'dir bzlas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239a-3: sngags rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239a-5: 'di yi cho ga mdor bsdus nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239a-6: dus su yang ni bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239a-7: dus mthar thub mchog 'jig rten du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa nub pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239a-9: de yi dus su cho ga 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239a-10: sngags 'grub pas ni gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gzhan gyi las kyis sbyor ba rnam par 'jig par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239a-12: ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239a-13: sngags thams cad kyi bdag po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239a-14: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis don du gnyer ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239a-15: gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cho ga yi ge gcig pa sngar rgya cher bstan nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239a-16: yang mdor na re zhig dang po bzlas pas gang du gnas pa las dpag tshad lnga'i nad nas ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239a-17: grub pa thams cad kyang nus pa med par 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyi nus pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239a-18: sgrub pa po'i 'dod pa ma gtogs par lha thams cad kyang gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239b-0: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa bo gzhan rnams kyi grub pa 'phrog par byed cing gzhan gyi sbyor bas gsang sngags @239b bcad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239b-2: phur bus btab pa'ang thar bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239b-3: bdag gis gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod bar 'dod na rtsva ku sha sngon po chang pa gang blangs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas mtshon gyis bcad na rig pa gang gi phyir dmigs te bcad pa de gcod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239b-4: gzugs brnyan byas te 'dis seng ldeng gi phur pas snying la btab na gnad la bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239b-5: le brgan du btsos pa'i skud pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa bor na bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239b-6: kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te kha bkab pa byas na rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239b-7: mtshon chas snying dum bu gnyis su byas na gnyis su 'gas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239b-9: khrag gis btab pas bsku ba byas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239b-10: ka ra b'i ra'i lcug mas kun tu brdeg na gnod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239b-11: gzhan gyi rig pa thams cad la mngon spyod bya ba ni ci dgar byar rung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239b-12: sngar gsungs pa'i las thams cad la 'o mas khrus byas nas sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239b-13: mar gyi sbyin sreg gis ni thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing nyams rtas pa byas par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:239b-14: khu tshur bcings pas sngags thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240a-2: sngags sgrub par 'dod pas kyang 'di nyid kyis bcing ba byas te bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240a-3: cho ga gang sgrub par 'dod pas kyang de nyid 'dis bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240a-5: 'di nyid kyi sngags kyis spyan drang ba bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240a-6: yang slar gshegs su gsol bar bya ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240a-7: gang 'di nyid kyis srung bar byed pa thub par dka' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240a-8: gang gis sngags 'di ma grub bam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240a-9: lan ma thob na 'di nyid dang lhan cig tu bzlas brjod byas na myur du 'grub bam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240a-12: lan ma byin na de ring po mi thogs pa nyid du 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240a-16: mar gyis til la btags te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg dus gsum du zhag bdun byas pa de 'di'i dbang du 'gyur zhing gang brjod pa de'i las byed par 'gyur ba'am lan thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240a-17: lha dbang du bya bar 'dod na thang shing gi yam shing gis brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240a-18: klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na mngar gsum gyis sbyin sreg bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240a-20: dri za mo thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na shing mya ngan med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240a-21: bri yang ku'i yam shing ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-0: @240b ma tog gi sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-2: klu mo'i gdon rnams la ni ske tshes bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-3: rgyal po rnams la ni yungs kar gyis bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-4: bram ze rnams la ni me tog gis sbyin sreg bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-5: rje'u rigs la ni zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-8: dmangs rigs la ni phub ma'i rdul gyis bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-9: bud med la ni lan tshva'i sbyin sreg bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-10: gdol pa la ni mo na sran gre'u dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-11: dzam bu li ka'i sbyin sreg bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-12: bu ma gzhon nu ma la ni 'bras yos kyis sbyin sreg bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-13: sems can thams cad la ni mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-14: til gyis sbyin sreg byas na dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-15: thams cad du yang dus gsum du zhag bdun du bya'o zhes gsungs nas rgyal ba'i mchog cang mi gsung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-16: thub mchog bdun pas sngags 'di ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-17: de tshe lha yi tshogs la gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-18: 'jig rten chos shes grol ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-19: de tshe de ni chags bral zlos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-20: de tshe thub pa mchog gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-21: sangs rgyas sras po thu po lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-22: byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-23: 'jam dpal la ni de tshe gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-24: lha yi lha ni blo ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-25: mgon po 'khor lo'i bdag po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-26: cho ga 'di ni rgya che bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-27: gang gi bskal pa'i tshad du yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-28: rgyal bas kyang ni bshad mi nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-29: mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:240b-30: cho ga yi ni phyogs gcig tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241a-0: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa @241a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241a-2: de tshe de skad gsungs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241a-4: gtsang ma'i gnas kyi steng bzhugs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241a-5: sangs rgyas de la skul bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241a-6: gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241a-7: rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241a-8: dus mthar 'jigs pa'i dus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241a-9: mi rnams bde ba skyed pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241a-10: mthu chen sngags kyi rgyal po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241a-11: gzi brjid chen po 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241a-12: ras ris ji ltar grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241a-13: myur du ras ris 'grub par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241a-14: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241a-15: yi ge gcig pa 'khor los bsgyur ba 'byung ba'i le'u rab 'byams las bcu dgu pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241a-19: yi ge gcig pa 'khor los bsgyur ba rdzu 'phrul chen pos ras ris kyi cho gar 'gyur ba rgya che ba ni sngar bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241a-20: de ni dus kyi tha ma'i dus su sems can rnams brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur zhing shes rab chung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241b-0: yid gzhungs pa dman pa'i phyir ras ris kyi tshad kyi rgya che ba'i sbyor ba @241b sgrub pa nyams par 'gyur bas sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pas zlos pa pos ji ltar dngos grub mchog thob par 'gyur ba de ltar ngas mdor bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241b-1: sgrub pa mchog byed par 'dod pas ras ma nyams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241b-3: skra dang bral ba dag la tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'dir gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241b-4: chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241b-5: 'jig rten thams cad kyi bdag po skyes bu dam pa rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba rgyal ba'i mchog chos 'chad pa kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241b-9: steng du ni phreng ba 'dzin pa'i lha'i bu gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241b-10: 'og tu sgrub pa po de'i mdun du dus gsum du aa ga ru sreg cing 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241b-11: de nas las su bya ba ni dang po'i 'khor lo'i sgrub pa byed par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241b-12: lcags bzang po'i rang bzhin las rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241b-13: cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du aa ga ru'i dud pas bdug cing 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241b-14: tha mar zla ba nya ba la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas lag pas bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:241b-15: ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242a-0: de bzung na rig pa 'dzin pa'i @242a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242a-2: gang gis mthong ba de dang lhan cig nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242a-3: de nas gdugs sgrub par 'dod na gdugs kha dog sna tshogs pa sar pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242a-5: ka shi ka'i gos 'phyang ba de nyid kyi cho gas mgo la gdugs bzung ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242a-6: bzlas pa byas na rig pa rang nyid nye bar bzhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242a-7: 'di nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du aa ga ru'i dud pas bdugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242a-8: 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas la tha mar zla ba nya ba la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas lag pas bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242a-9: ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242a-10: de thogs na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242a-11: zla ba re re zhing zla ba nya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242a-12: cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed lnga'i bar gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242a-13: 'di grub pa tsam gyis chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242a-14: mngon par shes pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242a-16: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par dgyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242a-18: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rjes su bsngags pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi 'khor los bsgyur ba stong gi g-yog 'khor @242b dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242b-1: de nas gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba bsgrub par 'dod na gser dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242b-4: nor bu'i rang bzhin gyi dbyug pa khru gang tsam byas la; ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa byas nas de blangs na nam mkha' la 'gro ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242b-5: thams cad la chos ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242b-6: bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242b-7: ci ste bum pa bzang po bsgrub par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242b-8: gser gyi bum pa bzang po byas la 'bru thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242b-10: sman gyis yongs su bkang la ras dkar pos bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242b-11: de la sngags 'dis bsgrub par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242b-12: cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed gcig la brtsams na gnyis pa la 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242b-13: de la lag pa rab tu bcug na ci 'dod pa de thob cing mi zad par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242b-14: ci ste nor bu rin po che bsgrub par 'dod na gser gyi dbyig pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242b-16: shel gyi nor bu byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242b-17: gos 'phyang bar byas la cho ga 'di nyid kyis bsgrubs na gang bsams pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242b-19: mi'i nang du thogs pa med cing stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242b-21: ci ste bcom ldan 'das la bzlas pa bye ba byas na rang gi lus kyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:242b-22: lha'i lus thob cing bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243a-1: tor gyi rgyal po gdugs dkar po la sogs pa de yang 'dis bcom ldan 'das la 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na las rnams byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243a-2: de ltar thogs pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gzhan gyi rtog pa'i cho gas ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243a-3: bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'bum phrag bcu bzlas na thams cad la 'grub par 'gyur ba rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243a-4: sngags thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243a-5: ci ste rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod na tsandan dmar po la rdo rje rtse gcig pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243a-6: yang na lcags bzang po la byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243a-7: ba'i rnam lngas bkrus la yar gyi ngo'i bco lnga la ras ris kyi mdun du mchod pa chen po bya zhing mar gyi mar me brgya sbar la dri'i chus rdo rje bkrus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243a-9: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid phul nas gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i 'khor ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243a-11: gtsug tor gdugs dkar po'i sngags 'dis bsrung ba byas la dkyil 'khor gyi nang du grogs la'ang bsrung ba byas nas rdo rje lag pa g-yas pas blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243a-12: thun dang po 'das shing thun gnyis pa la nye bar 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243b-0: sems rtse gcig pas ji @243b srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243b-1: skabs 'dir rig pa 'dzin pa lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243b-4: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro; ;de dag rig pa 'dzin pa'i bstod pa byed cing khyim du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243b-5: rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243b-6: lus phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra zhing phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar mgyogs pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243b-7: skad cig gis 'og min gyi lha'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243b-9: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa byams pa mthong zhing chos nyan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243b-10: shi nas gang du 'dod par der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243b-11: gal te phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs drung du yang skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243b-12: ci ste ral gri bsgrub par 'dod na skyon med pa'i ral gri blangs nas nyin zhag gcig smyung bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243b-13: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas ji srid du rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243b-14: de grub na g-yog 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243b-15: skra rna cha gdub kor dang 'dra bar 'khyil ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243b-16: lo bcu drug pa'i cha byad can dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs med cing rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:243b-17: bar gyi bskal par 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244a-0: ci ste ldong ros bsgrub par @244a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244a-1: 'dod na dpa' bo'i tshong gis nyos te rgyal dang ldan pa'i dus su zhag gsum smyung ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244a-2: dge slong bzang po'i dge 'dun la bshos drangs nas bka' lung stsal bar bskul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244a-3: sgrub pa po la der rjes su gnang nas rang gi gnas su zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244a-4: mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas mar gyi mar me stong rab tu sbar nas zhag gsum smyung ba byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244a-5: sems can thams cad la byams pa bskyed nas bdag nyid phul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244a-6: ldong ros blangs nas ji srid grub pa rnam gsum thob pa de srid du bzlas par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244a-9: 'bar bas sngar gang bsams pa nyid du grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244a-10: dro bar gyur pas dpral bar thig le byas na lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244a-14: sha za la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244a-15: dzambu'i gling na gnas pa'i sems can bran du 'gyur zhing gang cung zad thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro; ;lo stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244a-16: du ba 'thul ba la ni dpral bar thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244a-17: gal te 'dod na lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244a-18: skad cig thang cig yud tsam la snang zhing yang mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244b-0: mi snang ba thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhing lo sum stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur @244b ro; ;'bar bas ni rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244b-1: g-yog 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244b-2: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244b-3: lha gzhon nu'i lus su 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyis kyang mi thub par 'gyur na rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te bskal par yang gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244b-4: dus byas nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244b-5: ci ste mdung rtse gsum bsgrub par 'dod na lcags bzang po las byas pa'i mdung rtse gsum pa byas te lo'i bar du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244b-6: de nas bye ma'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten khru gang tsam gyi tshad byas te de la mchod pa chen po bya zhing gtor ma rgya chen po btang la lag pa g-yas pas mdung rtse gsum pa blangs la skyil mo krung bcas nas ji srid du spros pa na 'od zer stong byung ba de'i bar du bzlas pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244b-7: skabs 'dir dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244b-8: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244b-9: de nas de thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas gang dag gis mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244b-10: gang mthong ba de dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244b-11: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mig gsum par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:244b-12: dbang phyug chen po gnyis pa dang 'dra ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245a-1: cad kyis phyag byas shing bskal pa chen por gnas pa 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245a-2: bltas pa tsam gyis gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245a-3: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang gis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur na rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245a-4: shi 'phos nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245a-5: ci ste ro langs bsgrub par 'dod na yan lag rma med pa'i skyes bu'i ro blangs te seng ldeng gi phur pa bzhis btab la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245a-6: brang gi steng du rin po che'i phye mas gtor cing mchod na de'i lce'i rtse mo la nor bu rin po che snang bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245a-7: de blangs na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245a-8: mtshon gang dag yid la bsams pa tsam gyis de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245a-9: 'od dpag tshad brgya tsam du snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245a-10: 'dod na dus byed par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245a-11: gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu yang rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245a-13: shi 'phos nas kyang dri ma med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245a-14: ro langs gnyis pa sgrub pa ni rma med pa'i lus kyi ro blangs te rgya shug gi shing gi phur bus btab la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245b-0: de'i khar lcags kyi phye mas gtor zhing byin na de'i @245b lce 'byin par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245b-1: de bcad na g-yog 'khor brgya dang bcas te nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245b-2: bar gyi bskal par gnas par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245b-3: ri rab kyi rtse mor rtse zhing dga' bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245b-4: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe phyogs gcig gi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245b-5: ci ste lcags kyu bsgrub par 'dod na rtsva ku sha'i rang bzhin gyi lcags kyu byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245b-6: thab mo pa mdog nag po'i lag pa'i mthil gyis ba'i rnam lngas bkrus te mtshan mo gcig smyung ba byas nas lcags kyu khru gang gi tshad du byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245b-7: mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas phyag na rdo rje la mar gyi mar me brgya sbar bar bya'o; ;rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245b-8: bdag nyid la gdugs dkar pos bsrung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245b-9: gzi brjid phung pos ni dkyil 'khor bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245b-10: phur bu la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas te phyogs bzhir gtor la phur bus btab na 'og tu bcing ba byas shing gnas yongs su gzung ba byas par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245b-11: de nas thun gnyis pa la rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis skyil mo krung bcas la lcags kyu la me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245b-13: bdug pas mchod na de bsrung ba byas pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:245b-15: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag btsal nas skabs 'dir lcags kyu lag pas bzung nas ji srid du dmyal ba'i sems can rnams 'tshe ba nye bar zhi ba'i bar du bzlas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246a-1: chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246a-2: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'gro ba la thogs pa med pa lcags kyu lag na thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246a-5: gnod sbyin la sogs pa yang thag ring po nyid nas mthong na phyag 'tshal bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246a-7: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe phyag na rdo rje gnas su 'gro zhing phyag na rdo rje mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246a-8: gal te ras ris sgrub par gyur na de 'bar ba na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246a-9: cho ga gang bsgrub par 'dod kyang de'i sngags kyi ming bzung la 'bum bzla zhing de nas nub gcig smyung ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246a-10: mchod pa rgya chen po byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246a-11: shing aarga'i me rab tu sbar te til dag la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246a-12: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na sbyin sreg gi mthar 'ongs nas nor gang 'dod pa de steng bar 'gyur zhing mdag gzhug pa dbang du byed pa bzhin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246a-13: ci ste dbang phyug chen po dbang du byed par 'dod na dbang phyug chen po la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246a-14: lho phyogs su yud tsam gyis shing aarga'i me rab tu sbar la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas pa na ha ha zhes pa'i sgra byung bar gyur na 'jigs par mi bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246b-1: bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246b-2: dbang phyug chen po'i rig pa thams cad bdag la grub par gyur cig ces smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246b-3: mchog gang 'dod pa de ster bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246b-4: de bzhin du gyur cig ces byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246b-6: tshangs pa la sogs pa yang 'gug par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246b-7: mchog gang 'dod pa de yang 'di bzhin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246b-8: cho ga 'di bzhin du byas la legs par bsrung ba yang bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246b-9: ci ste gnod sbyin mo dgug par 'dod na de'i ming bzung la zhag bdun du shing mya ngan med kyi me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na 'ong zhing mchog ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246b-12: chung ma gang 'dod pa de'i cha byad du nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246b-13: ci ste mi 'ong na mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246b-14: klu mo dbang du byed par 'dod na klu shing gi me tog gis cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246b-15: srin mo dgug par 'dod na zla ba gsum du zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246b-17: sbyin sreg gi mthar zhag gcig smyung ba byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:246b-18: bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing gnod sbyin la gtor ma chan rnams sbyin par byas shing gnod sbyin dgug par bya'o zhes yid la byed cing aa mra'i shing gi yam shing zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247a-0: mar gyi btags pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na skabs @247a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247a-1: 'dir lus ngan po la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin 'ong bar 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247a-2: de dag la shing aarga'i me tog gi mchod yon byin na de dag ci zhig bya zhes smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247a-3: des brjod par bya ba ni nyin re zhing gnod sbyin lung bzhin du byed pa dgos so zhes brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247a-4: des gnod sbyin re re ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247a-5: des lung bsgo bar bya ba ni dpag tshad brgya nas bud med rnams 'dir 'ong bar gyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247a-6: tho rangs de nyid du khyer cig ces pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247a-7: 'khor brgya la yang 'bras chen byin cig ces brjod na; rgyab tu khur nas gang du 'dod pa der 'gro zhing khyer bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247a-8: lung stsal ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247a-9: ci ste phyag na rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod na bzhi 'gyur dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247a-10: bdun 'gyur gyi sngon du bsnyen pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247a-11: cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed po ma lus pa la rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas la ji srid zla ba nya ba'i bar du ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247a-12: zla ba nya ba'i par du mchod pa byas la dge slong gi dge 'dun khyad par can dag bshos gsol nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247a-13: 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin la rjes su yi rang bar byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247a-14: de nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas dang po'i thun 'das te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247a-15: gnyis pa'i thun la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247b-0: sems rtse gcig pas rdo rje 'dzin blta bar bya'o zhes sems la kun @247b tu brtags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247b-1: gu gul gyi ril bu rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam gyis mtshan mo thun gcig tu sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yul bskyod par 'gyur zhing sa 'gul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247b-3: sprin gyi sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247b-4: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247b-5: skabs 'dir bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rig pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247b-6: rig pa mchog la sogs pa'i rig pa'i rgyal pos yongs su bskor ba byon par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247b-11: mi'am cis byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bskor ba byon par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247b-12: de'i mod la dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi shin tu drag pa'i tshor ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247b-13: dri'i chus mchod yon dbul zhing phyag btsal te 'dug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247b-14: de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs pa ni mchog ci zhig sbyin par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247b-15: rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247b-19: gang 'dod pa de nyid bcom ldan 'das las thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247b-20: gang 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247b-21: rig pa 'dzin ba thams cad kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba rdo rje'i sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:247b-22: phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248a-1: mchan ma thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248a-2: bskal pa chen por gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248a-3: gang gi tshe 'dzin pa de'i rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248a-4: rig pa 'dzin pa gzhan dag gi yang cho ga 'di bzhin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248a-5: mdor na phyag na rdo rje'i cho ga gang yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248a-6: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi cho ga gang yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i cho ga gang yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248a-8: tshangs pa'i cho ga gang yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248a-9: dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga gang yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248a-11: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa gang yin pa de dag kyang 'di nyid kyis sgrub pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248a-12: sngags gang gis sgrub pa byas kyang ma grub pa ni 'dis lus la bzlas pa byas na nub bdun gyis nges par mthong ba sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248a-13: ci ste mi sbyin na ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248a-14: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i mdun du gal te zlos pa byed na nub bdun gyi nang du mthong ba sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248a-15: gal te sbyin par mi byed na mgo tshal pa bdun phrag gsum du 'gas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248a-17: nyi ma gzas zin pa na mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-0: ldong ros la sogs pa bsgrub par @248b bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-1: ci ste rdzas rnams bsgrub par 'dod na ldong ros blangs te mi'i 'o ma dang sbyar ba byas la ril bu lngar bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-2: aa ga ru'i snod kha sbyar gyi nang du bcug cing yungs kar dang lhan cig bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-4: nyi ma gzas 'dzin pa'i dus su gtor ma'i cho ga byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-5: gang gi tshe yungs kar tsi ti tsi ti zhes sgra 'don pa de'i tshe grub pa dang po yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-6: skye bo thams cad dbang du 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-7: de'i tshe 'di thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-8: gang smras pa de thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-9: ci ste du ba 'thul bar byed na mi snang bar byed pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-10: bar gyi bskal par 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-11: gang gi tshe 'bar bar gyur pa de'i tshe ni lha gzhon nu'i gzugs su 'gyur zhing nyi ma 'char ka'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-12: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-14: de bzhin du gi wang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-15: ba bla la sogs pa la'ang bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-16: ci ste mig sman bsgrub par 'dod na lig bu mig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-19: tsandan dag gcig tu byas te zangs ma'i snod du bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-20: zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:248b-21: des mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249a-0: mi snang bar byed pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur @249a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249a-1: ro; ;ci ste ral gri bsgrub par 'dod na ral gri ma nyams pa blangs la mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249a-2: bcu bzhi la ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249a-3: gtor ma btang zhing bsrung ba byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249a-4: ral gri lag pa g-yas pas bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249a-6: 'bar ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na gal te 'od 'phro na ni rig pa 'dzin pa gcig pur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249a-7: 'bar bas ni de rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249a-9: pha rol gnon pa thogs pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249a-11: gang mthong ba de dang lhan cig nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249a-12: ci ste rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod na lcags bzang po'i rang bzhin las rdo rje bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249a-13: sor bcu drug pa rtse mo gnyis ka'ang rtse gsum pa tsandan dmar pos byugs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249a-14: cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed kyi tshes nas brtsams nas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te bzlas pa bya zhing tshes nas nyi ma re re zhing re res bskyed pa'i dge slong dag la bshos drang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249a-15: tha mar nub gsum smyung ba byas la sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du ras ris rab tu bzhag cing mchod pa rgya chen po byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249a-16: mar gyi mar me brgya rab tu sbar zhing ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249b-0: lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje @249b bzung la ji srid 'bar ba de'i bar du bzlas pa bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249b-1: de bzung na de 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249b-2: rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249b-3: phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249b-6: lus zhig nas phyag na rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249b-7: de bzhin du mdung rtse dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249b-10: mdung la sogs pa mtshon thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249b-13: mchod phyir thogs la sogs pa gzhan gyi cho ga'i bya bas bsgrub par bya zhing thams cad kyang grub pa rnam pa gsum yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249b-14: zhi ba byed par 'dod pa la padma'i rnam pa 'dra ba'i thab khung byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249b-15: mchod sbyin la 'os pa'i yan lag gis me rab tu sbar la blugs gzar gyis zas mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249b-18: mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad zhag gsum byas na bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249b-20: zhag bdun gyis ni grong ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249b-21: grong khyer gyi 'chi ba mang po'i nye bar 'tshe ba zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249b-22: shing sha ma'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249b-24: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:249b-25: yang na shing au dum b'a ra'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250a-0: mar gyis btags ba'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyang @250a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250a-2: char mi 'bab pa la ni mngar gsum gyis sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du mchog tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250a-3: slong mo'i zas za zhing cho 'phrul chen po'i zla phyed kyi zla ba nya'i bar du nub gsum smyung ba byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250a-4: zla ba gzas zin pa na ba nag mo'i 'o ma lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags te 'thungs na bcud kyis len gyi yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250a-5: rtsva d'ur ba'i 'jag ma la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250a-7: mar gyis btags pas stong rtsa brgyad nub bcu'i bar du sbyin sreg byas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu zhi zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250a-9: dung la sogs pa la mngon par bsngags na mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250a-10: thos pas pha rol gyi sde dpung gis mi g-yo bar byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250a-11: bum pa gsar pa 'bru thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250a-12: spos chus bkang ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pas log 'dren gyis gtses shing zin pa bkrus te dbang bskur na dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250a-13: 'dis dbang bskur na sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250a-15: gdon gyis las rnams kyang byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250a-16: rma bya'i mjug ma la lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na dug thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250b-1: gzer thabs la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250b-2: srung ba'i skud pas ni nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250b-3: phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags kyis seng ldeng gi yam shing la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250b-5: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na lha ma yin gyi sngags 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250b-6: dus gsum du nyin mtshan nyi shu rtsa gcig la 'bras thug po che la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250b-8: mar gyi btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na longs spyod thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250b-9: lha dbang du bya bar 'dod na aa ga ru'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250b-11: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg dus gsum du nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la stong rtsa brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250b-12: 'bras thug po che la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250b-14: mar gyis btags pa gcig tu byas pas sbyin sreg byas na zas mi zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250b-15: gnod sbyin dbang du byed na gu gul gyi ril bu la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250b-17: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250b-18: shing mya ngan med kyi yam shing gis ni gnod sbyin mo rnams la bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250b-19: klu rnams la ni klu shing gi me tog gis bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250b-20: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje la ni aa ga ru'i yam shing gis bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:250b-21: rig pa 'dzin pa la ni po son cha'i shing gi yam shing gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251a-0: sa ga ru'i yam shing la du @251a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251a-1: ru ska'i 'bru mar gyis btags pas ni dri za la sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251a-2: yi dvags rnams ni bil ba'i shing gi yam shing gi so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251a-3: mi 'am ci rnams la ni sra rtsi pog gi sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251a-4: log 'dren thams cad la ni zhag bdun du sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251a-5: rgyal po'i bu la ni yungs kar til mar gyis btags pa dus gsum du zhag bdun la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing nyi ma la mngon du phyogs nas bzlas brjod 'bum byas na sdig pa thams cad las rab tu grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251a-6: rig pa thams cad tshim par byed par 'dod na ba gcin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251a-7: nas kyi kha zas za zhing rtsva au shi ra las gzugs brnyan byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251a-8: me tog dkar pos mchod cing 'o ma brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas nas 'o mas khrus byas te bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251a-9: aa ga ru'i dud pas bdugs na tshim zhing rgyas par byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251a-10: lan gcig bzlas pas bdag bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251a-11: lan gnyis bzlas pas gzhan bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251a-12: lan gsum bzlas pa byas pas rdzas bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251b-0: phur bus btab pa rnams la rtas par byed par 'dod na sman au shi ra las gzugs @251b brnyan du byas te me tog dkar pos mchod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251b-1: 'dis gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i ras ris kyi mdun du yungs kar gyi rgyal po la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251b-3: mar gyis btags la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251b-4: rig pa nye bar dmigs nas phur bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251b-5: ji srid du bzlas kyang rig pa 'bras bu med par shes na gi wang gis gro ga la bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251b-6: gro ga de la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251b-7: bcom ldan 'das 'di dang lhan cig stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la ku sha'i stan de nyid du gnyid log na rmi lam du 'ongs te 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251b-8: ci ste me tog padma bsgrub par 'dod na tsandan dmar po las padma byas te mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas zhag gsum smyung ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251b-9: padma lag pa g-yas pas bzung la ji srid 'bar ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na g-yog 'khor nyi shu dang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251b-10: rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251b-12: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251b-13: ci ste rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod na grog mkhar gyi sa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:251b-14: bye ma bsres nas rdo rje byas la bslangs pa'i kha zas kyis 'tsho zhing mi smra ba'i dka' thub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252a-1: cing rdo rje bzung ste myur du bzlas pa 'bum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252a-2: rdo rje ni rtse gcig bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252a-3: rdo rje de yungs kar gyi nang du gzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252a-4: yungs kar de ji srid du tsi ti'i tsi ti'i sgra sgrogs ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252a-5: rdo rje de blangs nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252a-6: ri'i rtse mo yang phye mar byed la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252a-7: klu'i shing yang skems par byed cing chu bo yang rgyun phyogs las zlog par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252a-9: dug rnams dug med par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252a-10: srog chags thams cad rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252a-14: shing rta la sogs pa yang rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252a-15: de la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed par 'di nyid rtse gsum pa'i rdo rjes sgrub par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252a-16: gtsug spyod kyis kyang mngon sum du bgegs byed par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252a-17: 'di'i cho gas rtag tu bzlas pa byed pa'i dus su sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi sngags kyis thog ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252a-18: tha mar lan re re bzlas pa byas na de dag zhi ba nyid du 'gyur zhing grub pa yang mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252a-19: de nas rgya mtsho chen por 'bab pa'i chu bo la yi ge gcig pas padma 'bum dor na dpal rang 'ongs nas mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252a-20: rgyal srid kyang sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252b-0: ci ste 'bru gcig pa dang bcas @252b pa'i padma 'bum phrag gsum dor nas kun la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252b-1: lnga 'bum bzlas na dzambu'i gling gi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252b-2: sa 'og tu 'jug pa'i sgor rkang pa bzhag ste 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'khrul 'khor thams cad bcom nas dogs pa med par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252b-3: zhugs nas kyang bcud kyis len thams cad 'byin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252b-4: ci ste de nyid du 'dug na'ang khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo'i 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252b-5: ci ste 'khor lo nang du byung na'ang sngags dran pa tsam gyis thal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252b-6: bsams pa tsam gyis phyir gso bar yang nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252b-7: nam yang phyis rab tu 'jug par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252b-9: de'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog la lan gcig bzlas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthe bo'i drung du gzhag pa byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252b-11: ji tsam na zhabs kyi mthe bong nas 'od zer byung nas sgrub pa po de'i lus la zhugs par gyur gyi bar du byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252b-12: de'i mod kho na la skra 'khyil zhing 'khor dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252b-13: 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro zhing rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:252b-14: bskal par yang gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253a-0: de nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su ras ris nub phyogs su bstan te bzhag la klu shing gis me rab tu spar nas @253a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253a-1: rgya mtsho la dmigs nas klu shing gi me tog gis sbyin sreg 'bum byas na rgya mtsho'i rlabs 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253a-2: de ni grub pa'i mtshan ma yin pas 'jigs par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253a-3: ji srid rgya mtsho las bram ze'i gzugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253a-4: bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smra ba na khyod nga'i dbang du gyis shig ces bya bar smra bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253a-5: de nas gang ci bsgo ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253a-6: sa la padma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253a-7: de'i steng du 'dug nas brgya phrag stong bzlas pa byas na padma de sa las 'phags nas g-yog 'khor stong dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253a-8: bskal pa chen por gnas pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253a-9: lam gcod par yang mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253a-10: 'od dpag tshad lngar snang bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253a-11: cho 'phrul chen po'i zla ba phyed la sna ma'i me tog dang ldan pa re res bzlas shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi steng du 'bum phrag gcig phul na ji srid gtsug tor nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253a-13: sgrub pa po'i lus la zhugs kyi bar du byas na de'i mod kho na la mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253a-14: 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253b-0: bcom ldan 'das @253b 'di nyid dang lhan cig gal te rig pa zlo bar byed na de nges par 'ong par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253b-1: mngon sum du bzlas na yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253b-2: gal te 'ong bar mi byed na de'i mgo 'gas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253b-4: yi ge gcig pa 'di ni gzhan ci zhig yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253b-5: gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'di nyid mngon sum yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253b-6: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253b-7: rig pa thams cad kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253b-9: gzi brjid phung po la sogs pa ni 'di'i g-yog 'khor yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253b-10: gtsug tor gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253b-11: cho ga thams cad 'di nyid la sbyar bar bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253b-12: gtsug tor gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang 'di bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253b-13: cho ga thams cad kyis kyang 'di bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253b-14: dngos grub dam pa 'dod pas kyang gnas ma yin par sbyar bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253b-15: gal te sbyor bar byed na grub pa dam par 'gyur ba ma yin zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253b-16: mdor na lha thams cad kyang 'dis 'gugs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:253b-17: de nas gter 'byin par 'dod na gang du gter yod pa der song la rtsa ba mi gnag ba'i bum pa blangs nas dri zhim po thams cad kyi lde gus byugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254a-0: stong rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas gal te gter @254a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254a-1: yod na sa de rang bye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254a-2: gal te gter de mi gang tsam na yod na chus gtor la khru gang tsam brkos la blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254a-3: ci ste seng ge bsgrub par 'dod na grog mkhar gyi sa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254a-4: gi wang gi lde gus bsres pa'i gong bu las byas nas bzhag ste mchod pa rgya chen po byas la ji srid 'gul ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254a-6: rgyab tu zhon na rna cha gdub kor dang 'dra zhing 'khyil pa'i skra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254a-7: bdag dang bcas pa'i 'khor lnga bcu dang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254a-8: tshangs pa ji lta bar lo stong phrag dgur 'tsho bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254a-9: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254a-10: de bzhin du glang po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254a-12: gang gi tshe seng ge seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa de'i tshe lha rnams stan las sa la ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254a-13: padma'i mtshor phyin nas padma 'bum gyis mchod nas kun gyi rgyal thabs thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254a-14: shing ka ra b'i ra'i me tog kha ma 'bus pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na rgyal po'i bu mo thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254b-0: sna ma'i me tog 'bum gyis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu bo la sngags dang bcas pas gtor na gang 'dod ba'i bu mo thob par 'gyur zhing grub pa mchog thams cad kyang 'grub @254b par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254b-1: gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba 'di'i sngags kyis ni de gang du 'ongs pa der dbang bo yang de la stan stobs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254b-2: lha'i rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang ring po nas mthong na 'jigs pas dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254b-3: lha rnams kyi rgyal po thams cad du yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254b-4: de ltar rgya cher bcom ldan 'das sh'akya seng ge mi mchog gis gsungs pa yin no ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254b-5: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254b-6: yi ge gcig pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i las kyi cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254b-7: ras ris bstan pa'i le'u rab 'byams las nyi shu pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254b-10: gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254b-11: de na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254b-16: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254b-18: bstan pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:254b-20: 'jig rten pa rnams kyis bsam pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa byed pa'i phyir nor bu rin po che lta bur gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255a-0: dus kyi tha ma'i dus de'i tshe @255a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag stongs ba na dam pa'i chos kyi tshul nub pa'i dus tshod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi mdzed yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255a-5: rgyud rnams kyi cho ga'i rgyal po ni thun mong du gyur cing gter du gyur par 'gyur ba yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255a-6: sems can thams cad kyi bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa byas na thob pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255a-9: rgyud rnams kyi 'di ni snying por gyur ba yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255a-11: khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po 'di ni mchog tu gyur ba yin no; ;yi ge gcig ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba 'di bzlas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255a-14: khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po gter du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255a-18: yi ge gcig pa sngon byung ba 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255a-20: 'das pa'i dus tshod du gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255b-0: ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i @255b dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255b-2: yang dag bar rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255b-8: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255b-12: gang gis dran ba tsam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255b-13: mtshan 'dzin pas kyang mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyang zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255b-14: gang gis mtshan thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can mang po nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur na sngags 'grub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255b-15: sngags zlos pa thams cad kyis kyang nges par tshe dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255b-16: ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la dang por dag gis kyang phyag byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255b-18: ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255b-19: de bzhin du de nas 'od dpag med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255b-20: rin chen tog la phyag bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:255b-21: de nas sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas nas ci 'dod ba'i sngags bzlas ba byas na myur du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi @256a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256a-1: mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256a-2: phyag 'tshal bas ni bsod nams chen po 'phel ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256a-3: de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad la yang phyag 'tshal bas na nges par byang chub la gzhol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256a-4: dge ba'i tshogs 'di yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i grangs su 'gro zhing de'i sngags kyang myur du 'grub pa stsol par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256a-7: ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang bo'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yi ge gcig pa'i sngags 'di gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256a-10: rgyud thams cad kyi mngon par 'dod pa; sngags thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256a-11: 'jam pa'i dbyangs khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po mchog tu gtsang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256a-13: 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256a-14: slob ma ma yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256a-15: chos dang mi ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256a-16: de bzhin du ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256a-17: bstan pa la ma dad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256a-22: bstan pa la nyes ba tshol ba la ni nam yang rab tu sbyar bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256a-23: rgyal ba'i sras la rab tu mi dang pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-1: rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-2: rjes su gzung ba mi bzod pa de la ni ngas sbyin par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-3: de la ni sngags grub pa mi snang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-4: dad cing zhi ba'i sems ldan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-5: sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-6: byang chub sems la rtag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-7: mchod dang rjes gzung de gtsor byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-9: cho ga 'dir ni yang dag bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-10: sngags chen yi ge gcig pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-11: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis nges par sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-13: re ba skyed byed stsol ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-14: sangs rgya kun gyi snying po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-15: sngags rnams ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-16: bdun cu rtsa drug bye ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-17: rang byung nyid kyis sngon gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-18: lus can sdig pas rmongs rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-19: sngags rnams dge ba'i don du yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-20: de bzhin gshegs rnams kun gyi sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-21: ston pa'i gzugs su yang dag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-22: de dag la 'di snying por gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-23: rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-24: yi ge gcig bor rtag par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-26: 'dir ni chos kyi mthar gnas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-27: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-28: chos kyi tshul la yang dag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-29: 'di ni yi ge gcig pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-30: sngags ni don rnams ma lus sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-31: rgyal po ma rungs zlog byed yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:256b-32: las ni sna tshogs byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-2: las ni rtsa brgyad stong po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-3: nges par yang ni byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-4: cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-5: phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-6: 'jam dpal gyi ni snying po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-7: yi ge ma dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-8: yi ge au dang rtag 'gro zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-10: tshe dang ye shes dpag med rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-11: dpang pos nges pa'i don du gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-12: 'jam pa'i dbyangs la sangs rgyas kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-13: dbang gi don du 'di rab sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-15: ston pa mya ngan 'das pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-16: cho ga mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-18: tshe ni dpag med ces bya bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-19: rnam par brtags par gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-20: der ni bcom ldan sangs rgyas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-21: chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-22: dpag med bskal par gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-23: tshe la dbang bar byin gyis brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-24: de nyid phyir na de mtshan gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-25: dpag med tshe dang ye shes des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-26: 'jig rten kun gyi rgyal po'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-28: des ni sngags mchog gtso 'di byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-29: sangs rgyas sras po blo dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-30: sras kyi gtso bo dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-31: rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs kyang che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-32: de nas sras po de nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-33: 'di ni kun tu bzang la sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257a-34: de nas sangs rgyas sras rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257b-0: de ni de bzhin @257b gshegs dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257b-1: sngags rnams kyis ni mchog gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257b-2: chos kyi rgyal pos gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257b-3: 'byung po rnams la phan don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257b-4: sngags rnams ma lus gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257b-5: tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257b-6: sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po tshe dpag tu med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257b-8: rin chen tog la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257b-9: de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum sngags bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257b-10: yi ge gcig po de gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257b-14: ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257b-15: gsungs ba ni sems can thams cad kyi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257b-18: 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257b-19: skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257b-20: ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo dag la gzigs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:257b-21: bstan pa nub pa'i dus tshod du mkhyen nas dus kyi tha ma la dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed ba'i ma rungs pa'i rgyal po bzlog pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258a-1: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi sras kyi gtso bo mthu chen po thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po la sbyin pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258a-2: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kun tu bzang po la byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po des kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des kyang sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i dbang gis snying gi gnas su rang gi lus la bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258a-5: ma 'ongs pa'i dus la bltos nas dus kyi tha ma bstan pa nub pa'i dus tshod la de bzhin gshegs pa'i tha ma bdag gis kyang bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258a-7: bstan pa 'jig pa'i dus su nga'i bstan pa yang dag par bsrung ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258a-8: 'di'i cho ga gzhan yang mdor bsdus nas brjod par bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258a-9: 'jam pa'i dbyangs gzhon nu nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258a-10: bdag nyid chen po'i cho ga rgya che ba 'di'i cho ga'i rgyal po'i dbang po brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258a-11: dang por re zhig ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te 'bum phrag sum cu bzlas pa byas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258a-12: 'o mas 'tsho zhing mi smras ba'i brtul zhugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-0: sngags gzhan la mi rten pa @258b dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-1: gzhan la mi sems pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-2: skyabs gsum yongs su blangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-3: byang chub tu sems bskyed ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-4: khrims lnga'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pas bzlas pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-6: des las rnams bya ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-7: dang por re zhig ras la ri mo bya ba ni ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas la tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-8: gtsang ma'i ras kyi dum bu gang yang rung ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-11: gur gum gyis chus gtor la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-12: gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su gtsang ba'i ri mo byed pa dkar gsum za zhing gos dkar po gyon pas zla ba nya ba'i bco lnga la nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su rnam par dag pa'i rgyu skar la nyi ma phyed pa'i bar du bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-13: de nas bri ba spangs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-14: de bzhin du nyin re zhing yang yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-15: dang por re zhig ras la tshe dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-17: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-18: ras khru bzhing khor yug tu tshe dpag tu med ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-22: rin po che margad kyis ras ris kyi 'og gi phyogs su mdzes bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:258b-23: de dag gi phyogs su rin po che'i zhal med khang mdzes ba'i rnam ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259a-0: @259a *// ba dan mdzes pa'i rnam par bsgreng ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259a-1: de'i dbus su tshe dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa kun nas 'od kyi phreng ba rab tu 'bar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259a-2: kha dog cung zad dmar zhing dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259a-3: g-yon phyogs su mthing shing gi rdo la bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob phyag g-yas na rnga yab thogs shing de bzhin gshegs pa la gtod pa'i lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259a-4: lag pa g-yon na skyur rtsi chen po'i shing thog thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259a-5: me tog pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259a-6: gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis lus brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259a-8: g-yas ngos su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po rin po che'i ri la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259a-9: lag pa g-yas pa na rnga yab thogs shing g-yob pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259a-10: lag pa g-yon pa na rin po che thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259a-11: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259a-12: rin po che'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259a-13: me tog pri yang ku ltar cung zad dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259a-14: ras sngon po g-yo ba dang ldan pas g-yogs pa; mu tig gi phreng ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259a-15: rin po ches mchod phyir thogs byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259a-16: khor yug rab tu 'bar bas 'brel ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-0: de'i g-yas ngos su 'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i @259b ril gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-2: zur phud lngas mgo legs par mdzes par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-3: byis pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-5: dar sngon po g-yo ba can mnabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-6: mu tig gi phreng ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-7: rin po che 'dzin cing 'dres pa'i mchod phyir thogs byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-8: de bzhin gshegs par song ba'i lta ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-9: cung zad bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-13: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-16: dbyibs 'dzin pa'i sgrub pa po me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-17: pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas yang dag par 'dug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-18: mgo mngon par btud pa ras ris kyi zur kyi mtha' ma'i phyogs su bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-20: g-yas phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis bri bar bya ba la s'a la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-21: rin chen tog khor yug tu kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-22: g-yon phyogs su gser thab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-23: 'od srung rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang dan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-24: me tog thams cad kyis gca' bkram [?] bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-25: ha cang mi ring ba na cho ga 'chad cing skyil mo krung gis bzhugs ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:259b-26: zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260a-1: me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260a-2: sprin gyi nang nas ro stong byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nam mkha' la lding ba spyan mdzes zhes bya ba mngon par bri bar bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260a-3: kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba dag ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260a-4: phyag g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260a-5: phyag g-yon pas chos gos kyi mtha' ma la 'dzin pa 'di ni tshe dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260a-6: ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal bo'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ras ris cho ga bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyi mchog 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260a-7: 'di ni gtsug tor gyi rgyal po gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba dang rab tu 'gran pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260a-9: stobs mtshungs pa 'di'i yon tan rgya che ba'i mthu ni bsam gyi mi khyab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260a-10: rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs che ba; mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260a-11: yi ge gcig pa la cho ga rgya cher bstan pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260a-12: ma bsgrubs kyang bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang las byed na bsgrubs pas lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-0: ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu phun sum @260b tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-2: yid kyis gang mngon par 'dod pa de ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-3: nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-4: de nyid bcom ldan 'das tshe dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-5: ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dbang pos byin gyis brlabs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi rgyal po zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-7: 'khor los bsgyur ba zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-8: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-9: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i snying po zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-10: yi ge gcig pa zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-11: mdor na 'di'i mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-12: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-13: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-15: sngon du spyod pa ma byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-16: khyim gyi rtsom pa thams cad la rab tu gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-17: bza' ba thams cad sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-19: grong gi chos la rab tu zhugs pa dag la'ang 'grub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-21: byang chub tu sems bskyed ba med pa ni ma gtogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-22: 'di dag la ni grub pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:260b-23: dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261a-2: 'di dag la yang las phra mo yang grub pa med na grub pa 'bring dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261a-3: rab la ni lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261a-6: spyod pa gtsor byed pa'i sgrub pa po la ni las stong rtsa brgyad kyi las phran tshogs la rab tu sbyar bas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261a-7: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261a-8: dang por re zhig lan gcig bzlas pas bdag bsrung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261a-9: lan gnyis bzlas pas gzhan bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261a-10: lan gsum bzlas pas srung ba dam par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261a-11: byang chub sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la rab tu gnas pas kyang yang dag par bskyod par mi nus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261a-12: de las gzhan pa'i sems can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261a-13: tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan bzhi bzlas nas rked par bcings na sa bon bsdams par 'gyur ba yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261a-14: rmi lam na yang 'di la sa bon 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261a-15: rang 'dod pa ni ma gtogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261a-17: mtshan mo gcig la gal te 'dod pa na nyi ma re re zhing bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261a-18: ci ste mi 'dod na thal ba la lan bdun sngags pa byas nas lte ba'i phyogs su bskus na zhag bdun phrag gsum du sa bon bsdams pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261a-19: lan lnga bzlas te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsgoms na gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-0: zla ba gzas @261b zin cing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dzin pa na shing aar ka'i me rab tu sbar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-1: ras ris mad kyang shar du mngon par bltas te mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag bcus sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-2: rgyal po'i pho brang dang nye ba chu bos bar ma bcad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-3: lha'i gnas su ma byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-4: phyogs gang du rgyal po gnas pa de dang nye bar sbyin sreg rab tu sbyar na tho rangs rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-5: gang smras pa de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-6: gal te dbang du ma gyur pa de'i tshe de'i sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-7: sems g-yeng ba thob par 'gyur na phyir yang bzlog par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-8: 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-9: gang de'i dus de nas brtsams nas rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-10: las de dag ni dad pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-11: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-12: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la ni mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-13: gal te byed na shin tu bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-14: gzhan dag la gnod pa byed pa ma rungs pa'i sems dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-15: drag po'i sems dang ldan pa rnams la ni bya ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-16: nyin re zhing yang mthong ba sbyin par byas na sems zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-17: gal te zhi bar ma gyur na phung khrol chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:261b-18: srog ni lhag ma tsam lus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262a-1: ba ni zla ba gzas zin gyi dus su shing pa la sha'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar te mar gyi sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad byas na tho rangs yul gyi bdag po'i rgyal po spyan drangs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262a-2: de dang lhan cig gros byas na bsam pa bden pa nye bar ston par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262a-3: de la bstan dag byas na zla ba drug gi nang du bsod nams stong yod pa'i grong ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262a-4: gal te mtshan phyed du sbyin sreg byas na zla ba gsum gyis ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262a-5: gal te thun thams cad kyi mtshan mo sbyin sreg byas na zla ba gcig gis thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262a-6: gal te zla gcig gi mtshan mo re re la sbyin sreg byas na yul thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262a-7: yang na yul dang 'dra ba'i grong ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262a-8: yang na gzhan cung zad nor yod pa la'ang dgra yod par mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262a-9: gal te dgra yod na'ang las rnam byas pa yin te zla ba gzas zin pa na shing aa pa margas me rab tu sbyar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262a-10: shing pa la sha'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262a-12: mar gyis btags pas bram ze'i skra la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262a-13: de'i tha mar shing bi tsu ma rda'i lo ma la ske tshe'i 'bru mar gyis brtags pa'i sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na tho rangs bram ze'i dgra zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262a-14: gal te rgyal po sdang bar gyur na las gzhan yang yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262b-0: zla ba gzas zin pa @262b la shing ji snyed pas me rab tu sbar la mar gyi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262b-1: sbyin sreg gi tha mar phyogs gang na rgyal po yod pa de phyogs su thal ba de gtor na de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262b-2: dus gang la longs spyod gang 'dod pa rgya che ba de dag gi grogs kyang byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262b-4: mang po rab tu ster bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262b-5: nges par zla ba drug gis don yod par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262b-6: de nas rigs bzhi las gang yang rung ba rtags gtso bo dang ldan pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262b-8: 'jig rten pa la dad pa dag sems 'khrug par gyur na phyogs gang na gnas pa der thal ba de gtor na yul gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262b-11: nye du la gnod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262b-12: de'i phyir gso ba ni 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas na sos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262b-13: yang na gza' bzhi po nyid kyi tshogs sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262b-16: dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262b-17: sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la gos gtsang ma bgos shing nyin zhag gcig smyung pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262b-18: srog chags med pa'i chus las bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262b-19: me tog dkar po dri zhim po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262b-20: gur gum dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:262b-21: ga bur gyi dud pas bdug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-0: gang du las la sbyar ba ni bram ze'i dgra la ni shing pa la shas @263a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-2: rgyal rigs kyi dgra la ni shing aa shvatvas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-3: rje'u rigs kyi dgra la ni shing seng ldeng gis bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-4: dmangs rigs kyi dgra la ni de las gzhan pa'i shing gis me rab tu sbar la de nyid kyi las bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-5: bram ze la ni shing pa la sha'i yam shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-6: rgyal rigs la ni aa shvattha'i yam shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-7: rje'u rigs la ni seng ldeng gi yam shing dang /
