K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-8: dmangs rigs la ni aa pa marga'i yam shing ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-9: de las gzhan ji snyed pas mar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-10: de bzhin du las gzhan yang bya ba ni rgyal po chen po la ni shing aa pa ri dzi ta'i rtsa ba'i yam shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-11: mar gyi sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-12: tha mar yang de nyid kyi thal bas gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-13: gang gi phyogs nas sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'ong ba de'i phyogs su gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i yi ge gcig pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas gtor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-14: yang na autpa la'i phyag rgya bcings na de 'jigs na ldog pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-15: dmag gi tshogs nyams par 'gyur ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-16: gzhan gang cung zad rnam par ltung ba chen por 'gyur ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-18: sems sdug bsngal bar gnas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-19: gang gis 'di'i ngag ldog par 'gyur ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263a-22: ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-0: gos la mngon par sngags te bgos @263b na skal pa bzang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-1: mig sman la mngon par sngags te mig la bskus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-3: gdong la lan bdun bsngags pa byas la khros pa'i gdong la bltas na zhi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-7: gzhan gang cung zad dri zhim pa la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas la rgyal po la byin na de bsnams pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-8: gzhan sems can gang la la mthong ba tsam gyis de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-9: yan lag thams cad na ba la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas pa byas la chu dron mos khrus byas na bde legs su gnas par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-10: las 'di rnams ni bya ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-11: sems can sdug bsngal ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-12: mgon med par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-14: bstan pa 'di'i brtul zhugs can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-15: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa la ni 'di lta bu'i las mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-16: bud med la yang las mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-17: de bzhin du byis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-18: rgan po dang nad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-22: skye gnas phan par skyes pa 'di dag la'ang mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-23: las 'di dag ni sems can chen po dag la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-24: dpa' zhing brkam chags bab tshol med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-25: phyogs chen por ni che ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:263b-26: mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab gtum la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-2: gzhan gyi nor ni 'phrog byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-3: sngags rnams kun dang sman rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-4: rnal 'byor ldan la ma dad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-5: spyos brtsam gdug pa'i sems ldan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-6: 'jig rten gyis smad rgyal po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-7: 'di dag la ni las sbyar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-8: chos dang ldan la rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-9: las rnams gzhan yang 'di skad brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-10: blo yis de ni yongs su spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-11: de nyid khros pas thal ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-12: bzlas pas phyogs su gtor byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-13: de rnams dgra ni rab khros dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-15: nges par skye bo de dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-16: yun ring nad kyis thebs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-17: de dag phyogs su 'chi ba mang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-18: 'go ba'i nad kyang rab tu snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-19: shin tu nyon mongs cher gyur kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-20: las rnams 'di dag bya min te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-21: der ni skye bo'i bdag po kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-22: zhag bdun gsum gyis nyams par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-23: las rnams brtsams nas sngon du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-24: bdun phrag gnyis la yang dag brtul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-25: bdun pa dang pos sems rnams g-yeng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-26: zhag bdun gnyis pas nad kyis 'debs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-28: de bas de ni yongs su spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-30: gnyis par phyogs su rnam par 'khyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-31: zhag bdun gsum par rnam par 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-32: de bas las 'di bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264a-33: sems can gdul bya'i don nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-1: sangs rgyas thugs ni dag pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-3: srog la gnod par byed pa'i las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-4: sangs rgyas kun gyis smad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-5: grub pa mchog ni rab 'dod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-6: zlos pas de dag bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-7: dmyal ba dag tu skye ba'i las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-8: 'di dag nyid la rab tu snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-10: 'di dag kho na bstan pa yin; ;las rnams sna tshogs bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-11: rkang gnyis mchog gis ji bzhin gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-12: rtag tu dkar las dkar ba 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-13: nag las nag pa rab tu smin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-15: 'dres pa dag tu rnam par smin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-16: de bzhin las 'di sna tshogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-17: de nyid sangs rgyas gzigs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-18: thugs rje can gyis gsungs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-19: de las zlos pa spang bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-20: nag dang 'dres pa'i las nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-21: dge byed dkar po bsten par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-23: srog gcod pas ni zlos pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-24: yang dang yang du dmyal bar 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-25: de bzhin de las log pa'i chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-26: 'tshe med las ni dam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-27: dge ba'i blos ni sngags rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-28: de bzhin mtho ris thar pa 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-29: legs byas las kyis thob pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-31: ji ltar chos dang chos min gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-32: thams cad mkhyen nyid spyod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:264b-33: zlos pa grub pa 'dod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-2: zlos pa dge la gnas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-4: dkar po'i las la gzhol byed la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-5: de yi thar ba mi ldog 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-7: de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-8: las rnams sna tshogs gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-9: sgrub pa rnams la bsdus don yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-10: ci 'dod las ni stong phrag brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-11: phra mo'i las ni byed pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-12: sgrub pa po ni mi 'grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-13: grub pa mchog ni mi 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-14: 'phad pas bzlas dang sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-16: cho ga mthong ba'i las kyi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-18: mchog dang tha ma par ma yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-19: las ni rnam pa gsum du bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-20: dka' thub can ni zlos mchog gis; ;de bzhin grub pa mchog thob 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-21: de bzhin bzlas pa bar ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-22: par ma'i las grub thob pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-23: de bzhin zlos pa tha mas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-24: tha ma'i las la yang dag brten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-25: grub pa phra mo thob par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-26: gzhan gyi grub pa thob ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-27: dus dang tshod dang bzlas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-28: sbyin sreg mthong bas bzhin grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-29: mchog gis mchog ni grub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-30: bar mas bar ma'i grub pa snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-31: tha mas tha ma'i las dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265a-32: phran tshegs grub pa thob pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265b-0: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde @265b snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265b-1: yi ge gcig pa rtsa ba'i rgyud 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying po'i cho ga rab 'byams las lo 'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so;;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265b-2: /de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265b-4: gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265b-7: khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga sgrub pa'i thabs la las thams cad don sgrub pa nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265b-8: 'di nyid kyi yi ge gcig pa'i snying po'i sngags sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265b-9: yi ge drug po ma'i mtha' can khyod kyis sngar bstan pa'i yi ge drug pa'i snying po'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265b-10: dang po na aom yod pa'i yi ge gcig pa'i ras ris dang po 'di nyid kyi cho gar 'gyur ba ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stongs shing rtsod pa'i dus tha mar phyin pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265b-13: 'jig rten skyob pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265b-16: dpung gnyen med pa na cho ga'i rgyal po 'di nyid skyob par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265b-19: dpung gnyen du gyur par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265b-20: dang por de zhig snga ma bzhin du ras ma nyams pa skra shad dang bral ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:265b-22: zhag bdun gsum gyi bar du tha ga pas btags pa kha tshar dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-1: gyi chus bsang gtor byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa padma'i gdan la bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-3: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gzigs pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-4: g-yas phyogs su nor bzang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-5: 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-6: 'jam dpal yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-8: lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-9: g-yon phyogs su kun tu bzang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-10: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-12: legs skyes kyang bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las shin tu chung bar 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-14: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-15: nor bzang ni lag na rnga yab thogs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-16: 'og tu ni sa'i lha mo rin po che'i za ma tog lag na thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-17: ro stod sa las byung ba 'drir bzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-18: steng du ni rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon nu gnyis phreng ba 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-19: sprin gyi nang nas char gtong ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-20: rig pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-21: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang lag na me tog thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la rnam par lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266a-25: ro stod bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la 'dud pa dang bcas pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-0: de 'di @266b lta bu'i ras ris sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du nub tu bstan te bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-1: 'jam dpal 'di'i yi ge gcig pa bzlas pa 'bum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-2: shing bzhin du mi smra ba'i dka' thub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-3: dus gsum du khrus byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-4: gos lan gsum brje ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-5: rtag tu gso sbyong byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-7: nas chan khyor gang tsam dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-10: zas kyang cha rnam pa bzhir byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-11: cha gcig ni dkon mchog gsum la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-13: gsum pa ni sems can thams cad la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-14: bzhi pa ni bdag nyid nye bar spyad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-15: mi dub pa'i lus kyis bcom ldan 'das yid la bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-16: sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i yid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-17: bdag nyid kyi don ci yang mi byed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-18: gzhan sems can thams cad kyi don 'dir bya'o zhes bsgoms nas bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-24: mar me dag kyang dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-25: khrus ni ras ris kyi grib mar mo [?] gzugs brtan la bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-26: dri ni 'og tu gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-28: bshos kyang rtag tu dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-29: de nyid du 'di dag la sngar mchod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-30: dang po dkon mchog gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-31: de'i 'og tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:266b-32: 'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-1: blo gros mi zad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-3: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-6: 'phags ma rma bya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-7: 'phags ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-8: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-12: mar me 'di dag thams cad la sngar mchod nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-13: phyis ras ris la mchod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-14: de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs 'ga' zhig tu sbrul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-18: log 'dren gyi gzugs grog mkhar gyis las byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-19: de dag gi lhag ma sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-20: sems kyis dran par bya ba ni til gyi tshigs ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-21: gu gul gyi tshigs ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-22: til las byas pa'i bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-26: skyu ru ra dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-29: 'khar ba'i snod rnams kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-30: ku sha'i khres la 'dug cing de nyid du gnas nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-32: dben pa'i gnas gzhan du ku sha stan du gding bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-33: ha cang btung ba mang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-34: ha cang bza' ba mang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-35: ha cang 'gro ba mang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267a-37: ha cang nyal ba spang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-0: dus gsum du sangs rgyas @267b rjes su dran par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-1: sa bon bsdam par yang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-2: rmi lam bzang po rnams gzhan la rab tu bstan par mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-4: de bzhin du mthar gyis ha cang mi myur bar yi ge gcig pa'i bzlas pa 'bum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-5: tha mar yang bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma bklag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-6: bzlas pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-7: yang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i zhal du bltas la tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-8: yi ge ma 'khrugs pas bzlas brjod bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-9: bgrang phreng la phyag byas te dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-10: cho ga 'dis sngon du bsnyen pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-11: gang du yid dge ba yod pa'i gnas dag tu ras ris de gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-12: ras ris kyi cho ga dang po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal tsandan dkar po las byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-15: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyag gcig na 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-16: phyag g-yas pa ma du lung ga'i 'bras bu 'dzin pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-17: de gtsang ba'i phyogs gcig tu nub phyogs su bstan la gzhag par byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-18: de'i mdun du me thab byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-19: las thams cad la zur bzhi pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-20: mtho do tsam gyi tshad du bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-21: 'og tu 'bru thams cad gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-22: de nas de'i steng du bya pa ni cho ga 'dis mi gsar pa bskye dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:267b-24: mya ngan med kyi yam shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-4: sbrang rtsi thams cad blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-5: zangs ma'i snod du gzhag par byas la stong rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas shing blugs gzar gyis sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-6: phyi nas nyin zhag gzhan la yar ngo'i tshes nas brtsams te las bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-7: shing aa shvat+tha'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar la du ba med par mthong na me spyan drang bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-8: a'a gatstsha ha ri bim ga le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-9: d'ipta dzi hva lo hi t'aksha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-10: de hi da d'a pa ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-11: sngags 'dis sreg blugs gsum dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa spyan drang bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-15: ku m'a ra bhu ta sarba satv'artha mu dya donyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-17: gandham bh'u panytsa pra ti grihna sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-18: gang sbyin par byed pa de sngags 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-19: byon na mchod yon dri zhim po'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-22: sreg blugs la lan bdun bzlas te lan gcig gtor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-23: de bzhin du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-24: 'bras thug po che'i chan gyis tshim par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-25: skabs 'dir nges par 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-26: tsandan gyi yam shing sor gnyis tsam gyi tshad kyis stong rtsa brgyad byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268a-27: me tog padma la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268b-0: mar gyis btags nas sbyin sreg stong rtsa @268b brgyad byas na nor rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268b-1: shing shri sha'i me'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar la til gyi sbyin sreg byas na nor gyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268b-2: rtag tu chus chu la sbyin sreg byas te nang par langs na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268b-6: mar gyis btags la sbyin sreg 'bum byas na grong bsod snyoms stong dang ldan pa thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268b-7: shing ba hu pu trika zhes bya bas sbyin sreg byas na bu mo gang 'dod pa rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268b-8: shing aa pa margas sbyin sreg byas na nad rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268b-9: 'o ma can gyi shing gis me rab tu sbar la til gyi sbyin sreg byas na gang sems par byed pa de thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268b-10: yul 'dod pas padma'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na yul rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268b-11: nang gi sbyin sreg 'bum byas na zas mi zad pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268b-13: me tog pri yang ku mar dang lhan cig sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268b-14: shing aar ka dang sna ma'i me tog gis chu la sbyin pa byas na zhag bdun gyis grong thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268b-15: sna ma'i me tog gi chu la me tog re re blangs te sbyin pa byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268b-16: lhag ma dkyil 'khor la bzhag na gang la snom du bcug pa de bsnams ba tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:268b-19: li shi'i me tog khar bcug ste bzlas pa byas na gang dang lhan cig gtam byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269a-0: @269a *// na le sham la stong rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas te khar bcug na khros pa la tshig gis dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269a-1: gtsug phud la 'di nyid kyi sngags kyis bcings na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269a-2: yid la rjes su dran na dgras mthong na yang khro ba med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269a-3: rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269a-4: tho rangs chen po nas langs nas gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su sna ma'i me tog dang ldan par chu la sbyin pa byas na tshig btsun par 'gyur ba'i blon por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269a-5: 'jigs pa yang dag par byung bar gyur na yid la byas pas 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269a-6: pha rol khros par gyur pa la'ang byams pa bsgoms nas rjes su dran zhing gdong la rnam par bltas na khro ba med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269a-7: dri zhim po'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na gang gi ched du byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269a-8: tho rangs lan bdun chu la bsngags te 'thungs na nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyang zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269a-9: lan bdun sngags pa'i chus gdong rab tu bkrus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269a-10: me tog la lan bdun sngags pas gzhan la byin na de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269a-11: 'bras thug po ches sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gcig byas na slob dpon nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269a-12: til gyi sbyin sreg gis ni yul gyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269b-0: padma'i @269b sbyin sreg stong byas na ti na ra stong thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269b-4: ga pur rnams dpa' bo'i nyo tshong gis nyos nas gcig tu byas la sbyin sreg byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269b-5: tshes lnga lnga zhing zla ba drug yongs su tshang bar byas na stong 'gyur thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269b-6: dri thams cad pa'i gzugs brnyan byas te mtshon rnon po so gcig pas skyes pa yin rkang pa g-yas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269b-7: bud med kyi ni rkang pa g-yon pa bcad cing sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269b-8: zhag bdun la dus gsum du dar du ra ka'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na ba rnams thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269b-9: arga'i me tog gis byas na 'bru rnams thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269b-10: shr'i sha'i me tog gis byas na rta rnams thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269b-11: shing mya ngan med kyis byas na gser thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269b-12: nad 'joms par byed pa'i me tog gis byas na gos rnams thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269b-14: gang 'dod pa de thams cad ni sna ma'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na byed par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269b-15: me tog ci 'dra ba'i kha dog gis chu la nyi ma shar ba'i dus su sbyin sreg byas na de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269b-16: kha dog 'dra ba'i gos thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:269b-17: mig sman la lan bdun bzlas pa byas te slong mo la 'gro na slong mo mi zad pa thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270a-0: rmi lam ngan pa mthong nas langs te bdag nyid kyis bzlas pa byas nas @270a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270a-1: yang nyal na rmi lam bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270a-2: de nas rgyal po dbang du byed par 'dod na de'i rkang pa'i rdul rnams blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270a-4: til dang bsres nas zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270a-5: rgyal mo dbang du byed par 'dod na lcam pa'i lo ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270a-7: sman b'a r'a hi rnams gcig tu byas te zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270a-8: blon po dbang du byed par 'dod na go bye dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270a-10: shu dag rnams kyis gzugs brnyan byas te zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270a-11: mdun na 'don dbang du byed par 'dod na spos pra ma tsa ri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270a-12: shu ti gcig tu byas te zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270a-13: bram ze rnams dbang du byed par 'dod na ni'o thug mar dang lhan cig pas zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270a-14: de nas rgyal rigs dbang du byed par 'dod na 'bras s'a lu'i chan mar dang ldan pas zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270a-15: rje'u rigs dbang du byed par 'dod na nas chan khyor gang bur ma dang ldan pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270a-16: zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270b-1: mar gyis sbyin sreg byas na dmangs rigs dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270b-2: thams cad gcig tu byas te sbyin sreg byas nas bzhi mdo'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270b-4: shing gcig pa dag tu gtor ma btang na nad pa de de las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270b-5: gdong la bltas te bzlas pa byas na nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270b-6: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gtsug phud la bcings na nad thams cad las yongs su grol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270b-7: nad thams cad la ni skud pa la mdud pa bya zhing gtsug phud bcing ba byas te bzlas pa byas na nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270b-8: nad kyis btab pa la ni bzlas pa tsam gyis yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270b-9: mgul pa'i nad la ni grog mkhar gyis la bzlas pa byas te lde gus byug pa byas na nad las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270b-10: mig gi nad la ni zar ma'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270b-11: ras ris kyi cho ga'i las gzhan yang sngar bstan pa'i cho gas ras ma nyams pa skra med pa la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'drir gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270b-12: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:270b-16: g-yas ngos su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271a-0: g-yon ngos su kun tu bzang po 'phags pa 'jam dpal las cung @271a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271a-2: ras ris de bzhag la bzlas pa bye ba byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271a-3: tsandan gyi yam shing la gur gum gyis btags pas sbyin sreg 'bum byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271a-4: sna ma'i me tog mar gyis btags pas sbyin sreg bye ba byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271a-5: gang gi tshad dang ldan pa'i padma'i tshogs kyis sbyin sreg byas pa de'i tshad kyi ti na ra'i tshogs rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271a-6: ji srid du bzlas pa de tsam gyi tshad dang ldan pa'i ti na ra ma blangs pa de ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271a-7: go phye'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na ti na ra stong sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271a-8: nad 'joms par byed pa'i 'bras bus sbyin sreg 'bum byas na nor bdag chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271a-9: gu gul gyi yam shing stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas na nor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271a-11: rtag tu til gyis sbyin sreg byas na 'bru rgyun mi 'chad par rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271a-12: ba lang gi lci ba las byung ba'i 'bras thug po che zho dang bcas pas sbyin sreg 'bum byas na ba stong thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271a-14: sho ma'i 'bras gcig tu byas te sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa'i bu mo rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271b-0: @271b sho ma'i lo mas sbyin sreg byas na 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271b-1: zar ma'i me tog la 'o mas btag pas sbyin sreg bya ba ni bram ze dbang du bya ba la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271b-2: shing ka ra b'i ra'i me tog la shing 'o ma can 'o ma med pas sbyin sreg bya ba ni rgyal rigs dang dbang du bya ba la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271b-3: dong ka'i me tog gis sbyin sreg bya ba ni rgyal po dbang du bya ba la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271b-4: bha du ra'i me tog gi sbyin sreg bya ba ni dmangs rigs dbang du bya ba la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271b-5: shing aarga'i me tog la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271b-7: mar gyis btags pas sbyin sreg 'bum byas na nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271b-8: 'di nyid kyi cho gas me tog dri zhim pa la lan 'bum bzlas te zhabs kyi drung du bzhag na rtag tu bde bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271b-9: shing aa shvatta'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar la sha ma'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na rgyu skar gyi gnod pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271b-10: gi wang la sngags mngon par bris te spyi bo la bcings nas g-yul du 'jug na mtshon gyis reg par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:271b-11: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i ras ris glang po che'i mtshog ma la bzhag ste dpung gi tshogs kyis sngon du btang na mthong ba tsam gyis gzhan gyi dpung 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272a-1: can gser gyi rma bya'i gdan la bzhugs pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272a-2: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags nas g-yul du zhugs na mthong ba nyid kyis gzhan gyi dpung 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272a-3: sna ma'i me tog la lan 'bum bzlas te zhabs drung du bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272a-4: de nyid ku sha bting ba'i stan byas na rmi lam du 'di la ji ltar 'dod pa ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272a-5: mar me stong la de bzhin du mar me re re la yang padma'i skud pa'i snying po byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272a-6: shing mngar gyis dkri ba byas la me rab tu sbar nas phul na nges par 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ji lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272a-7: ras ris kyi cho ga gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272a-9: dngul las gzhon nu'i gzugs byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272a-10: phyag g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272a-11: g-yon pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam 'dzin pa 'di lta bu sku gdung gi za ma tog mdun du bzhag la yi ge gcig pa'i bzlas pa 'bum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272a-12: mchod pa rnams ni nyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272a-13: zhabs g-yon pa'i mdun du bu mo la kha zas sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272a-16: glegs bam bklags par yang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272a-17: bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-0: me tog gsum gyis @272b mchod yon gsol te slar gshegs su gsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-1: cho ga snga ma bzhin du spyan drangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-3: padma'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-4: rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgyas ni spyan drang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-5: bkra shis ldan gyi phyag rgyas ni bzhugs su gsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-6: gang ba'i phyag rgyas ni mchod yon no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-7: rtags gcig pa'i phyag rgyas ni me tog dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-8: yid la re ba'i phyag rgyas ni mar me'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-9: g-yo ba'i phyag rgyas ni spos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-10: rma bya'i gdan gyi phyag rgyas ni dri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-11: srog shing gi phyag rgyas ni bshos so; ;cho ga 'di nyid kyis mtshan mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-12: nyin mo re re zhing ji srid bzlas pa rdzogs kyi bar du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-13: phyi nas ni las rnams bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-14: sna ma'i me tog gis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu bo la 'bum gyis gtor na yul thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-15: mtshan mo sna ma'i me tog gi tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du byas nas nyal na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor ba chos 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-16: gang gi don du byed pa de nyid kyi las bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-17: gso sbyong byas shing yar ngo'i tshes nas brtsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:272b-18: ga bur sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa'i spos kyis sbyin sreg byas na rgyal thabs thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273a-0: bzlas pa bye ba byas na 'jam dpal rang nyid @273a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273a-3: de dang lhan cig smra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273a-4: mngon sum du snang bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273a-5: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273a-6: ras ris kyi cho ga gsum pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273a-7: tsandan dmar po las byas pa'i gzhon nu'i gzugs can phyogs gcig na gnod sbyin dga' bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273a-8: phyogs gnyis pa na ni 'phrog ma shing mya ngan med kyi rtsa na 'dug pa de 'dra ba bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273a-11: ske tshe dang bsres pa'i tsandan dmar po'i gzugs brnyan byas nas bcad cing bcad cing sbyin sreg byas na gang gi ming gzung ba de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273a-12: shing au dum b'a ra'i 'bras bus gang gi ming bzung zhing sbyin sreg byas na de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273a-13: rgya shug gi 'bras bus sbyin sreg byas na gang gi ming bzung ba de dbang du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273a-14: khva dang 'dra ba'i shing au dum b'a ras sbyin sreg byas na gang gi ming bzung ba de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273a-15: shi nga sra ga ta gas sbyin sreg bya ba ni bram ze dbang du bya ba la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273a-16: padma'i rtsa bas ni rgyal rigs dbang du bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273a-17: autpa la'i rtsa bas sbyin sreg bya ba ni dmangs rigs dbang du bya ba la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273b-0: @273b sha kha ras sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad nyi ma bdun la dus gsum du byas na gang gi ming gis sbyin sreg byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273b-1: nim pa'i lo ma la yungs mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs kyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad zhag bdun la dus gsum du byas na gang gis ming gis byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273b-2: thams cad kyis sbyin sreg byas na thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273b-3: sman bri ha ta'i me tog gis sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gser rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273b-4: shing ka lanydza ri ka'i me tog la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na grong chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273b-5: pa ta la'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na 'bru mi zad pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273b-6: bil pa'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na gsar rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273b-9: mar gyis btags te sbyin sreg byas na rgol ba thams cad la lan 'debs nus par 'gyur ro; ;sman bram ha'i khu bcud mar dang ldan pa zangs ma'i snod du bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273b-10: bzlas pa khri rdzogs pa'i bar du bzlas nas de nas 'thungs na rgol ba thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:273b-11: shin tu zhe sdang ba la ni stong rtsa brgyad bong ba la mngon par sngags te khros pa'i mdun du bor na khro ba med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274a-0: @274a *// ras ris kyi cho ga bzhi pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274a-1: ras ma nyams pa sgra med pa la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274a-2: tshon ma 'dres pa dag gi 'phags pa 'jam dpal padma'i gdan la bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274a-3: g-yon phyogs su 'phags pa 'og dpag chen mo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274a-4: g-yas phyogs su 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzugs can ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274a-5: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274a-6: gos dkar po bgos pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274a-7: de'i 'og tu padma'i mtsho me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab pa na klu'i rgyal po gnyis ro stod chu'i nang nas byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274a-8: padma'i sdong bu la lag pas 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274a-9: 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyogs gcig tu bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274a-10: log 'dren gyi bgegs 'jigs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274a-12: spyan khro gnyer can du byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274a-13: phyogs gzhan du ri khrod ma lo ma gyon ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274a-15: dgra sta lag na thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274a-18: rma bya'i rgyab tu zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274a-19: sgrub pa po la srung bar byed pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274a-20: sgrub pa po yang padma'i phreng ba lag na thogs shing bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi zhal la rnam par blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274b-0: @274b steng du ni rnga yab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274b-1: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274b-2: rnga 'dzin pa'i lha'i bu rnams bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274b-3: ras ris de nub tu bstan te bzhag la sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du bzlas pa bye ba bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274b-4: bzlas pa'i tha mar me'i mchod pa chen po bya zhing bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklags pa bzlas pa stong phrag bcu 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i zhal la lta zhing bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274b-5: de nas ras ris 'gul bar gyur na rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274b-6: lha'i mig thob cing rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274b-7: 'khor los bsgyur ba chen por yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274b-8: bzlas shing bzlas na byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274b-9: de'i chos ston pa yang thos par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274b-10: ras ris de nyid kyi mdun du ba ser mo be'u yod pa'i mar khu blangs la zangs ma'i snod du bzhag nas ji srid du dro bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274b-12: rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na dro bar gyur pa na 'thungs na ni mchog tu yid gzhungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274b-14: du ba 'thul ba na 'thungs na ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:274b-15: rab tu 'bar ba na 'thungs na ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275a-1: phor so ma btang ba kha sbyar la shu dag sna ma'i me tog gis dkris pa bzhag la ji srid myu gu byung ba de'i bar du bzlas brjod bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275a-2: de zos na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275a-3: bzlas brjod gzhan bye ba byas na 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong zhing chos ston pa yang thos la de la dad par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275a-4: gser gyi padma 'dab ma brgyar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275a-5: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275a-6: ji srid 'bar gyi bar du bzlas pa byas na de blangs pa tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275a-7: gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275a-11: bil ba'i lo ma chu la bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275a-12: ji srid khu la khu la zhes bya ba'i sgra byed pa de srid du bzlas na de blangs pa tsam gyis sa la spyod pa'i srin po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275a-13: sha za rnams kyi bdag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275a-15: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa rma med cing ma 'dres pa'i ral gri blangs la ji srid sbrul gyi gdengs ka bzhin du byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275a-16: 'dug pa de srid du bzlas pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275a-17: de nas de blangs na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275a-18: bskal par tshe gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275b-0: gzhan gyis @275b mi thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275b-1: ldong ros lcags gsum gyis dkri bar byas te khar bcug la ji srid tsu lu tsu lu'i sgra 'byung ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na thub pa med par 'gyur ro; ;dgra thams cad 'joms par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275b-2: rigs thams cad dbang du byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275b-3: 'dod pa dbang du byed pa ni ma gtogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275b-4: shing sha mi las skyes pa'i shing aa shvatta'i snying po blangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275b-5: lcags gsum gyis dkri bar byas nas khar rab tu bcug na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275b-6: ji srid tsu lu tsu lu'i sgra 'byung ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275b-8: dngul gyi 'khor lo byas te lha ma yin gyi khung bu'i sgor bzhag la ji srid du 'khor los lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor bcad nas rab tu 'jug pa de'i bar du bzlas pa byas na de'i mod la lha ma yin gyi na chung rnams byung nas de dang lhan cig rab tu zhugs nas bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275b-9: lcags las byas pa'i mdung rtse gsum byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:275b-10: khung bu de dag gi sgor bzlas pa byed na der 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing; ji srid sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dang lhan cig 'dod pa de snyed dang lhan cig rab tu 'jug cing bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276a-2: ras ris kyi cho ga lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276a-3: shing aarga dkar po las mthe bong tsam gyi bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal byas la shing aarga'i me tog 'bum phul na blon po chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276a-4: shing ka ra b'i ra dkar po'i rtsa ba las mthe bong tsam byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276a-5: 'di nyid kyi me tog bye ba gcig phul na bka' la gtogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276a-6: shing ka ra h'a ta las mtho gang gi tshad tsam du byas la de'i me tog 'bum phul na dmag dpon thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276a-7: tsandan dkar po las mtho phyed tsam gyi bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276a-8: sna ma'i me tog 'bum phul na mdun na 'don thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276a-9: shing aa shvatta las sor gcig tsam gyi tshad du byas la rnyog pa med pa'i chus bum pa bkang pa phul na skye bo mang pos bkur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276a-10: dri thams cad las byas la me tog thams cad phul na gang 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276a-11: rtag tu yul ma ga dh'a'i yam shing ma nyams pas sbyin sreg byas na blon po skye bo mang pos bkur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276a-12: rtag tu bzlas pa byas na mtshams med pa lnga yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-0: @276b shi ba'i dus su yang 'jam dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-1: 'di la chos ston par yang mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-2: langs shing langs shing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na sems can thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-3: mig la yongs su bzlas na bdag po mthong zhing bka' drin stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-4: gang gis ched du las byas pa nyin zhag bdun gyis de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-5: grong gzhan du gnas pa la ni zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis so /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-6: yul gzhan la gnas pa la ni zla ba gnyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-7: gzhon nu'i bdag po'i cho gas yin gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-8: sngags gzhan gyi cho gas ma yin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-9: las ma lus par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-11: mngon spyod dbang du byed pa ni ma gtogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-12: cho ga drug pa 'di bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-13: dus kyi mtha' la sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-14: bsod nams chung la phan don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-15: thub pas sngon ni bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-16: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-17: bstan pa nub par gyur pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-18: dus ni mi bzad 'jigs pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-19: de tshe grub par 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-20: cho ga'i rgyal po bde byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-21: bdun pa 'dir ni bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-22: de tshe dus ni mi bzad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-23: cho ga 'di ni nga yis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:276b-24: sems can bsod nams chung ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-2: byang chub tshogs kyi rgyu don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-3: theg gsum lam la rab tu gzhol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-4: de yi dus su sems can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-5: thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-6: sred pas rmongs pa'i sems can dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-7: 'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis dkrugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-8: srid pa mthar ni gtug bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-9: de dag la bstan lam 'di yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-10: srid pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-11: dge ba'am dge ba'i las kyi rgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-12: grub dang sgrub dang de bzhin rdzas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-13: sngags dang rgyud ni nga yis bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-14: sgrub pa zlos pa rnams la 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-15: cho ga'i rgyal po bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-16: sems can rnams ni gdul don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-18: sh'akya seng ge mi yi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-19: thub pa mchog gis de gsungs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-20: de tshe dus kyi tha ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-21: grub pa don yod bstan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-22: sngags dang rgyud kyi stobs dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-23: brtson 'grus rgya che ldan bstan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-24: de tshe gnas gtsang lha tshogs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-25: rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-26: cho ga'i rgyal po rgya che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-27: 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-28: 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi bstan pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277a-29: grogs po de ni nga yis bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277b-0: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pa @277b po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277b-1: cho ga'i bya ba 'jam dpal gyi cho ga rab 'byams las le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277b-4: gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277b-6: khyod kyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277b-7: ras ris kyi cho ga bdun pa yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277b-8: gang gis dus kyi mtha' ma de la bsgrub par 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277b-9: de la don yod par 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277b-12: bde ba rnam par smin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277b-13: mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277b-14: ngan song thams cad las zlog par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277b-15: nges par byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa'i grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po gsungs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277b-17: yi ge drug pa 'gro ba drug las grol bar byed pa'i bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277b-21: srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277b-22: sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal las grol bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:277b-23: 'byung po thams cad kyis bzod par dka' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278a-1: thams cad kyis ma gos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278a-2: 'byung po thams cad kyis mi thub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278a-3: srid pa'i lam thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278a-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278a-5: ma rungs pa thams cad bzlog par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278a-6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278a-7: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278a-8: 'jam dpal gyi bstan pa la sngags thams cad kyi mchog de gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278a-9: aom b'a kye dam na ma:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278a-14: dus gsum du khrus byed cing gos lan gsum brje bas yi ge 'bum byas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278a-15: kha tshar gyi rtse mo ma bcad pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278a-16: tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis 'phags pa 'jam dpal padma'i gdan la chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278a-17: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278a-19: bla gos phrag bar gzar ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278a-20: g-yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag na padma bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278a-21: g-yas su ni 'phags pa kun tu bzang po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278b-0: steng du ni @278b rig pa 'dzin pa gnyis phreng ba thogs shing sprin gyi nang nas byung bar bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278b-1: 'og tu ni sgrub pa po lag na spos snod thogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278b-2: khor yug tu ni ri'i rtse mo'i 'og tu ni padma'i mtsho 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278b-3: sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278b-4: ras ris nub tu bstan te rab tu gzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278b-5: mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas mar me yang rab tu spar zhing sna ma'i me tog la re re la yang mngon par bzlas nas me tog stong rtsa brgyad 'jam dpal gyi zhal la gtor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278b-6: de nas zab pa chen po'i yi ge h'um gi sgra thos pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278b-7: ras ris rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278b-8: yi ge h'um gi sgras ni sa kun la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278b-9: ras ris 'gul bas ni rgol ba thams cad la lan 'debs nus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278b-10: 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi bstan bcos shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278b-11: ci ste ma grub kyang las thams cad la nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:278b-13: aa ga ru'i yam shing sor phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad la du rushka'i thang chus sil ha ras btags pas seng ldeng gi mdag ma du ba med pa la mtshan thog thag tu sbyin sreg byas na skya reng 'char ba tsam na 'phags pa 'jam dpal mthong bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279a-2: 'dod pa dbang du bya ba ni ma gtogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279a-3: de nyid kyi ras ris kyi mdun du tsandan gyi spos kyi rgyun chad pa med par mtshan thog thag tu bdugs te bzlas pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279a-4: de'i 'og tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du gshegs te zab mo'i chos ston pa de la mos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279a-5: mos nas kyang nad thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sa rjes su thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279a-8: tsandan dmar po las byas pa'i padma rtsa lag dang bcas pa sor drug tsam tsandan dmar po'i 'de gus bskus nas lan stong sngags shing dgang gzar gyi lan stong blug pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279a-9: zla ba nya la ras ris kyi mdun du padma'i snod bzhag la lag pas bzung nas ji srid rab tu 'bar ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na de bzung bas lo bcu drug gi na tshod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279a-11: nyi ma bas lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279a-12: lha gzhon nu lta bur 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279a-13: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis phyag byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279a-14: bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279a-15: lus zhig nas mngon par dga' bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279b-0: zla ba gzas zin pa @279b la shu dag dkar po blangs la ba'i rnam lngas bkrus te shing aa shvattha'i lo mas bkab pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279b-3: 'bar ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na dro ba 'byung bas ni skye bo thams cad dbang du 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279b-4: rgol ba thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279b-5: du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279b-6: stong phrag sum cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279b-7: 'bar bas ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279b-8: bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279b-9: ba ser skya'i be'u dang bcas pa'i mar khu blangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279b-10: zangs ma'i snod du shing aashvattha'i lo ma bdun gyis bkab ste bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279b-11: ji srid grub pa rnam gsum thob pa de srid du bzlas pa byas la de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279b-14: sman puskar m'u la'i sa bon zla ba gzas zin pa la khar bcug nas ji srid du tsu lu tsu lu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ba de srid du bzlas pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279b-15: sman de phyung nas lcags gsum gyis yongs su dkri ba byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279b-16: yang khar rab tu bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:279b-17: sman de skyug na ni snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280a-0: li shi dri zhim po khar bcug la bzlas pa 'bum byas @280a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280a-1: na gang dang smra ba de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280a-3: nas chan khyor gang za zhing bzlas pa 'bum phrag bcu gnyis byas na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280a-4: slong mo'i zas kyis 'tshol shing bzhin du mi smra ba'i dka' thub byed cing bzlas pa 'bum byed na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280a-5: bzlas pa bye ba byas na ji ltar srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa 'jam dpal chos ston pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280a-6: rtag tu bzlas pa byas na don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280a-7: gang gi gzugs brnyan dri thams cad pas byas la bcad cing sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro; ;gu gul gyi ril bu rgya shug gi tshig gu'i tshad tsam mar gyis btags pas brgya phrag stong gi sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280a-8: til la zho dang; mar gyis btags pas sbyin sreg 'bum phrag stong byas na thams cad kyi dam pa'i khyim gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280a-9: ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor byas la de la me tog gis bcal du bkra ma ste bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280b-0: de nas dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklag par @280b byas na zla ba gcig gis mchog tu yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280b-1: gi wang la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te dpral bar thig le byas na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280b-2: gtsug phud la lan bdun bzlas pa byas na sems can thams cad kyis gnod pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280b-3: me tog gi ri ma las sbyin sreg 'bum byas na nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280b-4: nyin re zhing bzlas pa bdun byas na nges par myong bar 'gyur bas las rnams zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280b-5: bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280b-6: le'u bdun pa'i ras ris kyi cho ga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280b-7: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280b-8: 'jam dpal gyi ras ris kyi cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams la sa nyi shu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:280b-11: gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-1: bsgyur ba la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-3: sngags thams cad kyi grub pa'i gnas yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-4: de yang mdor na byang phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-5: rgya dang rgya ni che nyid la; ;'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab 'grub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-6: gang yang de yi sngags rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-8: gtsug tor rgyal po thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-9: de dag tu ni grub par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-10: k'a bi she dang bag kha la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-11: ao di ya ni khor yug yul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-12: kha che dang ni sindhu'i yul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-13: kha ba can gyi mtshams kun dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-14: byang phyogs su ni gnas brten la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-16: gang yang sangs rgyas sngon gsungs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-17: da ltar yang ni gsungs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-18: ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-19: zhi ba'i rgyur ni gsungs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-20: kha ba can ri'i nang byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-22: skye bo skal ldan bzang po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-23: zhi ba'i las ni rtsom par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281a-24: de bzhin sngags ni yul dbus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-0: mdzod dang nor bu'i rigs @281b dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-1: der ni 'grub par rab tu snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-2: gnod sbyin lngas rtsen dag dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-3: 'phrog ma gnod sbyin skye gnas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-4: gang dag dri za'i sngags rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-5: de dag tu ni grub par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-6: de nas rtag tu ku sha'i grong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-7: ma ga dh'a ni khor yug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-8: ngogs dga' chu bo snar ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-9: bang ga'i yul ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-10: de bzhin nor bu'i rigs gsungs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-12: rgya mtsho dang ni gling ngogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-13: chu yi gzi ni thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-14: dga' ba'i grong khyer sim ha lar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-16: sgrol ma khro gnyer can dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-17: dpal chen ma dang grags chen ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-18: gdugs dkar rnams kyi sngags rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-19: zla ba'i grong khyer rgya mtsho dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-20: shar gyi yul ni kho ra yug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-22: 'bigs byed ri nang gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-23: yul ni mchog dbang khor yug tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-24: smin drug bu bzhin 'jam dpal ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-25: khor yug tu grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-26: ri rtse tshang tshing nang dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-27: ri sul dang ni nags bcas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-28: log 'dren bgegs ni byed pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-30: glang po'i cha byad yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-31: mche ba gtsigs pa gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:281b-32: de bzhin rta gzugs du ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-0: @282a *// du ma'i rnam par grags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-1: lha ni dbang dang ldan pa'i bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-2: rnam pa sna tshogs bgegs byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-3: des bstan sngags dang ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-4: grub pa'i zhing du rab tu snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-5: ma mo mi bzad rnam sna tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-6: gza' nyid shin tu mi bzad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-7: yi dvags skyes gnas bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-8: mi yi zas byed bden bral dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-9: yi dvags rgyal por bstan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-10: de dag zhing du grub par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-11: de la sogs pa'i 'byung po kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-12: grub pa'i zhing du gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-13: rdo rje khro bo brtson 'grus che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-14: de dag phyogs su grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-15: lha min sngags kyi gtso bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-16: gang gzhan de bzhin 'jig rten pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-17: sngags rgyud lho phyogs dag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-18: brten pa dag la grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-19: rtag tu yi dvags rgyal po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-20: gshin rjes kyang ni bstan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-21: zhi ba khyab 'jug gis bstan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-23: gdug cing gdug pa'i las dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-24: lha yi gnas su bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-25: sngags rnams gdug pa'i las rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-26: lag na rdo rjes bstan pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282a-27: lho yi phyogs la bsten na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-0: de dag gi ni phyogs dag @282b tu; ;myur du yang dag 'grub pa snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-1: nyi mas bshad pa'i sngags rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-2: nyi ma'i sngags zhes rab tu bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-3: nub phyogs na ni gang yod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-4: sngags dang rgyud ni rab tu 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-5: gnod sbyin dbang po rdzu 'phrul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-7: byis pa rnams ni rmongs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-8: 'byung po kun la nor sbyin zhing; ;cho ga mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-9: skye bo rnams la nor sbyin byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-10: longs spyod ldan zhing mdzod 'phel ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-12: nor sbyin zhes bya'i ming gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-13: sa yi steng du rnam par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-14: gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje rang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-15: byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-16: sngags pa mchog ni dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-17: rang nyid sa bcu'i bdag po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-18: rdo rje padma'i rigs dag gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-19: de dag sngags ni grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-20: de bzhin rigs brgyad sngags dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-21: phyogs brgyad dag tu gnas pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-22: rgyal ba'i rigs kyi sngags dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-23: byang gi phyogs su 'grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-24: padma'i rigs las byung ba'i sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-25: de bzhin shar gyi phyogs su 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-26: lho yi phyogs su gnas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-28: nub phyogs su ni mdzod 'grub gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:282b-29: phyogs mtshams dag tu rin chen rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-2: de dag 'grub par rab tu brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-3: lho nub kyi ni mtshams dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-4: de bzhin gnod sbyin rigs kyang 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-5: shar lho dag gi cha dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-6: nyan thos rnams ni gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-7: de dag rigs su snang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-9: byang shar dag gi cha dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-10: rang rgyal rnams su yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-11: rigs ni 'jig rten kun gyis mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-12: de dag der ni 'grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-13: 'og gi phyogs kyi cha dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-18: gtsug tor la sogs rab bsgrags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-19: steng du 'gro ba'i grub par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-20: rgyal ba 'khor lo sgyur bas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-21: thad kar kun nas khor yug tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-22: rdo rje can gyi grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-23: de bzhin gzhan yang sngags rgyal kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-24: padma'i rigs las byung ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-25: thams cad du ni thams cad 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-26: sngags rnams kun kyang longs spyod ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-27: rdo rje padma'i rigs dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-29: 'di dag zhing du bstan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-30: de yi dus ni yongs su bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283a-31: rgyal ba'i rigs kyi sngags grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-0: sangs @283b rgyas rnams la sngon 'byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-1: padma rdo rje'i rigs dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-2: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar ma'i dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-3: gzhan gyi dus su sngags dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-4: de las gzhan pa'i rigs 'grub yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-5: de dag grub pa'i dus su gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-6: dus gzhan rab tu bstan ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-7: dka' thub kyis ni grub pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-8: skye ba gsum gyis thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-9: rtag tu sngags rnams zlos pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-10: der dad yid ni der sems dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-11: rgyal sras rnams la rab dang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-13: dkon mchog gsum la gus pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-14: byang chub sems kyis brgyan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-15: shes rab che zhing sdom la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-16: sngags dang rgyud la 'jigs pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-17: byang chub sdom la gnas pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-19: sems can rnams kyis las grub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-20: bdag kyang grub par nyer bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-21: rtag tu sngags nyid grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-22: rmongs pa'i sems can 'grub pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-23: de nyid phyir na rgyal dbang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-24: cho ga'i rgyal po gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-25: sangs rgyas gtso bo bdun pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-26: sngags rnams rgya che'i las dag bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-27: sangs rgyas sras kyi thu bo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-28: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni gzi chen la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-29: thub pa'i zla ba rdzu 'phrul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:283b-30: des ni gsung mchog rab tu bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284a-2: gzhon nu rab tu nyon cig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284a-3: gang tshe sangs rgyas rtag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284a-5: de tshe de bzhin grub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284a-6: gtsug tor la sogs rab grags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284a-7: de bzhin 'khor los bsgyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284a-8: gzi brjid phung por rab bstan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284a-9: rgyal ba gtsug tor gdugs dkar po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284a-10: rgyal bas mang por gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284a-11: de la sogs pa'i gtsug tor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284a-13: gang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284a-15: chos kyi rgyal po rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284a-16: rkang gnyis dam pa bzhugs pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284a-17: sngags rnams ma lus bshad pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284a-19: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284a-21: dus kyi cho ga nges pa'i le'u rab 'byams las nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284a-23: gzhan yang; gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284b-0: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ras @284b ris ni sngar bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284b-1: sems can la yod pa'i spyod pa dge ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284b-2: mi dge ba'i mtshan ma rnams ni bshad par bya yi nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284b-3: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos btud nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284b-6: sems can rnams ni gzhan gyi lus la 'jug pa'i sems can rnams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284b-14: lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa las sna tshogs kyis byas pa'i lus rnam pa sna tshogs la brten cing gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284b-15: cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284b-19: 'byung po thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284b-23: bstan pa'i dus ni lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284b-24: de'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas legs par bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284b-25: de skad ces rgyal ba'i mchog 'jig rten gyi 'dren pa go'u ta ma bdun pa la gsol ba btab nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:284b-26: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa cang mi smra bar gyur te rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub @285a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-1: pas sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-5: gzhan gyi lus zhugs sems can ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-6: sngags kyi sbyor bas drang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-7: kha cig zas la chags pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-8: sa steng mi ni 'dzin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-9: gzhan dag khros ldan sems kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-10: sa steng dag tu mi bzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-11: rtag tu chags dang bral ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-12: snying rje'i dam tshig dag gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-14: dge ba'i mi la 'dzin par byed; ;rab bsngags dge dang g-yo ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-15: mi rnams kyi ni mdog kyang sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-16: nyi ma dag ni 'char ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-17: de dag 'jug par brjod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-18: mi rnams nyi ma nub pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-20: mtshan mo'i thun gyi dang po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-21: yar ngo la ni snang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-22: rab bsngags dge ba'i las dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-23: rtag tu gang zhig chos ldan mi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-24: gang zhig shes nyen ldan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-25: de dag la ni 'jug par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-27: des na mi la 'jug pa yin; ;phyogs gtsang skye bo gtsang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-28: rgyu skar skar ma bzang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-29: nyin zhag sngags dang zla res bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285a-30: yar ngo dge ba'i nyin zhag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-0: gza' @285b bzang yang dag ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-1: tshes grangs rdzogs dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-2: de bzhin zla ba nya ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-3: de dag la ni 'jug par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-4: chags bral rdzu 'phrul chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-6: nam mkha' la ni ta la tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-8: de ni skyil krung 'dug nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-9: nam mkha' la ni gnas par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-10: tshig kyang bzang po mtshungs med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-11: tshangs dbyangs de bzhin rnar snyan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-12: gang du 'dod chags bral de gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-13: sems dpa' chen po de dag smra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-14: gtsug tor phyag rgyas drangs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-16: sa steng de la 'jug pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-17: de yi mod la mchod yon sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-18: sna ma'i me tog dag la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-19: tsandan bzang po gur gum bsres //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-20: bsres pa'i chu dang chu gtsang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-21: de yi mod la dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-22: sngags pa sa la rab btud nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-23: pha na pa'i blo yis gsol ba gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-24: dpa' bo'i rang bzhin sems kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-25: sems can des ni gsol ba gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-26: tshig ni bzang po 'don byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-27: rnar snyan de bzhin rmongs ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-28: sngags shes cho ga 'jigs med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-30: 'jam dbyangs yang dag dran nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:285b-31: de yi dus su 'jigs med bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-2: gtsug tor las byung gzhan pa'ang bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-3: de nas phyogs ni bcing bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-4: steng dang 'og tu'ang de bzhin no; ;de nas de yi 'byung ba kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-5: bar dang tha mar rab tu brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-6: de bzhin dang po bar ma'i dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-7: byung dang ma 'ongs dus dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-8: de bzhin da ltar byung gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-10: de bzhin 'dzum med mig gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-11: chags bral des zin rab tu lta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-12: gang yin des bstan tshig gis ni; ;bde bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-13: de bzhin grub dang bsgrub bya'i rdzas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-14: gang zhig tshogs kyi rnam pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-15: rang rgyal byang chub dgra bcom dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-16: nges par byang chub chen po'ang de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-17: nges par sangs rgyas nyid rigs nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-18: de bzhin byang chub sems rigs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-19: rigs med nyid dang dus dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-20: sems can skal ldan brjod pa'ang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-21: dam tshig gis ni mngon mtshon pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-22: bden pa kun ni des ston 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-23: skad cig tsam ston rnal 'byor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-24: dus ring dus su sdod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-25: skad cig de la gang cung zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-26: yid la bsams shing don du gnyer //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286a-27: myur du sngags grub kho na la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-0: de dag thams cad ston @286b par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-1: ci 'dod mngon par re ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-2: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-3: sngags pas slar ni gshegs gsol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-4: myur du mchod yon phul nas 'gyel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-5: cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-6: snod ni yang dag bsrung ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-7: sems can lus ni 'gyel ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-8: sa yi steng du nyal ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-9: gtsug tor sngags dang ldan pa yi; ;sngags ni cho gar gsungs pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-10: de nyid kyis ni bsrung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-11: phyag rgya gtsug phud lnga yis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-12: de tshe lus ni bde legs 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-13: sa yi steng las ldang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-14: sems can kun la'ang 'jug pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-15: srung ba 'di ni rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-16: snod la brten te 'tshe byed par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-17: gdug pa'i sems can gyis mi nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-18: skye bo snod du gyur pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-19: 'di ni srung ba chen po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-20: de yi tshig ni bar mar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-21: dbus kyi yul gyir rab tu bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-22: lha yi skye gnas la brten pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-23: 'og min gzugs dang ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-24: de dang de yi rtags rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-25: gzugs ni rab tu snang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-26: 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-27: 'dod dang ldan pa'i lha dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-28: de las dman pa'i 'gro ba'i rtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-29: tshig nyid kyang ni shin tu snyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-30: de nas sa la gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:286b-31: gzhal med khang gnas lha rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:287a-2: ma ga dh'a yi gnod sbyin tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:287a-3: de bzhin aang+ga'i yul gyi tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:287a-4: lto 'phye chen po rab tu bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:287a-5: gzi brjid chen po nam mkha' lding; ;de dag shar phyogs tshig tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:287a-6: bang [?] ga'i yul du yang dag skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:287a-7: gang dag tshig ni bstan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:287a-8: de bzhin mi 'am ci yi tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:287a-9: de yi tshig tu rab brtag bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:287a-10: rtag tu pinda'i tshig gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:287a-11: grub dang ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:287a-12: de tshig rig pa 'dzin pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:287a-13: drang srong 'dod pa'i gzugs can yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:287a-14: de tshig mngon shes lnga dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:287a-15: drang srong rnams kyis yongs su brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:287a-16: gang yang yul tshig ma ga dh'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:287a-17: gang yang ha ri ki la'i tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:287a-18: mi gsal mi dong nyid dang ni //
