K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333a-10: 'dis dkyil 'khro bcing ba byas nas bzlas na 'khor los bsgyur ba yang dam tshig la gnas par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333a-11: 'khor los bsgyur ba gzhan yang zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333a-12: gnas de nyid du bzlas pa byas na rig pa'i mthu stobs kyis 'jigs rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333a-13: 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags rnams kyis phan tshun gnod pa byed par nus pa ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333a-14: bzlas pa ni gnas gcig tu rnam pa thams cad du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333a-15: de la sogs pa gtsug tor gyi rgyal po grangs med pa yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs la rgya cher bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333a-17: 'jam dpal cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la ni sngags tshad med pa yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333a-18: phyag rgya yang rnam pa sna tshogs nyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333a-19: ngas 'di mdor bsdus nas bshad pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333a-20: ngas gal te rgya cher bshad na ni mi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-0: mi @333b ma yin pa thams cad kyis bskal pa stong gi tshad du yang 'dzin pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-1: 'chang bar nus pa ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-3: de lta bas na mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-4: mdor na yad la nye bar gzung bar gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-5: dang po thub pa'i phyag rgya mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-6: 'dir ni rab tu gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-7: lha yi lha ni de nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-8: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-9: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-10: spyan ras gzigs ni zla ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-11: de nas phyag na rdo rje'i rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-12: gnod sbyin dbang po'i bstan pa yin; ;de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-13: dpag med chen po'i gzi brjid ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-14: pho nya pho nya mo tshogs kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-15: bran pho dran mo de bzhin gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-16: de bzhin gnod sbyin gnod sbyin mo; ;klu dang klu mo de bzhin gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-17: mngag gzhug mngag gzhug mo dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-18: rdzu 'phrul chen po sha za mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-19: de bzhin gzhan yang srin mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-20: lha dang lha min bu mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-21: grub dang rig pa 'dzin rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-22: mi rnams ma lus pa dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-23: skye bo thams cad dag gi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-24: so so so sor phyag rgya bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-25: sngags kyang rnam pa sna tshogs dang; ;las dang ting 'dzin sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-26: glang po nor bu'i rigs dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-27: de dag so so'i phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:333b-28: dgra bcom dang ni rang rgyal dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-2: sa bcu la ni rab gnas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-3: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-4: phyag rgya snying po sngags dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-5: gcig pa nyid du yongs su bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-6: lha dang gnod sbyin rigs dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-7: drang srong dri zas mchod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-8: phyag rgya dri zas bstan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-9: bdun pa'i rigs kyis gsungs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-10: de bzhin brgyad pa'i phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-11: gnod sbyin rigs su yongs su bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-12: phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-13: gzhan yang bde gshegs bka' dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-14: rgyud rnams dag ni so so dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-16: phyag rgya ldan pa'i sngags dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-17: las rnams la ni gsal bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-18: phyag rgya 'ching la sogs mkhas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-20: de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba ni lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo phan tshun bsdams la mthe bong gnyis bstan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-22: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thags kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334a-23: 'di nyid la ni mthe bong g-yas pa gcig bstan pa ni padma 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334b-0: lag pa g-yas g-yon snga ma bzhin du khu tshur bcangs te gung mo'i sor mo gnyis rab tu phyung zhing brkyang bar byas la gcig tu byas shing rdo rje'i rtse mo 'dra ba 'di ni rdo rje @334b 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334b-1: de las gcig bkug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334b-2: yang de nyid brkyang nas gung mo gnyis gdub kor ltar byas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i spos kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334b-3: lag pa gnyis po thams cad bsdus te khu tshur du byas pa 'di ni rin po che'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334b-4: nor bu la spyod pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334b-5: dzambha la chu dbang la sogs pa'i sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334b-6: phyag rgya 'di nyid sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334b-7: mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs gnyis bkug nas sen mo gnyis phan tshun sprad pa 'di ni gnod sbyin gyi rigs lngas rtsen la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334b-8: lag pa gnyis snga ma bzhin du khu tshur bcing ba byas la mthe bo'i sen mo gnyis phan tshun sprad cing steng du bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334b-9: gung mo gnyis ka'i rtse mo rdo rje'i rtse mo dang 'dra bar byas pa 'di ni lha thams cad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334b-10: lha'i rigs 'og min la sogs pa'i phyag rgya yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334b-11: lag pa gnyis de bzhin du bsdams la khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bo gnyis bstan pa 'di ni rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334b-12: 'phags pa nyan thos kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334b-13: khu tshur bcang bar byas pa 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:334b-14: rgyal ba'i sras thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni gcig tu brjod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335a-0: thal mo brkyang ba sbyar nas cung zad rtse mo bskum par byas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpang grags pa'i phyag rgyar bstan pa yin @335a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335a-1: no; ;nor bu rin po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335a-7: mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa ste bdun po de dag ni thub pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335a-14: phyag rgya bdun po 'di dag kyang rgyal ba'i sku nyid las skyes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335a-15: bdun gnyis kyi tshogs gnyis pa 'di dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335a-16: phyag rgya lnga ngas bshad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335a-17: thub pa'i snying po dang ldan pa nyi shu ni dang po'i rang byung gis kyang bstan pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335a-18: 'khor los bsgyur ba nyi shu'i 'khor gyi phyag rgya yang bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335a-20: sngags byung ba 'di grangs kyi mthar yang byas pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335a-21: thal mo sbyar ba byas nas gdub kor ltar byas pa ni nor bu rin po che'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335a-22: skyil mo krung gi g-yas g-yon brla'i nya'i phyogs su khu tshur rgyal mtshan du 'dzin pa ni 'khar gsil gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335a-23: lag pa thal mo sbyar la phan tshun du mngon par phyogs pa ni snam sbyar gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335a-24: lag pa thal mo sbyar ba las bzed pa ltar byas pa ni lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335a-25: chos ges ni lag pa g-yon pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335a-26: thugs kyi phyag rgya bzhin du g-yon pa'i mthe bong bteg pa ni mche ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335a-27: lag pa g-yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335a-28: g-yon pas chos gos la 'dzin pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335b-0: thal @335b mo sbyar ba las gung mo gnyis rdo rje'i rtse mo ltar byas la de'i rgyab tu mdzub mo gnyis cung zad bkug cing bzhag la mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro; ;'di nyid kyi gung mo'i tshigs bkug la mdzub mo gnyis gcig tu byas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas byams pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335b-1: thal mo sbyar ba yangs par byas la mdzub mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335b-2: srin lag gnyis bkug la rdo rje rtse gsum du byas pa 'di ni m'a ma k'i'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335b-3: thal mo sbyar bar byas nas mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa la bkug nas bzhag la mthe bong gnyis so sor bkyed nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335b-4: thal mo'i rnam par bya ba 'di ni longs spyod ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335b-5: lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335b-6: gung mo gnyis sbyar ba ni rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335b-7: g-yas pa'i sor mo gsum rdo rje'i rtse mo ltar byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335b-8: rked pa'i phyogs su brten pa 'di ni gnas pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335b-9: de ltar bdag nyid kyi mgo bor rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335b-10: phyag rgya chen po brgyad bcings la las thams cad bya zhing dam tshig gzung ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335b-11: dkyil 'khor bya ba dag la'ang me tog gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:335b-12: yang na sngar bstan pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas na ci 'dod pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336a-2: legs par phyag rgya bcings na ni phyag rgya'i mthu 'byung bar 'gyur gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336a-3: gang phyag rgya bab col du byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336a-4: gnas ma yin par bcas pa des ni 'di'i dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336a-5: gang rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid ni mdung rtse'i phyag rgya yin mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336a-7: rdo rje ni khyad par yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336a-8: gang gyen du bstan pa de ni rdo rje 'dzin gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336a-9: 'og tu bltas ba ni dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336a-10: bar du bzhag pa ni sbyin gnas su 'os pa'i slob dpon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336a-11: bla ma la ni phyag rgya dbus su gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336a-12: mi thams cad la ni sor mo gcig gdeg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336a-13: mi ma yin pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336a-17: srid pa gsum la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo gnyis bsgreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336a-19: gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gsum bsgreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336a-21: rig pa 'dzin ma thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo bzhi bsgreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336a-23: lha ma yan thams cad kyi bu mo'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni lag pa'i mthil mnyam por bzhag pa'o; ;thal mo sbyar ba legs par byas te bzhag pa ni gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-0: thal mo de nyid legs par byas pa las khu tshur bcing ba byas pa ni 'dod @336b pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa thams cad kyi yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-4: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni de nyid las sor mo gcig yang dag par bsgreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-6: sha za mo la sogs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo gnyis bsgreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-8: srin mo rnams kyi ni gsum bsgreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-9: sha rjen za ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-12: grul bum la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-15: sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad la ni sor mo bzhi bsgreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-16: sdig pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo thams cad bsdus pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-17: lag sor bsdus pa'i phyag rgya ni dgug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-18: lag sor brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-19: las thams cad ni rang gi sems kyis bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-20: ci 'dod pa'i phyag rgya 'di dag la rang rang gi sngags sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-21: gzhan gyi phyag rgyar gzhan gyi las ni mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-22: gang gi sngags gang la yod pa de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-23: de'i phyag rgya sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-24: phyag rgya 'di dag ni ring thung mnyam pa med pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-25: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:336b-26: sems can thams cad kyis phyag rgya mthong nas khro bar byed mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337a-1: pa ni rnam par nyams pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337a-2: phyag rgya nyams pa las ni dam tshig nyams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337a-3: rig pa thams cad las rnam par 'das par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337a-4: mthar yang ngu 'bod kyi 'gro ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337a-5: dmyal ba chen po mnar med par yang shin tu brtan pa'i skye ba thob par 'gyur ba ni phyag rgya la bgegs byed pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337a-6: gang yang phyag rgya dang; dam tshig la gnas pa de dag ni yun ring po mi nyung bar bde bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337a-7: lha'i gnas chen po'i 'gro bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337a-8: mthar yang nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dag gis phyag rgya rnam pa mang po rnams rab tu gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337a-12: sems can thams cad kyis kyang 'di'i mtha' rtogs par ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337a-14: grangs rtsi bar byed par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337a-16: rgyal ba'i rigs kyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i yi ge gcig pa de'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni lag pa g-yas g-yon snga ma bzhin du khu tshur du byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337a-17: gung mo gnyis phyir phyung la brkyang ste gcig tu rtse sprad la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337a-18: gnyi ga'i yang rtse mo'i tshigs bkug la mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs gnyis bkug cing sen mo gnyis phan tshun rtse sprad de mthe bong gnyis kyi sen mo'i steng du bzhag pa 'di ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337b-0: las thams cad byed @337b pa; phyag rgya thams cad kyi rab mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337b-1: 'jig rten gyi skyob pa rnams kyis gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337b-2: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i yi ge gcig pa dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337b-3: 'dis bsgrubs na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337b-5: 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337b-6: 'dis bzlas pa byas na sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyur ro; ;sgrub pa pos nges par sngon du cho ga'i rgyal po 'dir gsungs pa'i sngags kyis mchog brgyad stong bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337b-7: de ltar byas na rig pa 'di thams cad mngon du 'gyur zhing myur du grub pa rab tu ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337b-8: myur du mchog kyang ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337b-9: nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337b-11: spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po yi ge gcig pa dang ldan par byas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337b-12: yang na gos dkar mo'i rig pa phyag rgya dang ldan par byas na'ang de bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337b-13: rdo rje 'chang gi phyag rgya dang; de nyid kyi snying po yi ge gcig pa dang ldan par byas na'ang de bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337b-14: yang na m'a ma k'i'i rig pa chen mo dang ldan par byas na'ang las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337b-15: de bzhin du glang po'i rigs kyi yi ge gcig pa byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i spos kyi snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:337b-16: de bzhin du de nyid kyi phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338a-2: 'phags pa dang 'di dag la yang 'dir snying po yi ge gcig pa nyid la phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338a-3: sngags thams cad dang ldan par byas na las thams cad bya ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338a-4: ji ltar rigs par rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338a-5: sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa mtha' dag bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338a-6: de bzhin du drang srong rnams la ni dmod pa 'debs pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338a-7: de bzhin du dri za dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338a-9: lha ma yin dang bcas pa rnams la ni lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe bong nang du bcug pa byas pa'o; ;grub pa bstan pa'i khu tshur du gnas pa'i rgya ni gzhon nu ma bzhi'i phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338a-11: de bzhin du smin drug gi bu la ni mdung gi phyag rgyas so; ;de bzhin du gshin rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338a-17: lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa sems can srid pa gsum la yang dag par gnas pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338a-18: 'gro ba thams cad du gtogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338a-19: khams thams cad na gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338a-20: sems can thams cad kyi gdon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338a-21: ma mo dang; sha rjen za ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338a-22: sdig pa can gyi sems can thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338a-23: thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338a-24: sngags kyang thams cad du gsungs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338b-0: rim gyis @338b sbyar zhing mthar gyis thams cad kyi thams cad du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338b-1: dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ba'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338b-2: phyag rgya de'i yan lag tu gyur pa las byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338b-3: 'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338b-5: dri ma med par grags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338b-6: 'jam dpal khyod kyi autpa la'i phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i 'di dag gi phyag rgya shar du mngon par bltas te gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338b-8: nyi ma la mngon du bltas te gnas nas tho rangs langs la gtsang zhing gtsang ba'i gnas la gnas nas sgrub pa pos nges par 'di dag gi phyag rgya gang yang rung ba bcings la rang gi spyi bo'i steng du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338b-9: 'di dag gang yang rung ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas na nad thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338b-11: bgegs thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338b-12: sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338b-13: myur du grub pa ster bar 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338b-15: nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:338b-16: byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339a-1: 'gyur ba de yang gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339a-2: dang po re zhig dpa' bo chen po'i phyag rgya bca' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339a-3: lag pa gnyis sbyar bar byas la sor mo rnams nang du bsdus te; mthe bong gnyis bteg la tshigs gsum pa'i cha bkug pa 'di ni dpa' bo chen po'i phyag rgyar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339a-4: 'dir sngags ni; aa b'i ra h'um bam/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339a-7: lag pa gnyis de bzhin du yang dag par sbyar ba byas la; phyir yang rnam par phye zhing kun nas sor mo rnams padma kha bye ba ltar byas pa 'di ni kha bye ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya mchog yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339a-8: dang po'i sangs rgyas kyis rab tu bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339a-10: aom ga ga na sambha be d'ipta d'ipta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339a-11: dzv'a la ya dzv'a la ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339a-12: bud dha aa dhishthi te bi k'a s'a ya sarba bhu t'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339a-13: h'um h'um bi k'a si ni phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339a-14: 'di ni padma kha bye ba'i sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339a-15: phyag rgya 'di dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339a-16: gdon zhugs pa la sogs pa yang rab tu shes pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339a-18: gdon gyis zin pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339a-19: sha za sdig pa dang ldan pas zin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-0: dug gis brgyal ba rnams ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de @339b ltar de thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-1: 'di ni mdor na rig pa me tog kha bye ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan par byas na gdon thams cad sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-2: ma grub pa nyid kyang myur du grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-3: lag pa gnyis sbyar ba byas la sor mo rnams nang du mnyam por byas te bcug pa ni snying po'i phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-4: snying po lan bdun mngon par sngags la bkrol bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-5: de bzhin du thams cad du yang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-7: aom go da ro b'i ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-9: lag pa de nyid khu tshur du bya ste sor mo rnams brkyang la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-10: sor mo'i rtse mo phan tshun sprad cing nang du stong pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-13: 'di ni las thams cad byed pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-14: lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bong bteg la khu tshur bcangs pa ni 'khar gsil gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-16: aom dhu na dzi ta ra n'i n'am h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-17: 'khar gsil gyi sngags ni las thams cad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-18: 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pas lag pa g-yon pa chos gos la 'dzin par byas pa ni chos gos kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-20: aom raksha raksha sarba bud dha aa dhishthi ta da ma ts'i ba ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:339b-22: 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang ldan par byas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340a-2: bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340a-7: sdig pa can rnams dang; bgegs thams cad kyang mthong ba tsam gyis rab tu 'byer ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340a-9: mthe'u chung phan tshun sprad pa byas la lag pa'i kha sbyar thur du bstan pa ni lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340a-11: aom lo ka b'a la aa dhishthi tam ba ra dhva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340a-12: mah'a nu bha ba nu t'a p'a tr'a sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340a-14: sngags 'di dang yang dag par ldan par byas na las thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340a-15: kha zas za ba'i dus su dran par byas na sbyar ba'i dug thams cad nus pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340a-16: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340a-17: gung mo bkug pa 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340a-19: aom te dzo dz'a la sarba aartha sa dha ka siddhya tsi na t'a ma ni ratna h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340a-20: nor bu rin po che'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340a-21: phyag rgya 'di nyid dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad byed cing dge ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340a-22: rgyan gyi khyad bar thams cad la 'di nyid kyis mngon par sngags te rgyan du byas na bdag nyid la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340a-23: mchog tu skal ba bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340b-0: go cha la mngon @340b par sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340b-1: rang nyid kyis bgo bar byas nas g-yul du 'jug na 'di ni lus mtshon gyi mi phog cing mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340b-2: dgra thams cad kyi rang gi dpung 'byed bar byed cing pha rol gyi sde yang rab tu gnon par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340b-3: de la sogs pa tshad med pa'i las ma grub pa nyid kyang grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340b-4: rin po che padma r'a ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340b-5: ma rgad ta la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i rin che'i khyad par blangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340b-6: brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sdags pa byas nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340b-8: glang po che'i mtshog mar bcing ba byas nas g-yul gyi thog mar zhugs na nges par pha rol gyi dpung dang 'thab pa med par kho nar mthong bas 'jigs par 'gyur ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340b-9: rmugs pa chen po nyid du 'gyur ba 'am; bdag po dpung dang bcas pa de dag rab tu 'byer bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340b-10: sor mo rnams phan tshun bsdus nas khu tshur du byas la sor mo gung mo'i gnas gyi gsum pa'i tshigs kyi cha la mdzub mo'i tse mo bkug pa 'di ni kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340b-12: aom tstshindha tstshidha ha na da ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340b-15: rkang pa g-yon pa bteg la rkang ga+yas pas la bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:340b-16: g-yon pa'i rkang ba'i blo gis g-yas pa brkyang ba'i brla la bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341a-0: lag pa g-yas pas bsnun pa'i @341a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341a-1: tshul du nga rgyal gyis bstan par bya ba 'di ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341a-3: aom hu lu hu lu tsanda le ma tang+gi sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341a-4: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341a-6: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sngags 'di dag nyid dang yang dag par ldan pas sngags thams cad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341a-8: sdug bsngal thams cad nges par gcod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341a-9: ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341a-10: lag pa g-yon pa brla'i steng du dkur bstan la lag pa g-yas pas chos ston pa'i phyag rgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdung gi phyag rgya yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341a-12: aom bi dza ye mah'a shakti dhu ra pha ri h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdung gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341a-16: 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341a-18: ma rungs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341a-20: lha dang bcas pa yang rengs bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341a-21: 'di'i yon tan ni mtha' yas te; ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341b-0: lag pa'i sor mo rnams phan tshun de bzhin du byas la lag pa gnyis bkan te @341b mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo sbyar la de nyid bzlog la thur du bstan te dbral bar bzhag pa 'dri ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang mo'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzod spu'i phyag rgyar gsungs so; ;'dir sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341b-1: na ma:sarba th'a ga te bhya:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341b-4: ha he bandha bandha tishtha tishtha dha ra ya dhe ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341b-8: 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341b-9: gi wang gi lde gus dbral ba la thig ler byas la sngags bzlas na dgra'i nang du zhugs kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341b-10: ma rungs pa thams cad kyis kyang mi 'tshe bar 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341b-12: ma mthong yang las tshad med pa byed par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341b-14: rgyun mi 'chad par phan tshun thal mo sbyar ba byas la mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rtse sprad la tshigs par ma bkug cing mthe bong gnyis kyang bkug pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341b-16: aom du bu sphu ru dzva la [?] siddhi lo tsa ne sarbba rthas dha ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:341b-17: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan rtsi sngags so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342a-2: mig gnyis la mngon par sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342a-3: dgra'i nang du zhugs na dgra rnams mthong ba tsam gyis byams pa'i sems dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342a-4: phan pa'i bsam pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342a-5: bshes gnyen nyid du'ang ldog par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342a-6: grogs nyid du'ang rab tu sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342a-7: yang na g-yul gyi thog mar mig gnyis la mngon par sngags nas pha rol gyi dpung la bltas na zhi ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur zhing mtshon brdeg par rab tu nus pa ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342a-8: 'thab pa med pa nyid du'ang ldog par 'gyur te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342a-10: lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo de bzhin du glegs bam lta bur phan tshun gyi rtse mo sbyar la thad kar bzhag pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342a-12: na mo bha ga ba te tsu ru darsha ne aom th'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342a-14: 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342a-16: dgra ma rungs ba'i nang du bzlas par byas na de dag gi sems 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342b-0: yang na @342b g-yul gyi nang du rkang gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342b-1: rkang bzhi la sogs phyir rgol ba thams cad rnam par rmongs par byed pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342b-2: sems rnam par g-yengs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342b-3: mdor na bcom ldan 'das ma 'di ni ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342b-5: yon tan mtha' yas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya dang sngags ni mtha' yas par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342b-8: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'khor 'dus pa'i le'ur gsungs pa de bzhin du sngags dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342b-12: de bzhin du padma'i rigs la padma'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i sngags su 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342b-13: aom dzi dzi dzi n'am ga tam ya te de ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342b-14: sngags 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi padma'i phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342b-15: 'di bzlas na padma'i rigs thams cad bzlas pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342b-16: 'di grub na padma'i rigs thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:342b-17: de nas gos dkar mo'i rigs pa chen po gang yin pa de'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343a-0: @343a *// aom aa ka te bi ka te ni ka te ka tam ka te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343a-2: padma'i phyag rgya sbyar na las thams cad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343a-3: dur khrod thams cad du song nas bsrung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343a-4: de bzhin du sgrol ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343a-8: rta mgrin la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343a-9: rig pa 'dus pa'i le'ur gang gsungs pa'i padma'i rigs grangs med pa thams cad kyang 'dir sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343a-11: sngags kyi cho ga rgya cher padma dag kyang sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343a-12: de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343a-14: aom ku lam ba ri bandha bandha h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343a-15: 'di ni m'a ma k'i zhes bya ba'i rig pa chen mo las thams cad byed par sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343a-16: sngar rab tu sbyar ba'i phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343a-17: rig pa chen mo m'a ma k'i dang yang dag par ldan na sgrub pa po 'dod pa bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343a-18: gleng gzhi'i le'ur sngar bstan pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i 'khor rdo rje'i rigs ma lus pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343a-19: sngags dang ldan pa yang 'dir rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343a-20: de bzhin du glang po'i rigs la glang po'i spos kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343a-21: aom ga dza aah'a ye h'um khe tsa ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-0: @343b sngar bstan pa'i phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-1: snga ma de bzhin du thams cad glang po'i rigs la grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-2: de bzhin du kun tu bzang po'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-3: aom sa ma ye sa m'a dzi na su ra ta m'a pi lam ba h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-4: mthu chen thob kyi sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-5: aom tishtha tishtha mah'a sth'a ma ga ta bo dhi sa ma ya ma nu smar h'um phad phad sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-6: dri ma med par grags pa'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-7: aom bi ma le bi ma le bi ma la m'u te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-8: aom dha ka dha ka sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-9: nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-11: de bzhin du ngan song kun spong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-15: byams pa la sogs pas bcu rab tu thob par rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-16: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-17: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang grangs med cing phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-18: sngags kyang grangs med par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-19: de dag kyang cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la rab tu sbyar bar bya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-21: 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi shin tu rgya che dar bcas pa'i sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-22: phyag rgya thams cad kyi cho ga rgya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:343b-24: dam tshig la rab tu zhugs pa cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-0: cho ga'i rnam pa thams cad kyi bye brag cho ga'i rgyal po @344a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-2: sngags thams cad kyang 'di la bsgrub pa byar rung ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-3: de bzhin du rin po che'i rigs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-5: lha'i rigs dag la yang sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-7: phyag rgya thams cad rab tu sbyar ba 'dir bstan pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-8: rigs gcig kho nar 'gyur zhing gzhan du ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-9: rigs gcig kho nar 'gyur zhing gzhan du ma yin pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-12: de yang 'jam dpal gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su blta bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-14: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-18: 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-19: zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-20: zag pa med pa'i phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-22: cho ga'i rnam pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi nang du gtogs so zhes gzung bar gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-26: sngags kyi gsang ba gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig la ma chud pa de ni gang yang med de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-28: de rab tu gtogs pa nyid du zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-29: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu gsung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344a-30: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyang mchog nyid du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344b-1: de ltar na cho ga'i rgyal po 'di yang rigs kyi mchog rin po che dang bo dang po'i sangs rgyas kyis rab tu bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344b-4: rnam par 'grel bar mdzad pa ni bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344b-5: bcom ldan 'das s'a la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344b-6: bcom ldan 'das me tog kun nas skyes pa'i dri mchog rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344b-7: bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344b-8: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344b-9: bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi 'od dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344b-11: yang dag pa'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344b-13: tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344b-19: da ltar sh'akya thub pa ngas kyang rab tu bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344b-20: de bzhin du de ltar sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de 'ongs pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchog rin po cher gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344b-25: nges par chos kyi dbyings la brten pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344b-26: bskal ba stong du'ang 'di'i phan yon bstan par ni mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:344b-28: rgya che ba'i yon tan 'byung ba ni mthong ba'i chos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345a-2: dad pa can gang zhig gis the tshom med par 'chang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345a-4: the tshom med par rgyud 'di la brtson pa byed cing sngags sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345a-7: rtag tu mngon par brtson par byed pa de la ni mthong ba'i chos kho na la yon tan gyi phan yon brgyad rab tu 'thob ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345a-9: phyir rgol ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345a-10: dgra'i 'jigs pa 'di la mi 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345a-11: 'di'i lus la dug mi 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345a-13: byang chub sems dpas kyang 'di la byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345a-15: bde ba sten par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345a-16: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345a-17: mtshan mo'ang 'di la nyin re zhing rmi lam du mthong ba stsol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345a-18: sngags thams cad kyang 'di la bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345a-19: phyag rgya'ang 'di la rmi lam du ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345a-20: rgyal po ma rungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345a-21: sems can ma rungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345a-22: mi phan pa 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang gnod pa med par 'gyur ro; ;nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345a-23: dad cing the tshom med la mngon par brtson pa'i phan yon ni brgyad po 'di dag yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345b-3: sems can chen po bstan pa la phan par byed pa rnams kyi yin gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345b-4: sdig pa la zhugs pa gzhan gyi ni ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345b-5: de las bzlog pa de'i 'gro ba ni du 'bod la sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345b-6: phyag rgya snga dro bcing bar byas nas tshe ring bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345b-7: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345b-8: 'khor gyi snying po dang; gtsug tor la sogs pa'i sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345b-9: spyan la sogs pa gzhan gyi phyag rgya de bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345b-10: yang na 'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod kyi phyag rgya bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345b-13: gtsang zhing gtsang ma'i gnas su 'dug ste zhes bya ba ni gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs su zug rdu med pa'i gnas la ba'i lci bas la ma lhung bas byugs la me tog dkar po dri zhim po dag gis gcal bkram pa der 'dug la sngags bzlas shing phyag rgya bcing bar bya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345b-14: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345b-15: gzhan dag tu ni phyag rgya dang lhan cig bzlas pa gcig kyang mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345b-16: gtsang zhing gtsang ba zhes gang gsungs pa ni nyi ma nub pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345b-17: srog chags med pa'i chu gtsang mas khrus byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:345b-18: gos gsar pa bgos la gtsug tor gyi sngags kyis bsrung ba byas la grong gi chos rnam par spangs shing gtsang spra la dga' zhing dge ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa bsgoms la thun gcig 'das pa dang der nyal bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346a-3: bram ze'i bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i skud pa blangs la sngags 'dis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346a-4: aom ha ra ha ra bandha ne shukra dh'a ra n'i siddh'a rthe sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346a-5: m'a ma k'i'i phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346a-7: de nas skud pa rked pa la lan gsum dkris nas bcing ba byas na sa bon bcing ba byas par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346a-8: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis kyang rmi lam du yid la gnod pa byed par mi nus na rmi lam du log 'dren rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346a-9: de bzhin du cho ga 'dis 'dod chags dang ldan pas kyang mi nus na 'dod chags dang bral bas lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346a-10: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug dga' ldan gyi bu mo gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'chang ba'i 'dod chags can gyis kyang yid la gnod pa skyed par mi nus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346a-11: de las gzhan pa'i mi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346a-12: mi ma yin pa'i bud med kyis kyang lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346a-13: de lta bu'i cho gas nang bar langs la so shing bcas shing gdong rab tu bkrus la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346a-14: cho ga snga ma bzhin du srog chags med cing dri ma med pa'i chus khrus byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346b-0: shar phyogs su bltas la phyag rgya bcing zhing sngags bzla ba byas na tshe ring bar 'gyur zhing las @346b thams cad la nus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346b-1: nad chen po las grol te skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346b-2: dgra rnams kyang bshes gnyen nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346b-3: mthong ba tsam gyis gdon thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346b-5: sdig can la sogs pa rab tu 'byer bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346b-7: mthong ba tsam gyis gtsang ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346b-8: mi gtsang ba'i chogs las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346b-9: de bzhin du cho ga'i rgyal po 'di'i phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346b-10: sngags kyi tshogs kyi 'khor 'di yang grangs med pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pas gsungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346b-13: sh'akya thub pa ngas kyang da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346b-15: khyod la yang bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346b-16: chos kyi dbyings yun ring du yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir 'di khyod la yongs su gtad te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346b-17: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das te chos kyi de nyid la brten cing yang dag pa'i mtha'i tha mar gyur te zhi bar gyur pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346b-18: sems can snying rje chen po dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa la phan pa'i phyir gsungs shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:346b-19: dus kyi mtha' 'jigs pa chen po'i dus la bab pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347a-1: pa byed pa'i sems can rnams kyang bzlog pa'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347a-2: gdul ba'i don gyi phyir cho ga'i rgyal po 'di ngas gsungs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347a-3: rgya cher rnam par dbye bar byas na sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347a-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347a-10: sum cu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347a-13: thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la bka' stsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347a-17: sngags rnams kyi rgya che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347a-18: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i mdor bsdus pa dang; dam tshig la rjes su 'jug cing phyag rgya'i gnas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347a-20: rgyud de dag thams cad la gsang ba dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347a-21: rdzu 'phrul che kun sangs rgyas kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347a-22: 'di kun sngar ni gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347a-23: sngags shes bdag nyid chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347a-24: yon tan kun kyang bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-0: dang po'i sangs rgyas @347b dag gis sdar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-1: sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-2: sngags kyi 'khor lo dag dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-3: chos kyi 'khor lo bla med bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-4: yang dag mtha' la brten nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-5: zhi ba'i 'khor lo'i rjes su song //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-7: sangs rgyas de kun zhi bar gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-8: dang po'i de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-9: 'di kun sngon ni bstan pa yin; ;ngas kyang phyi ma'i dus dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-10: 'jam pa'i blo ldan khyod la bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-11: sangs rgyas 'od can de yi bka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-12: de tshe 'di ni thos nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-13: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni gzhon nu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-14: thal mo sbyar byas spyan sngar 'dug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-15: rkang gnyis rdzogs sangs rgyas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-16: smra ba'i mchog gis yongs su zhus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-17: 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-18: shes rab chen pos chos gsungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-19: mdor bsdus rgya ni mi che bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-21: 'jam dpal gyis ni de skad gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-22: de nas cang mi smra bar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-23: de nas dpal ldan tshangs pa'i dbyangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-24: ka la pingka'i sgra skad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-25: dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-26: de dag kun ni ston pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-27: gnas gtsang steng du gnas pa'i dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-28: de tshe sngags dang rgyud dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-30: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis yang dag gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:347b-31: phyag rgya'i cho ga 'byung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-2: yon tan bdag nyid rgya che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-3: 'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-4: sems can sems can ma yin pa'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-5: dang po rtags mtshan bzhin du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-6: rnam pa spyad dang spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-7: zur gyis thams cad smra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-8: lag gnyis rkang gnyis spyi bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-9: lag gcig sor mo'i sbyor ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-10: sngon gyi sangs rgyas de dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-11: de kun phyag rgya zhes su gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-12: bya bum gdugs dang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-13: padma rgyal mtshan ba dan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-14: nya dang rdo rje dung dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-15: de bzhin bum pa 'khor lo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-16: 'jig rten sna tshogs mtshon cha ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-17: ji srid yongs su bstan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-19: de kun phyag rgya dkyil 'khor dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-20: de dag go rims gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-21: cho ga ldan par bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-22: rtag tu de dag nyid la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-23: rang gzugs 'dra bar bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-24: dkyil 'khor phyag rgyar gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-25: thams cad du ni spyir gsungs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-26: de dag phyag rgyar yongs bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-27: gnas ni ji bzhin dag la dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-28: dkyil 'khor dag ni kun la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-29: rang dang 'dra ba nyid du sbyar /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-31: gtsug tor gdugs dkar nyid la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-32: gtso bor gdugs ni dkar po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348a-33: dkyil 'khor la ni rtag tu bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-0: chos kyi 'khor @348b lo sangs rgyas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-2: rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs la gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-3: glang po glang po'i rigs zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-4: nor bu'i rigs la bum pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-5: dkyil 'khor kun la rab tu sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-6: lha gzhan gyi ni rigs dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-7: dpal be'u bkra shis ldan pa bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-8: tshangs pa che la ngang pa bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-9: brgya byin la yang rdo rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-10: dbang phyug che la bri ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-11: rtse gsum khyu mchog yang dag bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-12: ske ma byed rtse gsum patti la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-13: mdung dang bcas pa nyid kyang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-15: lha ma yin la dpus dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-16: rnam pa sna tshogs brgya phrag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-17: lha yi mtshon cha sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-18: de dag gzhan yang bzhon pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-19: rnam pa sna tshogs de tshe bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-20: gzugs brnyan ji ltar gnas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-21: rang gzugs 'phos pa bzhin du bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-22: dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-23: gang yang rung ba 'di gcig bri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-24: gcig dang gnyis dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-25: grangs med gsum la sogs pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-26: dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-27: lan kan phreng ni de dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-28: gang gi ched du dkyil 'khor gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-29: de ni dbus su nges par sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-30: rgyal ba'i rigs ni nang du bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-31: nang gi dbus su'ang sangs rgyas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-32: de tshe nang du'ang gzugs brnyan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-33: ston pa yi ni kun tu bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-34: gnyis par padma'i rigs dgod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:348b-35: gsum par rdo rje'i rigs kyang bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-1: de bzhin de tshe thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-2: de nas sa kun la gnas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-3: gnod sbyin srin po mi dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-4: mthar gyis ji ltar gnas pa yi; ;mu stegs rnams kyang de nas bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-5: cho ga bzhin du thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-6: phyogs skyong de bzhin bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-7: mdor na gzugs brnyan gcig dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-8: gnyis dang gsum sogs grangs med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-9: mtha' yas phyogs la gnas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-10: dkyil 'khor ji srid kun tu bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-11: ma mo'i dkyil 'khor nyid dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-12: tshad med de tshe bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-13: gzugs brnyan gcig la sogs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-14: mtha' yas sa yi steng dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-16: rnam pa gsum du nges bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-17: mchog dang bar ma de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-18: tha ma nyid du'ang bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-19: mchog la mchog dag grub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-21: tha mas phran tshegs grub par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-22: rgyal ba mchog gis sngon gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-23: sems can yid ni rnam gsum gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-24: rgyal ba'i mchog gis grub par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-25: sems can chen pos chen por 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-27: gsum pa skye bo phra mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-28: las ni phra mor nyi bar bsten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-29: sangs rgyas nyid du sems dang la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349a-30: phun sum tshogs pa dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-0: nges par thob par @349b 'gyur ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-1: sems can dkyil 'khor mthong bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-2: de dus sems ni bar ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-3: rang rgyal byang chub thob par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-4: gus pa med pas nyan thos nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-5: tha mas nges par thob par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-6: bdag nyid chen po don bcas 'bras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-7: zhi ba'i 'gro ba nye bar bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-8: dkyil 'khor mthong bas mtho ris su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-10: de bzhin phyag rgya mchog kun dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-11: sngags rnams dang ni rgya cher bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-12: rnam gsum nyid kyang rab sbyar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-13: rnam gsum bde ba rab tu byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-14: phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gsungs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-15: sngags rnams bstan pa'ang phan pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-16: de dag rnam pa gsum du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-17: sngags kyang rnam gsum mnyam par bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-18: ji ltar dkyil 'khor bstan pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-19: phyag rgya sngags kyang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-20: 'di dag cho gar yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-22: de bzhin de yang rnam gsum 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-23: stong phrag dag ni du ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-24: rnam gsum rnam pa gsum dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-25: rnam pa gnyis dang grangs med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-26: gang phyir sngags ni sems la ltos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-27: sngags ni sems can spang mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-28: sems dang sngags ni yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-29: lhan cig tu ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-30: de bzhin gshegs kyi rig sngags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:349b-31: gang yang padma'i rigs dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-2: mi yi rigs ni nyid dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-3: 'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-4: de dag ma lus 'di las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-5: gang zhig rgyal dang rgyal sras sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-6: sems can phyir ni gsungs pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-7: gang zhig de zlos mngon brtson pa'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-8: de ni nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-9: gang yang sngags ni bar ma dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-10: gang zhig zlos pa de zlo byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-11: rang sangs rgyas su yang dag bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-12: nges par de yi rigs kyang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-13: sngags ni tha mar rab zhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-14: nyan thos dgra bcom gyis bshad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-15: 'jig rten ma lus kun la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-16: sngags zlos pa la mngon brtson pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-17: nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-18: nges par rigs su de gnas yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-19: mchog dang tha ma bar ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-20: der yang las ni rab sbyar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-21: zhi bas sangs rgyas byang chub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-22: rgyas pa yis ni rang rgyal 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-23: gzhan pa phran tshegs las kyis ni; ;nyan thos kyi ni byang chub brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-24: de ni rnam gsum dbye ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-25: der yang sems ni blta bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-26: mang por yang ni dbye bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-27: grangs med par yang dbye bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350a-28: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350b-1: nges par sdom pa'i le'u rab 'byams las sum cu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350b-2: de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon phyag na rdo rje 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de stan las yangs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350b-3: bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350b-4: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350b-5: gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba bshad pa de'i cho ga rgya che ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350b-6: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'ang bka' ma stsal bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350b-9: phyi ma'i skye bo la gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350b-10: bstan pa nub pa'i dus la bab te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350b-11: 'jigs pa chen po rtsod pa'i dus tha ma la nyan thos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350b-12: rang sangs rgyas dag med pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsnyan pa mang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350b-13: chos kyi khams yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350b-14: rgyal bo ma rungs pa thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:350b-15: dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dag tshar gcad pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351a-0: gdul bya'i sems can la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas @351a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351a-3: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351a-6: phyi ma'i dus su bstan pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351a-7: gang 'di khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin gsungs pa rab tu sbyar na de la grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351a-8: nges par rgyal po ma rungs pa bstan pa la gnod pa byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351a-9: sems can phyogs chen po dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351a-10: spro ba chen po dang ldan pa rnams tshar gcad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351a-11: rjes su gzung ba la rab tu zhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351a-12: snying rje chen po dang bral ba de dag la khro bo'i rgyal po 'di rab tu sbyar bar bya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351a-13: gzhan dag la ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351a-15: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351a-16: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khro gyi dkyil 'khor yang rnam pa drug tu 'gul bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351a-17: lha tshogs dag kyang 'jigs par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351a-18: byis ba kun kyang rab tu dngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-0: lha rnams kun dang klu @351b dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-1: lha min dbang dang ma mor bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-2: gza' rnams kun gyi gtso bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-3: lha tshogs mi dang bcas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-4: ma rungs sems ldan srul po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-6: mi yi bdag po gdug ldan sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-8: chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-9: de tshe de dag skyabs su song //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-10: gnod sbyin gsang ba'i bdag po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-11: 'od chen phyag na rdo rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-12: gzhon nur gyur pa'i sngags rgyal dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-14: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi drung du ni; ;de tshe de dag dam tshig blangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-15: ma rungs sngags ni mi bzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-16: kye ma bdag cag nges bsreg cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-17: de ring khro bos brgyal 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-18: sa yi steng du 'gyel 'gyur bas; ;sems can thugs la thugs brtse bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-19: yongs su bskyab cing bsrung du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-20: de nas 'od chen byis pa'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-21: byang chub sems dpa' des smras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-22: lha dang gnod sbyin srin po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-23: lha min thams cad ma 'jigs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-24: mi dang mi ma yin pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-25: 'byung po ma lus lha rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-26: khyed kyis dam tshig ngas bshad bsrung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-27: rtag tu byams sems gyur nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-28: rtag tu rang gi sngags kyang dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:351b-30: rkang gnyis mchog ni rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-2: gtsug tor spyan la sogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-4: gzi brjid phung po dam brgya la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-5: rnam sbyor gtsug nyor gsang sngags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-6: phyag na padma rnam gzigs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-7: kun tu gzigs pa'i mgon po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-8: khro gnyer sgrol ma grags ldan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-9: lha mo gos dkar mo dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-10: dkar [?] ma dang snyan ldan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-11: rig ma longs spyod ldan ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-12: rta mgrin sngags kyi rgyal po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-14: gtsor ni rgyal bas gsungs pa dang; ;yi ge gcig dang 'khor los bsgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-15: sngags rnams bdag po mnga' bdag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-16: 'od chen sngags kyi mgon po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-17: 'di dag de bzhin dran par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-18: gshin rje gshed ces bya ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-19: khro bo'i gtso bo de yang dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-20: mgon po spyan ras gzigs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-21: thugs ni thugs rje 'byung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-22: thugs rje chen pos thugs brlan par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-23: sangs rgyas snga mas gsungs ba'ang dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-24: sgrol ma skye bo sgrol bar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-25: spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-27: ming gi gzugs ni brtan pa'ang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-28: byang chub sems bzhin spyod pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-29: byang chub spyod byed dam pa'ang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-30: 'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352a-31: grangs med rnam pa mang por yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-0: @352b sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-1: de tshe lha mo rgyu bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-2: bud med gzugs ni gzung nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-3: sngags kyi tshul gyis lus can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-4: de tshe sems can 'dus byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-5: byang chub theg par sbyor bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-7: bsam zhing brtan par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-8: phyag na rdo rje dpa' bo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-9: sngags rnams kun gyi bdag po'ang dran;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-10: bdag ma rig 'dzin lha mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-11: 'jig rten gsum gyis rab mchod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-12: lu gu rgyud dang 'od dpag ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-13: rdo rje khu tshur snyan ldan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-14: khro dbang thig le dkar mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-15: dbyig sngon 'jigs par byed dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-16: 'di dag khro mo pho nya'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-17: rig ma'i spyan du rab tu bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-18: rdo rje'i rigs la gtso bo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-19: gang zhig dran na phan zhing srung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-20: byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-21: 'jig rten dag ni spos glang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-22: byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-23: blo dang mthu chen thob dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-24: sras kyi thu bo gtso bo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-25: kun tu bzang po dge ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-26: de tshe gang gis dran gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-27: de la 'jigs pa yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-28: rtag tu de tshe nor bzang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-29: gnod sbyin dam pa dzambha la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-30: nyan thos rang rgyal ma lus pa; ;dran na 'jigs pa ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-31: kun nas de dag mchod byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-32: srung ba chen por rab tu bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-33: de tshe 'bras bu che lha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:352b-34: bsod nams skyes dang 'du shes med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-0: @353a *// gzugs med gzugs can lha dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-2: dkon mchog gsum la mchod byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-3: rgyal ba'i bstan la rab dang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-4: sngags dang dgra la rtag 'jigs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-5: de dag la ni cung zad med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-6: de ltar dam tshig rjes gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-7: sngags pa kun gyis bsgoms min te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-8: 'di ni khro rgyal mchog ces pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-9: gshin rje gshed kyis brjod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-10: sems can dam tshig la gnas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-11: mi ni ma lus gnod mi nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-12: lha dang lha min thams cad dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-13: de nas yid ni dag 'gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-14: rgyal ba'i sras kyis rab bskul nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-15: thams cad dam tshig bstan gnas 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-16: gnod sbyin bdag po khro ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-17: khyad du gsod tshig brjod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-18: 'jig rten khams ni grang med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-19: de tshe thams cad rab tu 'gul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-20: don med khro bo'i rgyal po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-21: ci yi phyir na 'di bstan byas; ;sems can rnams ni gdul don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-22: de tshe sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-23: khro bo'i rgyal po'i nus pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-24: sngon chad bstan pa ma yin nam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-25: rdo rje can gyis de smras nas; ;rdo rje sa la dor zhing gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-26: rdzu 'phrul chen po byis pa'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-27: blo dang ldan pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353a-28: gzhon nu rab tu bzhad gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-0: tshig 'di dag @353b ni smras pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-1: lag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-2: gnod sbyin chen po sdang ma byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-3: khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-4: 'di ni nga yis rab tu bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-5: de bzhin rjes su sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-6: ji ltar 'dod bzhin rab tu ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-7: khyod kyis khro bo'i mthu dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-8: yongs su bstan par mi nus te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-9: lus 'di gnas shing snang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-10: de nyid khyod kyis drangs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-11: khyod nyid kyi ni snying la dris //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-12: khro bo'i mthu ni khugs pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-13: 'dir ni bzlog par nus pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-14: ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyod la bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-15: gzhan du dam tshig btang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-16: khrus med rab tu nyal ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-17: grong gi chos la rjes 'jug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-18: til mar gyis byugs srung med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-19: rtag tu gdug pa'i sems ldan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-20: sngags mchog thams cad spangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-21: bstan pa la ni ma zhugs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-22: de bzhin mi ni the tshom ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-23: dad pa med cing 'gyod par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-24: dam chos the tshom thob pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-25: de spong mnyam par ma bzhag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-26: gcer bu rtag par lhag mar ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-27: mi gtsang spyod pa'i spyod yul dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-28: mi brtson sngags dang mi ldan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-29: rtag tu brtse med lhag mar ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-30: lha yi gnas dang mchod rten dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-32: 'khrig pa la ni mngon dga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-33: khro bos de dag rnam par 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:353b-34: dam tshig nyams dang dad med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-2: cung zad shes pa 'khrul pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-3: spyod pa 'khrul pa de dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-4: khro bos rnam par 'jig par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-5: mi yi 'jig rten rnam kun tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-6: bag yod pa ni med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-7: bag med shin tu 'dod chags can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-8: dam tshig nyams shing skyon ldan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-9: sngags rnams legs par sbyar ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-10: khro bo'i rgyal por 'joms par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-11: bag med rigs min 'gro ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-12: byis pas rnam kun thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-13: rtag tu 'dod chags bral gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-14: rang rgyal dgra bcom nyan thos kun; ;khro bo yi ni rgyal po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-15: thams cad du ni 'ching dang gcod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-16: de skad smras nas 'jam dpal ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-17: snying rje yi ni brlan sems kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-18: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-19: rdzu 'phrul spyod pa bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-20: de skad smras nas de dag kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-21: cang mi smra bar gyur nas gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-22: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-23: phyir yang rdo rje rab tu blangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-24: de tshe rdo rje blangs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-25: khro rgyal mthu ni shes nas dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-26: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-27: gshin rje gshed kyi yongs su bsngags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354a-28: sngags kyi bdag nyid chen po'i nges par sdom pa'i le'u rab 'byams las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-0: sum cu @354b rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-1: de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la bltas te gnas gtsang ma'i steng na 'dug par gyur ba'i tshogs de dag la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-2: dang po re zhig grogs po khyed cag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-3: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-4: pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-6: gshin rje'i 'tsho ba mthar byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-7: sems can ma rungs pa tshar gcod pa de gtsor byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-8: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-9: de'i ras ris kyi cho ga yod de nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-10: chos grangs dang ni rgyu skar dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-11: smyung ba dag kyang mi bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-12: dgra yi 'jigs pa byung ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-13: ras ris 'di ni bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-14: mar ngo'i zlas phyed dag gnas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-15: tshes grangs bcu bzhi'am brgyad dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-16: bram ze dam pa mchog dag gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-17: dur khrod shi ba'i ro snyed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-18: de ni mtshan mo mun par blangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-19: de yi khrag gis tshon rtsi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-20: ras ni chu yis lan gsum bkru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-21: de nas de ni bskam bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-22: 'di byed gdug sems khro ldan zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-23: 'jigs par byed pas pri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-24: mar ngo'i zla phyed dur khrod du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-25: zhag ni gsum mam bdun du bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-26: tshes brgyad bcu bzhi'i nub mor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-27: zhag chen mar mes sbar ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-28: der gnas ri mor byed pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:354b-29: rtag tu g-yas kyi phyogs su blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-2: mnyam par bzhag ste bsrung ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-3: dgra yi sdug bsngal gyis nyen na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-4: yang na sngags pa rang gis bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-5: dang po'i mtshan [?] mor rtsom pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-6: dgra rnams lus la tsha ba 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-7: gnyis par tsha ba chen po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-8: dgra rnams brgyal bas gnon par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-9: gsum pa'i mtshan mor srog 'dor zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-11: sngags pa rab tu ma dad na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-12: de la zhi ba ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-13: dgra yi lus ni skams 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-15: gshin rje gshed ni 'jigs chen gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-16: ras ris 'di ni bris tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-17: zhal drug zhabs drug phyag drug bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-18: kha dog sngo zhing gsus pa 'phyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-19: khro ldan thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-20: stag gi pags pa rab tu mnabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-21: mtshon cha sna tshogs mi bzad ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-22: lag na dbyug to 'jigs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-23: spyan ni dmar zhing khro dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-24: spyan gsum dag gi rnam par mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-25: skra 'bar gyen du brdzes pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-26: de bzhin la lar du ba'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-27: mig sman nag po mi bzad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-28: dbyar gyi sprin dang 'dra ba'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-29: gshin rje'i gzugs dang 'dra ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-30: ma he la zhon yang dag bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-31: gdug pa'i las can 'jigs pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355a-32: drag cing drag po 'joms byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-0: sems can 'jigs par @355b byed pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-2: shin tu gdug pa'i las can dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-3: 'jigs shing shin tu mi bzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-4: lus can thams cad gsod byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-6: bdag gi khrag gi tshogs dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-7: khro bo mchog 'di bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-8: zhag chen po yi zhag dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-9: shin tu dmar ba'i tshon bsres bris //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-10: tshon rtsi'i snod du thod pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-11: mi yi rus pas par shing bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-12: shi ba'i skra las byas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-13: pir dang pir ni bcing ba'ang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-14: rang ngam ri mo mkhan gyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-15: de nas zas mi bza' bar bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-16: gtor ma me tog mang po sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-17: phreng ba dmar dang tsandan dmar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-18: sha chen tshil gyi spos dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-19: zhag gi spos kyis mchod pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-20: ras ris dam pa de la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-21: dang po bar mthar mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-22: ras ris yongs su rdzogs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-23: ri mo mkhan la sbyin pa'ang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-24: nor ni rab tu mang po'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-25: yang na gang gis dge ba'ang sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-26: las kyang 'jigs pa chen po bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-27: de yi don med mi bya'o //
