K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-28: mdor na dpa' bo'i rin du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-29: ji ltar 'dod pa de la bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-30: bzo bo'i las ni 'bras bcas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-31: kha zas med pa'ang rnam par spang;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-32: ji ltar de ni yang dag dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-33: de lta de ltar rab tu sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-34: srung pa chen po'ang rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:355b-36: gzo bo bza' dang bcas 'jigs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-1: gis kyang ni mngon par bsrung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-2: rig pa bzlas nas bya ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-3: gzhan du cho gar brjod pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-4: ras ris yongs su gsal byas pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-5: yid la 'dod pa byas mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-6: gdug pa'i dgra rnams 'joms byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-7: las ni thams cad byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-8: ras ris mchog blangs 'gro ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-10: phyogs chen rgyal po chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-11: sems can de ni dregs bcas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-12: mngon pa'i nga rgyal nga rgyal che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-13: gdug dang gdug pa'i las rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-14: dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-15: chad par smra dang sngags spangs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-16: sngags rnams mchod par mi byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-17: de la dad rten smod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-18: gang yang zlos pa smod byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-19: de bzhin mchod rten khyad du gsod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-20: cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-21: de dag la ni sbyor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-22: sems can kun dang skyob pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-23: rtag tu de bzhin chos mi ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-24: de dag la ni las rab sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-26: lung tang 'bras bu sngags bzlas blangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-27: rtsa ba dang ni shun pa'ang blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-28: 'bras bu'i rang skyur yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-29: mi yi rus phye legs btags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-30: yungs mar dang ni dug nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-31: star bu dang ni lang tang tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356a-32: ske tshe dang yang khrag nyid kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-0: mi las yang dag byung ba @356b dag ;thams cad blangs nas yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-1: ras ris dben pa'i phyogs su bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-2: sgrub po lho phyogs mngon bltas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-3: ras ris kyang ni byang du bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-4: me thab ji 'dod byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-5: tsha zhing skam pa'i shing dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-6: me thab de la mnyam gzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-7: dur khrod me yis sbar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-8: thams cad ldan pas bsreg byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-9: cho gar bstan pa'i sbyin sreg yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-10: khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-11: me lha dag ni spyan drang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-12: las rnams dag ni kun la'ang 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-13: mdung gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-14: me thab la ni khror bcas pas; ;rtsa brgyad stong gi sreg blugs sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-15: dang por bu dag 'chi ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-16: sems can zhugs nas de bzhin 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-17: gnyis pa la ni chung ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-18: 'khor dang gtso bor bcas pa'ang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-19: de la gsum par 'chi ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-20: gang gi ched du byas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-21: gang tshe mtshan phyed bzlas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-22: ras ris mdun du byed pa'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-23: dgra rnams gsad par bya phyir te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-24: de ni de dang mthun par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-27: mes tshig rlung ni chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-29: thams cad bsdus pa'i tshogs dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-30: pha rol tshogs kyis gnod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:356b-31: de la gnod pa sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-0: nad chen dag gis yang dag @357a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-1: khyab; ;rgyal po de yi lus kun kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-2: skam par 'di la the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-3: de yi khyim ni thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-4: mi ma yin pas yang dag dkrugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-5: mal du brtan pa mi rnyed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-7: srin po yi dvags sha rjen zas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-8: de yi khyim ni yongs su bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-9: thams cad du ni nyam thag 'jigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-10: sdug bsngal drag pos sdug bsngal 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-11: sa steng lha yi dbang phyug sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-12: de yi srung ba byed mi nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-13: 'jig rten skyong ba tshangs sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-14: brgya byin sogs pa sum cu'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-15: sngags kun lha dang bcas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-16: 'jig rten kun las byung ba'ang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-17: nga rgyal gyis 'khrugs ma rungs dgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-18: de yi 'tsho ba de mthar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-19: mtshan phyed nyi ma gung dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-20: gang du khros nas zlos byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-21: gshin rje khros pa mngon sum ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-22: bsrung bar yang ni nus ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-23: mar ngo'i zla phyed ci 'dod par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-24: sa steng ras ris bzhag nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-25: gtor ma mchod pa che bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-26: dur khrod dgon pa'i gnas dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-27: shing gcig de bzhin rtags dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-28: brag dang bas mtha' phug kyang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-29: gcig pu gnyis su med par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-30: rtag tu las rnams yang dag brtsams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-31: dgon ba chen po dben pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357a-32: lha yi khang pa stong pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-0: khang stong dang @357b ni chu bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-1: rgya mtsho'i 'gram la brten pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-2: grong khyer de dang nye ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-3: der gnas yang na ci 'dod par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-4: dpag tshad brgya yi tshad tsam nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-5: rtag tu las rnams bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-6: gtsang ba'i yul ni brgya dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-7: tshad med yul du gnas pa'ang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-8: sngags kyi rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-9: zlos pa'i grub pa bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-10: las ni bsam mi khyab par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-12: gshin rje gshed ni bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-13: khro bo'i rgyal po bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-14: las dang rdzu 'phrul yul dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-16: bsam gyis mi khyab zlos pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-17: sa steng 'di la grub pa snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-18: byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-19: kun gyis bsrung bar yong mi nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-20: 'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-21: gza' dang ma mo smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-22: dbang ldan dang ni khyab 'jug gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-23: skem byed dang ni brgya byin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-24: rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras dag ni; ;dam tshig 'dzin par byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-25: sa bcu la ni yang dag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-26: byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-27: gang zhig dgra bcom rang rgyal dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-28: rdzu 'phrul chen po chags bral ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-29: dam tshig sngon byas de dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-30: bsrung bar yang ni mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:357b-31: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-1: gyis; ;zlos pa sems ni ma dad na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-2: gzhan gyis nus par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-3: sngags ba mchog ni mi dga' na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-4: de 'dir zhi ba ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-5: bdag nyid chen po gshin rje gshed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-6: khro bo'i rgyal po zlos pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-7: gang tshe yid ni dang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-8: gang tshe snying rjes brlan gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-9: de tshe de ni zhi thob pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-12: rang skyur dug dang ldan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-13: khrag dang mi yi sha dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-14: lan tshva tsha ba gsum dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-15: ske tshe dung gi phye ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-16: star bu dang ni sra ma gyi sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-17: lang tang tshe yi rtsa ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-18: de bzhin ko sha ta ka'i dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-19: ae randa rtsa nas tshig thal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-20: leb rgan rtsi dang gze ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-21: po son cha yi rtsa ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-22: de bzhin sgog skya ke'u dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-23: gzhan gyi zhag dang chu dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-24: kun dong chang ni btung bar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-25: 'di kun cha mnyam byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-26: ras ris nye bar sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-27: sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-28: zla ba phyed kyi nang du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-29: bu dang gnyen sdug bcas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-32: gnyis pa'i nang du sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-33: de yi rtsad nas 'byin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358a-34: zlos pas me nang sbyin sreg byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-0: gsum pa'i dus su phyin @358b pa na; ;de yi grong rdal bcas de la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-1: mu ge dag ni 'byung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-3: srin pos kun tu khyab pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-4: mes tshig rdo yi char 'bab dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-5: rdo rje dang ni thog kyang 'bab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-6: ljongs dang phyogs dang yul dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-7: ji snyed rgyal po de la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-9: de bzhin gzhan gyi dmag tshogs 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-10: de yi yul du 'tshe ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-11: du ma mang po dag kyang 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-12: dpal min mang po rab ston pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-14: lang tang rtsa bas sbyin sreg byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-16: tsha bas rtag tu sbyin sreg byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-17: tsha ba chen po skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-18: shin tu skyur bas sbyin sreg byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-19: grang ba'i rims ni yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-20: ma rungs rgyal po stobs kyis dregs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-21: de yi lus la de dag 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-22: phyogs chen nor dang ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-23: gdug cing dpung tshe yang dag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-24: de yi 'tsho ba tha ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-25: nub gnyis yang na bdun gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-26: gang zhig gang la dad lha 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-27: skyes pa'i skar ma ming yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-28: ras ris mdun du gzugs bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-29: dur khrod sol bas bris pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-30: mgro la rdog pas mnan nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-31: khro bas bzlas pa brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-32: glo bur rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-33: mi yi bdag po zug gzer 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:358b-34: nad chen pos ni thebs 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-2: yang na dgra stas gcod pa 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-3: yan lag dag kyang mi tshang 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-4: sdig can mi ma yin pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-5: srin po gdug pas za bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-6: bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-7: sha rjen za dang srul po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-8: sha za yi dvags ma mo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-9: de yi mod la'ang gsod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-10: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-12: sangs rgyas kun la phyag btsal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-13: de nas cang mi smra bar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-15: 'di skad du ni yang smras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-16: gnod sbyin mo ni thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-17: gnod sbyin kun tshogs bos nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-18: de tshe gnod sbyin bdag po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-19: byang chub sems dpas smras pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-20: gnod sbyin rnams kyis ras ris smras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-21: 'dod pa kun dang nye bar ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-22: 'gugs par byed dang dbang byed kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-23: zug rdu ma lus yang dag 'byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-25: 'dod chags ldongs pa'am rmongs pa'i blos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-26: bde gshegs bkas kyang bzlog pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-27: gnyen pos kyang ni mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-28: thog med pa yi 'khor ba nas; ;shin tu sdug bsngal rgyu sngon byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-29: de dag sdug bsngal sdug bsngal bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-30: snying rje chen pos 'gro ba gdungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359a-31: tshangs spyod dbang po dul bas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359b-1: bzas po shis par bstan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359b-2: mthar ni zhi ba'ang thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359b-3: theg pa gsum la brten nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359b-4: mya ngan 'das pa legs par thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359b-5: bzlog pa blo ngan gyis zin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359b-6: 'dod chags kyis ldongs dka' thub med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359b-7: 'khor ba mi bzad tshang tshing gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359b-9: de dag sdug bsngal ldan don du; ;'dod pa'i longs spyod rjod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359b-10: khro bo 'di ni mnyes byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359b-11: sdig pa kun las ldog par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359b-12: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359b-13: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi mngon spyod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359b-14: legs par sdom pa'i le'u rab 'byams las sum cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359b-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur pa de stan las langs te sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tsal nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359b-16: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs gnyis la btud do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:359b-17: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la bltas nas tshig 'di smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360a-1: cad la gnod par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360a-2: 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sngags dang rgyud bshad na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis nges par chos 'di ni ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang gi phyir snying rje chen pos rab tu phye zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu zhugs na 'khor ba'i 'ching ba las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360a-9: sems can la gnod par byed pa'i chos ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360a-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi ched du gsungs pa ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360a-11: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu zhugs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la smras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360a-13: ji ltar khyod smra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360a-14: ji ltar khyod rab tu ston pa de bzhin du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360a-16: byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-0: de bzhin du bsgrub par @360b bya; ;ji ltar sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-1: byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bstan par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-2: don dam par ni yang dag pa'i mtha' las yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag par brten nas chos kyi mtha' las grol ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-3: sems can mtha' ni bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-4: rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-5: sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-6: byang chub spyod pa'ang bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-7: gdul ba'i sems can la brten nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-8: phan pa'i spyod pa bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-10: bsam mi khyab par yongs su bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-11: rgyud rnams kun la rgyud 'di yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-12: mthu ni bsam mi khyab pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-13: gshin rje gshed ni bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-14: khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-15: yul gsum dag kyang bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-16: rtogs pa'i bdag nyid bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-19: chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'i sgrub pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:360b-21: byang chub sems dpa' sngags zlos ba na 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361a-0: 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can 'dod pa la lhag par chags pas bsod nams ma yin pa shin tu rab tu @361a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361a-1: mang po 'phel bas dmyal ba chen por skye zhing sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu mang po 'di 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361a-2: sems can 'di dag byang chub rnam pa gsum gyis skal ba med par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361a-4: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sngags zlos pas sems nye bar gzhag par bya zhing thabs mkhas pa 'di la mngon spyod kyis las rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361a-5: las thams cad la yang mtshan mar 'dzin par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361a-6: mi dge bar 'dzin par mi bya zhing snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis sems can gdul ba'i thabs la yang bslab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361a-15: 'gro ba'i bdag nyid chen po sems can gdul ba'i thabs sgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361a-16: chos kyi dbyings sgrub pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu rtogs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361a-17: de nyid chos ston bas sems can smin pa'i thabs kyang rab tu sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361a-19: de bzhin du bdag cag gis bslab par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361a-23: bstan par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361b-1: gang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dam tshig chen po la zhugs pa de thams cad kyis mnyan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361b-4: mi dge ba 'tshol ba nyid du bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa la mngon par dga' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la rnam par bltas nas cang mi smra bar gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361b-8: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes yid la byas nas sangs rgyas la rnam par lta bzhin du rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361b-9: de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la rnam par bltas nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i cho ga yang smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361b-11: sems can gyi khams la brten pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs khyed cag nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361b-12: dang po re zhig bsrung ba byas la khro bo'i rgyal po'i ras ris de yongs su blangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361b-13: gnas dben par song nas dbang phyug chen po'i rtags gcig pa'i gnas su rtags de la dug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:361b-17: shing pi tsu mar da'i me tog gis mchod cing mi'i rgyu ma rlon pa dag gis bdag nyid la mchod phyir thogs byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362a-1: mgo bo'i thod pa g-yas pa'i lag na thogs pas brdegs pa lta bur byas la lag pa g-yon pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis mtshan gcig po la sdigs ba bzhin du byed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362a-2: gtsor khro ba'i dbang du gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362a-3: rgyal po ma rungs pas brnyas pa chen po'i sems kyis byas pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362a-4: gzhan skyon can gyi skyes bu phyogs chen po dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362a-5: nor chen po dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362a-6: rab tu gtum pa chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362a-7: gtso bo chen po dag gis khyad du gsod par 'gyur na sgo bcad pa byas la gcer bur byas shing skra bshig pas dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan la khro bo'i sngags ji srid dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan dkyil du gas par gyur ba de srid du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362a-8: dum bu gnyis su gyur na yi ge h'um gi sgra chen po yang thos par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362a-9: de la 'jigs par yang mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362a-10: de thos pa'i dbang gis rgyal po ma rungs pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362a-11: gzhan gang la la dbung chen po dang ldan pa'i dag de'i mod la rims chen pos zin par 'gyur ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362a-12: srin po la sogs pa mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362a-13: de nyid ji srid yud tsam du bzlas pa byas na de'i mod la dgra rnams kyis 'tsho ba ni mtha' mar 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362b-0: gal te mtshan mo bzlas na ni gza' 'khor dang bcas pa 'jig par @362b 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362b-2: las su 'gyur ba ni de bzhin du dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su nyi ma phyed la song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362b-3: nim pa'i lo mas mchod cing sha chen po'i spos kyis bdugs la; ji srid dgra'i khyim du mes tshig pa'i bar du bzlas pa byas na dgra yang 'dar ba'i rims chen pos thebs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362b-4: yang na khros pas bzlas pa ma btang zhing g-yas phyogs su rtags kyang yod na dgra de 'chi bar 'gyur zhing rigs rgyud 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362b-5: ci ste slar gso bar byed na ni rtags de chus phyir yang rab tu bkrus la shin tu bsil ba'i 'o mas khrus byas na slar yang sos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362b-7: dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan g-yas phyogs su bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362b-9: tsher ma can gyi shing gis me rab tu sbar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362b-10: shing p'a kang ta ka'i yam shing la dug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362b-12: ske tshe la mngon par btags la stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg byas na dgra thams cad nad chen pos thebs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362b-13: las thams cad kyis kyang nus pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362b-14: zhag gnyis pa la ni rims nad chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362b-15: zug gzer chen pos thebs pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362b-16: nad rnam pa sna tshogs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:362b-17: mi ma yin pas zin cing mthar 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363a-0: zhag gsum pa la grangs gsum gyis @363a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363a-1: byas na ni 'tsho ba thams cad kyis thams cad du 'dor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363a-2: slar gso bar byed na ni'o ma'i sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur zhing yul mi thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363a-3: dgra thams cad kyang sos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363a-4: de bzhin du lha thams cad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363a-6: 'byung po thams cad gang zhig gang gi lha la dad pa de rkang pas mnan pa'i las bya ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363a-7: yang na de'i rgyu skar ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363a-9: ming dag la rkang pas mnan la las byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig pa ni ma gtogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363a-11: thams cad kyis kyang zhabs kyi mthe bong g-yon pa bzung ste las bya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363a-14: gang yang 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi sngags ni mnan nas las bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363a-15: khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas pa ma grub pa nyid kyang bzlas pa tsam kho nas las rnams byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363a-16: sngags thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363a-18: sngags thams cad nus pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363a-21: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi chogs kyang ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar thams cad sgrub par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363b-0: bzlas pa tsam gyis re ba thams @363b cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363b-1: khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags 'di bzlas pa tsam kho nas grub pa nyid de grub pa dam pa'ang rjes su rab tu sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363b-2: yid la 'dod pas dgra rnams 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363b-3: mdung rtse chen bo'i phyag rgya dang ldan par byas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363b-4: las gzhan du'ang 'gyur pa ni nyi ma phyag la dur khyod du song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363b-5: sreg pa'i sar mtshan gcig smyung ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363b-6: mar ngo'i bcu bzhi la dur khrod kyi shing gis me rab tu sbar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363b-8: khrag gis btags pa'i ske tshes sbyin sreg byas na de las ha ha zhes pa'i sgra sgrogs shin gyi dvags thams cad 'ong par 'gyur na 'jigs par mi bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363b-9: dgra la gnod pa gyis shig ces byas na de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363b-10: de nas yud tsam gyis dpag tshad stong du yang song nas dgra rnams 'jom par byed cing rigs rgyud kyang brlag par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363b-11: de la sogs pa'i las mang po byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363b-13: las su 'gyur ba ni dben pa'i phyogs gtsang mar gos gtsang ma bgos te khang stong du rab tu zhugs nas mi'i rus pa'i sreg blugs kyis stong rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:363b-14: de nas thal ba de lag pa gnyi gas blangs la gos gtsang ma'i dum bu la so sor bcings te thum po gnyis su byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364a-1: kha sbyar gnyis kyi nang du so sor bzhag la bdag nyid srung ba chen po byas nas rdzas de blangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364a-2: khyim du slar zhugs nas mtshan mo dur khrod chen por song nas mar ngo'i bcu bzhi 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364a-3: tshes brgyad la mi sreg pa'i sar bzhag cing lho phyogs su bltas nas kham phor kha sbyar gnyis blangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364a-4: langs shing gcer bur byas te skra bshig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364a-5: khro ba dang bcas pas 'jigs par byas te rig pa stong phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na thal ba de grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364a-6: mi gang su dag rdzas de slong par gyur na sbyin par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364a-7: gal te tshan khar slong bar byed na ni khro bo'i rgyal po dran nas yi ge h'um rab tu sbyar ba byas na de'i mod la 'byer par 'gyur ro; ;bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms par yang cho ga 'di nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364a-9: g-yas pas blangs pa'i thal bas ni rtags mtshan bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364a-10: bag yod pas bsrung ba'ang byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364a-11: tho rangs nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su slar 'ong bar bya ba na khrus byas shing gtsang zhing gtsang ba'i gos bgos te rang gi khyim du 'jug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364a-14: de nas lag pa g-yas pa gang gis blangs pa'i thal ba des mi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364b-1: srog chags 'byung po thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364b-2: lha dang bcas pa'i klu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364b-3: gnod sbyin rnams kyis spyi bor gtor na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364b-4: gang lag pa g-yon pas blangs pa'i thal ba des ni mi'i bud med thams cad kyi spyi bor gtor na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364b-5: lag pa g-yas pas blangs pa'i thal ba gang yin pa des mi rnams kyi lte ba'i phyogs sam; pho mtshan gyi phyogs su gtor na grong ba'i chos bsten pa la nus pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364b-6: gang zhig bud mad la mngon par chags pa de'i gsang ba'i gnas su thal ba'i phye mas gtor na skyes pa gzhan brten pa la nus pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364b-7: skyes bu gzhan brten pa la rma med par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364b-8: ji srid rang gi skyes pa nyid thob na ni phyir yang de'i rma'i sgo de rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364b-9: 'dod pas log par g-yem bsten pa la yang nus pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364b-10: de bzhin du skyes pa la yang skyes pa'i dbang po la lag pa g-yas pas thal ba'i phye mas gtor na de yang gzhan gyi bud med la 'gro ba'i nus pa med par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364b-11: yongs su rnyid pa bzhin du de nyid 'byung zhing gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:364b-12: ji srid du rang gi chung ma de nyid dang yang phrad na phyir yang rnyid pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365a-0: bud med gang la thal ba gtor bar 'gyur ba de med par @365a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365a-2: yang na ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365a-3: gal te nan gyis byed na ni gsang ba'i phyogs su srin bu rnams rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365a-4: de dag gis zos pa na 'tsho ba yang 'gag par 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365a-5: zla ba gcig gi nang du rul bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365a-6: dri mi zhim zhing ro myangs par 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365a-7: gcin sri ba'i nad la sogs pas skyes bu zin par 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365a-8: skrangs nad chen po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365a-9: gang de dag gi nad kyis dus byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365a-10: yang na gzhan gyis bud med l;a bsten par 'dod na yang nus pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365a-11: ji ltar ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365a-12: gal te gtor ba tsam gyis thal ba dang phrad par ma gyur na mthong ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365a-13: ma mthong ba la yang mthun pa'i rlung dang sbyar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365a-14: thal pa gtor te; de la thal ba cung zad kyang babs par 'gyur ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365a-15: gtor bar byed pas yid kyis bsams te thal ba gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365a-16: gang brtsams par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis las rnams byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-0: gtor na ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad kyi las byed par 'gyur gyi gzhan @365b du ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-1: ci ste gnas mal la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-3: gos la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-7: gdugs la sogs pa yo byad thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-8: lhag ma ni bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-10: bca' ba la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-11: lus thams cad la dgos pa'i cha byas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-15: spos la sogs pa 'di dag thams cad la thal ba'i phye mas gtor na dgra de dag lus la shig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-16: ma kun ta'i srin bu rnams kyis kun nas khyab par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-17: shing ji ltar ba bzhin du za bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-18: rmi lam ngan pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-19: zhag bdun gyis kyang 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-21: lha thams cad kyis kyang bzlog par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-22: sngags thams cad kyis kyang bsrung bar mi nus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-23: grang gis thal ba gtong bar byed pa ni ma gtogs so; ;ci ste slar gso bar byed na ni shing mngar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-25: tsandan dkar po gcig tu byas la chu grang mo la btags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-26: de nas spyi bo nas bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:365b-27: rkang ba'i mthil gyi bar du de'i lus la byugs shing 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas na sos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366a-1: lus su bya ba ni mthun pa'i rlung gi phyogs gang du 'dod pa der song nas bud med mkha' 'gro ma ma rungs pa nga rgyal can thams cad la yang sbyor ba bya ste gzhan la ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366a-2: mthun pa'i rlung yod pa de nyid la gnas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366a-3: bcom ldan 'das yid la bsams te thal ba gtor na mo mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366a-4: nu ma thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366a-5: skyes pa la yang kha spu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366a-8: nu ma yang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366a-9: de lta bur rnam pa mang po du ma'i las kyang byed pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366a-10: gzhan byed du gzhug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366a-11: yang na gang dga' ba skye ba de byed du gzhug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366a-12: bud med dam skyes pa gang la sems dga' ba skye ba de la thal ba de byin na ji ltar 'dod pa'i las byed du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366a-14: de ltar nad chen po dag gis kyang 'debs su gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366a-15: bcom ldan 'das yid la bsams nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366a-16: thal ba'i lag pas spyi bo la reg na klad pa zug gzer skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366a-17: kha la reg par byas na kha'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366a-18: de bzhin du mthar gyis snying gi bar du reg par byas na snying gi nad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366b-0: de bzhin du rkang pa @366b gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366b-1: rje ngar gnyis la reg par byas na yang khrag las byung ba'i nad khrag 'khrug pa la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'debs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366b-4: dbang du byed par yang 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366b-5: ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar de thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366b-8: dbang du byed par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366b-9: shin tu thag ring po na gnas kyang las thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366b-10: mkhar shin tu bgrod dka' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366b-11: nye ba mthun pa'i rlung yod par gnas par byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366b-12: lag pa gnyis kas thal ba de nyid blangs la yang dag par gtor na ra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366b-14: yang thog kyang rab tu ltung bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366b-15: mkhar srung ba yang ltung bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366b-16: mes tshig pa chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366b-18: rnam par 'tshe ba chen pos kyang nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366b-19: thams cad bor nas rab tu 'byer bar yang 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366b-20: yang na skyabs su mngon par 'gro bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366b-21: de ltar gzhan gyi dpung la yang mthun pa'i rlung yod pa'i phyogs su thal ba gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:366b-23: sde chen po yang 'jig par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-1: rkang thang la sogs pa'i sde dpon yang 'jig par 'gyur ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-2: skyabs su mngon par 'gro bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-3: de ltar rnam pa du ma ci 'dod pa rnams kyis dgra rnams 'jig par bya ba'i phyir las byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-6: grogs po dag la yang srung ba chen po'i don du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-7: ci ste slar gso ba byed na ni thams cad du 'o ma'i zas kyis 'tsho zhing thams cad la ras ris kyi mdun du 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong gis sbyin sreg byas na sos par 'gyur zhing mi snang bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-8: ci ste gnod sbyin mo bsgrub par 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-9: gar byed 'dud ma rje btsun ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-10: nam gru mar yang rnam par grags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-11: mdzes ma mun pa snang byed ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-13: brgyad po 'di dag gnod sbyin mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-14: 'dod pa thams cad rab sgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-15: gar byed ma'i sngags ni; ;aom na ti mah'a na ti a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-16: di bya r'u pa n'i sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-17: 'di'i cho ga ni spang leb bam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-18: ras la mngon par bris la sha 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-19: 'o ma'i zas za zhing rig pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-20: aa mra'i shing gi rtsa bar gnas shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367a-21: sngo bsangs su gnas pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367b-3: lag pa g-yas pas sgrub pa po la sdigs mdzub byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367b-4: lag pa g-yon bas shing gi yal ga 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367b-5: yan lag thams cad mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367b-6: dar la rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gos bgos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367b-7: khro bo'i rgyal po de nyid kyi ras ris kyi mdun du bdag byang du mngon par bltas te 'dug la shing pa la shas me rab tu sbar la gu gul gyi ril bu dag la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367b-10: dus gsum du zhag bdun gyi bar du sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367b-11: de nas zhag bdun pa la gtor ma rgya chen po byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367b-12: mar gyi mar me yang rab tu sbar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367b-13: ji srid nam phyed pa de'i bar du bzlas pa byas te 'dug na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367b-14: de'i 'og tu gnod sbyin mo de rang nyid snang ba chen por byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367b-15: rang gi gzugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367b-16: 'ongs nas kyang smra bar bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367b-17: ngas ci zhig bya zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367b-18: de nas sgrub pa pos brjod par bya ba ni khyod nga'i chung mar gyis shig ces bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367b-19: de ltar bgyi'o zhes byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:367b-20: de nas bzung nas chung mar gyur te rang gi gnas su khyer nas 'dod pa thams cad ster bar byed cing bcud kyis len yang rab tu ster bar byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368a-2: gnod sbyin chen po dang rab tu 'gran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368a-3: gal te ma 'ongs na ni lan gnyis pa la khro bo'i sngags dang lhan cig bzlas pa byas na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368a-4: gal te ma 'ongs na ni khro bo 'chol pa'i rgyal pos 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368a-6: aom na tte shu kl'a m'a ba ra m'a lya dh'a ri ne mee thu na pri ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368a-8: rje btsun ma'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368a-9: aom bha tte bhatte aam ba lo ki ni ki nytsi r'a ya si /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368a-10: ae hye hi 'a gtstsha a'a ga tstsha a'a ga tstsha ma' ma k'a ryam ku ru sv'a ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368a-11: de nyid kyis ni ras ris med kyang 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368a-12: ri'i rtse mor dkyil 'khor byas la gu gul gyi du bas bdugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368a-13: gcig pu mi smra bar gnas shing gtsang spra byas te sgo bcad la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368a-14: rig pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas na zla ba gcig gi mtshan mo nges par 'ong bar 'gyur zhing 'ongs nas kyang 'dod pa spyad pa byas na chung mar 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368a-15: gal te de khyim du zhugs na ni lo stong phrag lnga'i bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368a-16: gal te ma zhugs na ni dzam bu'i gling gi lo lnga brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing rnam par spyod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-0: de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed cing lung @368b thams cad la yang dag par 'grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-1: de dang lhan cig gang du 'dod pa der 'gro zhing bcud kyis len rab tu sbyin par byed la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-2: sdug pa'i chung ma bzhin du phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yang rab tu byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-5: aom rakte rak t'a ba bh'a si rakta rakta le ba ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-6: gnod sbyin mchog ni nam gru ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-7: sbyor ba la dga' rjod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-8: cung zad dmar ba'i gos gyon zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-9: sngo zhing 'khyil ba'i skra yang yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-10: yan lag kun mdzes gnod sbyin mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-11: 'dod pa spyod la rtag tu dga'/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-12: 'dod dang longs spyod rtag tu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-13: mchog sbyin par ni rtag tu ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-14: snga ma bzhin du ras la mngon par bris la 'di'i khyad par ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-15: dar la dmar po gyon zhing dar la dmar pos stod g-yogs byas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-16: kha dog dmar bar yang snang ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-18: aom me kha le ma h'a yakhsi n'i ma ma k'a ryam sam p'a da ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-19: 'og pag ma bzang mo'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-20: aom me kha le su ma kha le ma h'a yaksha n'i sarba aartha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-22: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ne sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-24: aom a'a lo ka ni lo ka ba te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-25: 'di dag gi cho ga yang de nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-26: mun pa mdzes ma'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:368b-27: aom shr'i nu gu hya ke shr'i nu gu hya ke hye hi gu hya hi gu hya ke sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369a-1: cho ga la ni ras ris kyi cho ga ni 'di la med do /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369a-2: dang por re zhig gtsang zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369a-3: zla ba nya ba la gnas dben bar 'dug nas sgo bcad de snang ba med par mun pa'i gnas su rig pa stong phrag bcu bzlas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369a-4: de nas sgrub pa pos brtsam par bya ba ni zla ba nya nas brtsams nas zla ba nya gnyis pa'i bar 'dir las su bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369a-5: mtshan mo nyal ba'i dus su mal du 'dug nas mi snang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs su gcig pu sgo bcad la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369a-7: b'a na ka'i me tog legs par kha 'bus pa yungs mar dang bsres pas lag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369a-9: lag pa g-yas pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369a-10: mi smra ba'i dka' thub kyis bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369a-11: de bzhin du nyin re zhing ma chad par zla ba nya ba'i bar du byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369a-12: de nas mtshan phyed tsam na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369a-13: 'ongs nas kyang mi smra bar bya zhing cang mi smra bar gyur pas 'dod pa bsten par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369a-14: gang gi tshe zla ba drug na smra ba de'i tshe smra bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369a-15: de nas bzung nas chung mar 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369a-16: 'dod pa thams cad ster ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369a-17: 'di la lha'i reg pa bzang po yang sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369b-0: nyin par ma @369b mthong ba kho nar yang las thams cad sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369b-2: bcud kyis len pa rnams kyang rab tu ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369b-3: rgyab tu zhon na ni ri rab tu yang khyer bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369b-4: mtshan mo dzam bu'i gling kun tu yang 'khor bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369b-5: dpag tshad brgya na yod pa'i dgra de dag kyang 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369b-6: ji skad bstan pa de thams cad sgrub par byed do; ;gzhan gyi bud med la 'gro ba ni ma gtogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369b-7: gzhan gyi bud med la 'gro bar byed pa'i cho ga ni 'di dag thams cad la yang sbyar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369b-9: lhan cig yang dag par bsten par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369b-10: gal te gzhan gyi bud med la 'gro bar gyur na ni 'chi ba skyed par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369b-11: 'di ni mun nag mdzes ma zhes bya ba gnod sbyin mo stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor bsad sgrub pa pos 'grub par gyur na nyin te zhing gnod sbyin mo'i bran mo re re gtong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369b-12: blon po'i 'khor du ma dang ldan pa dang; gnod sbyin mo thams cad na'ang rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369b-13: mun pas bskor ba 'di dag thams cad kyang cho ga tha dad ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang kyang gzhan de dag ni mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:369b-14: mun nag chen po na gnas pa zhes bya pa'i gnod sbyin mo rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-1: 'jig rten rnam par grags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-2: mna' ma gnod sbyin mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-4: bdun pa lha mdzes ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-5: 'di dag ni gnod sbyin mo bdun dag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-6: sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-7: sa rnams ma lus dag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-9: cung zad kyi ni dus dag tu'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-10: lha yi gnas su'ang 'gro bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-11: lha dang lha min g-yul dag tu'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-13: chos ldan snying ni brtse ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-14: sems can 'dod cing mnyes gshin bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-15: sems can phan pa'i 'dod don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-16: sa steng dag tu yongs su rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-17: de la bsgrub dka' cung zad med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-18: dge ba'i las rnams ma lus byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-19: sems can longs spyod don du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-20: byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-22: aom gu hi li gu ha pa ti gu ha b'a si ni a'a na ya bha ga ba ti ma m'a ti kam sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-23: seng ldeng gis me rab tu sbar la pri yang ku'i me tog la mar gyis btags te zla ba gcig gi bar du dus gsum du sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-24: de nas de'i 'og tu sgrub pa brtsam par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370a-25: dang por re zhig byang bu 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-0: rtsig pa la tshon ma 'dres pa snod @370b gsar ba dag gi nang du bcug pa'i bir dag gis ri'i rgyal po ri rab zug zhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-1: rtse mo gzhi dang ldan pa ri bdun gyi phreng bas yongs su bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-2: ri de dag gi mtha' mar ri bo dag la brten pa'i phug kun tu bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-3: der gnas pa lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-4: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-5: gig bu gnod sbyin ma phug gnas ma zhes bya ba ro smad dar la gon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-6: stod g-yog dar la gyon pa gser gyi mdog can rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs mdzes pa bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-7: de lta bu'i ras ris bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-8: gtsang ba'i gnas su gtsang bas 'o ma'i zas kyis 'tsho zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-9: rig pa stong phrag bcu bzlas pa bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-10: ci nus pa'i mchod pa chen po byas na bzlas pa'i tha mar lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin mo snang ba chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-11: ldan par byas nas rang nyid 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-12: 'ongs pa na sna ma'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-13: tsandan dkar po bsres nas mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-15: ci zhig bya zhes smra bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-16: des smra bar bya ba ni bdag gi mar mdzod cig ces so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-17: de bzhin du bya'o zhes byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-18: de la sems 'gyod par na mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-19: de la 'dod pa dang ldan pa yang don du gnyer par yang mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:370b-20: de la 'phags ma rdzu 'phrul che ba don du gnyer na 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-0: de phan chad de la ma @371a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-1: dang 'dra bar bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-2: 'khor brgyad brgya dang bcas pa la zas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-3: gos rab tu ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-4: gnas ya nga ba las kyang skyob par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-6: ri'i steng du gnas na yang las thams cad yang dag par sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-7: bza' ba ci 'dod pa yang rab tu sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-9: bcud kyis len la sogs pa thams cad kyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-10: rab tu sbyin zhing ci 'dod pa yang rjes su sgrub par byed do /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-12: khang pa rtseg ma yang mngon par sprul par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-13: gser stong phrag kyang nyin re zhing rab tu sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-14: de nyid kyi nyin par thams cad zad par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-15: gal te mi byed na rnam par chad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-16: thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-18: 'di'i las ni ras ris 'di nyid kyi mdun du seng ldeng gi me rab tu sbar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-20: du ba dang bral ba'i mdag ma la lag pa g-yas pa'i mthil du ldong ros kyis gzugs brnyan du bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-22: bud med kyi ming lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil du bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-23: me mdag gi phung po de la bdugs shing sngags bzlas pa byas na dpag tshad brgyan gnas kyang 'ong bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371a-24: gang smras pa de thams cad byed du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-0: tho @371b rangs ni de nyid du khyer bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-1: las 'di nyid [?] ni mtshan mo bya ba yin gyi nyin par ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-3: aom na ra ba'i re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-4: de bzhin du 'di'i ras ris kyang bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-5: phug gi gnas ni ma gtogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-6: shing mya ngan med la brten pa bri bar bya la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-8: las gzhan thams cad ni phug gnas ma de bzhin du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-9: 'di la sring mo zhes kyang brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-10: 'di la las gzhan yang yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-11: zla ba gzas zin pa la btsag yug snam gro ba la gtums te khar bcug nas ji srid zla ba gzas btang gi bar du bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-12: de nas btsag yug snam gyi bud med dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-13: skyes pa gang gi ming bris pa de dpag tshad brgyan gnas kyang de nas 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-14: tho rangs ni de nyid du khyer bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-15: sring mo bzhin du bya ba rnams kyang byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-16: phongs pa'i dus su yang srung ba chen po byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-17: bzlas pa tsam gyis bud med thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-18: mi'i dpa' mo'i cho ga ni 'di'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-19: gnod sbyin gzhon nu ma'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-20: aom yaksha ku m'a ri ke sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-21: 'di'i cho ga ni gro ba la gi wang gis bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-22: gzhon nu ma mgo'i skra phyed bcings pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-23: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:371b-25: lag pa g-yas pa na ma du lung ga'i 'bras bu 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372a-0: lag pa g-yon pas shing mya ngan @372a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372a-2: de lta bu gro ba'i 'dab ma mgo'i gnas kyi steng du gzhag par byas nas dgon pa'i phyogs su gcig pu nyal bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372a-3: tsandan dkar po'i lde gus dkyil 'khor byas la dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog gis gcal bkram par byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372a-4: gu gul gyi bdugs pas bdugs nas rig pa stong rtsa brgyad zla ba gcig gi bar du bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372a-5: de nas zla ba nya ba la sna ma'i me tog gis mchod pa chen po byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372a-7: lha bshos kyang phul nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372a-8: ji srid du rnam thos sras kyi bu mo rang gi gzugs nyid kyis gzhon nu ma lnga brgyas yongs su bskor ba 'ong zhing phyogs de thams cad snang bar byas nas rang gi gzugs kyis nam mkha' la 'dug par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372a-9: de yang 'di skad du bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372a-10: de nas sgrub pa pos smra bar bya ba ni mchog gsum las gang yang rung ba gcig don du gnyer bar bya ba ni ma nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372a-13: gal te mar gyur na ni sems la 'gyod par mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372a-14: 'gyod na ni rnam par 'jig pa 'byung bar 'gyur bsam bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372a-15: ma des kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa'i zas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372b-0: rgyan gyi khyad par @372b thams cad yang dag par sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372b-1: nyin re zhing yang ti na ra stong ster bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372b-2: gal te 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du rnam par rgyun yang thams cad yang dag par sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372b-3: gang gi tshe sring mor gyur na yang de'i tshe dpag tshad brgya las kyang bud med 'gugs par byed cing de nyid du yang khyer bar byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372b-4: sring mo'i las thams cad kyang yang dag par sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372b-5: ci ste chung mar gyur na rang gi khyim du khyer zhing lo stong du 'tsho bar yang byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372b-6: gang gi tshe 'chi bar gyur pa de'i tshe yang rigs bzang por skye bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372b-7: ngag thams cad kyang chung ma bzhin du yang dag par sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372b-8: chung ma gnod sbyin ma'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372b-10: chung ma gnod sbyin mo 'di'i cho ga ni tsandan dkar po'i lde gus lag pa g-yas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372b-11: g-yon pa gur gum gyi lde gus nye bar byugs la lan stong du mngon par sngags pa byas nas mtshan mo gcig pu mi smra ba'i dka' thub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372b-12: dben pa'i sa phyogs su sgo gcad la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372b-14: brgyad til mar gyi nang du bcug la bcas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:372b-15: til mar de las ba ru ra'i 'bras bu blangs nas de la yongs su bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373a-0: sa las byas pa'i snod sar pa la bcug nas nyal ba'i rkang pa'i mthar bzhag la gnod sbyin 'di @373a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373a-1: nyid kyi sngags yi ge gcig pa stong gis mngon par sngags pa byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373a-2: gnas dben zhing mun pa'i phyogs su me tog gis gcal bkram pa la nyal bar byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373a-3: mi ma yin pa 'ongs nas rkang pa gnyis la lha'i bde ba'i reg pa 'jam pa'i lag pa'i mthil gyis bsku zhing byug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373a-4: gang gis reg pa tsam gyi lha'i bde ba'i reg pas gnyid 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373a-5: gang gi nyi ma shar na yang mtshan mo'i mthar dka' bas gnyid sad par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373a-6: rab tu sad na yang de nyid sems par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373a-8: lhan cig 'dod pa spyad par yang mi bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373a-9: smra bar yang ma byas na zla ba drug gis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373a-10: de nas de lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i bag ma sar pa 'dra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373a-11: g-yog 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373a-12: lag na mar me thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373a-13: 'jig rten rnams 'od bzang po dag gis gsal bar byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373a-15: rgyan sna tshogs 'bar ba dang ldan pa 'ongs nas kyang tshig rjod par byed la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373a-16: 'dod pa la longs spyod pa'i yo byad yongs su 'dzin pa 'ongs nas kyang sgrub pa po la mgul pa nas 'khyud par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373a-17: de nas bzung nas chung ma sdug pa bzhin du rjes su mthun par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373a-18: 'ongs na yang 'dod pa la brten par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373b-0: mtshan mo @373b yongs su spyad nas tho rangs mi snang bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373b-1: gser srang stong ri ba'i mu tig gi phreng ba mal du nyin re zhing yongs su bor nas 'gro bar yang byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373b-2: lhag ma ma lus par thams cad nyin re zhing zad par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373b-3: gal te cung zad 'jog par byed na yang yod par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373b-4: su la yang brjod par mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373b-5: gal te brjod par byed na phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro; ;yang na 'chi ba'i mtha'i bar du phung khrol byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373b-6: 'di dag ni mchog tu gsang zhing mchog tu sba bar bya ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373b-7: sems can gnyis pa la brjod pa ni bzod pa ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373b-11: bdag po la yang smra bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373b-12: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i phyugs kyi srog chags la yang brjod par mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373b-13: 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373b-14: gsang ba pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373b-15: gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi yang cho ga 'di nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373b-16: gal te gzhan la brjod na ni grub pa yang mi 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373b-18: rang gi chung ma la yang rtag tu 'gro ba yang rab tu spang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373b-20: aom ma no ha re ma dod sa ba ka ri bi tsitra ru pi nee mee thun pra ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:373b-21: de'i cho ga ni skyed mos tshal shing mya ngan med pa'i rtsar shin tu dben par khang pa byed du bcug la shin tu rab tu dben par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374a-1: mtho ba la gser gyi sgo 'phar bya zhing gtsang mar byas la bzlas pa 'bum phrag gcig byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374a-2: de nas las brtsam par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374a-3: zhag chen po blangs la dur khrod kyi skras snying po bya zhing sgo bcad la mar me sbar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374a-4: ras kha tshar dang bcas shing skra dang bral ba rab tu gsar pa sgo'i phyi rol tu bzhag na mtshan mo de gcer pur 'ongs nas gos de bgos nas nang du 'jug cing mi'i bud med kyi gzugs su byas shing de nas sgrub pa po de dang ji srid mar me 'bar gyi bar du dga' bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374a-5: mar me zad nas ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374a-6: gos de la gos gcig bcings te gos yongs su bzhag nas mal sna nas 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374a-7: yang na sgrub pa pos lag pa'i sor gdub bzhag pa las sor gdub gnyis pa yang bzhag nas 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374a-10: rkang pa gnyis kyi rkang gdub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374a-13: gzhan lha'i rgyan gcig cig gang de khyer ba de dang de rjes su ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374a-15: 'ong ba yang don med par mi byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374a-16: de bzhin du nyin re zhing yang ma lus par thams cad zad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374a-17: de bzhin du zla ba drug na smra bar byed na de'i tshe smra bar byas nas chung mar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374b-0: rtag tu gnas na bcud kyis @374b lan yang rab tu sbyin zhing gang 'thungs pas dus ring por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374b-1: yid kyis bsgoms nas seng ldeng gi phur bus sa brkos na lha'i gzhal med khang 'byung bar 'gyur la; phyung na ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374b-2: 'di'i sngags gnyis pa yod pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374b-3: aom ma h'a na gni na gni dzee sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374b-4: de nyid kyis mar me rab tu spar la sngags 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374b-5: phur bus mngon par sngags pa byas nas brko bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374b-6: phur bu phyung zhing mar me zad na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374b-10: ma he nag po'i rva dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374b-11: dur khrod kyi ras kyi snying po 'chang na yul gzhan du gang ci 'dod pa de yang ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374b-12: yang na rang nyid bya ste sngags kyang gzhan la mis byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374b-13: ci ste byin na ni rig pa chad par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374b-14: gang 'byin pa de'i phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374b-15: gang 'dod pa de yang gnas dben par byed na 'di'i grub pa don med par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374b-16: yang na gzhan dang rtse bar ni byed de 'on kyang de dang lhan cig smra bar ni mi byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374b-17: bud med gzhan dang phrad par mngon par 'dod pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374b-18: yid de la sems na yang de'i tshe zlos pa de'i gan du 'ong bar mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:374b-19: bud med gzhan dang phrad pa de'i dbang du 'gyur ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-1: su ra su na da ri sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-2: 'di'i cho ga ni seng ldeng gi shing gis me rab tu sbar la mar gyi sreg blugs kyis zla ba gcig la dus gsum du sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-3: de nas yar ngo'i zla ba nya la bsang byed kyis khres la 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-4: gtsang zhing gtsang pa'i sa phyogs dben par ji srid na ma phyed pa de srid du sngags bzlas pa byas na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur zhing de nas ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-6: chung ma sngar ji lta ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-7: thams cad kyang rgya cher brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-8: bdun po 'di dag gnod sbyin ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-9: phyag na rdo rje'i bka' yis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-10: lha dang lha min khams gsum du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-11: sa rnams kun tu yongs su rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-12: mi yul dag na sbyor bar dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-13: snying rjer ldan zhing rnam par rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-14: kha cig 'phags ma byis pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-15: gnod sbyin ma gzhan blun pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-16: gzhan dag phan byed 'tshe ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-17: de bzhin mtshan ma yongs su rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-19: brkam zhing sha ni za byed gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-21: de bzhin khrag la chags byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-22: rtag tu srog la gnod byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-23: khrag la dga' ba'i gnod sbyin mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-24: srung byed 'chi dang bcas gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-25: khyim ni kun tu yongs su rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375a-26: de dag tshar bcad bsgrub don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-0: dam tshig 'di ni rab tu @375b bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-2: byis pa rnams ni bsdus pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-3: sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-4: de ltar 'di kun gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-5: 'dod chags kyis mdongs sems rmongs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-6: gang tshe sngags pa 'khrig don gnyer //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-7: sngags kyis bkug byas longs spyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-9: klu mo 'am yang na dri za ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-11: lha min lha bas mchog gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-12: sa 'og gnas ni nyams dga' bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-13: gang du bud med grangs med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-14: sngags shes de ni rab tu 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-15: sngags shes sngags ni zlos pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-16: der song bskal par gnas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-17: byams pa zhes bya'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-19: de tshe des ni dam chos thos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-20: thos nas rab tu grol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-21: lha dang lha min bu mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-22: rig 'dzin bu mo dam pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-23: sngags kyis bkug nas spyod byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-24: de tshe lha yi bde bas dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-25: sngags pa dzambu'i gling gnas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-26: de nyid du ni rtag 'dren pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-27: gang tshe gtsang gnas gsang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-28: gtsang spra spyod pa rtag dga' ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-29: grub pa dam pa rmongs rnams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-31: bshad gci mi gtsang gnas dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-32: rtag tu dri nga rul pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-33: nad kyi sdug bsngal mya ngan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:375b-34: tha mar 'chi zhing sdug bsngal snod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-2: mi yi bud med reg mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-3: mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-4: stong pa gsog dang ther zug med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-5: byis pa rnams ni rje brid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-6: kun tu rtog las byung ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-8: sngags pas 'dod kun bsten mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-9: de dag chags bral zhes gsungs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-10: rnam grol de dag grub pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-11: gang zhig 'dod la chags bral ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-13: bshang gci khrag gis brlan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-14: rul pas kun tu khyab pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-15: rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-16: mi yi lus la reg mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-17: rmongs pa'am chags pa'i sems kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-18: der ni 'khrig pa brten mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-19: de dag rtag tu mi gtsang brten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-20: sngags kyi grub pa rnyed mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-21: sngags shes sngags kyi gzugs can dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-22: shes ldan dbang po thul ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-23: dpa' bo gtsang ba'i spyod la dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-24: rtag tu de yi sngags kyang 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-25: padma mtho ma rab dga' ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-26: mi pham ma dang rtag rgyal dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-27: sngo bsangs ldan pa'i gnod sbyin mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-31: 'di'i cho ga ni gang g'a'i ngogs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376a-33: skyed mos tshal gyi me tog gi ldum ra'i nang du lo ma'i spyil po byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376b-0: rab tu gtsang zhing bdag @376b nyid kyang gtsang bar byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376b-3: de nyid du mtshan mo sgo bcad nas 'dod pa'i yo byad kyi longs spyod rnams bsogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376b-4: de nyid du bdag nyid dang nye bar gnod sbyin mo'i mal yang bsham par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376b-5: rig pa stong phrag bcu bzlas pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376b-6: de bzhin du zla ba gcig byas na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376b-7: 'ongs nas kyang 'dod pa la longs spyod par byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376b-8: mu tig gi phreng ba bzang po mal du yongs su bor nas tho rangs 'gro bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376b-9: ji srid zla ba drug gi bar du nyin re zhing rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ro; ;gal te mu tig gi phreng ba de len na ni de tsam kho na yod par 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376b-10: phreng ba rin po che chen pos nye bar mdzes par byas pa de ni ti na ra 'bum ri ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376b-11: zla ba drug 'das nas ni rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376b-12: chung ma 'dod pa thams cad ster bar byed pa ji ltar rjes su mthun pa byas te nye bar gnas par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376b-13: sgrub pa po 'dod pa bzhin du ji ltar 'dod pa bdag nyid kyis mngon par sprul par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376b-14: gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi cho ga yang 'di yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376b-16: gzhan du yang sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376b-18: aom dza ye su dza ye dza ya ma ti sarba kary'a ni me ku ru sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376b-19: gser mdog lus ni sna tshogs lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:376b-20: sngo zhing 'khyil ba'i skra dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-2: zhi ba'i 'od ldan skal ldan dge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-3: snyan smra sgeg ldan gtso mo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-4: mu tig 'od ldan mthong na mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-5: rab bsngags gzugs ldan smin ma mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-6: 'jig rten kun gyis legs par mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-7: cung zad dmar ba'i gos gyon pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-8: de ni rgyal mar mngon par ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-9: 'di yis cho ga ni dang po 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-10: de nas dgon pa chen por rab tu zhugs nas 'bras bu'i zas za zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-11: ji srid du rang nyid kyi gzugs kyis 'ong ba de'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-12: 'ongs nas kyang smra ba ni ci zhig bya zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-13: gal te mar gyur na ni mar bzhin du re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing rgyal thabs ster bar byed la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-14: nor gyi bdag po chen po yang byed la tshe ring ba nyid du yang gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-15: ci ste sring mor 'gyur na ni dpag tshad stong du gnas kyang ji ltar 'dod ba'i bud med 'gugs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-16: nyin re zhing yang ti nar 'bum sbyin par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-18: ci ste chung mar gyur na ni rang gi gnas su khyer te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-19: lha'i gzhal med khang du 'dzogs nas de dang lhan cig dga' bar byed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377a-20: dus ring por lo stong phrag sum cu'i bar du ji ltar 'dod pa rnam par spyod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-0: gnod sbyin chen @377b po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-1: rab tu dga' ma'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-2: aom hrisht'i ma h'a na gni h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-3: 'di'i cho ga ni mtshan phyed kyi bar du bzlas pa grangs med pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-4: phyir yang gnyid log par ma byas na zla ba gcig gi nang du nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-5: chung mar gyur na ni 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-6: nyin re zhing ti na ra nyi shu rtsa lnga rab tu sbyin par byed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-7: rang gi mdzod nyid kyang ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-8: dus ring po yang 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-9: de bzhin du gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag du ma yang yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-10: de bzhin du sha za mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-11: sha za mo rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-13: lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-15: lha ma yin gyi bud med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-16: de bzhin du rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi bud med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-18: mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi sngags grangs med pa dag kyang yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-19: de bzhin du gnod sbyin rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:377b-33: phag mo la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyang yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-0: so so so sor thams cad dam tshig gis 'dir bkug nas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyis zos @378a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-2: dam tshig la bzhag cing 'jam pa'i dbyangs la nye bar gtad nas rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-3: go rims bzhin du gnas shing bsnyen bkur yang byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-4: thams cad kyi yang mdor bsdu na 'khrul 'khor gyi gzugs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-5: de nyid kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-6: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi rig pa ji srid gzugs brnyan rab tu 'gul ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-8: rdul 'byung ba'i bar du bzlas pa byas na rang nyid kyi gzugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-9: gang smras pa de thams cad yang dag par sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-12: gzhon nu ma bzhi gnod sbyin ma chen mo'i ming po tum pu ru zhes bya ba yang dag par rten pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-13: gru'i theg pa la yang dag par zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-14: 'jig rten thams cad kyis rab tu mchod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-15: sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin par byed pa de dag kyang cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-18: spang leb la mtsho'i dkyil du bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-19: gru'i theg pa la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-20: phu bo ming po'i rjes su 'gro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-21: bu mo bzhi po nyid kyang rgya mtsho'i nang du zhugs shing mnyam par 'dug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-22: de dag mi snang gnas gzhan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-23: khro bo'i bzlas pa yang dag brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378a-25: de dag kun ni skye 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-0: @378b de tshe grub pa yin shes nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-1: sngags kyi bzlas pa yongs su btang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-2: mtshan mo'i tha mar rang tshul nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-3: dge dang mi dge ston par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-4: skad cig gis ni zlos ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-5: don rnams thams cad sgrub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-6: khro bos bkug cing rgyas byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-7: smras pa thams cad byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-8: rtag tu nyi ma sogs kyi gza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-9: de bzhin drang srong srin po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-10: nam mkha' lding dang sha zas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-11: rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-12: dbang phyug che sogs 'byung pos kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-13: rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-14: de dag gis bshad cho ga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-15: sngags rgyud rgya che bcas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-16: thams cad de dag khro rgyal gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-18: gang dag sngags ni ci yod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-20: de kun khro bo'i rgyal po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-21: de dag bsgo ba mnyam par bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-22: gang yang 'phags pa'i sngags dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-23: thams cad kun 'gro'i khyad par can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-24: mchog dang rab mchog drag po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-25: gang yang de bzhin rgyal bas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-27: bdag nyid kyis kyang rab bshad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-28: gang yang gzhan gyis sngags mchog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-29: rigs lnga dag gis gsungs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-31: rgyal ba'i sras kyis gsungs ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-32: khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul ches //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:378b-33: thams cad de dag yang dag 'gugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:379a-3: gang zhig gang dag cho gar bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:379a-4: de nyid 'dir ni nges par sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:379a-5: gshin rje gshed ni khro rgyal gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:379a-6: las kun byed pa'i mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:379a-7: sgrol ma khro gnyer can nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:379a-8: de bzhin gos dkar mo dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:379a-9: de bzhin dkar chen rig ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:379a-10: rdo rje'i rigs 'byung m'a ma ki /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:379a-11: gtsug tor 'byung ba thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:379a-12: lha mo spyan ni nyid dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:379a-13: de bzhin gshegs kun rig pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:379a-14: mthu chen thob dang kun bzang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:379a-16: bdag kyang 'jig rten gnod sbyin bdag /
