K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443a-3: sngags kyi tshig ni 'di smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443a-4: nam: sarba buddha bo dhi satve bhya: aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa ne bhya:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443a-6: sarba bha yod a'a da ya tr'a s'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sa chen po 'di ri dang rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa dang bcas pa rnam pa drug tu g-yos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi zhing mtha' yas pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs kyi mthar thug pa thams cad dang bcas pa yang rab tu 'gul bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byin gyis brlabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443a-15: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'jigs pa dang bral nas ba spu langs te ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443b-0: mig gnyis phye ste stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas lan gsum bskor ba byas shing 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon du bltas nas sngags kyi tshig de dag gzungs ste yid la byas nas phyir yang shing rta la zhon te lha ma yin gang @443b yin pa de logs su phyin par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443b-1: de nas lha ma yin thams cad rgya mtsho chen po'i mtha'i 'gram du gang rang gi grong khyer gang yin pa der mngon du phyogs shing song bar gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443b-2: sems zhum zhing nyams la dpung gi 'jigs pas sems dkrugs shing gdong gi mdog nyams shing nga rgyal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443b-3: dregs pa la sogs pa dang bral bar gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443b-4: mtshon cha dang bral zhing ri 'bigs byed 'bar ba bzhin du lha'i dbang phyug de mthong nas byer bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443b-5: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443b-9: sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha ma yin las bdag cag nges par rgyal bas rang gi gnas su 'gro bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443b-10: rang rang gi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du song nas khyed cag rtse ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443b-11: dga' ba yongs su spyod par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443b-12: de nas lha de dag thams cad yid shin tu dga' nas phyir yang rang gi gnas su log par gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443b-13: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:443b-14: gang bdag gis gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyi gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa de byas la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la'ang btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444a-0: des na gong gi lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa mi @444a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444a-2: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis chen po la 'os pa'i nor bu rin po che nang 'od dang ldan zhing gsal ba'i phreng ba blangs nas gzhon nu'i cha byad kyi gzugs brnyan byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444a-3: steng gi khang bzangs su grong khyer chen po blta na sdug pa'i dbus na lha rnams kyi mdun sa chos bzang gi rtse mor rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba legs par bkod pa byas nas bzhag par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444a-4: de nas lha ma yin de dag rab tshim byed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444a-5: thag bzangs ris la sogs lha rnams kyi steng du mi 'gro zhing lha de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444a-7: g-yul mngon du phyogs par 'gro bar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444a-8: de ltar lo bye ba khri phrag du ma mi ma yin pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar yang lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444a-9: de bzhin du phan yon dpag tu med pa bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang sngon du gsungs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444a-14: de bzhin du phan yon gyi yon tan mchog 'di dag rgya che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444a-15: mtha' yas shing mu med pa sngon gsungs pa yin no /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-0: @444b gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-1: rnam par rtog par byed na bsod nams ma yin pa dpag tu med par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing dmyal bar yang skye bar 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-4: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi skye ba ngan par yang 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-7: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-8: de rnams bdag nyid chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-9: rnam par 'phrul pa yang med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-10: cho ga rgya che ba yang med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-11: 'phags pa ma yin pas bshad do zhes byas nas spong ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-12: yang na 'gro zhing 'di nyan par mi nus so zhes gnas de las gzhan du 'gro na de dag la bsod nams ma yin pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;ci ste blo chung ba gang gis chos 'di ni thub pa mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-13: thub pa'i sras blo dang ldan pa ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-14: zhes rab tu spong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-17: thig nag dang ni yang sos dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-18: spu gri so dang me ma mur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-19: ro myags chu bo rab med skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-20: de nas phyir yang spu gri sor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-21: lo ma ral gri lta bu'i nags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-22: yang na kyi hud zer de bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-23: 'jig rten grags pa so thams thams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:444b-24: sdig pa'i las kyi dmyal ba ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-2: des ni skye bo de dag 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-3: 'jig rten smad par rab bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-4: mi bzad mnar med pa zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-5: ma dad sems kyis chos spangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-6: sdig pa'i las can gnas yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-9: kun gyi mthar thug mnar med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-10: de nyams de bzhin dmyal chen skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-11: dmyal ba'i sa mtha' mtha' yas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-12: rtag tu blo med de ni 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-13: mdo sde de ni rgya cher bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-14: chos kyi nor kun rab spangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-16: dbang med rtag par dbang du 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-17: gang zhig mdo sde'i cho ga 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-18: sngags dang rgyud kyis legs par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-19: grub pa sna tshogs brgya rnams 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-20: yang dag mtha' ni sgrib pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-21: chos kyi dbyings kyi sku nyid yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-22: dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-23: cho ga cho ga rgya chen bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-25: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni legs dgod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-26: phun tshogs dpal dang blo gros mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-27: rtsa ba'i cho ga mi nyung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-28: rgya che mang por bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-29: rtag dang chad dang thog mtha' ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-30: gnyi ga'i mtha' don rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445a-31: rim bcas rim ni nges par bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-0: sngags kyi lus ni btus pa @445b yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-1: me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-2: stong pa'i de nyid legs gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-3: spangs pa rtag tu 'gro ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-5: bskal pa rnams mang gsum gyi grangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-6: de tshe bsod nams yongs bsags nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-7: de tshe byang chub thob nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-8: bdag dang rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-9: sngags dang rgyud kyi don gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-10: 'gro ba yul ni sdig med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-11: rtsa ba'i cho ga dag byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-12: sdig pa med cing bkra shis pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-14: nges pa'i mdo sde bzang po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-15: sa bdag yon tan bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-16: yul dang dus kyi sbyor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-17: rgyal sras mi ru skyes pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-18: sa steng dam pa'i chos bstan ces //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-19: 'jig rten gtso bo thub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-20: rgyal ba bdun pas bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-21: cho ga rgya cher gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-22: blo dang dpal ni mngon par 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-24: sngags dang rgyud dang ldan pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-25: gang zhig mdo mchog gtso bo 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-26: rgyal bas mchod pa'i chos kyi mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-27: sa steng mis ni spong byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-28: de ni mnar med dmyal bar 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-29: bskal pa chen por de 'tshed ces //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-30: rnam pa du mar dbye bar bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-31: nam zhig gang du 'byung ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-32: mi yi lus su skyes na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-33: dbul zhing nad mang glen pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:445b-34: kla klo dag tu skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446a-2: de ni mdze can nad par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446a-3: lkugs shing 'on pa yan lag nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446a-4: blo nyams long ba nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446a-5: rtsub cing rtag tu 'jig pa'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446a-6: sa steng yi dvags lta bur snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446a-7: gros ngan sems ni zhan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446a-8: sen mo dang ni lus kyang ngan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446a-9: srin bu rnams kyis zos pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446a-10: shu ba g-yan par yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446a-11: mdo sde 'di ni rab spangs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446a-13: de dang der ni skye ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446a-14: blo ngan rmongs par skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446a-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446a-16: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te mig phye zhing mi 'dzum pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446a-17: 'byung po'i tshogs du ma chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus pa shes nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446a-19: ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngo mtshar te mchog tu legs par gsungs pa lags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446b-0: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can mi rigs pa'i chags pas zil @446b gyis non pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446b-6: tshul khrims 'chal ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446b-7: de dag sngags rnams kyi rtog pa'i bdag nyid chen po rgyas pa grub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446b-14: bzlas pa nges par sdom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446b-15: chog rab 'byams dag la ma dad par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446b-17: sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no zhes byas nas spang bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446b-18: de dag nyon mongs pa'i sems su gyur nas dus byed par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446b-19: sdug bsngal drag cing tsha ba'i tshor pa myong zhing de dag dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446b-21: sdug bsngal ba'i sems can de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446b-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la spyi bor byugs nas bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446b-25: khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir rab tu zhugs pa khyod kyang legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446b-26: legs so; ;'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:446b-27: khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa de khyed yang legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447a-1: phyir legs par shin tu rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447a-2: sems can thams cad kyi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447a-4: bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447a-7: 'jig rten la rab tu brtse ba'i phyir ngas khyod la bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447a-8: spyod pa thams cad la zhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447a-11: chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447a-12: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi skul gnas par 'dod pa rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal po mchog tu gsang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447a-13: gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang 'di dran par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447a-15: na mo stee ya dhya ta th'a ga te bhya:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447a-18: aom ku m'a ra rlu pi ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447a-27: sarba du: khe bhya: phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447a-31: p'a pam me n'a sha ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447a-33: 'di ni khyod kyi snying po dam pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447a-34: zhi ba thams cad byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447a-35: sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447a-36: sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu grol bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447b-0: skal pa @447b bzang po mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447b-1: ngag gi dbang phyug skyed par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447b-2: rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad gzengs bstod par byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas 'di gsungs ma thag tu sa chen po ri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447b-5: sems can dang snod nye ba'i mthar thug pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447b-6: 'gro ba thams cad de yi dvags kyi 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447b-9: dmyal ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu sbyangs shing bde ba rnams kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447b-11: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yang yid la byed cing de'i tshe dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems kyang med par 'gyur na bdud sdig to can gyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447b-13: log 'dren thams cad kyang 'byer bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447b-14: 'di ltar yang sems bskyed par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447b-16: chos ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447b-19: spong ba ni bdag cag gis ci zhig nus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:447b-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448a-0: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i @448a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448a-3: nyes dmigs kyi nus par ba 'byams bstan pa'i le'u sum cu drug pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448a-6: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448a-7: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448a-8: gnas gtsang ma'i steng na gnas pa'i lha'i bu'i tshogs rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448a-9: sems can bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448a-20: drang srong mchog dam pa du ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448a-21: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448a-22: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448a-26: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448a-27: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448a-28: chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448a-29: rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra bar bzhugs pa'i sangs @448b rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams thugs rangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448b-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448b-4: dpal lha btsan po lha btsun pa byang chub 'od kyi bkas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448b-5: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge bsnyen chen po ku m'a ra ka la sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-022:448b-6: sgra bsgyur gyi lotstsha ba dge slong sh'akya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
